    table_defaults
        sqlserver_location 'STATIC' 
        sqlserver_collation 'Latin1_General_CI_AS_WS' 
        sqlserver_collation_case_sensitive 'Latin1_General_CS_AS_WS';
        

    index_defaults
        sqlserver_location 'STATIC_I';

    table SAMPLE_POINT;

    {SAMPLE_POINT.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias IDENTIFIER 
        datatype IDENTITY(10) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {SAMPLE_POINT.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        alias GROUP 
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {SAMPLE_POINT.POINT_LOCATION}
    field POINT_LOCATION
        alias LOCATION_ID, LOCATION 
        links_to LOCATION.IDENTITY;

    {SAMPLE_POINT.SAMPLE_TYPE}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        prompt_type phrase IDENTITIES 
        phrase_type SAMP_TYPE;

    {SAMPLE_POINT.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {SAMPLE_POINT.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {SAMPLE_POINT.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {SAMPLE_POINT.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {SAMPLE_POINT.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {SAMPLE_POINT.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    {SAMPLE_POINT.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.DELIV_LOCATION}
    field DELIV_LOCATION
        datatype TEXT (25);

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.VOLUME}
    field VOLUME
        datatype INTEGER 
        format 9999;

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.LABEL_COUNT}
    field LABEL_COUNT
        datatype INTEGER 
        format 99;

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.MPS_TEMPLATE}
    field MPS_TEMPLATE
        links_to SAMP_TMPL_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.GLOBAL_SP}
    field GLOBAL_SP
        datatype IDENTITY (17) 
        default 'MISSING' 
        prompt_type choose 
        choose_type GLOBAL_SP;

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.MPS_EXPORT}
    field MPS_EXPORT
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'No' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.CHECK_PRODUCT_BEFORE}
    field CHECK_PRODUCT_BEFORE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'No' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.MES_SP}
    field MES_SP
        datatype IDENTITY (10);

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.SITE}
    field SITE
        datatype IDENTITY (20) 
        prompt_type phrase 
        phrase_type SITE;

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.AREA}
    field AREA
        datatype IDENTITY (30) 
        prompt_type phrase 
        phrase_type AREA;

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.ROOM}
    field ROOM
        datatype TEXT (20) 
        default 'NONE' 
        prompt_type phrase 
        phrase_type ROOM;

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.ZONE}
    field ZONE
        datatype IDENTITY (50) 
        default 'NONE' 
        prompt_type phrase 
        phrase_type SP_ZONE;

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.EQUIPMENT}
    field EQUIPMENT
        datatype IDENTITY (10);

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.TAG_ID}
    field TAG_ID
        datatype IDENTITY (10);

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.PRODUCT_IMPACT}
    field PRODUCT_IMPACT
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'No' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.ALLOW_TRANSFER}
    field ALLOW_TRANSFER
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'No' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    {Custom} 
    {SAMPLE_POINT.INSPECTION_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_TYPE
        datatype TEXT (2) 
        allowed_characters '0..9 ';

    table REPORT
        alias REPORTFORMAT;

    {REPORT.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias IDENTIFIER 
        datatype IDENTITY (20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {REPORT.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        alias GROUP 
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {REPORT.TITLE}
    field TITLE
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {REPORT.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {REPORT.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {REPORT.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {REPORT.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {REPORT.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    {REPORT.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    table SAMPLE
        noindex 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE' 
        prompt_description 'STRUCTURE_SAMPLE';

    {SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        alias IDNUMERIC
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE
        prompt_type USER_DEFINED
        descending
        prompt_description 'STRUCTURE_SAMPLE_ID_NUMERIC'
        allowed_characters ' ..`'
        library '$PROMPT_SAMPLE'
        routine 'prompt_sample';

    {SAMPLE.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        datatype IDENTITY (30) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1) 
        allowed_characters ' ..`'
        prompt_description 'STRUCTURE_SAMPLE_ID_TEXT' ;

    {SAMPLE.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        alias JOBNAME 
        links_to PARENT JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME
        prompt_description 'STRUCTURE_SAMPLE_JOB_NAME' ;

    {SAMPLE.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2) 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type SAMP_STAT;

    {SAMPLE.OLD_STATUS}
    field OLD_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type SAMP_STAT;

    {SAMPLE.COMPARED}
    field COMPARED
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {SAMPLE.ON_SPEC}
    field ON_SPEC
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {SAMPLE.RE_SAMPLED}
    field RE_SAMPLED
        datatype BOOLEAN;

collection child_formulation on sample_formulation using parent_sample;

collection parent_formulation on sample_formulation using child_sample;

    index SAMPLE_ID_CONC_IDX
        on CONCERN_FUNCTION 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index SAMPLE_LOCATION_IDNUM_IDX
        on LOCATION_ID, ID_NUMERIC, STANDARD, JOB_NAME, LOGIN_DATE, PRODUCT, SAMPLING_POINT 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index SAMPLE_BATCH_NAME_INDEX
        on BATCH_NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index SAMPLE_PRODUCT_INDEX
        on PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, STATUS 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index SAMPLE_PRD_PRV_IDN_IDX
        on PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, ID_NUMERIC 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index SAMPLE_ID_NUMERIC_GROUP UNIQUE
        on STATUS, GROUP_ID, ID_NUMERIC;

    index SAMPLE_ID_TEXT_GROUP UNIQUE
        on STATUS, GROUP_ID, ID_TEXT;

    index sample_id_text_index unique
        on ID_TEXT 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index sample_job_name_index
        on JOB_NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index idx_sample_label
        on ID_NUMERIC, ID_TEXT, JOB_NAME, RECD_DATE, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, DATE_EXP, TESTMIX_ID 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    {TEST.WORKFLOW_NODE}
    field WORKFLOW_NODE
        links_to WORKFLOW_NODE.WORKFLOW_NODE_GUID 
        default '536C9DA2-7668-4701-92B0-754E1F1BA2A6';

    {TEST.ENTITY_TEMPLATE_ID}
    field ENTITY_TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to ENTITY_TEMPLATE.IDENTITY AS ENTITY_TEMPLATE;

    {TEST.ENTITY_TEMPLATE_VERSION}
    field ENTITY_TEMPLATE_VERSION
        links_to ENTITY_TEMPLATE.ENTITY_TEMPLATE_VERSION AS ENTITY_TEMPLATE;

    {TEST.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    {TEST.DATE_EXP}
    field DATE_EXP
        datatype DATE 
        default NULL;

    {TEST.WORKSHEET_NAME}
    field WORKSHEET_NAME
        datatype TEXT (20);

    {TEST.LABEL_PRINTED}
    field LABEL_PRINTED
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'No' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    {TEST.LOGIN_DATE}
    field LOGIN_DATE
        datatype DATE 
        default '0';

    index TEST_WORKSHEET_INDEX
        on WORKSHEET 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index TEST_SAMPLE_INDEX
        on SAMPLE 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index test_i unique
        on test_number rdb_location 'HASH_STORAGE_AREA' rdb_specific 'TYPE IS HASHED' 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index samp_anal_index
        on sample , ANALYSIS 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index test_analysis_index
        on ANALYSIS 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    table RESULT
        noindex 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE';

    {RESULT.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to PARENT TEST.TEST_NUMBER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {RESULT.NAME}
    field NAME
        alias COMPONENT_NAME 
        datatype TEXT (60) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, NAME, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1) CASE_SENSITIVE;

        alias COMP_NUM 
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

        datatype TEXT(1);

        datatype REAL;

        datatype IDENTITY;

        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    index RESULT_I UNIQUE
        on TEST_NUMBER, NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index RESULT_ENTERED_I
        on ENTERED_ON 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index RESULT_STATUS_I
        on TEST_NUMBER, NAME, TEXT, UNITS, STATUS 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index RESULT_COV_IND2
        on TEST_NUMBER, NAME, ORDER_NUMBER, RESULT_TYPE, TEXT, VALUE, UNITS, ENTERED_BY, ENTERED_ON, MAXIMUM, MINIMUM, OUT_OF_RANGE 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    {PREPARATION.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    table MLP_LEVEL
        alias MLP_LEVELS;

    {MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {MLP_LEVEL.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_TYPE}
    field LEVEL_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        prompt_type 
        phrase IDENTITIES VALID phrase_type MLP_LEVELS;

    {MLP_LEVEL.MESSAGE_ACTION}
    field MESSAGE_ACTION
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {MLP_LEVEL.REPORT_ACTION}
    field REPORT_ACTION
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        default 'D' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type REPT_ACT;

    {MLP_LEVEL.RESULT_ACTION}
    field RESULT_ACTION
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        default 'A' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type RESL_ACT;

    {MLP_LEVEL.DISPLAY_MESSAGE}
    field DISPLAY_MESSAGE
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {MLP_LEVEL.REPORT_NAME}
    field REPORT_NAME
        links_to REPORT.IDENTITY;

    {MLP_LEVEL.ROUTINE_NAME}
    field ROUTINE_NAME
        datatype TEXT (20) 
        prompt_type USER_DEFINED LIBRARY '$PROMPT_ROUTINE' ROUTINE 'prompt_routine';

    {MLP_LEVEL.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {MLP_LEVEL.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {MLP_LEVEL.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {MLP_LEVEL.AQL_LEVEL}
    field AQL_LEVEL
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'No' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'No' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    table MLP_HEADER NOINDEX;

    index MLP_HEAD_ID_INDEX
        on IDENTITY, PRODUCT_VERSION, APPROVAL_STATUS, GROUP_ID, REMOVEFLAG;

    index MLP_HEAD_VERS_INDEX
        on PRODUCT_VERSION;

    index MLP_GROUP_INDEX
        on PRODUCT_GROUP;

    index MLP_SUBGROUP_INDEX
        on PRODUCT_SUBGROUP;

    index MLP_SAMPTYPE_INDEX
        on SAMPLE_TYPE;

    table MLP_ANALYSIS;

    {MLP_ANALYSIS.PRODUCT_ID}
    field PRODUCT_ID
        links_to PARENT MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY AS PARENT_MLP 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MLP_ANALYSIS.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to PARENT MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION AS PARENT_MLP 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, VERSION_NUMBER;

    {MLP_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_ID}
    field ANALYSIS_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MLP_ANALYSIS.SAMPLING_INSP_LEVEL}
    field SAMPLING_INSP_LEVEL
        datatype IDENTITY 
        default 'II' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type STAT_SIL_A;

    {MLP_ANALYSIS.INSPECTION_LEVEL}
    field INSPECTION_LEVEL
        datatype IDENTITY 
        default 'NORMAL' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type STAT_IL;

    {MLP_ANALYSIS.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING;

    table MLP_COMPONENTS;

    {MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to PARENT MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION AS PARENT_MLP 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, VERSION_NUMBER;

    {MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID}

        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    field COMPONENT_NAME

    {MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_NUMBER}

        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_TYPE}

        datatype TEXT (1) 
        prompt_type 
        phrase VALID IDENTITIES phrase_type RES_COMP;

    {MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to UNIT_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {MLP_COMPONENTS.PLACES}
    field PLACES
        datatype INTEGER 
        lower_limit -1;

    {MLP_COMPONENTS.TYPICAL_TEXT}
    field TYPICAL_TEXT
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE}
    field ENTRY_CODE
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {MLP_COMPONENTS.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING;

    index MLP_COMPONENTS_EC_I
        on ENTRY_CODE 
        sqlserver_location 'STATIC_I';

    index MLP_COMPONENTS_COMP_I
        on ANALYSIS_ID, COMPONENT_NAME, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_VERSION, ENTRY_CODE
        sqlserver_location 'STATIC_I';
 
    
    table MLP_VALUES
        alias LIMIT;

    {MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE}
    field ENTRY_CODE
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        datatype TEXT (10);

    {MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        datatype TEXT (10);

    {MLP_VALUES.TEXT_SPEC}
    field TEXT_SPEC
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {MLP_VALUES.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        links_to LIMIT_CALCULATION.IDENTITY;

    {MLP_VALUES.TEXT_PHRASE}
    field TEXT_PHRASE
        links_to LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS}
    field BOOLEAN_PASS
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {MLP_VALUES.AQL_VALUE}
    field AQL_VALUE
        datatype TEXT(234);

    {MLP_VALUES.PRODUCT_ID}
    field PRODUCT_ID
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {MLP_VALUES.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {MLP_VALUES.ANALYSIS_ID}
    field ANALYSIS_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    {MLP_VALUES.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME;

    index MLP_VALUES_EC_I
        on ENTRY_CODE, LEVEL_ID 
        sqlserver_location 'STATIC_I';

    index MLP_VALUES_PROD_I
        on PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_VERSION, ANALYSIS_ID, COMPONENT_NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'STATIC_I';

    index SQL_LEVEL_ID
        on LEVEL_ID, ENTRY_CODE, MIN_LIMIT, MAX_LIMIT, TEXT_PHRASE, ANALYSIS_ID
        sqlserver_location 'STATIC_I';

        datatype IDENTITY;


    view MLP_VERSIONS_VIEW
        alias MLP_VERSIONS 
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {MLP_VERSIONS_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MLP_VERSIONS_VIEW.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        alias VERSION 
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY DESCENDING;

    {MLP_VERSIONS_VIEW.VERSION_COMMENT}
    field VERSION_COMMENT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.VERSION_COMMENT;

    {MLP_VERSIONS_VIEW.VERSION_STATUS}
    field VERSION_STATUS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_STATUS;

    {MLP_VERSIONS_VIEW.CREATED_DATE}
    field CREATED_DATE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.CREATED_DATE;

    {MLP_VERSIONS_VIEW.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to MLP_HEADER.NAME;

    select_clause
        select MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY], MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION, MLP_HEADER.VERSION_COMMENT, MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_STATUS, MLP_HEADER.CREATED_DATE, MLP_HEADER.NAME
        from MLP_HEADER;


    view MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW
        alias PRODUCT
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.IDENTITY}

        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.MATERIAL_TYPE}

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.MATGROUPDESC}

        links_to MLP_HEADER.MATGROUPDESC;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MODIFIABLE;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.MPS_EXPORT}
    field MPS_EXPORT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MPS_EXPORT;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.MPS_TEMPLATE}
    field MPS_TEMPLATE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MPS_TEMPLATE;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to MLP_HEADER.NAME;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.PRODHIERAKEYNAME}
    field PRODHIERAKEYNAME
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODHIERAKEYNAME;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP}
    field PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.PRODUCT_FORM}
    field PRODUCT_FORM
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_FORM;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.PRODUCT_FORMAT}
    field PRODUCT_FORMAT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_FORMAT;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.PRODUCT_GROUP}
    field PRODUCT_GROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_GROUP;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.PRODUCT_IDENTIFICATION}
    field PRODUCT_IDENTIFICATION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_IDENTIFICATION;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.PRODUCT_STATUS}
    field PRODUCT_STATUS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_STATUS;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP}
    field PRODUCT_SUBGROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.PROJECT_ID}
    field PROJECT_ID
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PROJECT_ID;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.QC_DATE}
    field QC_DATE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.QC_DATE;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.QC_NUMBER}
    field QC_NUMBER
        links_to MLP_HEADER.QC_NUMBER;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.QCQS_COMMENT}
    field QCQS_COMMENT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.QCQS_COMMENT;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.QS_DATE}
    field QS_DATE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.QS_DATE;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.QS_NUMBER}
    field QS_NUMBER
        links_to MLP_HEADER.QS_NUMBER;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        links_to MLP_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.SAMPLE_TYPE}

        links_to MLP_HEADER.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.SAP_CERT}

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.SAP_MASTERSTATUS}

        links_to MLP_HEADER.SAP_MASTERSTATUS;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.SAP_UNIQUEID}
    field SAP_UNIQUEID
        links_to MLP_HEADER.SAP_UNIQUEID;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.SOS_GROUP}
    field SOS_GROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.SOS_GROUP;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.STRAINS}
    field STRAINS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.STRAINS;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.SUBSTANCE}
    field SUBSTANCE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.SUBSTANCE;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.TEST_SCHEDULE}
    field TEST_SCHEDULE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.TEST_SCHEDULE;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.VERSION_COMMENT}
    field VERSION_COMMENT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.VERSION_COMMENT;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.VERSION_STATUS}
    field VERSION_STATUS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.VERSION_STATUS;

    {MLP_LATEST_VERSION_VIEW.WARN_MSG}
    field WARN_MSG
        links_to MLP_HEADER.WARN_MSG;


    select_clause
        SELECT
            M1.[IDENTITY],
            M1.PRODUCT_VERSION,
            M1.PRODUCT_CODE,
            M1.DESCRIPTION,
            M1.PRODUCTAREA,
            M1.PRODUCTSEGMENT,
            M1.PRODUCTCLUSTER,
            M1.PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER,
            M1.APPROVAL_STATUS,
            M1.APPR_DATE,
            M1.MODIFIED_ON,
            M1.MODIFIED_BY,
            M1.ALLOW_AGREE,
            M1.AMOUNT_01,
            M1.APPROVAL_REQD,
            M1.CERT_TYPE,
            M1.CONVERTED_BY,
            M1.CONVERTED_DATE,
            M1.CREATED_DATE,
            M1.CULTURE_GROUP,
            M1.DISP_RESP,
            M1.DO_SPLAN_LOGIN,
            M1.ENTRY_CODE,
            M1.EXTERNAL_VERSION,
            M1.GMP_STATUS,
            M1.GROUP_ID,
            M1.HAS_ATTACHMENTS,
            M1.INSPECTION_PLAN,
            M1.MASTER_PLANT,
            M1.MATERIAL_TYPE,
            M1.MATGROUPDESC,
            M1.MODIFIABLE,
            M1.MPS_EXPORT,
            M1.MPS_TEMPLATE,
            M1.NAME,
            M1.PRODHIERAKEYNAME,
            M1.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP,
            M1.PRODUCT_FORM,
            M1.PRODUCT_FORMAT,
            M1.PRODUCT_GROUP,
            M1.PRODUCT_IDENTIFICATION,
            M1.PRODUCT_STATUS,
            M1.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP,
            M1.PROJECT_ID,
            M1.QC_DATE,
            M1.QC_NUMBER,
            M1.QCQS_COMMENT,
            M1.QS_DATE,
            M1.QS_NUMBER,
            M1.REMOVEFLAG,
            M1.SAMPLE_TYPE,
            M1.SAP_CERT,
            M1.SAP_MASTERSTATUS,
            M1.SAP_UNIQUEID,
            M1.SOS_GROUP,
            M1.STRAINS,
            M1.SUBSTANCE,
            M1.TEST_SCHEDULE,
            M1.VERSION_COMMENT,
            M1.VERSION_STATUS,
            M1.WARN_MSG
        FROM MLP_HEADER M1
        WHERE PRODUCT_VERSION >= (SELECT MAX(PRODUCT_VERSION)
                                    FROM MLP_HEADER M2
                                    WHERE M2.[IDENTITY] = M1.[IDENTITY]
                                    AND M2.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A'
                                    AND M2.REMOVEFLAG = 'F');

    view WORK_PROFILE
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {WORK_PROFILE.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY , PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {WORK_PROFILE.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        alias VERSION 
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY , VERSION_NUMBER , DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {WORK_PROFILE.PRODUCT_CODE}
    field PRODUCT_CODE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_CODE;

    {WORK_PROFILE.ENTRY_CODE}
    field ENTRY_CODE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.ENTRY_CODE;

    {WORK_PROFILE.PRODUCT_GROUP}
    field PRODUCT_GROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_GROUP;

    {WORK_PROFILE.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {WORK_PROFILE.TEST_SCHEDULE}
    field TEST_SCHEDULE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.TEST_SCHEDULE;

    {WORK_PROFILE.PRODUCT_STATUS}
    field PRODUCT_STATUS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_STATUS;

    {WORK_PROFILE.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {WORK_PROFILE.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {WORK_PROFILE.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MODIFIABLE 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {WORK_PROFILE.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        links_to MLP_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {WORK_PROFILE.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to MLP_HEADER.GROUP_ID 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {WORK_PROFILE.VERSION_COMMENT}
    field VERSION_COMMENT
        alias COMMENT 
        links_to MLP_HEADER.VERSION_COMMENT;

    {WORK_PROFILE.VERSION_STATUS}
    field VERSION_STATUS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.VERSION_STATUS;

    {WORK_PROFILE.CREATED_DATE}
    field CREATED_DATE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.CREATED_DATE;

    {WORK_PROFILE.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to MLP_HEADER.NAME;

    select_clause
        select M.[IDENTITY], M.PRODUCT_VERSION, M.PRODUCT_CODE, M.ENTRY_CODE, M.PRODUCT_GROUP, M.DESCRIPTION, M.TEST_SCHEDULE, M.PRODUCT_STATUS, M.MODIFIED_ON, M.MODIFIED_BY, M.MODIFIABLE, M.REMOVEFLAG, M.GROUP_ID, M.VERSION_COMMENT, M.VERSION_STATUS, M.CREATED_DATE, M.NAME
        from MLP_HEADER M
        where M.[IDENTITY] IN
        (select distinct M2.[IDENTITY]
        from MLP_HEADER M2, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY TSE, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY VCLE
        where M2.[IDENTITY] = TSE.[IDENTITY] and M.[IDENTITY] = M2.[IDENTITY] and VCLE.COMP_LIST = TSE.[IDENTITY] and VCLE.ANALYSIS = TSE.ANALYSIS_ID)and M.PRODUCT_VERSION =
        (select max(PRODUCT_VERSION)
        from MLP_HEADER M2
        where M2.[IDENTITY] = M.[IDENTITY]);

    table LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER;

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias IDENTIFIER 
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        alias GROUP 
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.PHRASE_LINK}
    field PHRASE_LINK
        links_to PHRASE_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.DEFAULT_COMPARISON}
    field DEFAULT_COMPARISON
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        default 'P' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type LIMIT_COMP;

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    table LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY;

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY.LIMIT_PHRASE}
    field LIMIT_PHRASE
        links_to PARENT LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY.RESULT_VALUE}
    field RESULT_VALUE
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        alias ORDER_NUM 
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING;

    {LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY.COMPARISON}
    field COMPARISON
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        default 'P' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type LIMIT_COMP;

    table WORKSHEET
        noindex 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE';

    {WORKSHEET.WORKSHEET_TYPE}
    field WORKSHEET_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type WKS_TYPE;

    {WORKSHEET.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias WORKSHEET_NAME 
        datatype IDENTITY (20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,PRIMARY_BROWSE 
        allowed_characters ' ..`';

    {WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR}
    field ASSIGNED_OPERATOR
        alias OPERATOR 
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {WORKSHEET.GENERATOR_OPERATOR}
    field GENERATOR_OPERATOR
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {WORKSHEET.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER}
    field LINK_NUMBER
        alias WORKSHEET_NUMBER 
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL alias WORKSHEET_LINK;

    {WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED}
    field DATE_GENERATED
        datatype DATE;

    index WORKSHEET_I UNIQUE
        on WORKSHEET_TYPE, IDENTITY 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    view SAMPLE_WORKSHEET
        on_table WORKSHEET, SAMPLE;

    {SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias ID_NUMERIC, WORKSHEET_NAME 
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR}
    field ASSIGNED_OPERATOR
        alias OPERATOR 
        links_to WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.GENERATOR_OPERATOR}
    field GENERATOR_OPERATOR
        links_to WORKSHEET.GENERATOR_OPERATOR 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to WORKSHEET.STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER}
    field LINK_NUMBER
        alias WORKSHEET_NUMBER alias WORKSHEET_LINK 
        links_to WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER;

    {SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED}
    field DATE_GENERATED
        links_to WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED;

    select_clause
        select SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.GENERATOR_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.STATUS, WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER, WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED
        from WORKSHEET, SAMPLE
        where WORKSHEET.WORKSHEET_TYPE = 'SMPWKS' and SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY];

    view ANALYSIS_WORKSHEET
        on_table WORKSHEET;

    {ANALYSIS_WORKSHEET.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias WORKSHEET_NAME, ANALYSIS_ID 
        links_to WORKSHEET.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {ANALYSIS_WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR}
    field ASSIGNED_OPERATOR
        alias OPERATOR 
        links_to WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {ANALYSIS_WORKSHEET.GENERATOR_OPERATOR}
    field GENERATOR_OPERATOR
        links_to WORKSHEET.GENERATOR_OPERATOR 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {ANALYSIS_WORKSHEET.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to WORKSHEET.STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {ANALYSIS_WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER}
    field LINK_NUMBER
        alias WORKSHEET_NUMBER alias WORKSHEET_LINK 
        links_to WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER;

    {ANALYSIS_WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED}
    field DATE_GENERATED
        links_to WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED;

    select_clause
        select WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.GENERATOR_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.STATUS, WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER, WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED
        from WORKSHEET
        where WORKSHEET.WORKSHEET_TYPE = 'TESTWKS';

    view USER_WORKSHEET
        on_table WORKSHEET;

    {USER_WORKSHEET.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias WORKSHEET_NAME 
        links_to WORKSHEET.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {USER_WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR}
    field ASSIGNED_OPERATOR
        alias OPERATOR 
        links_to WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {USER_WORKSHEET.GENERATOR_OPERATOR}
    field GENERATOR_OPERATOR
        links_to WORKSHEET.GENERATOR_OPERATOR 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {USER_WORKSHEET.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to WORKSHEET.STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {USER_WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER}
    field LINK_NUMBER
        alias WORKSHEET_NUMBER alias WORKSHEET_LINK 
        links_to WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER;

    {USER_WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED}
    field DATE_GENERATED
        links_to WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED;

    select_clause
        select WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.GENERATOR_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.STATUS, WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER, WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED
        from WORKSHEET
        where WORKSHEET.WORKSHEET_TYPE = 'UDWKS';

    table STANDARD;

    {STANDARD.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias IDENTIFIER 
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {STANDARD.CATEGORY}
    field CATEGORY
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {STANDARD.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {STANDARD.STANDARD_TYPE}
    field STANDARD_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        default 'CALIB' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type STAND_TYPE;

    {STANDARD.STANDARD_NAME}
    field STANDARD_NAME
        datatype TEXT(234);

    {STANDARD.EXPIRY_TYPE}
    field EXPIRY_TYPE
        datatype TEXT(1) 
        default 'T' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type EXPIRY_TYP;

    {STANDARD.LIFETIME}
    field LIFETIME
        alias STANDARD_LIFETIME 
        datatype INTERVAL;

    {STANDARD.MAXIMUM_USAGE}
    field MAXIMUM_USAGE
        datatype INTEGER 
        default 1 
        lower_limit 1;

    {STANDARD.INTERNAL_EXTERNAL}
    field INTERNAL_EXTERNAL
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {STANDARD.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT(234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {STANDARD.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {STANDARD.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {STANDARD.MODIFIED_BY}

    table TIMERQUEUE
        noindex 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE';

    {TIMERQUEUE.ENTRY_NUMBER}

        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    field PRINTER
        links_to PRINTER.IDENTITY;

    {TIMERQUEUE.PARAM_STRING}

        datatype TEXT (255);

        datatype TEXT (20);

        datatype TEXT;

        prompt_type

    {TIMERQUEUE.TASK_PARAMS}

        datatype TEXT;

    field STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        default 'A';

    field TAG
        datatype TEXT (30);

        datatype INTEGER 
        default 1;

    index TIMERQUEUE_I UNIQUE
        on ENTRY_NUMBER 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

        on owner_menu , menu_numeric ;

        on owner_menu , procedure_num ;

        on owner_menu , mnemonic ;

        datatype IDENTITY (17) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE 
        allowed_characters '0..9A..Z-_/\ ';

    {PHRASE.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING;

        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {PHRASE.ICON}
    field ICON
        links_to ICON.IDENTITY;

        alias INSTRUMENT 
        links_to INSTRUMENT.IDENTITY;

    {TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_TYPE}
    field INSTRUMENT_TYPE
        links_to INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.IDENTITY;

    {TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.STD_TEST}
    field STD_TEST
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'Yes' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    {TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.REPLICATE_COUNT}
    field REPLICATE_COUNT
        datatype INTEGER 
        default 1 
        format 99 
        lower_limit 1 
        upper_limit 99;

    {TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.IS_ANALYSIS}
    field IS_ANALYSIS
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST}
    field COMPONENT_LIST
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST;

    table LOG_SCHED_HEADER;

        alias SCHEDULE_NAME 
        datatype IDENTITY

    {LOG_SCHED_HEADER.REPEAT_INTERVAL}

        datatype INTERVAL;

    field ACTIVATION_TIME
        datatype DATE;

    {LOG_SCHED_HEADER.JOB_TEMPLATE_ID}

        alias JOB_TEMPLATE 
        links_to JOB_TEMPLATE.IDENTITY;

        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    table AUDIT_TRANSACTION
        noindex 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE';

    {AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION}
    field TRANSACTION
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY , PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_TRANSACTION.SYSTEM_PID}
    field SYSTEM_PID
        datatype TEXT (8);

    {AUDIT_TRANSACTION.USER_ID}
    field USER_ID
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_NAME}
    field TRANSACTION_NAME
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE}
    field TRANSACTION_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {AUDIT_TRANSACTION.SESSION_ID}
    field SESSION_ID
        links_to ACCESS_LOG.SESSION_ID;

    index AUDIT_TRANSACTION_I UNIQUE
        on TRANSACTION 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index audit_session_id
        on SESSION_ID 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    table AUDIT_EVENT
        noindex 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE';

    {AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT}
    field EVENT
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY , PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_EVENT.TRANSACTION}
    field TRANSACTION
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION;

    {AUDIT_EVENT.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        datatype TEXT (30) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {AUDIT_EVENT.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_ACTION}
    field EVENT_ACTION
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_REASON}
    field EVENT_REASON
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        prompt_type 
        phrase phrase_type AUDIT_TEXT;

    {Custom} 
    index audit_table_event_transact
        on TABLE_NAME, EVENT, TRANSACTION 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index AUDIT_EVENT_I UNIQUE
        on EVENT 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index AUDIT_EVENT_TRANS_INDEX
        on TRANSACTION 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index audit_table_no_index
        on TABLE_NAME , RECORD_KEY0 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    table AUDIT_DATA
        noindex 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE';

    {AUDIT_DATA.DATA}
    field DATA
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY , PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_DATA.EVENT}
    field EVENT
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {AUDIT_DATA.DATA_REASON}
    field DATA_REASON
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        prompt_type 
        phrase phrase_type AUDIT_TEXT;

    {AUDIT_DATA.field}
    field field
        datatype TEXT (20);

    {AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_BEFORE}
    field VALUE_BEFORE
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        default NULL;

    {AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_AFTER}
    field VALUE_AFTER
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        default NULL;

    index AUDIT_DATA_I UNIQUE
        on DATA 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    index audit_field_index
        on event, FIELD 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    view AUDIT_VALUES
        on_table AUDIT_EVENT , AUDIT_DATA , AUDIT_TRANSACTION;

    {AUDIT_VALUES.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TABLE_NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_VALUES.FIELD_NAME}
    field FIELD_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.field 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_VALUES.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.RECORD_KEY0 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_VALUES.AUDIT_DATE}
    field AUDIT_DATE
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE;

    {AUDIT_VALUES.AUDIT_ACTION}
    field AUDIT_ACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_ACTION;

    {AUDIT_VALUES.USER_NAME}
    field USER_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.USER_ID;

    {AUDIT_VALUES.VALUE_BEFORE}
    field VALUE_BEFORE
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_BEFORE;

    {AUDIT_VALUES.VALUE_AFTER}
    field VALUE_AFTER
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_AFTER;

    {AUDIT_VALUES.EVENT}
    field EVENT
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.EVENT;

    {AUDIT_VALUES.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.DATA 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    view AUDIT_VIEW
        on_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION , AUDIT_EVENT;

    {AUDIT_VIEW.EVENT}
    field EVENT
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {AUDIT_VIEW.TRANSACTION}
    field TRANSACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TRANSACTION;

    {AUDIT_VIEW.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.RECORD_KEY0;

    {AUDIT_VIEW.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TABLE_NAME;

    {AUDIT_VIEW.EVENT_ACTION}
    field EVENT_ACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_ACTION;

    {AUDIT_VIEW.EVENT_REASON}
    field EVENT_REASON
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_REASON;

    {AUDIT_VIEW.TRANSACTION_DATE}
    field TRANSACTION_DATE
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW.USER_ID}
    field USER_ID
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.USER_ID;

    {AUDIT_VIEW.TRANSACTION_NAME}
    field TRANSACTION_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_NAME;

    select_clause
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION];

    table LICENSE;

    {LICENSE.PRODUCT}

    {LICENSE.CHECKSUM}

        datatype INTEGER;

    {LICENSE.CPU_TYPE}
    field CPU_TYPE
        datatype INTEGER;

    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {TAB_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    table JOBTAB_HEADER;

    {JOBTAB_HEADER.NAME}

        alias IDENTITY

        on menu_name, menu_number, order_number ;

    table ANAL_WORKS_TEMPL;

    {ANAL_WORKS_TEMPL.TEMPLATE_ID}
    field TEMPLATE_ID
        datatype IDENTITY (15) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {ANAL_WORKS_TEMPL.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {ANAL_WORKS_TEMPL.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (80) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {ANAL_WORKS_TEMPL.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2) 
        default 'U' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type TEMP_STAT;

    {ANAL_WORKS_TEMPL.DATE_APPROVED}
    field DATE_APPROVED
        datatype DATE;

    {ANAL_WORKS_TEMPL.APPROVER_ID}

        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

        default 'S' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type SAMP_SOUR;

    field MIN_SAMPLES
        datatype INTEGER 
        default 1 
        format 99999999 
        lower_limit 1;

    field EDIT_SAMPLES_LIST
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {ANAL_WORKS_TEMPL.SAMPLE_SORT}

        datatype TEXT (1) 
        default 'J' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type SAMP_SORT;

        datatype BOOLEAN;

        links_to STANDARD.IDENTITY;

        datatype INTEGER 
        default 0

        lower_limit 0;

    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    field REMOVEFLAG

    table C_SAMPLE tableset COMMITTED
        noindex PARENT_table SAMPLE 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED' 
        prompt_description 'STRUCTURE_SAMPLE';

    index C_SAMPLE_ID_NUMERIC_GROUP UNIQUE
        on STATUS, GROUP, ID_NUMERIC 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_SAMPLE_ID_TEXT_GROUP UNIQUE
        on STATUS, GROUP, ID_TEXT 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_SAMPLE_BATCH_NAME_INDEX
        on BATCH_NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_SAMPLE_PRODUCT_INDEX
        on PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, STATUS 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_SAMPLE_PRD_PRV_IDN_IDX
        on PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, ID_NUMERIC 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index c_sample_id_text_index unique
        on ID_TEXT 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index c_sample_job_name_index
        on JOB_NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index c_sample_status_index unique
        on id_numeric , status 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    table C_SAMPLE_FORMULATION tableset COMMITTED
        noindex PARENT_table SAMPLE_FORMULATION 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    table C_TEST tableset COMMITTED
        noindex PARENT_table TEST 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    index C_TEST_COVERING_INDEX
        on SAMPLE, ANALYSIS, TEST_NUMBER, STATUS, DATE_COMPLETED, ANALYSIS_VERSION 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_TEST_WORKSHEET_INDEX
        on WORKSHEET 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index c_test_i unique
        on TEST_NUMBER rdb_location 'HASH_STORAGE_AREA' rdb_specific 'TYPE IS HASHED' 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index c_samp_anal_index
        on sample , ANALYSIS 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index c_test_analysis_index
        on ANALYSIS 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    table C_RESULT tableset COMMITTED
        noindex PARENT_table RESULT 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    index C_RESULT_I UNIQUE
        on TEST_NUMBER, NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_RESULT_ENTERED_I
        on ENTERED_ON 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_RESULT_STATUS_I
        on TEST_NUMBER, NAME, TEXT, UNITS, STATUS 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_RESULT_COV_IND
        on TEST_NUMBER, NAME, RESULT_TYPE, CALCULATION, TEXT, VALUE, ORDER_NUMBER, UNITS, STATUS, ENTERED_ON, OUT_OF_RANGE 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_RESULT_COV_IND2
        on TEST_NUMBER, NAME, ORDER_NUMBER, RESULT_TYPE, TEXT, VALUE, UNITS, ENTERED_BY, ENTERED_ON, MAXIMUM, MINIMUM, OUT_OF_RANGE 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    table C_JOB_HEADER tableset COMMITTED
        noindex PARENT_table JOB_HEADER 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    index C_JOB_HEADER_I UNIQUE
        on JOB_NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_JOB_HEADER_PRODNAME_I
        on PRODUCT_NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_JOB_HEADER_BATCHNAME_I
        on BATCH_NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    table C_AUDIT_TRANSACTION tableset COMMITTED
        noindex PARENT_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    index C_AUDIT_TRANSACTION_I UNIQUE
        on TRANSACTION 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_AUDIT_SESSION_ID
        on SESSION_ID 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    table C_AUDIT_EVENT tableset COMMITTED
        noindex PARENT_table AUDIT_EVENT 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    index C_AUDIT_EVENT_I UNIQUE
        on EVENT 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_AUDIT_EVENT_TRANS_INDEX
        on TRANSACTION 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_AUDIT_TABLE_NO_INDEX
        on table_name , RECORD_KEY0 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    table C_AUDIT_DATA tableset COMMITTED
        noindex PARENT_table AUDIT_DATA 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    index C_AUDIT_DATA_I UNIQUE
        on DATA 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index C_AUDIT_EVENT_INDEX
        on EVENT 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index c_audit_field_index
        on event, field ;

    view C_AUDIT_VALUES
        parent_table AUDIT_VALUES tableset COMMITTED;

    view C_AUDIT_VIEW
        parent_table AUDIT_VIEW tableset COMMITTED;

    select_clause
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from C_AUDIT_EVENT E, C_AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION];

    table CONFIG_HEADER;

    {CONFIG_HEADER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype IDENTITY (30) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY , PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {CONFIG_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {CONFIG_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {CONFIG_HEADER.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {CONFIG_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {CONFIG_HEADER.USER_MODIFIABLE}
    field USER_MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {CONFIG_HEADER.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {CONFIG_HEADER.DATA_TYPE}
    field DATA_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        default 'TEXT' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type CONFG_TYPE;

    {CONFIG_HEADER.LIBRARY}
    field LIBRARY
        links_to REPORT.IDENTITY;

    {CONFIG_HEADER.ROUTINE}
    field ROUTINE
        datatype TEXT (80) 
        prompt_type USER_DEFINED LIBRARY '$PROMPT_ROUTINE' ROUTINE 'prompt_routine';

    {CONFIG_HEADER.VALUE}
    field VALUE
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        prompt_type USER_DEFINED LIBRARY '$CONFIG_PROMPT' ROUTINE 'prompt_config';

    {CONFIG_HEADER.CATEGORY}
    field CATEGORY
        datatype IDENTITY 
        prompt_type 
        phrase VALID IDENTITIES phrase_type CONFG_CATG;

    table CONFIG_ITEM;

    {CONFIG_ITEM.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to CONFIG_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CONFIG_ITEM.OPERATOR}
    field OPERATOR
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CONFIG_ITEM.GROUP_NAME}
    field GROUP_NAME
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CONFIG_ITEM.VALUE}
    field VALUE
        datatype TEXT (255);

    table CRITERIA_HEADER;

    {CRITERIA_HEADER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype IDENTITY (20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY , DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {CRITERIA_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {CRITERIA_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {CRITERIA_HEADER.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {CRITERIA_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {CRITERIA_HEADER.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {CRITERIA_HEADER.DESCRIPTION}

        datatype TEXT (255) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {CRITERIA_HEADER.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    table CRITERIA;

    {CRITERIA.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to PARENT CRITERIA_HEADER.IDENTITY AS CRITERIA 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CRITERIA.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (30) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CRITERIA.FIELD_NAME}
    field FIELD_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (30) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CRITERIA.WIDTH}
    field WIDTH
        datatype INTEGER 
        lower_limit 0 
        upper_limit 200;

    {CRITERIA.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (30);

    table CRITERIA_SAVED;

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (30) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype IDENTITY (40) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE(2), PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.TASK_NAME}
    field TASK_NAME
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.FORM}
    field FORM
        links_to FORM.NAME;

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for NAME;

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.PUBLIC_CRITERIA}
    field PUBLIC_CRITERIA
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'Yes' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    {CRITERIA_SAVED.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    table CRITERIA_CONDITION;

    {CRITERIA_CONDITION.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to PARENT CRITERIA_SAVED.TABLE_NAME AS CRITERIA 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CRITERIA_CONDITION.CRITERIA_SAVED}

        links_to PARENT CRITERIA_SAVED.IDENTITY AS CRITERIA

        default 'EQUALS'

        choose choose_type crit_op;

    {CRITERIA_CONDITION.VALUE}

        datatype TEXT (255);

    table CRITERIA_ORDER;

    {CRITERIA_ORDER.TABLE_NAME}

    {CRITERIA_ORDER.CRITERIA_SAVED}

        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CRITERIA_ORDER.ORDER_NUMBER}

        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING;

    {CRITERIA_ORDER.CRIT_ORDER}
    field CRIT_ORDER
        datatype TEXT (10) 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type CRIT_ORD;

    table CRITERIA_VARIABLE;

    {CRITERIA_VARIABLE.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to PARENT CRITERIA_SAVED.TABLE_NAME AS CRITERIA 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CRITERIA_VARIABLE.CRITERIA_SAVED}
    field CRITERIA_SAVED
        links_to PARENT CRITERIA_SAVED.IDENTITY AS CRITERIA 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CRITERIA_VARIABLE.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (50) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {CRITERIA_VARIABLE.TYPE}
    field TYPE
        datatype TEXT (20);

    {CRITERIA_VARIABLE.VALUE}
    field VALUE
        datatype TEXT (100);

    {CRITERIA_VARIABLE.REPORT}
    field REPORT
        links_to REPORT.IDENTITY;

    {CRITERIA_VARIABLE.ROUTINE}
    field ROUTINE
        datatype TEXT (50);

    view MLP_VIEW
        on_table MLP_HEADER, MLP_VALUES, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_COMPONENTS;

    {MLP_VIEW.PRODUCT_ID}
    field PRODUCT_ID
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {MLP_VIEW.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {MLP_VIEW.ANALYSIS_ID}
    field ANALYSIS_ID
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {MLP_VIEW.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {MLP_VIEW.COMPONENT_TYPE}
    field COMPONENT_TYPE
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_TYPE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {MLP_VIEW.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID;

    {MLP_VIEW.LEVEL_ORDER}
    field LEVEL_ORDER
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {MLP_VIEW.CONTINUE_CHECKING}
    field CONTINUE_CHECKING
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_SPEC;

    {MLP_VIEW.MESSAGE_ACTION}
    field MESSAGE_ACTION
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.MESSAGE_ACTION;

    {MLP_VIEW.REPORT_ACTION}
    field REPORT_ACTION
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.REPORT_ACTION;

    {MLP_VIEW.RESULT_ACTION}
    field RESULT_ACTION
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.RESULT_ACTION;

    {MLP_VIEW.DISPLAY_MESSAGE}
    field DISPLAY_MESSAGE
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.DISPLAY_MESSAGE;

    {MLP_VIEW.REPORT_NAME}
    field REPORT_NAME
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.REPORT_NAME;

    {MLP_VIEW.ROUTINE_NAME}
    field ROUTINE_NAME
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.ROUTINE_NAME;

    {MLP_VIEW.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {MLP_VIEW.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {MLP_VIEW.TEXT_SPEC}
    field TEXT_SPEC
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_SPEC;

    {MLP_VIEW.TEXT_PHRASE}
    field TEXT_PHRASE
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_PHRASE;

    {MLP_VIEW.BOOLEAN_PASS}
    field BOOLEAN_PASS
        links_to MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS;

    {MLP_VIEW.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to MLP_HEADER.NAME;

    select_clause
        select MC.PRODUCT_ID, MC.PRODUCT_VERSION, MC.ANALYSIS_ID, MC.COMPONENT_NAME, MC.COMPONENT_TYPE, ML.LEVEL_ID, MHV.MIN_LIMIT, MHV.TEXT_SPEC, ML.MESSAGE_ACTION, ML.REPORT_ACTION, ML.RESULT_ACTION, ML.DISPLAY_MESSAGE, ML.REPORT_NAME, ML.ROUTINE_NAME, MCV.MIN_LIMIT, MCV.MAX_LIMIT, MCV.TEXT_SPEC, MCV.TEXT_PHRASE, MCV.BOOLEAN_PASS, MH.NAME, MCV.CALCULATION
        from MLP_HEADER MH, MLP_VALUES MHV, MLP_LEVEL ML, MLP_COMPONENTS MC, MLP_VALUES MCV
        where MH.ENTRY_CODE = MHV.ENTRY_CODE and ML.LEVEL_ID = MHV.LEVEL_ID and ML.LEVEL_ID = MCV.LEVEL_ID and MC.PRODUCT_ID = MH.[IDENTITY] and MC.PRODUCT_VERSION = MH.PRODUCT_VERSION and MC.ENTRY_CODE = MCV.ENTRY_CODE;

    {MLP_VIEW.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        links_to MLP_VALUES.CALCULATION;

    table HELP_CONTEXT;

    {HELP_CONTEXT.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype IDENTITY(30) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {HELP_CONTEXT.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {HELP_CONTEXT.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {HELP_CONTEXT.KEYWORD}
    field KEYWORD
        datatype TEXT (30);

    {HELP_CONTEXT.TITLE}
    field TITLE
        datatype TEXT (80) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {HELP_CONTEXT.MNEMONIC}
    field MNEMONIC
        datatype IDENTITY (10) 
        prompt_type USER_DEFINED LIBRARY '$LTE_HELP' ROUTINE 'prompt_mnemonic';

    {HELP_CONTEXT.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {HELP_CONTEXT.REMOVE_FLAG}
    field REMOVE_FLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {HELP_CONTEXT.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    table VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to PARENT VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY AS VERSIONED_ANALYSIS 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION AS VERSIONED_ANALYSIS 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, VERSION_NUMBER;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST}
    field COMP_LIST
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {Custom} 
    {VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.NAME
    field NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY CASE_SENSITIVE;}

    table VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to PARENT VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS AS VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to PARENT VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION AS VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST}
    field COMP_LIST
        links_to PARENT VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST AS VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, NAME CASE_SENSITIVE;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.DEFAULT_VALUE}
    field DEFAULT_VALUE
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.REPLICATE_COUNT}
    field REPLICATE_COUNT
        datatype INTEGER 
        default 1 
        lower_limit 1 
        upper_limit 999;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.RESULT_ENTRY}
    field RESULT_ENTRY
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.CREATE_ALWAYS}
    field CREATE_ALWAYS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'Yes' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    {VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.SPIKE_VALUE}
    field SPIKE_VALUE
        datatype REAL 
        format '999.99' 
        lower_limit 0.0;

    {VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.SURROGATE_MLP}
    field SURROGATE_MLP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        default NULL;

    {SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_SAMPLES_TO_DO}

    view SAMP_TEST_RESULT
        on_table SAMPLE , TEST , RESULT;

    {SAMP_TEST_RESULT.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {SAMP_TEST_RESULT.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {SAMP_TEST_RESULT.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE(4);

    {SAMP_TEST_RESULT.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.JOB_NAME;

    {SAMP_TEST_RESULT.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    field STATUS

    view LIMIT_VIEW
        on_table MLP_VALUES;

    {LIMIT_VIEW.LEVEL_ENTRY_CODE}
    field LEVEL_ENTRY_CODE
        links_to MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {LIMIT_VIEW.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID
        links_to MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {LIMIT_VIEW.LEVEL_ORDER}
    field LEVEL_ORDER
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {LIMIT_VIEW.CONTINUE_CHECKING}
    field CONTINUE_CHECKING
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_SPEC;

    {LIMIT_VIEW.LIMIT_ENTRY_CODE}
    field LIMIT_ENTRY_CODE
        links_to MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE;

    {LIMIT_VIEW.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {LIMIT_VIEW.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {LIMIT_VIEW.TEXT_SPEC}
    field TEXT_SPEC
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_SPEC;

    {LIMIT_VIEW.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        links_to MLP_VALUES.CALCULATION;

    {LIMIT_VIEW.TEXT_PHRASE}
    field TEXT_PHRASE
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_PHRASE;

    {LIMIT_VIEW.BOOLEAN_PASS}
    field BOOLEAN_PASS
        links_to MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS;

    select_clause
        select MHV.ENTRY_CODE, MHV.LEVEL_ID, MHV.MIN_LIMIT, MHV.TEXT_SPEC, MCV.ENTRY_CODE, MCV.MIN_LIMIT, MCV.MAX_LIMIT, MCV.TEXT_SPEC, MCV.CALCULATION, MCV.TEXT_PHRASE, MCV.BOOLEAN_PASS
        from MLP_VALUES MHV, MLP_VALUES MCV
        where MCV.LEVEL_ID = MHV.LEVEL_ID;

    table UNIT_HEADER;

    {UNIT_HEADER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias UNIT_ID , SYMBOL_ID 
        datatype TEXT(40) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY , PRIMARY_BROWSE 
        allowed_characters '0..9a..zA..Z /*^+-.[]()%_#' 
        case_sensitive
        prompt_description 'LTE_UNIT_IDENTITY' ;

    {UNIT_HEADER.SYSTEM}
    field SYSTEM
        alias PROTOCOL 
        datatype TEXT(4) 
        default 'ENGL' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type UNIT_PROT;

    {UNIT_HEADER.CLASS}
    field CLASS
        datatype TEXT(2) 
        default 'B' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type UNIT_CLASS;

    {UNIT_HEADER.QUANTITY}
    field QUANTITY
        alias BASE_TYPE , TYPE 
        datatype TEXT(10) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(1) 
        default 'A' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type UNIT_TYPE;

    {UNIT_HEADER.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        alias COMMON_NAME 
        datatype TEXT(60) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2) 
        allowed_characters '0..9a..zA..Z /*^+-.[]()%_#'
        prompt_description 'LTE_UNIT_DESCRIPTION' ;

    {UNIT_HEADER.DERIVATION}
    field DERIVATION
        alias FORMULA , EXPRESSION 
        datatype TEXT(40) 
        default '1' 
        allowed_characters '0..9a..zA..Z /*^+-.[]()%_#';

    {UNIT_HEADER.COMPLEMENT}
    field COMPLEMENT
        datatype TEXT(40) 
        allowed_characters '0..9a..zA..Z /*^+-.[]()%_#';

    {UNIT_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {UNIT_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {UNIT_HEADER.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {UNIT_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    table UNIT_ALIAS;

    {UNIT_ALIAS.PARENT_ID}
    field PARENT_ID
        links_to PARENT UNIT_HEADER.IDENTITY AS UNIT_HEADER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY CASE_SENSITIVE;

    {UNIT_ALIAS.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias ALIAS_ID 
        datatype TEXT(40) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY , PRIMARY_BROWSE 
        allowed_characters '0..9a..zA..Z /*^+-.[]()%_#' 
        case_sensitive
        prompt_description 'Alias_ID' ;

    {UNIT_ALIAS.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING;

    table BATCH_TMPL_HEADER;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias IDENTIFIER 
        datatype IDENTITY(15) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        alias GROUP 
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.LIMITS}
    field LIMITS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.BATCH_CLASS}
    field BATCH_CLASS
        datatype IDENTITY (10) 
        default 'BASE' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type BATCH_TYPE;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.SYNTAX}
    field SYNTAX
        links_to SYNTAX.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.EDIT_CRITERIA}
    field EDIT_CRITERIA
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.MINIMUM_SAMPLES}
    field MINIMUM_SAMPLES
        datatype INTEGER 
        default 1 
        lower_limit 0 
        upper_limit 999;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.MAXIMUM_SAMPLES}
    field MAXIMUM_SAMPLES
        datatype INTEGER 
        default 0 
        lower_limit 0 
        upper_limit 999;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.AUTOMATIC_SELECT}
    field AUTOMATIC_SELECT
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.EDIT_LIST}
    field EDIT_LIST
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'Yes' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.RANDOM_CONTROL}
    field RANDOM_CONTROL
        links_to STANDARD.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.RANDOM_NUMBER}
    field RANDOM_NUMBER
        datatype INTEGER 
        default 0 
        lower_limit 0 
        upper_limit 999;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.PRINT_ON_CREATION}
    field PRINT_ON_CREATION
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.PRINTER}
    field PRINTER
        links_to PRINTER.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.COMPRESSION}
    field COMPRESSION
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        default 'L' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type BATCH_COMP;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    {BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    table BATCH_TMPL_ENTRY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_ENTRY.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING , UNIQUE_KEY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_ENTRY.TYPE}
    field TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_ENTRY.REPEAT_COUNT}
    field REPEAT_COUNT
        datatype INTEGER;

    {BATCH_TMPL_ENTRY.PARENT}
    field PARENT
        datatype INTEGER;

    {BATCH_TMPL_ENTRY.LIMIT}
    field LIMIT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_ENTRY.STANDARD}
    field STANDARD
        links_to STANDARD.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST}
    field COMPONENT_LIST
        links_to COMP_LIST_HEADER.COMP_LIST;

    {BATCH_TMPL_ENTRY.SECTION}
    field SECTION
        datatype TEXT (1);

    table BATCH_HEADER;

    {BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype IDENTITY (20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY 
        prompt_type USER_DEFINED LIBRARY '$PROMPT_BATCH' ROUTINE 'prompt_batch';

    {BATCH_HEADER.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type BATCH_STAT;

    {BATCH_HEADER.DATE_CREATED}
    field DATE_CREATED
        datatype DATE;

    {BATCH_HEADER.CREATOR}
    field CREATOR
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_HEADER.DATE_COMPLETED}
    field DATE_COMPLETED
        datatype DATE;

    {BATCH_HEADER.COMPLETER}
    field COMPLETER
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_HEADER.DATE_REVIEWED}
    field DATE_REVIEWED
        datatype DATE;

    {BATCH_HEADER.REVIEWER}
    field REVIEWER
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED
        datatype DATE;

    {BATCH_HEADER.AUTHORISER}
    field AUTHORISER
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_HEADER.AUTHORISATION_NOTES}
    field AUTHORISATION_NOTES
        datatype TEXT (255);

    {BATCH_HEADER.DATE_CANCELLED}
    field DATE_CANCELLED
        datatype DATE;

    {BATCH_HEADER.CANCELLER}
    field CANCELLER
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_HEADER.LIMITS}
    field LIMITS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_HEADER.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_HEADER.BATCH_CLASS}
    field BATCH_CLASS
        links_to BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.BATCH_CLASS;

    {BATCH_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID}
    field TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_HEADER.REVIEW_STATUS}
    field REVIEW_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        default 'F' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type LIMIT_COMP;

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_PROJECT}
    field CDS_PROJECT
        datatype TEXT (12) 
        prompt_type 
        phrase IDENTITIES phrase_type MCPROJECT;

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_CHANNEL_NUMBER}
    field CDS_CHANNEL_NUMBER
        datatype INTEGER;

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_RSF_NAME}
    field CDS_RSF_NAME
        datatype TEXT (8);

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_COMMENTS}
    field CDS_COMMENTS
        datatype TEXT(60);

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_TEMPLATE_NAME}
    field CDS_TEMPLATE_NAME
        datatype TEXT (8);

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_ANALYSIS_NAME}

        datatype TEXT (14) 
        prompt_type 
        phrase IDENTITIES phrase_type MCANAL;

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_METHOD_NAME}
