        datatype TEXT (10) 
        prompt_type 
        phrase IDENTITIES phrase_type MCTEMP;

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_CONTROL_NAME}
    field CDS_CONTROL_NAME
        datatype TEXT (8);

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_CALIBRATION_NAME}
    field CDS_CALIBRATION_NAME
        datatype TEXT (8);

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_SUBTRACT_NAME}
    field CDS_SUBTRACT_NAME
        datatype TEXT (14);

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_SUBTRACT_SAMPLE}
    field CDS_SUBTRACT_SAMPLE
        datatype INTEGER;

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_SUB_INJECTION}
    field CDS_SUB_INJECTION
        alias CDS_SUBTRACT_INJECTION 
        datatype INTEGER;

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_RVS_CALIB_NAME}
    field CDS_RVS_CALIB_NAME
        alias CDS_RVS_CALIBRATION_NAME 
        datatype TEXT (8);

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_AMOUNT_SAMPLE}
    field CDS_AMOUNT_SAMPLE
        alias CDS_AMOUNT_SAMPLE_field 
        datatype TEXT (20);

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_INSTRUMENT}
    field CDS_INSTRUMENT
        datatype TEXT (20) 
        prompt_type 
        phrase IDENTITIES phrase_type MCINST;

    {BATCH_HEADER.CDS_APPEND_ANALYSIS}
    field CDS_APPEND_ANALYSIS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'Overwrite' 
        true_word 'Append' 
        false_word 'Overwrite';

    {BATCH_HEADER.ANALYST}
    field ANALYST
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_HEADER.INSTRUMENT}
    field INSTRUMENT
        links_to INSTRUMENT.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_HEADER.START_DATE}
    field START_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {BATCH_HEADER.END_DATE}
    field END_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {BATCH_HEADER.BATCH_COMMENT}
    field BATCH_COMMENT
        datatype TEXT (255);

    {BATCH_HEADER.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    table BATCH_ENTRY;

    {BATCH_ENTRY.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING , UNIQUE_KEY;

    {BATCH_ENTRY.TEST}
    field TEST
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE}
    field TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_ENTRY.REPEAT_SECTION}
    field REPEAT_SECTION
        datatype INTEGER;

    {BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS}
    field REVIEW_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        default 'F' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type LIMIT_COMP;

    table C_BATCH_HEADER PARENT_table BATCH_HEADER tableset COMMITTED
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    table C_BATCH_ENTRY PARENT_table BATCH_ENTRY tableset COMMITTED
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    table INCREMENTS;

    {INCREMENTS.MAJOR}
    field MAJOR
        alias TABLE 
        datatype TEXT (40) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {INCREMENTS.MINOR}
    field MINOR
        alias ENTITY 
        datatype TEXT (40) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {INCREMENTS.LASTVAL}
    field LASTVAL
        alias VALUE 
        datatype INTEGER;

    {INCREMENTS.CACHING}
    field CACHING
        datatype INTEGER;

    view ANALYSIS_VIEW
        alias ANALYSIS
        on_table VERSIONED_ANALYSIS;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.GROUP_ID
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.ANALYSIS_TYPE}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.INSTTYPE_ID}
    field INSTTYPE_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INSTTYPE_ID;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.PREPARATION_ID}
    field PREPARATION_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.PREPARATION_ID;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.EXPECTED_TIME}
    field EXPECTED_TIME
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.EXPECTED_TIME;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.CHARGECODE}
    field CHARGECODE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CHARGECODE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.RESULT_SCREEN}
    field RESULT_SCREEN
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.RESULT_SCREEN;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIED_ON
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIED_BY
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIABLE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.REMOVEFLAG;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.REPLICATES}
    field REPLICATES
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.REPLICATES;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.ACCESS_FLAGS}
    field ACCESS_FLAGS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ACCESS_FLAGS;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.COMP_REPLICATES}
    field COMP_REPLICATES
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COMP_REPLICATES;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.GENERIC_ANALYSIS}
    field GENERIC_ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.GENERIC_ANALYSIS;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.APPROVAL_REQD}
    field APPROVAL_REQD
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.APPROVAL_REQD;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.ALLOW_CATEGORY}
    field ALLOW_CATEGORY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ALLOW_CATEGORY;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.APPROVAL_STATUS}
    field APPROVAL_STATUS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.APPROVAL_STATUS
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.INSPECTION_PLAN}
    field INSPECTION_PLAN
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INSPECTION_PLAN;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE}
    field SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.AUTO_VALIDATE}
    field AUTO_VALIDATE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.AUTO_VALIDATE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.INSTRUMENT_REQUIRED}
    field INSTRUMENT_REQUIRED
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INSTRUMENT_REQUIRED;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.SOP_REFERENCE}
    field SOP_REFERENCE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.SOP_REFERENCE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.UNCERTAINTY_TEXT}
    field UNCERTAINTY_TEXT
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.UNCERTAINTY_TEXT;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.NAME;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.ACTIVE}
    field ACTIVE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ACTIVE
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.ACTIVE_FROM}
    field ACTIVE_FROM
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ACTIVE_FROM;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.ACTIVE_TO}
    field ACTIVE_TO
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ACTIVE_TO;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.WORKFLOW_ID}
    field WORKFLOW_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.WORKFLOW_ID;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.ENTITY_TEMPLATE_ID}
    field ENTITY_TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ENTITY_TEMPLATE_ID;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.EXINSTTYPE}
    field EXINSTTYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.EXINSTTYPE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.CONVERTED_DATE}
    field CONVERTED_DATE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CONVERTED_DATE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.CONVERTED_BY}
    field CONVERTED_BY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CONVERTED_BY;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.QAP_NUMBER}
    field QAP_NUMBER
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAP_NUMBER;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.QAP_DATE}
    field QAP_DATE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAP_DATE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.QAP_COMMENT}
    field QAP_COMMENT
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAP_COMMENT;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.INOC_TEMP}
    field INOC_TEMP
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INOC_TEMP;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.COA_GROUP}
    field COA_GROUP
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COA_GROUP;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.CONDITIONS}
    field CONDITIONS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CONDITIONS;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.MEDIA_01}
    field MEDIA_01
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MEDIA_01;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.QAM_NUMBER}
    field QAM_NUMBER
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAM_NUMBER;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.Q_INSTRUCTION}
    field Q_INSTRUCTION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.Q_INSTRUCTION;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.Q_METHOD}
    field Q_METHOD
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.Q_METHOD;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.ALLOW_RES_IMPORT}
    field ALLOW_RES_IMPORT
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ALLOW_RES_IMPORT;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.RDA_AVAILABLE}
    field RDA_AVAILABLE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.RDA_AVAILABLE;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.CALC}
    field CALC
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALC;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.CDOC_METHOD}
    field CDOC_METHOD
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CDOC_METHOD;

    {ANALYSIS_VIEW.CONFIRMATION}
    field CONFIRMATION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CONFIRMATION;

    select_clause
        SELECT
            A1.[IDENTITY],
            A1.ANALYSIS_VERSION,
            A1.GROUP_ID,
            A1.ANALYSIS_TYPE,
            A1.DESCRIPTION,
            A1.INSTTYPE_ID,
            A1.PREPARATION_ID,
            A1.EXPECTED_TIME,
            A1.CHARGECODE,
            A1.RESULT_SCREEN,
            A1.MODIFIED_ON,
            A1.MODIFIED_BY,
            A1.MODIFIABLE,
            A1.REMOVEFLAG,
            A1.CALCULATION,
            A1.REPLICATES,
            A1.ACCESS_FLAGS,
            A1.COMP_REPLICATES,
            A1.GENERIC_ANALYSIS,
            A1.APPROVAL_REQD,
            A1.ALLOW_CATEGORY,
            A1.APPROVAL_STATUS,
            A1.INSPECTION_PLAN,
            A1.SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE,
            A1.AUTO_VALIDATE,
            A1.INSTRUMENT_REQUIRED,
            A1.SOP_REFERENCE,
            A1.UNCERTAINTY_TEXT,
            A1.NAME,
            A1.ACTIVE,
            A1.ACTIVE_FROM,
            A1.ACTIVE_TO,
            A1.WORKFLOW_ID,
            A1.ENTITY_TEMPLATE_ID,
            A1.HAS_ATTACHMENTS,
            A1.EXINSTTYPE,
            A1.CONVERTED_DATE,
            A1.CONVERTED_BY,
            A1.QAP_NUMBER,
            A1.QAP_DATE,
            A1.QAP_COMMENT,
            A1.INOC_TEMP,
            A1.COA_GROUP,
            A1.CONDITIONS,
            A1.MEDIA_01,
            A1.QAM_NUMBER,
            A1.Q_INSTRUCTION,
            A1.Q_METHOD,
            A1.ALLOW_RES_IMPORT,
            A1.RDA_AVAILABLE,
            A1.CALC,
            A1.CDOC_METHOD,
            A1.CONFIRMATION
        FROM VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A1
        WHERE ANALYSIS_VERSION >= (SELECT MAX(ANALYSIS_VERSION)
                                    FROM VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A2
                                    WHERE A2.[IDENTITY] = A1.[IDENTITY]
                                    AND A2.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A'
                                    AND A2.ACTIVE = 'T'
                                    AND A2.REMOVEFLAG = 'F');
    

    view COMPONENT_VIEW
        alias COMPONENT 
        on_table VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        alias ANALYSIS_ID 
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        alias COMPONENT_NUMBER 
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER 
        used_for ORDERING;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.RESULT_TYPE}
    field RESULT_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.MINIMUM}
    field MINIMUM
        alias MIN 
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.MINIMUM;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.MAXIMUM}
    field MAXIMUM
        alias MAX 
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.MAXIMUM;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.TRUE_WORD}
    field TRUE_WORD
        alias EXTRUE 
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.FALSE_WORD}
    field FALSE_WORD
        alias EXFALSE 
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.ALLOWED_CHARACTERS}
    field ALLOWED_CHARACTERS
        alias RANGE 
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ALLOWED_CHARACTERS;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        alias CALCULATION_ID 
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.CALCULATION;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.PLACES}
    field PLACES
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.PLACES;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.REP_CONTROL}
    field REP_CONTROL
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.REP_CONTROL;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.REPLICATES}
    field REPLICATES
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.REPLICATES;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.SIG_FIGS_NUMBER}
    field SIG_FIGS_NUMBER
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.SIG_FIGS_NUMBER;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.SIG_FIGS_ROUNDING}
    field SIG_FIGS_ROUNDING
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.SIG_FIGS_ROUNDING;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.SIG_FIGS_FILTER}
    field SIG_FIGS_FILTER
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.SIG_FIGS_FILTER;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.MINIMUM_PQL}
    field MINIMUM_PQL
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.MINIMUM_PQL;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.MAXIMUM_PQL}
    field MAXIMUM_PQL
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.MAXIMUM_PQL;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.PQL_CALCULATION}
    field PQL_CALCULATION
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.PQL_CALCULATION;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.FORMULA}
    field FORMULA
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FORMULA;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.MATRIX_NO}
    field MATRIX_NO
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.MATRIX_NO;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.MATRIX_NAME}
    field MATRIX_NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.MATRIX_NAME;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.COLUMN_NO}
    field COLUMN_NO
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.COLUMN_NO;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.COLUMN_NAME}
    field COLUMN_NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.COLUMN_NAME;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.ROW_NO}
    field ROW_NO
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ROW_NO;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.ROW_NAME}
    field ROW_NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ROW_NAME;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.UNCERTAINTY_TEXT}
    field UNCERTAINTY_TEXT
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNCERTAINTY_TEXT;

    {COMPONENT_VIEW.ENTITY_CRITERIA}
    field ENTITY_CRITERIA
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ENTITY_CRITERIA;

    select_clause
        select C.ANALYSIS, C.ANALYSIS_VERSION, C.NAME, C.ORDER_NUMBER, C.RESULT_TYPE, C.UNITS, C.MINIMUM, C.MAXIMUM, C.TRUE_WORD, C.FALSE_WORD, C.ALLOWED_CHARACTERS, C.CALCULATION, C.PLACES, C.REP_CONTROL, C.REPLICATES, C.SIG_FIGS_NUMBER, C.SIG_FIGS_ROUNDING, C.SIG_FIGS_FILTER, C.MINIMUM_PQL, C.MAXIMUM_PQL, C.PQL_CALCULATION, C.FORMULA, C.MATRIX_NO, C.MATRIX_NAME, C.COLUMN_NO, C.COLUMN_NAME, C.ROW_NO, C.ROW_NAME, C.UNCERTAINTY_TEXT, C.ENTITY_CRITERIA
        from VERSIONED_COMPONENT C
        where ANALYSIS_VERSION =
        (select max(ANALYSIS_VERSION)
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A2
        where A2.[IDENTITY] = C.ANALYSIS and A2.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A' and A2.ACTIVE = 'T' and A2.REMOVEFLAG = 'F');

    view COMPLIST_HEADER_VIEW
        alias COMP_LIST_HEADER 
        on_table VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER;

    {COMPLIST_HEADER_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {COMPLIST_HEADER_VIEW.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {COMPLIST_HEADER_VIEW.COMP_LIST}
    field COMP_LIST
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {COMPLIST_HEADER_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    select_clause
        select CLH.ANALYSIS, CLH.ANALYSIS_VERSION, CLH.COMP_LIST, CLH.DESCRIPTION
        from VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER CLH
        where ANALYSIS_VERSION =
        (select max(ANALYSIS_VERSION)
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A2
        where A2.[IDENTITY] = CLH.ANALYSIS and A2.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A' and A2.ACTIVE = 'T' and A2.REMOVEFLAG = 'F');

    view COMPLIST_ENTRY_VIEW
        alias COMP_LIST_ENTRY 
        on_table VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY;

    {COMPLIST_ENTRY_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {COMPLIST_ENTRY_VIEW.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {COMPLIST_ENTRY_VIEW.COMP_LIST}
    field COMP_LIST
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {COMPLIST_ENTRY_VIEW.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {COMPLIST_ENTRY_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER 
        used_for ORDERING;

    {COMPLIST_ENTRY_VIEW.DEFAULT_VALUE}
    field DEFAULT_VALUE
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.DEFAULT_VALUE;

    {COMPLIST_ENTRY_VIEW.REPLICATE_COUNT}
    field REPLICATE_COUNT
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.REPLICATE_COUNT;

    {COMPLIST_ENTRY_VIEW.RESULT_ENTRY}
    field RESULT_ENTRY
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.RESULT_ENTRY;

    {COMPLIST_ENTRY_VIEW.CREATE_ALWAYS}
    field CREATE_ALWAYS
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.CREATE_ALWAYS;

    {COMPLIST_ENTRY_VIEW.SPIKE_VALUE}
    field SPIKE_VALUE
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.SPIKE_VALUE;

    {COMPLIST_ENTRY_VIEW.SURROGATE_MLP}
    field SURROGATE_MLP
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.SURROGATE_MLP;

    select_clause
        select CLE.ANALYSIS, CLE.ANALYSIS_VERSION, CLE.COMP_LIST, CLE.NAME, CLE.ORDER_NUMBER, CLE.DEFAULT_VALUE, CLE.REPLICATE_COUNT, CLE.RESULT_ENTRY, CLE.CREATE_ALWAYS, CLE.SPIKE_VALUE, CLE.SURROGATE_MLP
        from VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY CLE
        where ANALYSIS_VERSION =
        (select max(ANALYSIS_VERSION)
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A2
        where A2.[IDENTITY] = CLE.ANALYSIS and A2.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A' and A2.ACTIVE = 'T' and A2.REMOVEFLAG = 'F');

    table BLOB_VALUES;

    {BLOB_VALUES.BLOB_ID}
    field BLOB_ID
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {BLOB_VALUES.IS_BINARY}
    field IS_BINARY
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {BLOB_VALUES.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (40);

    {BLOB_VALUES.FIELD_NAME}
    field FIELD_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (40);

    {BLOB_VALUES.BLOB_field}
    field BLOB_field
        datatype BLOB;

    table ARCHIVE_JOB_HEADER PARENT_table JOB_HEADER tableset ARCHIVE;

    table ARCHIVE_SAMPLE tableset ARCHIVE
        noindex PARENT_table SAMPLE 
        prompt_description 'STRUCTURE_SAMPLE';

    index arc_sample_id_text_index unique
        on id_text ;

    index arc_sample_job_name_index
        on job_name ;

    index arc_sample_status_index unique
        on id_numeric , status ;

    table ARCHIVE_S_FORMULATION tableset ARCHIVE
        noindex PARENT_table SAMPLE_FORMULATION;

    table ARCHIVE_TEST tableset ARCHIVE
        noindex PARENT_table TEST;

    index arc_test_i unique
        on test_number rdb_location 'HASH_STORAGE_AREA' rdb_specific 'TYPE IS HASHED' ;

    index arc_samp_anal_index
        on sample , analysis ;

    index arc_test_analysis_index
        on analysis ;

    table ARCHIVE_RESULT PARENT_table RESULT tableset ARCHIVE;

    table ARCHIVE_AUDIT_TRANS PARENT_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION tableset ARCHIVE;

    table ARCHIVE_AUDIT_EVENT PARENT_table AUDIT_EVENT tableset ARCHIVE;

    index A_AUDIT_EVENT_TRANS_INDEX
        on TRANSACTION;

    index arc_audit_table_no_index
        on table_name , record_key0;

    table ARCHIVE_AUDIT_DATA PARENT_table AUDIT_DATA tableset ARCHIVE;

    index arc_audit_field_index
        on field;

    view ARCHIVE_AUDIT_VALUES
        parent_table AUDIT_VALUES tableset ARCHIVE;

    view ARCHIVE_AUDIT_VIEW
        parent_table AUDIT_VIEW tableset ARCHIVE;

    select_clause
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from ARCHIVE_AUDIT_EVENT E, ARCHIVE_AUDIT_TRANS T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION];

    table ARCHIVE_BATCH_HEADER PARENT_table BATCH_HEADER tableset ARCHIVE;

    table ARCHIVE_BATCH_ENTRY PARENT_table BATCH_ENTRY tableset ARCHIVE;

    table LIST_RESULT_FORMAT;

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        alias GROUP 
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.FORM_TITLE}
    field FORM_TITLE
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.REPLICATE_TITLE}
    field REPLICATE_TITLE
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.VALUE_TITLE}
    field VALUE_TITLE
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.MAX_REPLICATES}
    field MAX_REPLICATES
        datatype INTEGER 
        lower_limit 0;

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.LIBRARY}
    field LIBRARY
        links_to REPORT.IDENTITY;

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.CALLBACK_ROUTINE}
    field CALLBACK_ROUTINE
        datatype IDENTITY (40) 
        prompt_type USER_DEFINED LIBRARY '$PROMPT_ROUTINE' ROUTINE 'prompt_routine';

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    {LIST_RESULT_FORMAT.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    table LIST_RESULT;

    {LIST_RESULT.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to RESULT.TEST_NUMBER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {LIST_RESULT.NAME}
    field NAME
        alias COMPONENT_NAME 
        links_to RESULT.NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {LIST_RESULT.REPLICATE_NUMBER}
    field REPLICATE_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {LIST_RESULT.RESULT_VALUE}
    field RESULT_VALUE
        datatype REAL;

    {LIST_RESULT.RESULT_STRING}
    field RESULT_STRING
        datatype TEXT (234);

    table STANDARD_CONCENTRATION;

    {STANDARD_CONCENTRATION.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to PARENT STANDARD_VERSIONS.IDENTITY AS STANDARD_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {STANDARD_CONCENTRATION.VERSION}
    field VERSION
        links_to PARENT STANDARD_VERSIONS.VERSION AS STANDARD_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {STANDARD_CONCENTRATION.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (40) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY CASE_SENSITIVE;

    {STANDARD_CONCENTRATION.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING;

    {STANDARD_CONCENTRATION.AMOUNT}
    field AMOUNT
        datatype REAL 
        lower_limit 0.0;

    {STANDARD_CONCENTRATION.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to UNIT_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    table INSPECTION_HEADER;

    {INSPECTION_HEADER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias IDENTIFIER 
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {INSPECTION_HEADER.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        alias GROUP 
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {INSPECTION_HEADER.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {INSPECTION_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {INSPECTION_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {INSPECTION_HEADER.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {INSPECTION_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {INSPECTION_HEADER.INSPECTION_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        default 'ROUND' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type INSP_TYPE;

    {INSPECTION_HEADER.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    {INSPECTION_HEADER.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    table INSPECTION_RECORD;

    {INSPECTION_RECORD.INSPECTION_IDENTITY}
    field INSPECTION_IDENTITY
        links_to PARENT INSPECTION_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {INSPECTION_RECORD.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, ORDERING;

    {INSPECTION_RECORD.INSPECTION_USER_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_USER_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        default 'USER' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type INSP_USER;

    {INSPECTION_RECORD.PERSONNEL_ID}
    field PERSONNEL_ID
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {INSPECTION_RECORD.ROLE_ID}
    field ROLE_ID
        links_to ROLE_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {INSPECTION_RECORD.INSPECTION_TEXT}
    field INSPECTION_TEXT
        datatype TEXT (234);

    table INSPECTOR;

    {INSPECTOR.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        datatype TEXT (30) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {INSPECTOR.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        datatype TEXT (50) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {INSPECTOR.VERSION}
    field VERSION
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {INSPECTOR.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, ORDERING;

    {INSPECTOR.INSPECTION_USER_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_USER_TYPE
        links_to INSPECTION_RECORD.INSPECTION_USER_TYPE;

    {INSPECTOR.PERSONNEL_ID}
    field PERSONNEL_ID
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {INSPECTOR.ROLE_ID}
    field ROLE_ID
        links_to ROLE_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {INSPECTOR.INSPECTION_IDENTITY}
    field INSPECTION_IDENTITY
        links_to INSPECTION_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {INSPECTOR.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {INSPECTOR.INSPECTION_TEXT}
    field INSPECTION_TEXT
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {INSPECTOR.OLD_STATUS}
    field OLD_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {INSPECTOR.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {INSPECTOR.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {INSPECTOR.APPROVAL_USER}
    field APPROVAL_USER
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {INSPECTOR.APPROVAL_DATE}
    field APPROVAL_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {INSPECTOR.ACTUAL_USER}
    field ACTUAL_USER
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    view SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW
        on_table SAMPLE, INSPECTOR, ROLE_ASSIGNMENT;

    {SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY , PRIMARY_BROWSE DESCENDING;

    {SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS;

    {SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW.VERSION}
    field VERSION
        links_to INSPECTOR.VERSION;

    {SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        links_to INSPECTOR.ORDER_NUM;

    {SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW.INSPECTION_USER_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_USER_TYPE
        links_to INSPECTION_RECORD.INSPECTION_USER_TYPE;

    {SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW.PERSONNEL_ID}
    field PERSONNEL_ID
        alias INSPECTOR_PERSONNEL_ID 
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW.ROLE_ID}
    field ROLE_ID
        links_to ROLE_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW.INSPECTION_IDENTITY}
    field INSPECTION_IDENTITY
        links_to INSPECTION_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW.INSPECTION_STATUS}
    field INSPECTION_STATUS
        links_to INSPECTOR.STATUS;

    {SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW.INSPECTION_TEXT}
    field INSPECTION_TEXT
        links_to INSPECTOR.INSPECTION_TEXT;

    {SAMPLE_INSPECT_VIEW.ROLE_PERSONNEL_ID}
    field ROLE_PERSONNEL_ID
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    select_clause
        select S.ID_NUMERIC, S.ID_TEXT, S.STATUS, I.VERSION, I.ORDER_NUM, I.INSPECTION_USER_TYPE, I.PERSONNEL_ID, I.ROLE_ID, I.INSPECTION_IDENTITY, I.STATUS, I.INSPECTION_TEXT, R.OPERATOR_ID
        from SAMPLE S, INSPECTOR I
        left outer join ROLE_ASSIGNMENT R on R.ROLE_ID = I.ROLE_ID
        where I.RECORD_KEY0 = S.ID_NUMERIC and I.TABLE_NAME ='SAMPLE';

    view TEST_INSPECT_VIEW
        on_table TEST, INSPECTOR, ROLE_ASSIGNMENT;

    {TEST_INSPECT_VIEW.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {TEST_INSPECT_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS;

    {TEST_INSPECT_VIEW.VERSION}
    field VERSION
        links_to INSPECTOR.VERSION;

    {TEST_INSPECT_VIEW.INSPECTION_USER_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_USER_TYPE
        links_to INSPECTION_RECORD.INSPECTION_USER_TYPE;

    {TEST_INSPECT_VIEW.PERSONNEL_ID}
    field PERSONNEL_ID
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {TEST_INSPECT_VIEW.ROLE_ID}
    field ROLE_ID
        links_to ROLE_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {TEST_INSPECT_VIEW.INSPECTION_STATUS}
    field INSPECTION_STATUS
        links_to INSPECTOR.STATUS;

    {TEST_INSPECT_VIEW.INSPECTION_TEXT}
    field INSPECTION_TEXT
        links_to INSPECTOR.INSPECTION_TEXT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {TEST_INSPECT_VIEW.ROLE_PERSONNEL_ID}
    field ROLE_PERSONNEL_ID
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    select_clause
        select T.TEST_NUMBER, T.STATUS, I.VERSION, I.INSPECTION_USER_TYPE, I.PERSONNEL_ID, I.ROLE_ID, I.STATUS, I.INSPECTION_TEXT, R.OPERATOR_ID
        from TEST T, INSPECTOR I
        left outer join ROLE_ASSIGNMENT R on R.ROLE_ID = I.ROLE_ID
        where I.RECORD_KEY0 = T.TEST_NUMBER and I.TABLE_NAME = 'TEST';

    view JOB_INSPECT_VIEW
        on_table JOB_HEADER, INSPECTOR, ROLE_ASSIGNMENT;

    {JOB_INSPECT_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {JOB_INSPECT_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {JOB_INSPECT_VIEW.VERSION}
    field VERSION
        links_to INSPECTOR.VERSION;

    {JOB_INSPECT_VIEW.INSPECTION_USER_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_USER_TYPE
        links_to INSPECTION_RECORD.INSPECTION_USER_TYPE;

    {JOB_INSPECT_VIEW.PERSONNEL_ID}
    field PERSONNEL_ID
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {JOB_INSPECT_VIEW.ROLE_ID}
    field ROLE_ID
        links_to ROLE_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {JOB_INSPECT_VIEW.INSPECTION_STATUS}
    field INSPECTION_STATUS
        links_to INSPECTOR.STATUS;

    {JOB_INSPECT_VIEW.INSPECTION_TEXT}
    field INSPECTION_TEXT
        links_to INSPECTOR.INSPECTION_TEXT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {JOB_INSPECT_VIEW.ROLE_PERSONNEL_ID}
    field ROLE_PERSONNEL_ID
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    select_clause
        select J.JOB_NAME, J.JOB_STATUS, I.VERSION, I.INSPECTION_USER_TYPE, I.PERSONNEL_ID, I.ROLE_ID, I.STATUS, I.INSPECTION_TEXT, R.OPERATOR_ID
        from JOB_HEADER J, INSPECTOR I
        left outer join ROLE_ASSIGNMENT R on R.ROLE_ID = I.ROLE_ID
        where I.RECORD_KEY0 = J.JOB_NAME and I.TABLE_NAME = 'JOB_HEADER';

    table REPORT_TMPL_HEADER;

    {REPORT_TMPL_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID}

        datatype IDENTITY (20)

        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {REPORT_TMPL_HEADER.GROUP_ID}

        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {REPORT_TMPL_HEADER.INITIALISED}

        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON}

        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {REPORT_TMPL_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY}

        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {REPORT_TMPL_HEADER.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    table REPORT_TMPL_ADV_OPTS;

    {REPORT_TMPL_ADV_OPTS.TEMPLATE_ID}
    field TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to REPORT_TMPL_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {REPORT_TMPL_ADV_OPTS.SERVER_TEMPLATE}

    {REPORT_TMPL_ADV_OPTS.APPL_TEMPLATE}

        datatype TEXT (234) 
        prompt_type 
        phrase NOIDENTITIES phrase_type MACRO_NAME;

        datatype TEXT (234) 
        prompt_type 
        phrase NOIDENTITIES phrase_type SS_MACRO;

    {REPORT_TMPL_ADV_OPTS.DOC_TO_USE}
    field DOC_TO_USE
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {REPORT_TMPL_ADV_OPTS.SS_DOC_SHEET}
    field SS_DOC_SHEET
        datatype TEXT (2) 
        default '1' 
        allowed_characters '0..9';

    {REPORT_TMPL_ADV_OPTS.INSERT_AT_TOP}
    field INSERT_AT_TOP
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_ADV_OPTS.INSERT_AT_BOTTOM}
    field INSERT_AT_BOTTOM
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_ADV_OPTS.INSERT_AT_BOOKMARK}
    field INSERT_AT_BOOKMARK
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_ADV_OPTS.BOOKMARK_NAME}

        datatype TEXT (234) 
        prompt_type 
        phrase NOIDENTITIES phrase_type BOOKMARK;

    table REPORT_TMPL_LAYOUT;

    {REPORT_TMPL_LAYOUT.LINK_NUMBER}

        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {REPORT_TMPL_LAYOUT.TEMPLATE_ID}

        links_to REPORT_TMPL_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID;

    {REPORT_TMPL_LAYOUT.ORDER_NUMBER}

        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING;

    {REPORT_TMPL_LAYOUT.BLOCK_TYPE}

        datatype TEXT (20);

    {REPORT_TMPL_LAYOUT.REC_KEY0}
    field REC_KEY0
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    table REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.DATA_BLOCK_NUMBER}
    field DATA_BLOCK_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.TEMPLATE_ID}
    field TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to REPORT_TMPL_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.IN_BORDER_SINGLE}
    field IN_BORDER_SINGLE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.IN_BORDER_DOUBLE}
    field IN_BORDER_DOUBLE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    field IN_BORDER_NONE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.OUT_BORDER_DOUBLE}
    field OUT_BORDER_DOUBLE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.OUT_BORDER_NONE}
    field OUT_BORDER_NONE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.COL_WIDTHS_AUTO}
    field COL_WIDTHS_AUTO
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.COL_WIDTHS_WRAP}
    field COL_WIDTHS_WRAP
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.COL_WIDTHS_MAN}
    field COL_WIDTHS_MAN
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        true_word 'In' 
        false_word 'Cm';

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.COL_WIDTHS_VAL}
    field COL_WIDTHS_VAL
        datatype REAL;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.TAB_SEPARATED}
    field TAB_SEPARATED
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.COMMA_SEPARATED}
    field COMMA_SEPARATED
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.USER_SEPARATOR}
    field USER_SEPARATOR
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.SEPARATOR_VALUE}
    field SEPARATOR_VALUE
        datatype TEXT (5);

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.OUTLINE}
    field OUTLINE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.LEFT_BORDER}
    field LEFT_BORDER
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.RIGHT_BORDER}
    field RIGHT_BORDER
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.TOP_BORDER}
    field TOP_BORDER
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.BOTTOM_BORDER}
    field BOTTOM_BORDER
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.INSERT_COL}
    field INSERT_COL
        datatype TEXT (2) 
        default 'A' 
        allowed_characters 'a..zA..Z';

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.INSERT_ROW}
    field INSERT_ROW
        datatype TEXT (3) 
        default '0' 
        allowed_characters '0..9';

    {REPORT_TMPL_DATA_BLOCK.FONT_RECORD}
    field FONT_RECORD
        links_to REPORT_TMPL_FONT.FONT_NUMBER;

    table REPORT_TMPL_TABS;

    view INSPECT_HISTORY_VIEW
        on_table SAMPLE,INSPECTOR;

    {INSPECT_HISTORY_VIEW.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE DESCENDING;

    {INSPECT_HISTORY_VIEW.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {INSPECT_HISTORY_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {INSPECT_HISTORY_VIEW.LOGIN_DATE}
    field LOGIN_DATE
        links_to SAMPLE.LOGIN_DATE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    select_clause
        select distinct S.ID_NUMERIC, S.ID_TEXT, S.STATUS, S.LOGIN_DATE
        from SAMPLE S, INSPECTOR I
        where I.RECORD_KEY0 = S.ID_NUMERIC and I.TABLE_NAME ='SAMPLE';

    table BATCH_SQC_HEADER;

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias IDENTIFIER 
        datatype IDENTITY (20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        alias GROUP 
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.COMPONENT}
    field COMPONENT
        links_to COMPONENT.NAME;

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.COMPONENT_2}
    field COMPONENT_2
        links_to COMPONENT.NAME;

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.STANDARD}
    field STANDARD
        datatype IDENTITY 
        prompt_type 
        phrase phrase_type SQC_STAN;

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.INSTRUMENT}
    field INSTRUMENT
        links_to INSTRUMENT.IDENTITY;

    {BATCH_SQC_HEADER.POINTS}
    field POINTS
        datatype INTEGER 
        default '20' 
        lower_limit '0';

    table BATCH_TMPL_SQC;

    {BATCH_TMPL_SQC.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to PARENT BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_SQC.CHART}
    field CHART
        links_to PARENT BATCH_SQC_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {BATCH_TMPL_SQC.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING;

    view BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW
        on_table BATCH_HEADER,BATCH_ENTRY,SAMPLE,TEST,RESULT;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.BATCH_HEADER}
    field BATCH_HEADER
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.BATCH_TEMPLATE}
    field BATCH_TEMPLATE
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.INSTRUMENT}
    field INSTRUMENT
        links_to TEST.INSTRUMENT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.PRODUCT}
    field PRODUCT
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.STANDARD}
    field STANDARD
        links_to SAMPLE.STANDARD_TYPE;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.TEXT}
    field TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to RESULT.UNITS;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.ENTERED_ON}
    field ENTERED_ON
        links_to RESULT.ENTERED_ON;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.SURROGATE_MLP}
    field SURROGATE_MLP
        links_to RESULT.SURROGATE_MLP;

    {BATCH_SQC_ACTIVE_VIEW.SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION}
    field SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION
        links_to RESULT.SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION;

    select_clause
        select H.[IDENTITY], H.TEMPLATE_ID, T.ANALYSIS, T.INSTRUMENT, S.PRODUCT, S.PRODUCT_VERSION, S.STANDARD_TYPE, S.ID_NUMERIC, S.ID_TEXT, R.TEST_NUMBER, R.NAME, R.TEXT, R.UNITS, R.ENTERED_ON, R.SURROGATE_MLP, R.SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION
        from BATCH_HEADER H, BATCH_ENTRY E, TEST T, SAMPLE S, RESULT R
        where (H.STATUS <> 'X')and (E.[IDENTITY] = H.[IDENTITY])and (T.TEST_NUMBER = E.TEST)and (S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE)and (R.TEST_NUMBER = E.TEST)and (R.STATUS IN ('A', 'E', 'M'));

    view BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_VIEW
        on_table C_BATCH_HEADER,C_BATCH_ENTRY,C_SAMPLE,C_TEST,C_RESULT;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.BATCH_HEADER}
    field BATCH_HEADER
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.BATCH_TEMPLATE}
    field BATCH_TEMPLATE
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.INSTRUMENT}
    field INSTRUMENT
        links_to TEST.INSTRUMENT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.PRODUCT}
    field PRODUCT
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.STANDARD}
    field STANDARD
        links_to SAMPLE.STANDARD_TYPE;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.TEXT}
    field TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to RESULT.UNITS;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.ENTERED_ON}
    field ENTERED_ON
        links_to RESULT.ENTERED_ON;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.SURROGATE_MLP}
    field SURROGATE_MLP
        links_to RESULT.SURROGATE_MLP;

    {BATCH_SQC_COMMITTED_view.SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION}
    field SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION
        links_to RESULT.SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION;

    select_clause
        select H.[IDENTITY], H.TEMPLATE_ID, T.ANALYSIS, T.INSTRUMENT, S.PRODUCT, S.PRODUCT_VERSION, S.STANDARD_TYPE, S.ID_NUMERIC, S.ID_TEXT, R.TEST_NUMBER, R.NAME, R.TEXT, R.UNITS, R.ENTERED_ON, R.SURROGATE_MLP, R.SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION
        from C_BATCH_HEADER H, C_BATCH_ENTRY E, C_TEST T, C_SAMPLE S, C_RESULT R
        where (H.STATUS <> 'X')and (E.[IDENTITY] = H.[IDENTITY])and (T.TEST_NUMBER = E.TEST)and (S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE)and (R.TEST_NUMBER = E.TEST)and (R.STATUS IN ('A', 'E', 'M'));

        prompt_type USER_DEFINED LIBRARY '$PROMPT_ROUTINE' ROUTINE 'prompt_routine';

    {TIMER_SCHEDULE.MODIFIED_ON}

        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {TIMER_SCHEDULE.MODIFIED_BY}

        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {TIMER_SCHEDULE.MODIFIABLE}

    {TIMER_SCHEDULE.REMOVEFLAG}

        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

        lower_limit 0 
        upper_limit 10;

    {CGI_SCRIPT.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}

    table CLIENT_ACCESS;

    {CLIENT_ACCESS.IP_ADDRESS}

        true_word 'Enabled' 
        false_word 'Disabled';

        datatype INTEGER 
        default 1

        upper_limit 9999;

    table OBSOLETE_ESIG_MENU_LEVEL;

    {OBSOLETE_ESIG_MENU_LEVEL.MENU_NUMBER}
    field MENU_NUMBER
        links_to MASTER_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {OBSOLETE_ESIG_MENU_LEVEL.ESIG_LEVEL}
    field ESIG_LEVEL
        datatype IDENTITY 
        prompt_type 
        phrase IDENTITIES phrase_type ESIG_LEVEL;

    {OBSOLETE_ESIG_MENU_LEVEL.ESIG_REASON}
    field ESIG_REASON
        datatype TEXT (80);

    view ESIG_MENU_LEVEL_VIEW
        alias ESIG_MENU_LEVEL 
        on_table MASTER_MENU;

    {ESIG_MENU_LEVEL_VIEW.MENU_NUMBER}
    field MENU_NUMBER
        links_to MASTER_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ESIG_MENU_LEVEL_VIEW.ESIG_LEVEL}
    field ESIG_LEVEL
        links_to MASTER_MENU.ESIG_LEVEL;

    {ESIG_MENU_LEVEL_VIEW.ESIG_REASON}
    field ESIG_REASON
        links_to MASTER_MENU.ESIG_REASON;

    select_clause
        select MASTER_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM, MASTER_MENU.ESIG_LEVEL, MASTER_MENU.ESIG_REASON
        from MASTER_MENU;

    table ACCESS_LOG;

    {ACCESS_LOG.SESSION_ID}
    field SESSION_ID
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ACCESS_LOG.OPERATOR}
    field OPERATOR
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {ACCESS_LOG.IP_ADDRESS}
    field IP_ADDRESS
        datatype TEXT (39);

    {ACCESS_LOG.SERVER_PID}
    field SERVER_PID
        datatype TEXT (10);

    {ACCESS_LOG.SERVER_OS_USERNAME}
    field SERVER_OS_USERNAME
        datatype TEXT (20);

    {ACCESS_LOG.SERVER_NAME}
    field SERVER_NAME
        datatype TEXT (15);

    {ACCESS_LOG.SERVER_DATE}
    field SERVER_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {ACCESS_LOG.SERVER_DATE_TEXT}
    field SERVER_DATE_TEXT
        datatype TEXT (23);

        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS;

    {INCIDENTS.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        datatype TEXT (10);

    {INCIDENTS.RESULTID}
    field RESULTID
        datatype TEXT (264);

    {INCIDENTS.RESULT_NAME}
    field RESULT_NAME
        datatype TEXT (254);

    {INCIDENTS.RESULT_TEXT}
    field RESULT_TEXT
        datatype TEXT (254);

    {INCIDENTS.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        datatype TEXT(40);

    {INCIDENTS.SENT}
    field SENT
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'False' 
        true_word 'True' 
        false_word 'False';

    {INCIDENTS.NC_STATUS}
    field NC_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (50);

    {INCIDENTS.NC_IDENTITY}
    field NC_IDENTITY
        datatype TEXT (25);

    {INCIDENTS.NC_LINK_EDIT}
    field NC_LINK_EDIT
        datatype TEXT (500);

    {INCIDENTS.NC_LINK_READ}
    field NC_LINK_READ
        datatype TEXT (500);

    index IDX_INCIDENTS UNIQUE
        on INCIDENT_ID, SAMPLE, JOB_NAME;

    index IDX_INCIDENTS_STA_TMPL_SAMPLE
        on STATUS, TEMPLATE_ID, SAMPLE;

    index IDX_NC_ID
        on NC_IDENTITY;

    index INC_SUBJECT
        on SUBJECT_TABLE, SUBJECT_FIELD;

        datatype TEXT (30);

    {EXPLORER_AUX.POST_COMMIT_ROUTINE}
    field POST_COMMIT_ROUTINE
        datatype TEXT (30);

    {EXPLORER_AUX.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    table EXPLORER_AUX_FIELDS;

    {EXPLORER_AUX_FIELDS.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to PARENT EXPLORER_AUX.TABLE_NAME AS EXPLORER_AUX 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {EXPLORER_AUX_FIELDS.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to PARENT EXPLORER_AUX.IDENTITY AS EXPLORER_AUX 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1), VERSION_NUMBER;

        datatype IDENTITY

        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, ORDERING;

        datatype TEXT (30) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {EXPLORER_AUX_FIELDS.WIDTH}
    field WIDTH
        datatype INTEGER 
        default 10 
        format 99 
        lower_limit 1 
        upper_limit 50;

    {EXPLORER_AUX_FIELDS.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (30);

    {EXPLORER_AUX_FIELDS.DEFAULT_VALUE}
    field DEFAULT_VALUE
        datatype TEXT;

    {EXPLORER_AUX_FIELDS.VISIBLE}
    field VISIBLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'True' 
        true_word 'True' 
        false_word 'False';

        default 'False'

        false_word 'False';

    table MASTER_MENU;

    {MASTER_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM}
    field PROCEDURE_NUM
        datatype INTEGER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE 
        lower_limit 1 
        prompt_type USER_DEFINED LIBRARY '$MENU_MASTER_PROMPT' ROUTINE 'prompt_menu';

    {MASTER_MENU.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {MASTER_MENU.SHORT_TEXT}
    field SHORT_TEXT
        datatype TEXT (30);

    {MASTER_MENU.MNEMONIC}
    field MNEMONIC
        datatype IDENTITY (10) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (4);

    {MASTER_MENU.LIBRARY}
    field LIBRARY
        links_to REPORT.IDENTITY;

    {MASTER_MENU.ROUTINE}
    field ROUTINE
        datatype TEXT (40) 
        prompt_type USER_DEFINED LIBRARY '$PROMPT_ROUTINE' ROUTINE 'prompt_routine';

    {MASTER_MENU.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (40) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (5);

    {MASTER_MENU.DATA_TYPE}
    field DATA_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2) 
        prompt_type 
        phrase VALID IDENTITIES phrase_type MENU_DATA;

    {MASTER_MENU.ACTION_TYPE}
    field ACTION_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3) 
        prompt_type 
        phrase VALID IDENTITIES phrase_type MENU_ACTN;

    {MASTER_MENU.TYPE}
    field TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        default 'MENU' 
        prompt_type 
        phrase VALID IDENTITIES phrase_type MENU_TYPE;

    {MASTER_MENU.COMMITTED}
    field COMMITTED
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'False' 
        true_word 'True' 
        false_word 'False';

    {MASTER_MENU.AUX_REPORT}
    field AUX_REPORT
        links_to EXPLORER_AUX.IDENTITY;

    {MASTER_MENU.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {MASTER_MENU.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {MASTER_MENU.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {MASTER_MENU.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {MASTER_MENU.ICON}
    field ICON
        links_to ICON.IDENTITY;

    {MASTER_MENU.ESIG_LEVEL}
    field ESIG_LEVEL
        datatype IDENTITY 
        prompt_type 
        phrase VALID IDENTITIES phrase_type ESIG_LEVEL;

    {MASTER_MENU.ESIG_REASON}
    field ESIG_REASON
        datatype TEXT (80);

    {MASTER_MENU.PARAMETERS}
    field PARAMETERS
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {MASTER_MENU.PARAMETERS_ACTIONS}
    field PARAMETERS_ACTIONS
        datatype IDENTITY 
        default 'BEFORE' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type MNU_PARAM;

    {MASTER_MENU.LIMSML_ENTITY}
    field LIMSML_ENTITY
        links_to LIMSML_ENTITY_ACTION.ENTITY;

    {MASTER_MENU.LIMSML_ACTION}
    field LIMSML_ACTION
        links_to LIMSML_ENTITY_ACTION.ACTION;

    {MASTER_MENU.CATEGORY}
    field CATEGORY
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {MASTER_MENU.IMPLEMENTATION_TYPE}
    field IMPLEMENTATION_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (6) 
        default 'VGL' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type IMPL_TYPE;

    {MASTER_MENU.TASK_NAME}
    field TASK_NAME
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {MASTER_MENU.TASK_PARAMETERS}
    field TASK_PARAMETERS
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {MASTER_MENU.WINDOW_STYLE}
    field WINDOW_STYLE
        datatype TEXT (20);

    {MASTER_MENU.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    index master_menu_mnemonic
        on mnemonic ;

    index master_menu_table
        on table_name ;

    table ROLE_HEADER;

    {ROLE_HEADER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype IDENTITY (20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {ROLE_HEADER.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        alias GROUP 
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {ROLE_HEADER.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {ROLE_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {ROLE_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {ROLE_HEADER.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {ROLE_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {ROLE_HEADER.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    {ROLE_HEADER.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    table ROLE_ENTRY NOINDEX;

    {ROLE_ENTRY.ROLE_ID}
    field ROLE_ID
        links_to PARENT ROLE_HEADER.IDENTITY AS ROLE_HEADER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ROLE_ENTRY.PROCEDURE_NUM}
    field PROCEDURE_NUM
        links_to PARENT MASTER_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM AS MASTER_MENU 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    index role_entry_proc_num
        on procedure_num, role_id;

    table ROLE_ASSIGNMENT;

    {ROLE_ASSIGNMENT.OPERATOR_ID}
    field OPERATOR_ID
        links_to PARENT PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ROLE_ASSIGNMENT.ROLE_ID}
    field ROLE_ID
        links_to PARENT ROLE_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ROLE_ASSIGNMENT.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    view ROLE_MENU
        on_table ROLE_ASSIGNMENT, ROLE_HEADER, ROLE_ENTRY, MASTER_MENU;

    {ROLE_MENU.OPERATOR_ID}
    field OPERATOR_ID
        links_to ROLE_ASSIGNMENT.OPERATOR_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ROLE_MENU.ROLE_ID}
    field ROLE_ID
        links_to ROLE_ASSIGNMENT.ROLE_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ROLE_MENU.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to ROLE_ASSIGNMENT.GROUP_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ROLE_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM}
    field PROCEDURE_NUM
        links_to ROLE_ENTRY.PROCEDURE_NUM 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ROLE_MENU.COMMITTED}
    field COMMITTED
        links_to MASTER_MENU.COMMITTED;

    select_clause
        select P.[IDENTITY] OPERATOR_ID, E.ROLE_ID, G.[IDENTITY] GROUP_ID, E.PROCEDURE_NUM, MM.COMMITTED
        from ROLE_ENTRY E INNER JOIN MASTER_MENU MM on (E.PROCEDURE_NUM = MM.PROCEDURE_NUM and MM.REMOVEFLAG = 'F')
        left outer join GROUP_HEADER G on (G.REMOVEFLAG = 'F')
        left outer join PERSONNEL P on (P.REMOVEFLAG = 'F')
        where E.ROLE_ID LIKE '%DISPLAYER' union
        select ROLE_ASSIGNMENT.OPERATOR_ID, ROLE_ASSIGNMENT.ROLE_ID, ROLE_ASSIGNMENT.GROUP_ID, ROLE_ENTRY.PROCEDURE_NUM, MASTER_MENU.COMMITTED
        from ROLE_ASSIGNMENT, ROLE_HEADER, ROLE_ENTRY, MASTER_MENU
        where ROLE_ASSIGNMENT.ROLE_ID = ROLE_ENTRY.ROLE_ID and ROLE_ENTRY.PROCEDURE_NUM = MASTER_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM and ROLE_HEADER.[IDENTITY] = ROLE_ENTRY.ROLE_ID and ROLE_ASSIGNMENT.ROLE_ID not LIKE '%DISPLAYER' and ROLE_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG = 'F';

    view USER_ROLE;

    {USER_ROLE.USER_ID}
    field USER_ID
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {USER_ROLE.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to PERSONNEL.DESCRIPTION;

    {USER_ROLE.LOCATION_ID}
    field LOCATION_ID
        links_to PERSONNEL.LOCATION_ID;

    {USER_ROLE.ROLE_ID}
    field ROLE_ID
        links_to ROLE_ENTRY.ROLE_ID;

    {USER_ROLE.LAST_LOGIN}
    field LAST_LOGIN
        links_to PASSWORD.LAST_LOGIN;

    select_clause
        select P.[IDENTITY], P.DESCRIPTION, P.LOCATION_ID, RA1.ROLE_ID, CAST (PW.LAST_LOGIN AS SMALLDATETIME)LAST_LOGIN
        from ROLE_ASSIGNMENT RA1 INNER JOIN PERSONNEL P on RA1.OPERATOR_ID = P.[IDENTITY] and P.REMOVEFLAG = 'F' INNER JOIN PASSWORD PW on P.[IDENTITY] = PW.[IDENTITY]
        where P.LOCATION_ID <> '' and P.[IDENTITY] not IN ('TEST')and RA1.ROLE_ID =
        (select TOP 1 RA2.ROLE_ID
        from
        (select 'USER' ROLE, 1 ORDER_NUM
        union all
        select 'DYNAMIC_DISPLAYER', 2
        union all
        select 'STATIC_DISPLAYER', 4
        union all
        select 'WEB_USER', 8
        union all
        select 'DYNAMIC_MAINTAINER', 16
        union all
        select 'STATIC_MAINTAINER', 32
        union all
        select 'DYNAMIC_AUTHORISER', 64
        union all
        select 'STATIC_AUTHORISER', 128
        union all
        select '', 256
        union all
        select 'SYSTEM_MANAGER', 512)r2 join ROLE_ASSIGNMENT ra2 on r2.ROLE = ra2.ROLE_ID
        where ra2.OPERATOR_ID = ra1.OPERATOR_ID order by r2.ORDER_NUM DESC);

    view ROLE_ENTRY_DETAILS
        on_table ROLE_ENTRY, MASTER_MENU;

    {ROLE_ENTRY_DETAILS.ROLE_ID}
    field ROLE_ID
        links_to ROLE_ENTRY.ROLE_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ROLE_ENTRY_DETAILS.PROCEDURE_NUM}
    field PROCEDURE_NUM
        links_to ROLE_ENTRY.PROCEDURE_NUM 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {ROLE_ENTRY_DETAILS.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to MASTER_MENU.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {ROLE_ENTRY_DETAILS.DATA_TYPE}
    field DATA_TYPE
        links_to MASTER_MENU.DATA_TYPE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {ROLE_ENTRY_DETAILS.ACTION_TYPE}
    field ACTION_TYPE
        links_to MASTER_MENU.ACTION_TYPE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {ROLE_ENTRY_DETAILS.TYPE}
    field TYPE
        links_to MASTER_MENU.TYPE;

    {ROLE_ENTRY_DETAILS.ICON}
    field ICON
        links_to MASTER_MENU.ICON;

    select_clause
        select ROLE_ENTRY.ROLE_ID, ROLE_ENTRY.PROCEDURE_NUM, MASTER_MENU.DESCRIPTION, MASTER_MENU.DATA_TYPE, MASTER_MENU.ACTION_TYPE, MASTER_MENU.TYPE, MASTER_MENU.ICON
        from ROLE_ENTRY, MASTER_MENU
        where ROLE_ENTRY.PROCEDURE_NUM = MASTER_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM;

    view MENU_IE_VIEW
        on_table MASTER_MENU , SMW_MENU;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.PROCEDURE_NUM}
    field PROCEDURE_NUM
        links_to MASTER_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to MASTER_MENU.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.SHORT_TEXT}
    field SHORT_TEXT
        links_to MASTER_MENU.SHORT_TEXT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.MNEMONIC}
    field MNEMONIC
        links_to MASTER_MENU.MNEMONIC;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.LIBRARY}
    field LIBRARY
        links_to MASTER_MENU.LIBRARY;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.ROUTINE}
    field ROUTINE
        links_to MASTER_MENU.ROUTINE;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.TYPE}
    field TYPE
        links_to MASTER_MENU.TYPE;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.MENU_NAME}
    field MENU_NAME
        links_to SMW_MENU.MENU_NAME;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.ENTRY_NUMBER}
    field ENTRY_NUMBER
        links_to SMW_MENU.ENTRY_NUMBER;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.MENU_NUMBER}
    field MENU_NUMBER
        links_to SMW_MENU.MENU_NUMBER;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to SMW_MENU.ORDER_NUMBER;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.OPTION_NUMBER}
    field OPTION_NUMBER
        links_to SMW_MENU.OPTION_NUMBER;

    {MENU_IE_VIEW.OPTION_NAME}
    field OPTION_NAME
        links_to SMW_MENU.OPTION_NAME;

    select_clause
        select MASTER_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM, MASTER_MENU.DESCRIPTION, MASTER_MENU.SHORT_TEXT, MASTER_MENU.MNEMONIC, MASTER_MENU.LIBRARY, MASTER_MENU.ROUTINE, MASTER_MENU.TYPE, SMW_MENU.MENU_NAME, SMW_MENU.ENTRY_NUMBER, SMW_MENU.MENU_NUMBER, SMW_MENU.ORDER_NUMBER, SMW_MENU.OPTION_NUMBER, SMW_MENU.OPTION_NAME
        from MASTER_MENU
        right outer join SMW_MENU on SMW_MENU.OPTION_NUMBER = MASTER_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM;

    table COMPONENT_EQUIVALENCE
        alias COMPEQUIV;

    {COMPONENT_EQUIVALENCE.DESTINATION}
    field DESTINATION
        links_to DESTINATION.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {COMPONENT_EQUIVALENCE.ANALYSIS_ID}
    field ANALYSIS_ID
        alias VG_ANALYSIS 
        links_to COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {COMPONENT_EQUIVALENCE.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        alias VG_COMPONENT 
        links_to COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {COMPONENT_EQUIVALENCE.FOREIGN_COMPONENT}
    field FOREIGN_COMPONENT
        alias FOREIGN_COMP 
        datatype TEXT (50);

    {COMPONENT_EQUIVALENCE.REPORT}
    field REPORT
        links_to REPORT.IDENTITY;

    {COMPONENT_EQUIVALENCE.ROUTINE}
    field ROUTINE
        datatype IDENTITY (40) 
        prompt_type USER_DEFINED LIBRARY '$PROMPT_ROUTINE' ROUTINE 'prompt_routine';

    {COMPONENT_EQUIVALENCE.COMP_TYPE}
    field COMP_TYPE
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {COMPONENT_EQUIVALENCE.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    table DESTINATION;

    table ESIG_EVENT;

    {ESIG_EVENT.ESIG_EVENT_ID}
    field ESIG_EVENT_ID
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY DESCENDING;

    {ESIG_EVENT.OPERATOR}
    field OPERATOR
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {ESIG_EVENT.FULLNAME}
    field FULLNAME
        links_to PERSONNEL.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {ESIG_EVENT.SERVER_DATE}
    field SERVER_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {ESIG_EVENT.SERVER_DATE_TEXT}

        datatype TEXT (23);

        datatype TEXT (39);

        datatype TEXT (80);

        datatype TEXT (23);

        datatype TEXT (80);

    {ESIG_EVENT.MENU_NUMBER}
    field MENU_NUMBER
        links_to ESIG_MENU_LEVEL.MENU_NUMBER;

    {ESIG_EVENT.ESIG_REASON}
    field ESIG_REASON
        links_to ESIG_MENU_LEVEL.ESIG_REASON;

    {ESIG_EVENT.SIGNATURE_COMMENT}

        datatype TEXT (234);

    {ESIG_EVENT.SUCCESS}

        datatype BOOLEAN;

        links_to ACCESS_LOG.SESSION_ID;

    {ESIG_EVENT.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234);

    index esig_server_date
        on server_date ;

    table ESIG_DATA;

    {ESIG_DATA.ESIG_DATA_ID}
    field ESIG_DATA_ID
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {ESIG_DATA.ESIG_EVENT_ID}
    field ESIG_EVENT_ID
        links_to ESIG_EVENT.ESIG_EVENT_ID;

    {ESIG_DATA.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to ESIG_CHECKSUM_FIELDS.TABLE_NAME 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {ESIG_DATA.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {ESIG_DATA.CHECKSUM_FIELDS}
    field CHECKSUM_FIELDS
        links_to ESIG_CHECKSUM_FIELDS.CHECKSUM_FIELDS;

    {ESIG_DATA.CHECKSUM}
    field CHECKSUM
        datatype TEXT (80);

    index esig_data_esig_event_id
        on esig_event_id, esig_data_id ;

    index esig_data_table_key0
        on table_name , record_key0 , esig_data_id ;

    table ESIG_CHECKSUM_FIELDS;

    {ESIG_CHECKSUM_FIELDS.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        datatype TEXT (30) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {ESIG_CHECKSUM_FIELDS.CHECKSUM_FIELDS}
    field CHECKSUM_FIELDS
        datatype TEXT (2000);

    view ESIG_DATA_VIEW
        on_table ESIG_EVENT, ESIG_DATA;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW.ESIG_EVENT_ID}
    field ESIG_EVENT_ID
        links_to ESIG_EVENT.ESIG_EVENT_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW.ESIG_DATA_ID}
    field ESIG_DATA_ID
        links_to ESIG_DATA.ESIG_DATA_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to ESIG_DATA.TABLE_NAME;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        links_to ESIG_DATA.RECORD_KEY0;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW.OPERATOR}
    field OPERATOR
        links_to ESIG_EVENT.OPERATOR;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW.FULLNAME}
    field FULLNAME
        links_to ESIG_EVENT.FULLNAME;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW.SERVER_DATE}
    field SERVER_DATE
        links_to ESIG_EVENT.SERVER_DATE;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW.ESIG_REASON}
    field ESIG_REASON
        links_to ESIG_EVENT.ESIG_REASON;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW.SIGNATURE_COMMENT}
    field SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        links_to ESIG_EVENT.SIGNATURE_COMMENT;

    table C_ESIG_EVENT PARENT_table ESIG_EVENT tableset COMMITTED
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    index c_esig_server_date
        on server_date 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    table C_ESIG_DATA PARENT_table ESIG_DATA tableset COMMITTED
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    index c_esig_data_esig_event_id
        on esig_event_id, esig_data_id 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    index c_esig_data_table_key0
        on table_name , record_key0 , esig_data_id 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    view C_ESIG_DATA_VIEW
        parent_table ESIG_DATA_VIEW tableset COMMITTED;

    table ARCHIVE_ESIG_EVENT PARENT_table ESIG_EVENT tableset ARCHIVE;

    index archive_esig_server_date
        on server_date ;

    table ARCHIVE_ESIG_DATA PARENT_table ESIG_DATA tableset ARCHIVE;

    index archive_esig_data_esig_event
        on esig_event_id, esig_data_id ;

    index archive_esig_data_table_key0
        on table_name , record_key0 , esig_data_id ;

    view ARCHIVE_ESIG_DATA_VIEW
        parent_table ESIG_DATA_VIEW tableset ARCHIVE;

    view USER_VIEW
        on_table PERSONNEL, PASSWORD;

    {USER_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias IDENTIFIER 
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {USER_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to PERSONNEL.GROUP_ID 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {USER_VIEW.DEFAULT_GROUP}
    field DEFAULT_GROUP
        links_to PERSONNEL.DEFAULT_GROUP;

    {USER_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to PERSONNEL.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {USER_VIEW.AUTHORITY}
    field AUTHORITY
        links_to PERSONNEL.AUTHORITY;

    {USER_VIEW.LOCATION_ID}
    field LOCATION_ID
        alias LOCATION 
        links_to PERSONNEL.LOCATION_ID;

    {USER_VIEW.COST_CODE}
    field COST_CODE
        links_to PERSONNEL.COST_CODE;

    {USER_VIEW.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to PERSONNEL.MODIFIED_ON 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {USER_VIEW.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.MODIFIED_BY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {USER_VIEW.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        links_to PERSONNEL.MODIFIABLE 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {USER_VIEW.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        links_to PERSONNEL.REMOVEFLAG 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    select_clause
        select P.[IDENTITY], P.GROUP_ID, P.DEFAULT_GROUP, P.DESCRIPTION, P.AUTHORITY, P.LOCATION_ID, P.COST_CODE, P.MODIFIED_ON, P.MODIFIED_BY, P.MODIFIABLE, P.REMOVEFLAG
        from PERSONNEL P, PASSWORD PSW
        where P.[IDENTITY] = PSW.[IDENTITY];

    table CALC_FUNCTION;

    {CALC_FUNCTION.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype IDENTITY(20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {CALC_FUNCTION.LIBRARY}
    field LIBRARY
        links_to REPORT.IDENTITY;

    {CALC_FUNCTION.ROUTINE}
    field ROUTINE
        datatype TEXT (40) 
        prompt_type USER_DEFINED LIBRARY '$prompt_routine' ROUTINE 'prompt_routine';

    {CALC_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_TYPE}
    field FUNCTION_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        prompt_type 
        phrase IDENTITIES phrase_type FUNC_TYPE;

    {CALC_FUNCTION.RETURN_DATA_TYPE}
    field RETURN_DATA_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY 
        default 'NUMERIC' 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type PARAM_TYPE;

    {CALC_FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {CALC_FUNCTION.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        alias GROUP 
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {CALC_FUNCTION.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {CALC_FUNCTION.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {CALC_FUNCTION.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {CALC_FUNCTION.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {CALC_FUNCTION.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    {CALC_FUNCTION.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    {CALC_FUNCTION_PARAMETER.CALC_FUNCTION}

        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3) 
        prompt_type USER_DEFINED LIBRARY '$LTE_INFOMAKER' routine find_pbl_name;

    {INFOMAKER_LINK.REPORT}
    field REPORT
        datatype TEXT (50)

        datatype INTEGER 
        default 1 
        lower_limit 1

    view WEB_MENU
        on_table WEB_MENU_SECTION;

    {WEB_MENU.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to WEB_MENU_SECTION.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    select_clause
        select distinct WEB_MENU_SECTION.[IDENTITY]
        from WEB_MENU_SECTION;

    table WEB_MENU_SECTION;

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype IDENTITY (20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.SECTION}
    field SECTION
        datatype IDENTITY (20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        alias GROUP 
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        datatype INTEGER 
        used_for ORDERING 
        default 1;

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.ICON}
    field ICON
        links_to ICON.IDENTITY 
        default 'INT_CLOSED_FOLDER';

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.VISIBLE}
    field VISIBLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'True' 
        true_word 'True' 
        false_word 'False';

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.ALWAYS_VISIBLE}
    field ALWAYS_VISIBLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'False' 
        true_word 'True' 
        false_word 'False';

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.IMAGE_LINK}
    field IMAGE_LINK
        datatype TEXT (100);

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.INTRODUCTION}
    field INTRODUCTION
        datatype TEXT (2000) 
        default NULL;

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.SUMMARY}
    field SUMMARY
        datatype TEXT (2000) 
        default NULL;

    {WEB_MENU_SECTION.SHOW_MENU_OPTIONS}
    field SHOW_MENU_OPTIONS
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'True' 
        true_word 'True' 
        false_word 'False';

        alias REMOVE_FLAG

        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

        alias GROUP

        links_to SYNTAX.IDENTITY;
