    {MENU_TOOLBAR.INTERNAL_ITEM_NAME}
    field INTERNAL_ITEM_NAME
        datatype TEXT (40);

    {MENU_TOOLBAR.PAINT_STYLE}
    field PAINT_STYLE
        datatype TEXT (40);

    {MENU_TOOLBAR.BEGIN_GROUP}
    field BEGIN_GROUP
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'No' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    {MENU_TOOLBAR.SHORTCUT}
    field SHORTCUT
        datatype TEXT (20);

    table EXPLORER_HIERARCHY;

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (30) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY.HIERARCHY}
    field HIERARCHY
        datatype IDENTITY (40) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    table EXPLORER_HIERARCHY_LEVEL;

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY_LEVEL.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to PARENT EXPLORER_HIERARCHY.TABLE_NAME AS HIERARCHY_LINK 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY_LEVEL.HIERARCHY}
    field HIERARCHY
        links_to PARENT EXPLORER_HIERARCHY.HIERARCHY AS HIERARCHY_LINK 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY_LEVEL.LINK_TABLE_NAME}
    field LINK_TABLE_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (30) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY_LEVEL.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        alias POSITION 
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING, UNIQUE_KEY;

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY_LEVEL.TREE_DISPLAY_FIELDS}
    field TREE_DISPLAY_FIELDS
        datatype TEXT (200);

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY_LEVEL.LINK_FROM_PARENT}
    field LINK_FROM_PARENT
        datatype TEXT (200);

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY_LEVEL.LINK_TO_PARENT}
    field LINK_TO_PARENT
        datatype TEXT (200);

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY_LEVEL.CRITERIA}
    field CRITERIA
        links_to CRITERIA_SAVED.IDENTITY;

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY_LEVEL.EXPLORER_FORM}
    field EXPLORER_FORM
        links_to FORM.NAME;

    {EXPLORER_HIERARCHY_LEVEL.EXPLORER_FORM_TASK}
    field EXPLORER_FORM_TASK
        datatype TEXT (100);

    table MENU_MYTASKS;

    {MENU_MYTASKS.MYTASKS_NAME}
    field MYTASKS_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {MENU_MYTASKS.ITEM_NUMBER}
    field ITEM_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, ORDERING;

    {MENU_MYTASKS.ITEM_NAME}
    field ITEM_NAME
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {MENU_MYTASKS.PROCEDURE_NUM}
    field PROCEDURE_NUM
        links_to MASTER_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM;

    {MENU_MYTASKS.ICON}
    field ICON
        links_to ICON.IDENTITY;

    {MENU_MYTASKS.PARAMETERS}
    field PARAMETERS
        datatype TEXT (234);

    view R_BATCH_FAILURES;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.TEST}
    field TEST
        links_to BATCH_ENTRY.TEST;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.TYPE}
    field TYPE
        links_to BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.REVIEW_STATUS}
    field REVIEW_STATUS
        links_to BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.TEXT}
    field TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to RESULT.STATUS;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {R_BATCH_FAILURES.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    oracle_specific_select
        select distinct BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY, BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'Z', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, TEST.TEST_COUNT
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, TEST, SAMPLE
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.IDENTITY = BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY)and (BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS <> 'P')and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)union
        select distinct BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY, BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID, MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT, RESULT.TEXT, RESULT.STATUS, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, TEST.TEST_COUNT
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.IDENTITY = BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY)and (BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS <> 'P')and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID = BATCH_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE <> MLP_HEADER.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (RESULT.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)MINUS
        select distinct BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY, BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'Z', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, TEST.TEST_COUNT
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.IDENTITY = BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY)and (BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS <> 'P')and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID = BATCH_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE <> MLP_HEADER.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (RESULT.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME);

    sqlserver_specific_select
        select distinct BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'Z', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, TEST.TEST_COUNT
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, TEST, SAMPLE
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.[IDENTITY] = BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY])and (BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS <> 'P')and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)union
        select distinct BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID, MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT, RESULT.TEXT, RESULT.STATUS, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, TEST.TEST_COUNT
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.[IDENTITY] = BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY])and (BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS <> 'P')and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID = BATCH_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE <> MLP_HEADER.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (RESULT.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)EXCEPT
        select distinct BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'Z', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, TEST.TEST_COUNT
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.[IDENTITY] = BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY])and (BATCH_ENTRY.REVIEW_STATUS <> 'P')and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID = BATCH_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE <> MLP_HEADER.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (RESULT.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME);

    view R_BATCH_REPORT;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.TEST}
    field TEST
        links_to BATCH_ENTRY.TEST;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.TYPE}
    field TYPE
        links_to BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.TEXT}
    field TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.BOOLEAN_PASS}
    field BOOLEAN_PASS
        links_to MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.RESULT_TYPE}
    field RESULT_TYPE
        links_to RESULT.RESULT_TYPE;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.TRUE_WORD}
    field TRUE_WORD
        links_to RESULT.TRUE_WORD;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to RESULT.STATUS;

    {R_BATCH_REPORT.COMPONENT_ORDER_NUMBER}
    field COMPONENT_ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER;

    oracle_specific_select
        select BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY, BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME, COMPONENT_VIEW.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'X', 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, 'X', COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, COMPONENT_VIEW, TEST, SAMPLE
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.IDENTITY = BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY)and (BATCH_ENTRY.TEST = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)union
        select BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY, BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME, COMPONENT_VIEW.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', RESULT.TEXT, 'X', RESULT.RESULT_TYPE, RESULT.TRUE_WORD, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, RESULT.STATUS, COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, TEST, COMPONENT_VIEW, SAMPLE, RESULT
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.IDENTITY = BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY)and (BATCH_ENTRY.TEST = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (RESULT.NAME = COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME)union
        select BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY, BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID, MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT, 'XXXXXXXXXX', MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS, 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, 'X', COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, COMPONENT_VIEW
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.IDENTITY = BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY)and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY = SAMPLE.PRODUCT)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)union
        select BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY, BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID, MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT, RESULT.TEXT, MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS, RESULT.RESULT_TYPE, RESULT.TRUE_WORD, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, RESULT.STATUS, COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT, COMPONENT_VIEW
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.IDENTITY = BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY)and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY = SAMPLE.PRODUCT)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (RESULT.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)MINUS
        select BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY, BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME, COMPONENT_VIEW.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'X', 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, 'X', COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, COMPONENT_VIEW, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT
        where (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (BATCH_ENTRY.IDENTITY = BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY)and (BATCH_ENTRY.TEST = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (RESULT.NAME = COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME)MINUS
        select BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY, BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'X', 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, 'X', COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, COMPONENT_VIEW
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.IDENTITY = BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY)and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY = SAMPLE.PRODUCT)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)MINUS
        select BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY, BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', RESULT.TEXT, 'X', RESULT.RESULT_TYPE, RESULT.TRUE_WORD, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, RESULT.STATUS, COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT, COMPONENT_VIEW
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.IDENTITY = BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY)and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY = SAMPLE.PRODUCT)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (RESULT.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)MINUS
        select BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY, BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID, MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT, 'XXXXXXXXXX', MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS, 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, 'X', COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT, COMPONENT_VIEW
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.IDENTITY = BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY)and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY = SAMPLE.PRODUCT)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (RESULT.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME);

    sqlserver_specific_select
        select BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME, COMPONENT_VIEW.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'X', 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, 'X', COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, COMPONENT_VIEW, TEST, SAMPLE
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.[IDENTITY] = BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY])and (BATCH_ENTRY.TEST = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)union
        select BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME, COMPONENT_VIEW.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', RESULT.TEXT, 'X', RESULT.RESULT_TYPE, RESULT.TRUE_WORD, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, RESULT.STATUS, COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, TEST, COMPONENT_VIEW, SAMPLE, RESULT
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.[IDENTITY] = BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY])and (BATCH_ENTRY.TEST = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (RESULT.NAME = COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME)union
        select BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID, MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT, 'XXXXXXXXXX', MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS, 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, 'X', COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, COMPONENT_VIEW
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.[IDENTITY] = BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY])and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY] = SAMPLE.PRODUCT)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)union
        select BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID, MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT, RESULT.TEXT, MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS, RESULT.RESULT_TYPE, RESULT.TRUE_WORD, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, RESULT.STATUS, COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT, COMPONENT_VIEW
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.[IDENTITY] = BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY])and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY] = SAMPLE.PRODUCT)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (RESULT.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)EXCEPT
        select BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME, COMPONENT_VIEW.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'X', 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, 'X', COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, COMPONENT_VIEW, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT
        where (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (BATCH_ENTRY.[IDENTITY] = BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY])and (BATCH_ENTRY.TEST = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (RESULT.NAME = COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME)EXCEPT
        select BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'X', 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, 'X', COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, COMPONENT_VIEW
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.[IDENTITY] = BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY])and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY] = SAMPLE.PRODUCT)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)EXCEPT
        select BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', RESULT.TEXT, 'X', RESULT.RESULT_TYPE, RESULT.TRUE_WORD, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, RESULT.STATUS, COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT, COMPONENT_VIEW
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.[IDENTITY] = BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY])and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY] = SAMPLE.PRODUCT)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (RESULT.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)EXCEPT
        select BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, BATCH_ENTRY.TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID, MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT, 'XXXXXXXXXX', MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS, 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, 'X', COMPONENT_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER
        from BATCH_ENTRY, BATCH_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_HEADER, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_VALUES, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT, COMPONENT_VIEW
        where (BATCH_ENTRY.[IDENTITY] = BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY])and (TEST.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY] = SAMPLE.PRODUCT)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE)and (MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID = MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID)and (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = BATCH_ENTRY.TEST)and (RESULT.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME);

    view R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID
        links_to MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.BOOLEAN_PASS}
    field BOOLEAN_PASS
        links_to MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.COMPONENT_TYPE}
    field COMPONENT_TYPE
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_TYPE;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.PLACES}
    field PLACES
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.PLACES;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.REPLICATE_COUNT}
    field REPLICATE_COUNT
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.REPLICATE_COUNT;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.RESULT_ENTRY}
    field RESULT_ENTRY
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.RESULT_ENTRY;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.CREATE_ALWAYS}
    field CREATE_ALWAYS
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.CREATE_ALWAYS;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.SPIKE_VALUE}
    field SPIKE_VALUE
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.SPIKE_VALUE;

    {R_BATCH_TMPL_COMPONENTS_LIST.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS;

    oracle_specific_select
        select MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY, MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME, COMPONENT_VIEW.RESULT_TYPE, COMPONENT_VIEW.PLACES, COMPONENT_VIEW.UNITS, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.REPLICATE_COUNT, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.RESULT_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.CREATE_ALWAYS, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.SPIKE_VALUE, BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS
        from COMPONENT_VIEW, MLP_VALUES, MLP_HEADER, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, BATCH_TMPL_HEADER
        where COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_HEADER.ENTRY_CODE and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME = COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY and BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.IDENTITY = MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY union
        select MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID, MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID, MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.PLACES, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.REPLICATE_COUNT, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.RESULT_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.CREATE_ALWAYS, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.SPIKE_VALUE, BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS
        from MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_VALUES, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, BATCH_TMPL_HEADER
        where MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS and MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_VERSION =
        (select max(PRODUCT_VERSION)
        from MLP_COMPONENTS
        where ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID and BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.IDENTITY = MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID MINUS
        select MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID, MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.PLACES, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.order_number, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.replicate_count, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.result_entry, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.create_always, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.analysis_version, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.spike_value, BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS
        from MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_VALUES, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, BATCH_TMPL_HEADER
        where MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS and MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_VERSION =
        (select max (PRODUCT_VERSION)
        from MLP_COMPONENTS
        where ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID and BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.IDENTITY = MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID;

    sqlserver_specific_select
        select MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY], MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME, COMPONENT_VIEW.RESULT_TYPE, COMPONENT_VIEW.PLACES, COMPONENT_VIEW.UNITS, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.REPLICATE_COUNT, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.RESULT_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.CREATE_ALWAYS, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.SPIKE_VALUE, BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS
        from COMPONENT_VIEW, MLP_VALUES, MLP_HEADER, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, BATCH_TMPL_HEADER
        where COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS = BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_HEADER.ENTRY_CODE and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = COMPONENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME = COMPONENT_VIEW.NAME and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY] and BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.[IDENTITY] = MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY] union
        select MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID, MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID, MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.PLACES, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.REPLICATE_COUNT, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.RESULT_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.CREATE_ALWAYS, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.SPIKE_VALUE, BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS
        from MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_VALUES, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, BATCH_TMPL_HEADER
        where MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS and MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_VERSION =
        (select max(PRODUCT_VERSION)
        from MLP_COMPONENTS
        where ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID and BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.[IDENTITY] = MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID EXCEPT
        select MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID, MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME, MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_TYPE, MLP_COMPONENTS.PLACES, MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.order_number, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.replicate_count, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.result_entry, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.create_always, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.analysis_version, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.spike_value, BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS
        from MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_VALUES, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, BATCH_TMPL_HEADER
        where MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS and MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_VERSION =
        (select max (PRODUCT_VERSION)
        from MLP_COMPONENTS
        where ANALYSIS_ID = BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.ANALYSIS)and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID and BATCH_TMPL_HEADER.[IDENTITY] = MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID;

    view R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.WORKSHEET}
    field WORKSHEET
        links_to WORKSHEET.IDENTITY;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.SAMPLE}
    field SAMPLE
        links_to TEST.SAMPLE;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to RESULT.UNITS;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.RESULT_TYPE}
    field RESULT_TYPE
        links_to RESULT.RESULT_TYPE;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.TRUE_WORD}
    field TRUE_WORD
        links_to RESULT.TRUE_WORD;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.FALSE_WORD}
    field FALSE_WORD
        links_to RESULT.FALSE_WORD;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to RESULT.ORDER_NUMBER;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED}
    field DATE_GENERATED
        links_to WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR}
    field ASSIGNED_OPERATOR
        links_to WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR;

    {R_SAMPLE_WORKSHEET.TEXT}
    field TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    select_clause
        select WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], TEST.SAMPLE, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, TEST.ANALYSIS, TEST.TEST_COUNT, RESULT.NAME, RESULT.UNITS, RESULT.RESULT_TYPE, RESULT.TRUE_WORD, RESULT.FALSE_WORD, RESULT.ORDER_NUMBER, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED, WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, RESULT.TEXT
        from WORKSHEET, TEST, SAMPLE, RESULT
        where TEST.WORKSHEET = WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER and TEST.SAMPLE = SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC and TEST.TEST_NUMBER = RESULT.TEST_NUMBER union
        select distinct W2.[IDENTITY], T2.SAMPLE, T2.TEST_NUMBER, T2.ANALYSIS, T2.TEST_COUNT, VC2.NAME, VC2.UNITS, VC2.RESULT_TYPE, VC2.TRUE_WORD, VC2.FALSE_WORD, VC2.ORDER_NUMBER, S2.ID_TEXT, W2.DATE_GENERATED, W2.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, ' '
        from WORKSHEET W2 JOIN TEST T2 on T2.WORKSHEET = W2.LINK_NUMBER JOIN SAMPLE S2 on T2.SAMPLE = S2.ID_NUMERIC JOIN VERSIONED_COMPONENT VC2 on VC2.ANALYSIS = T2.ANALYSIS and VC2.ANALYSIS_VERSION = T2.ANALYSIS_VERSION
        where VC2.NAME not IN
        (select NAME
        from RESULT R2
        where R2.TEST_NUMBER = T2.TEST_NUMBER)and T2.HAS_RESULT_LIST = 'F';

    view R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.IDENTITY;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.PLACES}
    field PLACES
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.PLACES;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.RESULT_TYPE}
    field RESULT_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID
        links_to MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.BOOLEAN_PASS}
    field BOOLEAN_PASS
        links_to MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS;

    {R_WORK_PROFILE_COMPONENTS_LIST.INSTRUMENT}
    field INSTRUMENT
        links_to TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID;

    oracle_specific_select
        select TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.IDENTITY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 999, 'X', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID
        from VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY
        where VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST union
        select TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.IDENTITY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.PLACES, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID
        from VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY
        where VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME union
        select TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.IDENTITY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.PLACES, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID, MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID
        from VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_VALUES, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY
        where VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME MINUS
        select TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.IDENTITY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 999, 'X', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID
        from VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_VALUES, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY
        where VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME MINUS
        select TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.IDENTITY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 999, 'X', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID
        from VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY
        where VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST MINUS
        select TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.IDENTITY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.PLACES, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID
        from VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_VALUES, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY
        where VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME;

    sqlserver_specific_select
        select TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.[IDENTITY], VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 999, 'X', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID
        from VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY
        where VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST union
        select TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.[IDENTITY], VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.PLACES, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID
        from VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY
        where VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME union
        select TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.[IDENTITY], VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.PLACES, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID, MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT, MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID
        from VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_VALUES, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY
        where VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME EXCEPT
        select TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.[IDENTITY], VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 999, 'X', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID
        from VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_VALUES, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY
        where VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME EXCEPT
        select TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.[IDENTITY], VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 999, 'X', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID
        from VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY
        where VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST EXCEPT
        select TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.[IDENTITY], VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME, VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.PLACES, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'XXXXX', 'X', TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.INSTRUMENT_ID
        from VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY, VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS, MLP_VALUES, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, TEST_SCHED_ENTRY
        where VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.COMP_LIST = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID = TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST and MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE and MLP_VALUES.ENTRY_CODE = MLP_COMPONENTS.ENTRY_CODE and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_C_L_HEADER.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME = VERSIONED_C_L_ENTRY.NAME;

    view R_WORKSHEET;

    {R_WORKSHEET.WORKSHEET}
    field WORKSHEET
        links_to WORKSHEET.IDENTITY;

    {R_WORKSHEET.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION;

    {R_WORKSHEET.MINIMUM}
    field MINIMUM
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.MINIMUM;

    {R_WORKSHEET.MAXIMUM}
    field MAXIMUM
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.MAXIMUM;

    {R_WORKSHEET.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS;

    {R_WORKSHEET.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME;

    {R_WORKSHEET.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION;

    {R_WORKSHEET.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    {R_WORKSHEET.RESULT_TYPE}
    field RESULT_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE;

    {R_WORKSHEET.TRUE_WORD}
    field TRUE_WORD
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD;

    {R_WORKSHEET.FALSE_WORD}
    field FALSE_WORD
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD;

    {R_WORKSHEET.OPERATOR}
    field OPERATOR
        links_to WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR;

    {R_WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED}
    field DATE_GENERATED
        links_to WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED;

    {R_WORKSHEET.PERSONNEL}
    field PERSONNEL
        links_to PERSONNEL.DESCRIPTION;

    {R_WORKSHEET.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER;

    oracle_specific_select
        select WORKSHEET.IDENTITY, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION, 99999999.9, 99999999.9, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY, 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED, PERSONNEL.DESCRIPTION, 'XXXXXXXXXX'
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, WORKSHEET
        left outer join PERSONNEL on PERSONNEL.IDENTITY = WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR
        where (VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION = ' 1')union
        select WORKSHEET.IDENTITY, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.MINIMUM, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.MAXIMUM, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD, WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED, PERSONNEL.DESCRIPTION, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, WORKSHEET
        left outer join PERSONNEL on PERSONNEL.IDENTITY = WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR
        where (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY)and (VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION = ' 1')and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = ' 1')MINUS
        select WORKSHEET.IDENTITY, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION, 99999999.9, 99999999.9, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY, 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED, PERSONNEL.DESCRIPTION, 'XXXXXXXXXX'
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, WORKSHEET
        left outer join PERSONNEL on PERSONNEL.IDENTITY = WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR
        where (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY)and (VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION = ' 1')and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = ' 1');

    sqlserver_specific_select
        select WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION, 99999999.9, 99999999.9, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.[IDENTITY], 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED, PERSONNEL.DESCRIPTION, 'XXXXXXXXXX'
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, WORKSHEET
        left outer join PERSONNEL on PERSONNEL.[IDENTITY] = WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR
        where (VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION = ' 1')union
        select WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.MINIMUM, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.MAXIMUM, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.[IDENTITY], VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD, WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED, PERSONNEL.DESCRIPTION, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, WORKSHEET
        left outer join PERSONNEL on PERSONNEL.[IDENTITY] = WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR
        where (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.[IDENTITY])and (VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION = ' 1')and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = ' 1')EXCEPT
        select WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION, 99999999.9, 99999999.9, 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.[IDENTITY], 'X', 'XXXXXXXXXX', 'XXXXXXXXXX', WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED, PERSONNEL.DESCRIPTION, 'XXXXXXXXXX'
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, WORKSHEET
        left outer join PERSONNEL on PERSONNEL.[IDENTITY] = WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR
        where (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.[IDENTITY])and (VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION = ' 1')and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = ' 1');

    view R_WORKSHEET_BODY;

    {R_WORKSHEET_BODY.WORKSHEET}
    field WORKSHEET
        links_to WORKSHEET.IDENTITY;

    {R_WORKSHEET_BODY.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to TEST.SAMPLE;

    {R_WORKSHEET_BODY.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    {R_WORKSHEET_BODY.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {R_WORKSHEET_BODY.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {R_WORKSHEET_BODY.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME;

    {R_WORKSHEET_BODY.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER;

    {R_WORKSHEET_BODY.RESULT_TYPE}
    field RESULT_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE;

    {R_WORKSHEET_BODY.TRUE_WORD}
    field TRUE_WORD
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD;

    {R_WORKSHEET_BODY.FALSE_WORD}
    field FALSE_WORD
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD;

    {R_WORKSHEET_BODY.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS;

    {R_WORKSHEET_BODY.RESULT_TEXT}
    field RESULT_TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    oracle_specific_select
        select WORKSHEET.IDENTITY, TEST.SAMPLE, TEST.TEST_COUNT, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX'
        from WORKSHEET, TEST, SAMPLE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT
        where (TEST.WORKSHEET = WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION)union
        select WORKSHEET.IDENTITY, TEST.SAMPLE, TEST.TEST_COUNT, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, RESULT.TEXT
        from WORKSHEET, TEST, SAMPLE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, RESULT
        where (TEST.WORKSHEET = WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (RESULT.NAME = VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME)MINUS
        select WORKSHEET.IDENTITY, TEST.SAMPLE, TEST.TEST_COUNT, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX'
        from WORKSHEET, TEST, SAMPLE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, RESULT
        where (TEST.WORKSHEET = WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (RESULT.NAME = VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME);

    sqlserver_specific_select
        select WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], TEST.SAMPLE, TEST.TEST_COUNT, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX'
        from WORKSHEET, TEST, SAMPLE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT
        where (TEST.WORKSHEET = WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION)union
        select WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], TEST.SAMPLE, TEST.TEST_COUNT, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, RESULT.TEXT
        from WORKSHEET, TEST, SAMPLE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, RESULT
        where (TEST.WORKSHEET = WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (RESULT.NAME = VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME)EXCEPT
        select WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], TEST.SAMPLE, TEST.TEST_COUNT, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX'
        from WORKSHEET, TEST, SAMPLE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, RESULT
        where (TEST.WORKSHEET = WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (RESULT.NAME = VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME);

    select_clause
        select WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], TEST.SAMPLE, TEST.TEST_COUNT, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX'
        from WORKSHEET, TEST, SAMPLE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT
        where (TEST.WORKSHEET = WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION)union
        select WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], TEST.SAMPLE, TEST.TEST_COUNT, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, RESULT.TEXT
        from WORKSHEET, TEST, SAMPLE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, RESULT
        where (TEST.WORKSHEET = WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (RESULT.NAME = VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME)EXCEPT
        select WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], TEST.SAMPLE, TEST.TEST_COUNT, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.TRUE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.FALSE_WORD, VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS, 'XXXXXXXXXX'
        from WORKSHEET, TEST, SAMPLE, VERSIONED_COMPONENT, RESULT
        where (TEST.WORKSHEET = WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER)and (SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS = TEST.ANALYSIS)and (VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ANALYSIS_VERSION = TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION)and (RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = TEST.TEST_NUMBER)and (RESULT.NAME = VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME);

    table INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE;

    {INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype IDENTITY (17) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    {INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        alias GROUP 
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.INSTRUCTIONS}
    field INSTRUCTIONS
        datatype TEXT (255);

    {INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.SOP_REFERENCE}
    field SOP_REFERENCE
        datatype TEXT(100);

    {INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.MANUFACTURER}
    field MANUFACTURER
        links_to SUPPLIER.IDENTITY;

    field OPERATOR_ID
        alias OPERATOR 
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

        datatype TEXT (255);

    field CALIB_CONTRACTOR
        links_to SUPPLIER.IDENTITY;

        datatype INTERVAL 
        lower_limit '0 00:00:00.00';

        links_to SAMP_TMPL_HEADER.IDENTITY;

        lower_limit '0 00:00:00.00';

    table INSTRUMENT_PART_LINK_TEMPLATE NOINDEX;

    {INSTRUMENT_PART_LINK_TEMPLATE.INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE}

        links_to PARENT INSTRUMENT_TEMPLATE.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

        on instrument_template, instrument_part_template;

        on instrument_part_template, instrument_template;

    {SCHEDULE_POINT.NAME}

        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    {SCHEDULE_POINT.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE}

        links_to SAMP_TMPL_HEADER.IDENTITY;

        datatype INTERVAL 
        default '0000 1';

        datatype BOOLEAN;

        links_to WORKFLOW_NODE.WORKFLOW_NODE_GUID AS PARENT_NODE;

    {WORKFLOW_NODE.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE, NAME;

    {WORKFLOW_NODE.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {WORKFLOW_NODE.NODE_TYPE}
    field NODE_TYPE
        datatype TEXT (30);

    {WORKFLOW_NODE.PARAMETERS_EXT}
    field PARAMETERS_EXT
        datatype TEXT (4000);

    {WORKFLOW_NODE.DEFAULT_WORKFLOW_ID}
    field DEFAULT_WORKFLOW_ID
        links_to WORKFLOW.WORKFLOW_GUID;

    {WORKFLOW_NODE.ACTION_TABLE_NAME}
    field ACTION_TABLE_NAME
        links_to WORKFLOW_ACTION_TYPE.TABLE_NAME AS ACTION_TYPE;

    {WORKFLOW_NODE.ACTION_TYPE_ID}
    field ACTION_TYPE_ID
        links_to WORKFLOW_ACTION_TYPE.IDENTITY AS ACTION_TYPE;

    {WORKFLOW_NODE.STATE_TABLE_NAME}
    field STATE_TABLE_NAME
        links_to WORKFLOW_STATE.TABLE_NAME AS REQUIRED_STATE;

    {WORKFLOW_NODE.STATE_IDENTITY}
    field STATE_IDENTITY
        links_to WORKFLOW_STATE.IDENTITY AS REQUIRED_STATE;

    {WORKFLOW_NODE.EVENT_TABLE_NAME}
    field EVENT_TABLE_NAME
        links_to WORKFLOW_EVENT_TYPE.TABLE_NAME AS EVENT_TYPE;

    {WORKFLOW_NODE.EVENT_TYPE_ID}
    field EVENT_TYPE_ID
        links_to WORKFLOW_EVENT_TYPE.IDENTITY AS EVENT_TYPE;

    {WORKFLOW_NODE.ENTITY_TEMPLATE_ID}
    field ENTITY_TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to ENTITY_TEMPLATE.IDENTITY;

    index workflow_node_workflow
        on workflow_id, workflow_version, order_number ;

    index workflow_node_parent
        on parent_node, order_number ;

    table WORKFLOW_LINK;

    {WORKFLOW_LINK.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        datatype TEXT (30) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {WORKFLOW_LINK.RECORD_KEY0}

        datatype TEXT (100) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {WORKFLOW_LINK.WORKFLOW_NODE}

        links_to WORKFLOW_NODE.WORKFLOW_NODE_GUID;

        on TRIGGERING_TEST_NO;

    index REASON_CODE_INDEX
        on REASON_CODE;

        used_for ORDERING;

    {COMPOSITION_ENTRY.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {COMPOSITION_ENTRY.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    table LABLABEL_CHAR NOINDEX;

    {LABLABEL_CHAR.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        alias GROUP 
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, SECURITY_ID;

    {LABLABEL_CHAR.RESULT_TYPE}
    field RESULT_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {LABLABEL_CHAR.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY CASE_SENSITIVE;

    {LABLABEL_CHAR.LABEL_TEXT}
    field LABEL_TEXT
        datatype TEXT (15);

    {LABLABEL_CHAR.PRINT_LABEL}
    field PRINT_LABEL
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'Yes' 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    {LABLABEL_CHAR.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {LABLABEL_CHAR.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {LABLABEL_CHAR.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    index LABEL_COMPONENT_INDEX UNIQUE
        on GROUP_ID, RESULT_TYPE, COMPONENT_NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'STATIC_I';

    table TIMESERIES
        noindex 
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE';

    {TIMESERIES.TEST_NUMBER}

        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {TIMESERIES.COMPONENT_NAME}

        datatype REAL;

    {TIMESERIES.DELTA_VALUE}
    field DELTA_VALUE
        datatype REAL;

    index TIMESERIES_INDEX UNIQUE
        on TEST_NUMBER, TIMESTAMP, DELTA_VALUE
        sqlserver_location 'ACTIVE_I';

    table C_INCIDENTS PARENT_table INCIDENTS tableset COMMITTED
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    index C_INCIDENT_IDENTITY
        on INCIDENT_ID,SUBJECT_TABLE 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    table C_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS PARENT_table INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS tableset COMMITTED
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    index C_INCIDENT_CRES_ID
        on CHECKLIST_ID 
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED_I';

    table C_LOT_DETAILS PARENT_table LOT_DETAILS tableset COMMITTED
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    table C_LOT_RELATION PARENT_table LOT_RELATION tableset COMMITTED
        sqlserver_location 'COMMITTED';

    table ARCHIVE_LOT_DETAILS PARENT_table LOT_DETAILS tableset ARCHIVE;

    table ARCHIVE_LOT_RELATION PARENT_table LOT_RELATION tableset ARCHIVE;

    table ARCHIVE_STANDARD_VERSIONS PARENT_table STANDARD_VERSIONS tableset ARCHIVE;

    table R_AUDIT_DATA PARENT_table AUDIT_DATA tableset RETENTION
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    index R_AUDIT_DATA_EVENT
        on EVENT 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    table R_AUDIT_EVENT PARENT_table AUDIT_EVENT tableset RETENTION
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    index R_AUDIT_EVENT_TABLE_ID
        on RECORD_KEY0,TABLE_NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    index R_AUDIT_EVENT_TRANS_INDEX
        on TRANSACTION 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    table R_AUDIT_TRANSACTION PARENT_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION tableset RETENTION
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    index R_AUDIT_TRANSACTION_TRANS
        on TRANSACTION 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    table R_ESIG_DATA PARENT_table ESIG_DATA tableset RETENTION
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    index R_ESIG_DATA_ESIG_EVENT_ID
        on ESIG_EVENT_ID,ESIG_DATA_ID 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    index R_ESIG_DATA_TABLE_KEY0
        on TABLE_NAME,RECORD_KEY0,ESIG_DATA_ID 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    table R_ESIG_EVENT PARENT_table ESIG_EVENT tableset RETENTION
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    index R_ESIG_EVENT_ID
        on ESIG_EVENT_ID 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    table R_INCIDENTS PARENT_table INCIDENTS tableset RETENTION
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    index R_INCIDENT_ID_TABLE
        on INCIDENT_ID,SUBJECT_TABLE 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    table R_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS PARENT_table INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS tableset RETENTION
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    index R_INC_CHECK_RES_ID
        on INCIDENT_ID 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    table R_LOT_DETAILS PARENT_table LOT_DETAILS tableset RETENTION
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    table R_LOT_RELATION PARENT_table LOT_RELATION tableset RETENTION
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    table R_JOB_HEADER tableset RETENTION
        noindex PARENT_table JOB_HEADER 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    index R_JOB_HEADER_JOB UNIQUE
        on JOB_NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    table R_SAMPLE tableset RETENTION
        noindex PARENT_table SAMPLE 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    index R_SAMPLE_ID_TEXT_INDEX UNIQUE
        on ID_TEXT 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    index R_SAMPLE_JOB_NAME_INDEX
        on JOB_NAME 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    index R_SAMPLE_STATUS_INDEX UNIQUE
        on ID_NUMERIC,STATUS 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    table R_TEST tableset RETENTION
        noindex PARENT_table TEST 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    index R_SAMP_ANAL_INDEX
        on SAMPLE,ANALYSIS 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    index R_TEST_ANALYSIS_INDEX
        on ANALYSIS 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    index R_TEST_I UNIQUE
        on TEST_NUMBER 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    table R_RESULT PARENT_table RESULT tableset RETENTION
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION';

    index R_RESULT_TEST
        on TEST_NUMBER 
        sqlserver_location 'RETENTION_I';

    table ARCHIVE_AUDIT_TRANSACTION PARENT_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION tableset ARCHIVE;

    table ARCHIVE_INCIDENTS PARENT_table INCIDENTS tableset ARCHIVE;

    table ARCHIVE_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS tableset ARCHIVE
        noindex PARENT_table INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS;

    index ARCHIVE_ICR_INCIDENT_UNIQUE UNIQUE
        on INCIDENT_ID,ACTION_NUMBER;

    index ARCHIVE_INC_CHECK_RES
        on INCIDENT_ID;

    field FILENAME_ONLY
        datatype TEXT(50);

    {SMP_MODULE_PROGRAM.PROGRAM_SET}
    field PROGRAM_SET
        datatype IDENTITY(10) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (5);

    {SMP_MODULE_PROGRAM.CLIENT_SERVER}
    field CLIENT_SERVER
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'SERVER_DLL' 
        true_word 'CLIENT_DLL' 
        false_word 'SERVER_DLL';

    {SMP_MODULE_PROGRAM.MINIMUM_VERSION}
    field MINIMUM_VERSION
        datatype TEXT(10);

    {SMP_MODULE_PROGRAM.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT(234);

    {SMP_MODULE_PROGRAM.MODULE_INSTALL_OK}
    field MODULE_INSTALL_OK
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        default 'N' 
        true_word 'Y' 
        false_word 'N';

    table SMP_MODULE_INSTRUCT;

    {SMP_MODULE_INSTRUCT.SMP_VERSION}
    field SMP_VERSION
        links_to SMP_MODULE.SMP_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {SMP_MODULE_INSTRUCT.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to SMP_MODULE.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {SMP_MODULE_INSTRUCT.VERSION_NUMBER}
    field VERSION_NUMBER
        links_to SMP_MODULE.VERSION_NUMBER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,VERSION_NUMBER,DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {SMP_MODULE_INSTRUCT.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,ORDERING,DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {SMP_MODULE_INSTRUCT.INSTRUCTIONS}
    field INSTRUCTIONS
        datatype TEXT(234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(4);

    table SMP_MODULE_MENU;

        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {SMP_MODULE_MENU.ITEM_NAME}

        datatype TEXT(20)

    {SMP_MODULE_MENU.SHORT_TEXT}
    field SHORT_TEXT
        links_to MASTER_MENU.SHORT_TEXT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(5);

    {SMP_MODULE_MENU.GENERATE_NEW_ONE}
    field GENERATE_NEW_ONE
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(6) 
        default 'N'

    {SMP_MODULE_MENU.NEW_PROCEDURE_NUM}

        links_to MASTER_MENU.PROCEDURE_NUM 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(7);

    {ALL_JOB_HEADER.INSPECTION_STATUS}
    field INSPECTION_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.INSPECTION_STATUS;

    {ALL_JOB_HEADER.COUNT_OF_JOB}
    field COUNT_OF_JOB
        datatype INTEGER;

    select_clause
        select JOB_NAME, JOB_STATUS, JOB_STATUS, BROWSE_DESCRIPTION, SAMPLE_SYNTAX_ID, DATE_CREATED, DATE_COMPLETED, DATE_RECEIVED, DATE_TO_START, SUBMITTER_OPER, SAMPLES_TO_DO, GROUP_ID, TEMPLATE_ID, SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, OLD_STATUS, INSPECTION_HEADER, NODE_TRIGGER_PATH, ORIGINAL_JOB, BEEN_COPIED, AUTO_VALIDATE, TOTAL_ELEMENTS, LOT_ID, CERTIFICATE, DATE_EXP, BULK_JOB_ID, BATCH_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, POTENCY, WORK_CENTER, MPS_STATUS, MATERIAL_BEFORE, BATCH_BEFORE, LAYERED, PROCESS_ORDER, REFERENCE_ORDER, MPS_SOURCE, MPS_LOAD_STATUS, LOGIN_PLANT, DELETE_FLAG, DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED, BLOCK_CERTIFICATES, BATCH_MASS_INFO, INSPECTION_LOT, INSPECTION_TYPE, VENDOR_BATCH, SAMPLE_TYPE, PRODUCTION_DATE, SHELFLIFE_EXP_DATE, SAP_STATUS, SAP_UPDATE_DATE, PROJECT_ID, FIRST_PROD_ORD_STATUS, FIRST_AUTHORISER, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_ON, PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP, CUSTOMER, CH_SALES, MES_UPDATE, MES_STATUS, CONSIGN_ID, CONSIGN_SEQUENCE, CONSIGN_DATE, SAP_P_ORD_UPDATE, SAP_INSP__UPDATE, SAP_BATCH_UPDATE, COUNTRY, COUNTRYCODE, INSPECTION_STATUS, 1
        from JOB_HEADER WITH (NOLOCK)
        union all
        select JOB_NAME, JOB_STATUS, JOB_STATUS, BROWSE_DESCRIPTION, SAMPLE_SYNTAX_ID, DATE_CREATED, DATE_COMPLETED, DATE_RECEIVED, DATE_TO_START, SUBMITTER_OPER, SAMPLES_TO_DO, GROUP_ID, TEMPLATE_ID, SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, OLD_STATUS, INSPECTION_HEADER, NODE_TRIGGER_PATH, ORIGINAL_JOB, BEEN_COPIED, AUTO_VALIDATE, TOTAL_ELEMENTS, LOT_ID, CERTIFICATE, DATE_EXP, BULK_JOB_ID, BATCH_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, POTENCY, WORK_CENTER, MPS_STATUS, MATERIAL_BEFORE, BATCH_BEFORE, LAYERED, PROCESS_ORDER, REFERENCE_ORDER, MPS_SOURCE, MPS_LOAD_STATUS, LOGIN_PLANT, DELETE_FLAG, DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED, BLOCK_CERTIFICATES, BATCH_MASS_INFO, INSPECTION_LOT, INSPECTION_TYPE, VENDOR_BATCH, SAMPLE_TYPE, PRODUCTION_DATE, SHELFLIFE_EXP_DATE, SAP_STATUS, SAP_UPDATE_DATE, PROJECT_ID, FIRST_PROD_ORD_STATUS, FIRST_AUTHORISER, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_ON, PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP, CUSTOMER, CH_SALES, MES_UPDATE, MES_STATUS, CONSIGN_ID, CONSIGN_SEQUENCE, CONSIGN_DATE, SAP_P_ORD_UPDATE, SAP_INSP__UPDATE, SAP_BATCH_UPDATE, COUNTRY, COUNTRYCODE, INSPECTION_STATUS, 1
        from C_JOB_HEADER WITH (NOLOCK);
