        links_to SAMPLE.TANK_NUMBER;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.DATESTART_PREP}
    field DATESTART_PREP
        links_to SAMPLE.DATESTART_PREP;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.SAMPLE_COMMENT}
    field SAMPLE_COMMENT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLE_COMMENT;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.CONCERN_FUNCTION}
    field CONCERN_FUNCTION
        links_to SAMPLE.CONCERN_FUNCTION;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.MPS_STATUS}
    field MPS_STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.MPS_STATUS;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.TESTMIX_ID}
    field TESTMIX_ID
        links_to SAMPLE.TESTMIX_ID;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.BATCH_MASS_INFO}
    field BATCH_MASS_INFO
        links_to SAMPLE.BATCH_MASS_INFO;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.LOGIN_PLANT}
    field LOGIN_PLANT
        links_to SAMPLE.LOGIN_PLANT;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.PRODUCER_ID}
    field PRODUCER_ID
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCER_ID;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.INSPECTION_LOT}
    field INSPECTION_LOT
        links_to SAMPLE.INSPECTION_LOT;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.INSPECTION_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_TYPE
        links_to SAMPLE.INSPECTION_TYPE;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.STAB_STUDY_ID}
    field STAB_STUDY_ID
        links_to SAMPLE.STAB_STUDY_ID;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.STABILITY_SAMPLE}
    field STABILITY_SAMPLE
        links_to SAMPLE.STABILITY_SAMPLE;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.LAYER_FACTOR}
    field LAYER_FACTOR
        links_to SAMPLE.LAYER_FACTOR;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.C_FACTOR}
    field C_FACTOR
        links_to SAMPLE.C_FACTOR;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.TIME_FACTOR}
    field TIME_FACTOR
        links_to SAMPLE.TIME_FACTOR;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.PRODUCT_BEFORE}
    field PRODUCT_BEFORE
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_BEFORE;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.BATCH_BEFORE}
    field BATCH_BEFORE
        links_to SAMPLE.BATCH_BEFORE;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.DATE_IDEAL_COMPLETE}
    field DATE_IDEAL_COMPLETE
        links_to SAMPLE.DATE_IDEAL_COMPLETE;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED
        links_to SAMPLE.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP}
    field PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.CUSTOMER_SAMPLE_ID}
    field CUSTOMER_SAMPLE_ID
        links_to SAMPLE.CUSTOMER_SAMPLE_ID;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.CHCC}
    field CHCC
        links_to SAMPLE.CHCC;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to SAMPLE.MODIFIED_ON;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to SAMPLE.MODIFIED_BY;

    {ALL_SAMPLE.COUNT_OF_SAMPLE}
    field COUNT_OF_SAMPLE
        datatype INTEGER;

    select_clause
        select ID_NUMERIC, ID_TEXT, JOB_NAME, STATUS, OLD_STATUS, COMPARED, ON_SPEC, RE_SAMPLED, ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, LINK_NUMBER, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_BY, SAMPLED_DATE, RECD_DATE, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATERESREQ, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATERESAVAIL, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, GRADE_CODE, TESTS_TO_DO, ON_WKS, PROJECT_ID, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PREPARATION, HAZARD, PRIORITY, LOCATION_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, TEST_SCHEDULE, TEMPLATE_ID, COMP_PROD_NAME, COMP_PROD_VER, COMP_PROD_GRADE, STANDARD, STANDARD_ID, STANDARD_VERSION, INSPECTION_HEADER, STANDARD_TYPE, BATCH_ID, DYNAMIC_PRODUCT, TOTAL_ELEMENTS, SAMPLING_PROCEDURE, REPLICATE_LINK_NO, AUTO_VALIDATE, HAS_INCIDENTS, CERTIFICATE, SUBSTANCE, MAIN_SAMPLE, SAMPLED_BY, EQUIPMENT, DATE_EXP, GROUP_ID, DATERESEXP, TANK_NUMBER, DATESTART_PREP, SAMPLE_COMMENT, CONCERN_FUNCTION, MPS_STATUS, TESTMIX_ID, BATCH_MASS_INFO, LOGIN_PLANT, PRODUCER_ID, INSPECTION_LOT, INSPECTION_TYPE, STAB_STUDY_ID, STABILITY_SAMPLE, LAYER_FACTOR, C_FACTOR, TIME_FACTOR, PRODUCT_BEFORE, BATCH_BEFORE, DATE_IDEAL_COMPLETE, DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED, PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP, CUSTOMER_SAMPLE_ID, CHCC, MODIFIED_ON, MODIFIED_BY, 1
        from SAMPLE WITH (NOLOCK)
        union all
        select ID_NUMERIC, ID_TEXT, JOB_NAME, STATUS, OLD_STATUS, COMPARED, ON_SPEC, RE_SAMPLED, ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, LINK_NUMBER, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_BY, SAMPLED_DATE, RECD_DATE, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATERESREQ, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATERESAVAIL, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, GRADE_CODE, TESTS_TO_DO, ON_WKS, PROJECT_ID, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PREPARATION, HAZARD, PRIORITY, LOCATION_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, TEST_SCHEDULE, TEMPLATE_ID, COMP_PROD_NAME, COMP_PROD_VER, COMP_PROD_GRADE, STANDARD, STANDARD_ID, STANDARD_VERSION, INSPECTION_HEADER, STANDARD_TYPE, BATCH_ID, DYNAMIC_PRODUCT, TOTAL_ELEMENTS, SAMPLING_PROCEDURE, REPLICATE_LINK_NO, AUTO_VALIDATE, HAS_INCIDENTS, CERTIFICATE, SUBSTANCE, MAIN_SAMPLE, SAMPLED_BY, EQUIPMENT, DATE_EXP, GROUP_ID, DATERESEXP, TANK_NUMBER, DATESTART_PREP, SAMPLE_COMMENT, CONCERN_FUNCTION, MPS_STATUS, TESTMIX_ID, BATCH_MASS_INFO, LOGIN_PLANT, PRODUCER_ID, INSPECTION_LOT, INSPECTION_TYPE, STAB_STUDY_ID, STABILITY_SAMPLE, LAYER_FACTOR, C_FACTOR, TIME_FACTOR, PRODUCT_BEFORE, BATCH_BEFORE, DATE_IDEAL_COMPLETE, DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED, PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP, CUSTOMER_SAMPLE_ID, CHCC, MODIFIED_ON, MODIFIED_BY, 1
        from C_SAMPLE WITH (NOLOCK);

    view ALL_TEST
        on_table TEST;

    {ALL_TEST.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {ALL_TEST.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS;

    {ALL_TEST.SAMPLE}
    field SAMPLE
        links_to TEST.SAMPLE;

    {ALL_TEST.PREPARATION}
    field PREPARATION
        links_to TEST.PREPARATION;

    {ALL_TEST.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    {ALL_TEST.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS;

    {ALL_TEST.OLD_STATUS}
    field OLD_STATUS
        links_to TEST.OLD_STATUS;

    {ALL_TEST.DATE_STARTED}
    field DATE_STARTED
        links_to TEST.DATE_STARTED;

    {ALL_TEST.STARTER}
    field STARTER
        links_to TEST.STARTER;

    {ALL_TEST.DATE_COMPLETED}
    field DATE_COMPLETED
        links_to TEST.DATE_COMPLETED;

    {ALL_TEST.COMPLETER}
    field COMPLETER
        links_to TEST.COMPLETER;

    {ALL_TEST.DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED
        links_to TEST.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {ALL_TEST.AUTHORISER}
    field AUTHORISER
        links_to TEST.AUTHORISER;

    {ALL_TEST.COMPONENT_REPLICATES}
    field COMPONENT_REPLICATES
        links_to TEST.COMPONENT_REPLICATES;

    {ALL_TEST.WORKSHEET}
    field WORKSHEET
        links_to TEST.WORKSHEET;

    {ALL_TEST.WORKSHEET_POSITION}
    field WORKSHEET_POSITION
        links_to TEST.WORKSHEET_POSITION;

    {ALL_TEST.REPLICATE_TEST}
    field REPLICATE_TEST
        links_to TEST.REPLICATE_TEST;

    {ALL_TEST.INSTRUMENT}
    field INSTRUMENT
        links_to TEST.INSTRUMENT;

    {ALL_TEST.TEST_PRIORITY}
    field TEST_PRIORITY
        links_to TEST.TEST_PRIORITY;

    {ALL_TEST.ON_SPEC}
    field ON_SPEC
        links_to TEST.ON_SPEC;

    {ALL_TEST.TEST_SCHEDULE}
    field TEST_SCHEDULE
        links_to TEST.TEST_SCHEDULE;

    {ALL_TEST.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        links_to TEST.ORDER_NUM;

    {ALL_TEST.HAS_RESULT_LIST}
    field HAS_RESULT_LIST
        links_to TEST.HAS_RESULT_LIST;

    {ALL_TEST.COMPONENT_LIST}
    field COMPONENT_LIST
        links_to TEST.COMPONENT_LIST;

    {ALL_TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {ALL_TEST.PREPARATION_BATCH}
    field PREPARATION_BATCH
        links_to TEST.PREPARATION_BATCH;

    {ALL_TEST.INSTRUMENT_BATCH}
    field INSTRUMENT_BATCH
        links_to TEST.INSTRUMENT_BATCH;

    {ALL_TEST.PARENT_TEST}
    field PARENT_TEST
        links_to TEST.PARENT_TEST;

    {ALL_TEST.INSPECTION_HEADER}
    field INSPECTION_HEADER
        links_to TEST.INSPECTION_HEADER;

    {ALL_TEST.TRIGGER_RULE}
    field TRIGGER_RULE
        links_to TEST.TRIGGER_RULE;

    {ALL_TEST.TRIGGER_ANALYSIS}
    field TRIGGER_ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST.TRIGGER_ANALYSIS;

    {ALL_TEST.STAT_DOUBLE_ATT_FAIL}
    field STAT_DOUBLE_ATT_FAIL
        links_to TEST.STAT_DOUBLE_ATT_FAIL;

    {ALL_TEST.VALIDATION_STATUS}
    field VALIDATION_STATUS
        links_to TEST.VALIDATION_STATUS;

    {ALL_TEST.AUTHORISATION_COMMENT}
    field AUTHORISATION_COMMENT
        links_to TEST.AUTHORISATION_COMMENT;

    {ALL_TEST.AUTO_VALIDATE}
    field AUTO_VALIDATE
        links_to TEST.AUTO_VALIDATE;

    {ALL_TEST.HAS_INCIDENTS}
    field HAS_INCIDENTS
        links_to TEST.HAS_INCIDENTS;

    {ALL_TEST.INSTRUMENT_TYPE}
    field INSTRUMENT_TYPE
        links_to TEST.INSTRUMENT_TYPE;

    {ALL_TEST.INSTRUMENT_REQUIRED}
    field INSTRUMENT_REQUIRED
        links_to TEST.INSTRUMENT_REQUIRED;

    {ALL_TEST.DATE_EXP}
    field DATE_EXP
        links_to TEST.DATE_EXP;

    {ALL_TEST.WORKSHEET_NAME}
    field WORKSHEET_NAME
        links_to TEST.WORKSHEET_NAME;

    {ALL_TEST.LABEL_PRINTED}
    field LABEL_PRINTED
        links_to TEST.LABEL_PRINTED;

    {ALL_TEST.LOGIN_DATE}
    field LOGIN_DATE
        links_to TEST.LOGIN_DATE;

    {ALL_TEST.COUNT_OF_TEST}
    field COUNT_OF_TEST
        datatype INTEGER;

    select_clause
        SELECT
            TEST_NUMBER
           ,ANALYSIS
           ,SAMPLE
           ,PREPARATION
           ,TEST_COUNT
           ,STATUS
           ,OLD_STATUS
           ,DATE_STARTED
           ,STARTER
           ,DATE_COMPLETED
           ,COMPLETER
           ,DATE_AUTHORISED
           ,AUTHORISER
           ,COMPONENT_REPLICATES
           ,WORKSHEET
           ,WORKSHEET_POSITION
           ,REPLICATE_TEST
           ,INSTRUMENT
           ,TEST_PRIORITY
           ,ON_SPEC
           ,TEST_SCHEDULE
           ,ORDER_NUM
           ,HAS_RESULT_LIST
           ,COMPONENT_LIST
           ,ANALYSIS_VERSION
           ,PREPARATION_BATCH
           ,INSTRUMENT_BATCH
           ,PARENT_TEST
           ,INSPECTION_HEADER
           ,TRIGGER_RULE
           ,TRIGGER_ANALYSIS
           ,STAT_DOUBLE_ATT_FAIL
           ,VALIDATION_STATUS
           ,AUTHORISATION_COMMENT
           ,AUTO_VALIDATE
           ,HAS_INCIDENTS
           ,INSTRUMENT_TYPE
           ,INSTRUMENT_REQUIRED
           ,DATE_EXP
           ,WORKSHEET_NAME
           ,LABEL_PRINTED
           ,LOGIN_DATE
           ,1
        FROM TEST WITH (NOLOCK)
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
            TEST_NUMBER
           ,ANALYSIS
           ,SAMPLE
           ,PREPARATION
           ,TEST_COUNT
           ,STATUS
           ,OLD_STATUS
           ,DATE_STARTED
           ,STARTER
           ,DATE_COMPLETED
           ,COMPLETER
           ,DATE_AUTHORISED
           ,AUTHORISER
           ,COMPONENT_REPLICATES
           ,WORKSHEET
           ,WORKSHEET_POSITION
           ,REPLICATE_TEST
           ,INSTRUMENT
           ,TEST_PRIORITY
           ,ON_SPEC
           ,TEST_SCHEDULE
           ,ORDER_NUM
           ,HAS_RESULT_LIST
           ,COMPONENT_LIST
           ,ANALYSIS_VERSION
           ,PREPARATION_BATCH
           ,INSTRUMENT_BATCH
           ,PARENT_TEST
           ,INSPECTION_HEADER
           ,TRIGGER_RULE
           ,TRIGGER_ANALYSIS
           ,STAT_DOUBLE_ATT_FAIL
           ,VALIDATION_STATUS
           ,AUTHORISATION_COMMENT
           ,AUTO_VALIDATE
           ,HAS_INCIDENTS
           ,INSTRUMENT_TYPE
           ,INSTRUMENT_REQUIRED
           ,DATE_EXP
           ,WORKSHEET_NAME
           ,LABEL_PRINTED
           ,LOGIN_DATE
           ,1
        FROM C_TEST WITH (NOLOCK);

    view ALL_RESULT
        on_table RESULT;

    {ALL_RESULT.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to RESULT.TEST_NUMBER;

    {ALL_RESULT.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {ALL_RESULT.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to RESULT.ORDER_NUMBER;

    {ALL_RESULT.RESULT_TYPE}
    field RESULT_TYPE
        links_to RESULT.RESULT_TYPE;

    {ALL_RESULT.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to RESULT.UNITS;

    {ALL_RESULT.MINIMUM}
    field MINIMUM
        links_to RESULT.MINIMUM;

    {ALL_RESULT.MAXIMUM}
    field MAXIMUM
        links_to RESULT.MAXIMUM;

    {ALL_RESULT.TYPICAL}
    field TYPICAL
        links_to RESULT.TYPICAL;

    {ALL_RESULT.TRUE_WORD}
    field TRUE_WORD
        links_to RESULT.TRUE_WORD;

    {ALL_RESULT.FALSE_WORD}
    field FALSE_WORD
        links_to RESULT.FALSE_WORD;

    {ALL_RESULT.ALLOWED_CHARACTERS}
    field ALLOWED_CHARACTERS
        links_to RESULT.ALLOWED_CHARACTERS;

    {ALL_RESULT.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        links_to RESULT.CALCULATION;

    {ALL_RESULT.VALUE}
    field VALUE
        links_to RESULT.VALUE;

    {ALL_RESULT.TEXT}
    field TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {ALL_RESULT.PLACES}
    field PLACES
        links_to RESULT.PLACES;

    {ALL_RESULT.OUT_OF_RANGE}
    field OUT_OF_RANGE
        links_to RESULT.OUT_OF_RANGE;

    {ALL_RESULT.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to RESULT.STATUS;

    {ALL_RESULT.OLD_STATUS}
    field OLD_STATUS
        links_to RESULT.OLD_STATUS;

    {ALL_RESULT.ENTERED_ON}
    field ENTERED_ON
        links_to RESULT.ENTERED_ON;

    {ALL_RESULT.ENTERED_BY}
    field ENTERED_BY
        links_to RESULT.ENTERED_BY;

    {ALL_RESULT.DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED
        links_to RESULT.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {ALL_RESULT.AUTHORISER}
    field AUTHORISER
        links_to RESULT.AUTHORISER;

    {ALL_RESULT.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to RESULT.GROUP_ID;

    {ALL_RESULT.SECURITY_FLAGS}
    field SECURITY_FLAGS
        links_to RESULT.SECURITY_FLAGS;

    {ALL_RESULT.SIG_FIGS_NUMBER}
    field SIG_FIGS_NUMBER
        links_to RESULT.SIG_FIGS_NUMBER;

    {ALL_RESULT.SIG_FIGS_ROUNDING}

        links_to RESULT.SIG_FIGS_ROUNDING;

    {ALL_RESULT.SIG_FIGS_FILTER}
    field SIG_FIGS_FILTER
        links_to RESULT.SIG_FIGS_FILTER;

    {ALL_RESULT.REP_CONTROL}
    field REP_CONTROL
        links_to RESULT.REP_CONTROL;

    {ALL_RESULT.MINIMUM_PQL}
    field MINIMUM_PQL
        links_to RESULT.MINIMUM_PQL;

    {ALL_RESULT.MAXIMUM_PQL}
    field MAXIMUM_PQL
        links_to RESULT.MAXIMUM_PQL;

    {ALL_RESULT.LESS_THAN_PQL}
    field LESS_THAN_PQL
        links_to RESULT.LESS_THAN_PQL;

    {ALL_RESULT.GREATER_THAN_PQL}
    field GREATER_THAN_PQL
        links_to RESULT.GREATER_THAN_PQL;

    {ALL_RESULT.PQL_CALCULATION}
    field PQL_CALCULATION
        links_to RESULT.PQL_CALCULATION;

    {ALL_RESULT.FORMULA}
    field FORMULA
        links_to RESULT.FORMULA;

    {ALL_RESULT.DILUTION_FACTOR}
    field DILUTION_FACTOR
        links_to RESULT.DILUTION_FACTOR;

    {ALL_RESULT.SPIKE_VALUE}
    field SPIKE_VALUE
        links_to RESULT.SPIKE_VALUE;

    {ALL_RESULT.SURROGATE_MLP}
    field SURROGATE_MLP
        links_to RESULT.SURROGATE_MLP;

    {ALL_RESULT.SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION}
    field SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION
        links_to RESULT.SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION;

    {ALL_RESULT.MATRIX_NO}
    field MATRIX_NO
        links_to RESULT.MATRIX_NO;

    {ALL_RESULT.MATRIX_NAME}
    field MATRIX_NAME
        links_to RESULT.MATRIX_NAME;

    {ALL_RESULT.COLUMN_NO}
    field COLUMN_NO
        links_to RESULT.COLUMN_NO;

    {ALL_RESULT.COLUMN_NAME}
    field COLUMN_NAME
        links_to RESULT.COLUMN_NAME;

    {ALL_RESULT.ROW_NO}
    field ROW_NO
        links_to RESULT.ROW_NO;

    {ALL_RESULT.ROW_NAME}
    field ROW_NAME
        links_to RESULT.ROW_NAME;

    {ALL_RESULT.HAS_INCIDENTS}
    field HAS_INCIDENTS
        links_to RESULT.HAS_INCIDENTS;

    {ALL_RESULT.INSTRUMENT_USED}
    field INSTRUMENT_USED
        links_to RESULT.INSTRUMENT_USED;

    {ALL_RESULT.RAW_RESULT}
    field RAW_RESULT
        links_to RESULT.RAW_RESULT;

    {ALL_RESULT.COUNT_OF_RESULT}
    field COUNT_OF_RESULT
        datatype INTEGER;

    select_clause
        select TEST_NUMBER, NAME, ORDER_NUMBER, RESULT_TYPE, UNITS, MINIMUM, MAXIMUM, TYPICAL, TRUE_WORD, FALSE_WORD, ALLOWED_CHARACTERS, CALCULATION, VALUE, TEXT, PLACES, OUT_OF_RANGE, STATUS, OLD_STATUS, ENTERED_ON, ENTERED_BY, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, GROUP_ID, SECURITY_FLAGS, SIG_FIGS_NUMBER, SIG_FIGS_ROUNDING, SIG_FIGS_FILTER, REP_CONTROL, MINIMUM_PQL, MAXIMUM_PQL, LESS_THAN_PQL, GREATER_THAN_PQL, PQL_CALCULATION, FORMULA, DILUTION_FACTOR, SPIKE_VALUE, SURROGATE_MLP, SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION, MATRIX_NO, MATRIX_NAME, COLUMN_NO, COLUMN_NAME, ROW_NO, ROW_NAME, HAS_INCIDENTS, INSTRUMENT_USED, RAW_RESULT, 1
        from RESULT WITH (NOLOCK)
        union all
        select TEST_NUMBER, NAME, ORDER_NUMBER, RESULT_TYPE, UNITS, MINIMUM, MAXIMUM, TYPICAL, TRUE_WORD, FALSE_WORD, ALLOWED_CHARACTERS, CALCULATION, VALUE, TEXT, PLACES, OUT_OF_RANGE, STATUS, OLD_STATUS, ENTERED_ON, ENTERED_BY, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, GROUP_ID, SECURITY_FLAGS, SIG_FIGS_NUMBER, SIG_FIGS_ROUNDING, SIG_FIGS_FILTER, REP_CONTROL, MINIMUM_PQL, MAXIMUM_PQL, LESS_THAN_PQL, GREATER_THAN_PQL, PQL_CALCULATION, FORMULA, DILUTION_FACTOR, SPIKE_VALUE, SURROGATE_MLP, SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION, MATRIX_NO, MATRIX_NAME, COLUMN_NO, COLUMN_NAME, ROW_NO, ROW_NAME, HAS_INCIDENTS, INSTRUMENT_USED, RAW_RESULT, 1
        from C_RESULT WITH (NOLOCK);

    view ALL_INCIDENTS;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.INCIDENT_ID}
    field INCIDENT_ID
        links_to INCIDENTS.INCIDENT_ID;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to INCIDENTS.STATUS;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.CHECKLIST_ID}
    field CHECKLIST_ID
        links_to INCIDENT_CHECKLIST.CHECKLIST_ID;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.TEMPLATE_ID}
    field TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to INCIDENT_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_ID;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.REVIEW_INSPECTORS}
    field REVIEW_INSPECTORS
        links_to INSPECTION_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.AUTHORISE_INSPECTORS}
    field AUTHORISE_INSPECTORS
        links_to INSPECTION_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.REVIEW_VERSION}
    field REVIEW_VERSION
        links_to INSPECTOR.VERSION;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.AUTHORISE_VERSION}
    field AUTHORISE_VERSION
        links_to INSPECTOR.VERSION;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to INCIDENTS.DESCRIPTION;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.INCIDENT_DATE}
    field INCIDENT_DATE
        links_to INCIDENTS.INCIDENT_DATE;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.REPORTED_BY}
    field REPORTED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.SUBJECT_TABLE}
    field SUBJECT_TABLE
        links_to INCIDENT_TEMPLATE.SUBJECT_TABLE;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.SUBJECT_field}
    field SUBJECT_field
        links_to INCIDENTS.SUBJECT_FIELD;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.LOCATION_ID}
    field LOCATION_ID
        links_to LOCATION.IDENTITY;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.REMARK}
    field REMARK
        links_to INCIDENTS.REMARK;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.HAS_ATTACHMENTS}
    field HAS_ATTACHMENTS
        links_to INCIDENTS.HAS_ATTACHMENTS;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.DATE_EXP}
    field DATE_EXP
        links_to INCIDENTS.DATE_EXP;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.PRODUCT}
    field PRODUCT
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.SAMPLE}
    field SAMPLE
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.RESULTID}
    field RESULTID
        links_to INCIDENTS.RESULTID;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.RESULT_NAME}
    field RESULT_NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.RESULT_TEXT}
    field RESULT_TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to RESULT.UNITS;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.SENT}
    field SENT
        links_to INCIDENTS.SENT;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.NC_STATUS}
    field NC_STATUS
        links_to INCIDENTS.NC_STATUS;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.NC_IDENTITY}
    field NC_IDENTITY
        links_to INCIDENTS.NC_IDENTITY;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.NC_LINK_EDIT}
    field NC_LINK_EDIT
        links_to INCIDENTS.NC_LINK_EDIT;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.NC_LINK_READ}
    field NC_LINK_READ
        links_to INCIDENTS.NC_LINK_READ;

    {ALL_INCIDENTS.COUNT_OF_INCIDENTS}
    field COUNT_OF_INCIDENTS
        datatype INTEGER;

    select_clause
        select INCIDENT_ID, STATUS, CHECKLIST_ID, TEMPLATE_ID, REVIEW_INSPECTORS, AUTHORISE_INSPECTORS, REVIEW_VERSION, AUTHORISE_VERSION, DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_DATE, REPORTED_BY, SUBJECT_TABLE, SUBJECT_FIELD, LOCATION_ID, REMARK, HAS_ATTACHMENTS, DATE_EXP, JOB_NAME, BATCH_NAME, PRODUCT, SAMPLE, TEST_NUMBER, ANALYSIS, TEST_COUNT, RESULTID, RESULT_NAME, RESULT_TEXT, UNITS, SENT, NC_STATUS, NC_IDENTITY, NC_LINK_EDIT, NC_LINK_READ, 1
        from INCIDENTS
        union all
        select INCIDENT_ID, STATUS, CHECKLIST_ID, TEMPLATE_ID, REVIEW_INSPECTORS, AUTHORISE_INSPECTORS, REVIEW_VERSION, AUTHORISE_VERSION, DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_DATE, REPORTED_BY, SUBJECT_TABLE, SUBJECT_FIELD, LOCATION_ID, REMARK, HAS_ATTACHMENTS, DATE_EXP, JOB_NAME, BATCH_NAME, PRODUCT, SAMPLE, TEST_NUMBER, ANALYSIS, TEST_COUNT, RESULTID, RESULT_NAME, RESULT_TEXT, UNITS, SENT, NC_STATUS, NC_IDENTITY, NC_LINK_EDIT, NC_LINK_READ, 1
        from C_INCIDENTS;

    view ALL_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS;

    {ALL_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.INCIDENT_ID}
    field INCIDENT_ID
        links_to INCIDENTS.INCIDENT_ID;

    {ALL_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.ACTION_NUMBER}
    field ACTION_NUMBER
        links_to INC_CHECKLIST_ACTIONS.ACTION_NUMBER;

    {ALL_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.CHECKLIST_ID}
    field CHECKLIST_ID
        links_to INCIDENT_CHECKLIST.CHECKLIST_ID;

    {ALL_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.ACTION_TYPE}
    field ACTION_TYPE
        links_to INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.ACTION_TYPE;

    {ALL_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.ACTION_TAKEN}
    field ACTION_TAKEN
        links_to INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.ACTION_TAKEN;

    {ALL_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.ACTION_RESULT}
    field ACTION_RESULT
        links_to INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.ACTION_RESULT;

    {ALL_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.BLOB_FILE}
    field BLOB_FILE
        links_to BLOB_VALUES.BLOB_ID;

    {ALL_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.COMPLETION_DATE}
    field COMPLETION_DATE
        links_to INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.COMPLETION_DATE;

    {ALL_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS.COMPLETED_BY}
    field COMPLETED_BY
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    select_clause
        select INCIDENT_ID, ACTION_NUMBER, CHECKLIST_ID, ACTION_TYPE, ACTION_TAKEN, ACTION_RESULT, BLOB_FILE, COMPLETION_DATE, COMPLETED_BY
        from INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS
        union all
        select INCIDENT_ID, ACTION_NUMBER, CHECKLIST_ID, ACTION_TYPE, ACTION_TAKEN, ACTION_RESULT, BLOB_FILE, COMPLETION_DATE, COMPLETED_BY
        from C_INC_CHECKLIST_RESULTS;
