    {Custom} 
    {MLP_HEADER_VIEW.APPR_DATE}
    field APPR_DATE
        datatype DATE;


    {Custom} 
    select_clause
        SELECT
            H.[IDENTITY] AS SUB_IDENTITY
            ,H.PRODUCT_VERSION AS SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION
            ,S.[IDENTITY] AS "IDENTITY"
            ,S.IDENTITY_VERSION AS PRODUCT_VERSION
            ,H.PRODUCT_CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE
            ,H.ENTRY_CODE AS ENTRY_CODE
            ,H.PRODUCT_GROUP AS PRODUCT_GROUP
            ,H.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP AS PRODUCT_SUBGROUP
            ,H.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION
            ,H.TEST_SCHEDULE AS TEST_SCHEDULE
            ,H.PRODUCT_STATUS AS PRODUCT_STATUS
            ,H.MODIFIED_ON AS MODIFIED_ON
            ,H.MODIFIED_BY AS MODIFIED_BY
            ,H.MODIFIABLE AS MODIFIABLE
            ,H.REMOVEFLAG AS REMOVEFLAG
            ,H.GROUP_ID AS GROUP_ID
            ,H.WARN_MSG AS WARN_MSG
            ,H.SAMPLE_TYPE AS SAMPLE_TYPE
            ,H.CONVERTED_DATE AS CONVERTED_DATE
            ,H.CONVERTED_BY AS CONVERTED_BY
            ,H.QC_NUMBER AS QC_NUMBER
            ,H.QC_DATE AS QC_DATE
            ,H.QS_NUMBER AS QS_NUMBER
            ,H.QS_DATE AS QS_DATE
            ,H.QCQS_COMMENT AS QCQS_COMMENT
            ,H.MPS_TEMPLATE AS MPS_TEMPLATE
            ,CASE 
                WHEN h.CULTURE_GROUP = '' THEN ''
                ELSE LEFT(H.CULTURE_GROUP, charindex(':', H.CULTURE_GROUP) - 1) 
            END AS CULTURE_GROUP
            ,H.DISP_RESP AS DISP_RESP
            ,H.AMOUNT_01 AS AMOUNT_01
            ,H.MASTER_PLANT AS MASTER_PLANT
            ,H.MPS_EXPORT AS MPS_EXPORT
            ,H.ALLOW_AGREE AS ALLOW_AGREE
            ,H.CERT_TYPE AS CERT_TYPE
            ,H.SAP_CERT AS SAP_CERT
            ,S.IDENTITY_VERSION AS PRODUCT_VERSION
            ,H.VERSION_COMMENT AS VERSION_COMMENT
            ,H.VERSION_STATUS AS VERSION_STATUS
            ,H.CREATED_DATE AS CREATED_DATE
            ,H.APPROVAL_REQD AS APPROVAL_REQD
            ,H.APPROVAL_STATUS AS APPROVAL_STATUS
            ,H.INSPECTION_PLAN AS INSPECTION_PLAN
            ,H.EXTERNAL_VERSION AS EXTERNAL_VERSION
            ,H.DO_SPLAN_LOGIN AS DO_SPLAN_LOGIN
            ,H.PROJECT_ID AS PROJECT_ID
            ,H.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP AS PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP
            ,H.MATERIAL_TYPE AS MATERIAL_TYPE
            ,H.SOS_GROUP AS SOS_GROUP
            ,H.SAP_UNIQUEID
            ,H.SAP_MASTERSTATUS
            ,H.GMP_STATUS
            ,H.PRODUCTAREA
            ,H.PRODUCTSEGMENT
            ,H.PRODUCTCLUSTER
            ,H.PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER
            ,H.PRODHIERAKEYNAME
            ,H.MATGROUPDESC
            ,H.PRODUCT_FORM
            ,H.PRODUCT_FORMAT
            ,H.PRODUCT_IDENTIFICATION
            ,H.STRAINS
            ,H.APPR_DATE
        FROM MLP_HEADER H
        INNER JOIN MLP_SCHEDULE S
            ON (H.[IDENTITY] = S.MLP_ID
            AND H.PRODUCT_VERSION = S.MLP_VERSION)
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
            H.[IDENTITY] AS SUB_IDENTITY
            ,H.PRODUCT_VERSION AS SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION
            ,H.[IDENTITY] AS "IDENTITY"
            ,H.PRODUCT_VERSION AS PRODUCT_VERSION
            ,H.PRODUCT_CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE
            ,H.ENTRY_CODE AS ENTRY_CODE
            ,H.PRODUCT_GROUP AS PRODUCT_GROUP
            ,H.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP AS PRODUCT_SUBGROUP
            ,H.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION
            ,H.TEST_SCHEDULE AS TEST_SCHEDULE
            ,H.PRODUCT_STATUS AS PRODUCT_STATUS
            ,H.MODIFIED_ON AS MODIFIED_ON
            ,H.MODIFIED_BY AS MODIFIED_BY
            ,H.MODIFIABLE AS MODIFIABLE
            ,H.REMOVEFLAG AS REMOVEFLAG
            ,H.GROUP_ID AS GROUP_ID
            ,H.WARN_MSG AS WARN_MSG
            ,H.SAMPLE_TYPE AS SAMPLE_TYPE
            ,H.CONVERTED_DATE AS CONVERTED_DATE
            ,H.CONVERTED_BY AS CONVERTED_BY
            ,H.QC_NUMBER AS QC_NUMBER
            ,H.QC_DATE AS QC_DATE
            ,H.QS_NUMBER AS QS_NUMBER
            ,H.QS_DATE AS QS_DATE
            ,H.QCQS_COMMENT AS QCQS_COMMENT
            ,H.MPS_TEMPLATE AS MPS_TEMPLATE
            ,CASE 
                WHEN h.CULTURE_GROUP = '' THEN ''
                ELSE LEFT(H.CULTURE_GROUP, charindex(':', H.CULTURE_GROUP) - 1) 
            END AS CULTURE_GROUP
            ,H.DISP_RESP AS DISP_RESP
            ,H.AMOUNT_01 AS AMOUNT_01
            ,H.MASTER_PLANT AS MASTER_PLANT
            ,H.MPS_EXPORT AS MPS_EXPORT
            ,H.ALLOW_AGREE AS ALLOW_AGREE
            ,H.CERT_TYPE AS CERT_TYPE
            ,H.SAP_CERT AS SAP_CERT
            ,H.PRODUCT_VERSION AS PRODUCT_VERSION
            ,H.VERSION_COMMENT AS VERSION_COMMENT
            ,H.VERSION_STATUS AS VERSION_STATUS
            ,H.CREATED_DATE AS CREATED_DATE
            ,H.APPROVAL_REQD AS APPROVAL_REQD
            ,H.APPROVAL_STATUS AS APPROVAL_STATUS
            ,H.INSPECTION_PLAN AS INSPECTION_PLAN
            ,H.EXTERNAL_VERSION AS EXTERNAL_VERSION
            ,H.DO_SPLAN_LOGIN AS DO_SPLAN_LOGIN
            ,H.PROJECT_ID AS PROJECT_ID
            ,H.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP AS PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP
            ,H.MATERIAL_TYPE AS MATERIAL_TYPE
            ,H.SOS_GROUP AS SOS_GROUP
            ,H.SAP_UNIQUEID
            ,H.SAP_MASTERSTATUS
            ,H.GMP_STATUS
            ,H.PRODUCTAREA
            ,H.PRODUCTSEGMENT
            ,H.PRODUCTCLUSTER
            ,H.PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER
            ,H.PRODHIERAKEYNAME
            ,H.MATGROUPDESC
            ,H.PRODUCT_FORM
            ,H.PRODUCT_FORMAT
            ,H.PRODUCT_IDENTIFICATION
            ,H.STRAINS
            ,H.APPR_DATE
        FROM MLP_HEADER H;

    view TEST_SCHED_VIEW
        on_table TEST_SCHED_ENTRY;

    {TEST_SCHED_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.IDENTITY;

    {TEST_SCHED_VIEW.TEST_SCHEDULE}
    field TEST_SCHEDULE
        datatype TEXT(100);

    {TEST_SCHED_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.ANALYSIS_ID;

    {TEST_SCHED_VIEW.REPLICATE_COUNT}
    field REPLICATE_COUNT
        links_to TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.REPLICATE_COUNT;

    {TEST_SCHED_VIEW.COMPONENT_LIST}
    field COMPONENT_LIST
        links_to TEST_SCHED_ENTRY.COMPONENT_LIST;

    {TEST_SCHED_VIEW.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        datatype TEXT(10);

    select_clause
        SELECT
            TS1.[IDENTITY]
            ,CASE
                WHEN TS3.[IDENTITY] IS NOT NULL THEN TS1.[IDENTITY] + +'\' + +TS2.[IDENTITY] + +'\' + +TS3.[IDENTITY]
                WHEN TS2.[IDENTITY] IS NOT NULL THEN TS1.[IDENTITY] + +'\' + +TS2.[IDENTITY]
                WHEN TS1.[IDENTITY] IS NOT NULL THEN TS1.[IDENTITY]
            END AS TEST_SCHEDULE
            ,CASE
                WHEN TS3.ANALYSIS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TS3.ANALYSIS_ID
                WHEN TS2.ANALYSIS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TS2.ANALYSIS_ID
                WHEN TS1.ANALYSIS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TS1.ANALYSIS_ID
                ELSE NULL
            END ANALYSIS_ID
            ,CASE
                WHEN TS3.ANALYSIS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TS3.REPLICATE_COUNT
                WHEN TS2.ANALYSIS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TS2.REPLICATE_COUNT
                WHEN TS1.ANALYSIS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TS1.REPLICATE_COUNT
                ELSE NULL
            END REPLICATE_COUNT
            ,CASE
                WHEN TS3.ANALYSIS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TS3.COMPONENT_LIST
                WHEN TS2.ANALYSIS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TS2.COMPONENT_LIST
                WHEN TS1.ANALYSIS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TS1.COMPONENT_LIST
                ELSE NULL
            END COMPONENT_LIST
            ,RIGHT('00' + +LTRIM(TS1.ORDER_NUM), 2) + +ISNULL(RIGHT('00' + +LTRIM(TS2.ORDER_NUM), 2), '00') + +ISNULL(RIGHT('00' + +LTRIM(TS3.ORDER_NUM), 2), '00') ORDER_NUMBER
        FROM TEST_SCHED_ENTRY TS1
        LEFT OUTER JOIN TEST_SCHED_ENTRY TS2
            ON TS1.ANALYSIS_ID = TS2.[IDENTITY]
            AND TS1.IS_ANALYSIS = 'F'
            AND TS1.[IDENTITY] IN (SELECT
                    [IDENTITY]
                FROM TEST_SCHED_HEADER
                WHERE REMOVEFLAG = 'F')
        LEFT OUTER JOIN TEST_SCHED_ENTRY TS3
            ON TS2.ANALYSIS_ID = TS3.[IDENTITY]
            AND TS2.IS_ANALYSIS = 'F'
            AND TS2.[IDENTITY] IN (SELECT
                    [IDENTITY]
                FROM TEST_SCHED_HEADER
                WHERE REMOVEFLAG = 'F')
        WHERE TS1.[IDENTITY] IN (SELECT
                [IDENTITY]
            FROM TEST_SCHED_HEADER
            WHERE REMOVEFLAG = 'F');

    view JOB_TO_CANCEL
        on_table JOB_HEADER;

    {JOB_TO_CANCEL.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME;

    {JOB_TO_CANCEL.TEMPLATE_ID}
    field TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to JOB_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID;

    {JOB_TO_CANCEL.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to JOB_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {JOB_TO_CANCEL.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to JOB_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON;

    select_clause
        SELECT
            J.JOB_NAME
            ,J.TEMPLATE_ID
            ,J.GROUP_ID
            ,J.MODIFIED_ON
        FROM JOB_HEADER J
        LEFT OUTER JOIN SAMPLE S
            ON J.JOB_NAME = S.JOB_NAME
        WHERE J.JOB_STATUS NOT IN ('X', 'A')
          AND J.TEMPLATE_ID NOT IN (' ')
          AND J.INSPECTION_TYPE <> '09'
        GROUP BY    J.JOB_NAME
                    ,J.TEMPLATE_ID
                    ,J.GROUP_ID
                    ,J.MODIFIED_ON
        HAVING COUNT(S.JOB_NAME) = 0 
        UNION
        SELECT
            J.JOB_NAME
            ,J.TEMPLATE_ID
            ,J.GROUP_ID
            ,J.MODIFIED_ON
        FROM JOB_HEADER J
        LEFT OUTER JOIN SAMPLE S
            ON J.JOB_NAME = S.JOB_NAME
        WHERE J.JOB_STATUS NOT IN ('X', 'A')
          AND J.TEMPLATE_ID NOT IN (' ')
          AND J.INSPECTION_TYPE = '09'
          AND j.DATE_CREATED <  DATEADD(D, -7, GETDATE())
        GROUP BY    J.JOB_NAME
                    ,J.TEMPLATE_ID
                    ,J.GROUP_ID
                    ,J.MODIFIED_ON
        HAVING COUNT(S.JOB_NAME) = 0 
        UNION
        SELECT
            J.JOB_NAME
            ,J.TEMPLATE_ID
            ,J.GROUP_ID
            ,J.MODIFIED_ON
        FROM JOB_HEADER J
        WHERE J.JOB_STATUS NOT IN ('X', 'A')
        AND J.MODIFIED_ON < DATEADD(D, -7, GETDATE())
        AND (J.JOB_NAME LIKE '%/DK%'
        OR J.JOB_NAME LIKE '%/DE%'
        OR J.JOB_NAME LIKE '%/FR%'
        OR J.JOB_NAME LIKE '%/US%') 
        UNION
        SELECT
            J.JOB_NAME
            ,J.TEMPLATE_ID
            ,J.GROUP_ID
            ,J.MODIFIED_ON
        FROM JOB_HEADER J
        LEFT OUTER JOIN SAMPLE S
            ON J.JOB_NAME = S.JOB_NAME
        WHERE J.JOB_STATUS = 'C'
        AND J.OLD_STATUS = ' '
        AND J.TEMPLATE_ID = 'P-BULK-ROS'
        AND j.INSPECTION_TYPE <> '09'
        GROUP BY    J.JOB_NAME
                    ,J.TEMPLATE_ID
                    ,J.GROUP_ID
                    ,J.MODIFIED_ON
        HAVING COUNT(S.JOB_NAME) = 0
        UNION 
        SELECT DISTINCT
            J.JOB_NAME
            ,J.TEMPLATE_ID
            ,J.GROUP_ID
            ,J.MODIFIED_ON
        FROM JOB_HEADER J
        LEFT OUTER JOIN SAMPLE S
            ON J.JOB_NAME = S.JOB_NAME
        WHERE J.JOB_STATUS = 'V'
        AND J.TEMPLATE_ID NOT LIKE '%STAB%'
        AND S.STATUS IN ('A', 'C', 'V')
        AND ((J.TEMPLATE_ID <> 'RDA-GENERA'
        AND J.MODIFIED_ON < DATEADD(D, -30, GETDATE()))
        OR (J.TEMPLATE_ID = 'RDA-GENERA'
        AND J.MODIFIED_ON < DATEADD(D, -180, GETDATE())))
        GROUP BY    J.JOB_NAME
                    ,J.TEMPLATE_ID
                    ,J.GROUP_ID
                    ,J.MODIFIED_ON
        HAVING COUNT(S.JOB_NAME) = 0
        AND J.JOB_NAME NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT JOB_NAME FROM SAMPLE);

    view AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR
        on_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION, AUDIT_EVENT, AUDIT_DATA, JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE, TEST, RESULT;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        datatype IDENTITY (15);

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.COMPONENT}
    field COMPONENT
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TABLE_NAME;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.field}
    field field
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.FIELD;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.VALUE_BEFORE}
    field VALUE_BEFORE
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_BEFORE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.VALUE_AFTER}
    field VALUE_AFTER
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_AFTER;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.REASON}
    field REASON
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_REASON;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.USER_ID}
    field USER_ID
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.USER_ID;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.TRANSACTION_DATE}
    field TRANSACTION_DATE
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.TRANSACTION_NAME}
    field TRANSACTION_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_NAME;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JSTR.EVENT_ACTION}
    field EVENT_ACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_ACTION;

    select_clause
        select TOP 100 PERCENT *
        from
        (select E.RECORD_KEY0 AS JOB_NAME, '' AS ID_NUMERIC, '' AS TEST_NUMBER, '' AS ANALYSIS, '' AS COMPONENT, E.TABLE_NAME, A.FIELD, A.VALUE_BEFORE, A.VALUE_AFTER, case when A.DATA_REASON = ' ' then E.EVENT_REASON else A.DATA_REASON end AS REASON, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.TRANSACTION_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION
        from AUDIT_DATA A, AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where A.EVENT = E.EVENT and E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION] and E.TABLE_NAME = 'JOB_HEADER'
        union all
        select S.JOB_NAME, E.RECORD_KEY0 AS ID_NUMERIC, '' AS TEST_NUMBER, '' AS ANALYSIS, '' AS COMPONENT, E.TABLE_NAME, A.FIELD, A.VALUE_BEFORE, A.VALUE_AFTER, case when A.DATA_REASON = ' ' then E.EVENT_REASON else A.DATA_REASON end AS REASON, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.TRANSACTION_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION
        from AUDIT_DATA A, AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION T, ALL_SAMPLE S
        where A.EVENT = E.EVENT and E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION] and E.TABLE_NAME = 'SAMPLE' and E.RECORD_KEY0 = S.ID_NUMERIC
        union all
        select S.JOB_NAME, S.ID_NUMERIC, E.RECORD_KEY0 AS TEST_NUMBER, T.ANALYSIS ++ '/' ++ CONVERT (VARCHAR, T.TEST_COUNT)AS ANALYSIS, '' AS COMPONENT, E.TABLE_NAME, A.FIELD, A.VALUE_BEFORE, A.VALUE_AFTER, case when A.DATA_REASON = ' ' then E.EVENT_REASON else A.DATA_REASON end AS REASON, AT.USER_ID, AT.TRANSACTION_DATE, AT.TRANSACTION_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION
        from AUDIT_DATA A, AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION AT, ALL_SAMPLE S, ALL_TEST T
        where A.EVENT = E.EVENT and E.[TRANSACTION] = AT.[TRANSACTION] and E.TABLE_NAME = 'TEST' and E.RECORD_KEY0 = T.TEST_NUMBER and T.SAMPLE = S.ID_NUMERIC
        union all
        select S.JOB_NAME, S.ID_NUMERIC AS ID_NUMERIC, T.TEST_NUMBER AS TEST_NUMBER, T.ANALYSIS ++ '/' ++ CONVERT (VARCHAR, T.TEST_COUNT)AS ANALYSIS, R.NAME COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS AS COMPONENT, E.TABLE_NAME, A.FIELD, A.VALUE_BEFORE, A.VALUE_AFTER, case when A.DATA_REASON = ' ' then E.EVENT_REASON else A.DATA_REASON end AS REASON, AT.USER_ID, AT.TRANSACTION_DATE, AT.TRANSACTION_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION
        from AUDIT_DATA A, AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION AT, ALL_SAMPLE S, ALL_TEST T, ALL_RESULT R
        where A.EVENT = E.EVENT and E.[TRANSACTION] = AT.[TRANSACTION] and E.TABLE_NAME = 'RESULT' and E.RECORD_KEY0 = R.TEST_NUMBER + R.NAME collate Latin1_General_CS_AS_WS and T.SAMPLE = S.ID_NUMERIC and T.TEST_NUMBER = R.TEST_NUMBER)A ORDER BY A.TRANSACTION_DATE;

    view NOVERSION_ANALYSIS
        on_table VERSIONED_ANALYSIS;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        alias IDENTIFIER 
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.GROUP_ID 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.INSTTYPE_ID}
    field INSTTYPE_ID
        datatype IDENTITY(17);

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.PREPARATION_ID}
    field PREPARATION_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.PREPARATION_ID;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.EXPECTED_TIME}
    field EXPECTED_TIME
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.EXPECTED_TIME;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.CHARGECODE}
    field CHARGECODE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CHARGECODE;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.RESULT_SCREEN}
    field RESULT_SCREEN
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.RESULT_SCREEN;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIED_ON 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIED_BY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIABLE 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.REMOVEFLAG 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.REPLICATES}
    field REPLICATES
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.REPLICATES;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.ACCESS_FLAGS}
    field ACCESS_FLAGS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ACCESS_FLAGS;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.COMP_REPLICATES}
    field COMP_REPLICATES
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COMP_REPLICATES;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.GENERIC_ANALYSIS}
    field GENERIC_ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.GENERIC_ANALYSIS;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.APPROVAL_REQD}
    field APPROVAL_REQD
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.APPROVAL_REQD;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.ALLOW_CATEGORY}
    field ALLOW_CATEGORY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ALLOW_CATEGORY;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.EXINSTTYPE}
    field EXINSTTYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.EXINSTTYPE;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.CONVERTED_DATE}
    field CONVERTED_DATE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CONVERTED_DATE;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.CONVERTED_BY}
    field CONVERTED_BY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CONVERTED_BY;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.QAP_NUMBER}
    field QAP_NUMBER
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAP_NUMBER;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.QAP_DATE}
    field QAP_DATE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAP_DATE;

    {NOVERSION_ANALYSIS.QAP_COMMENT}
    field QAP_COMMENT
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAP_COMMENT;

    select_clause
        select A1.[IDENTITY], A1.ANALYSIS_VERSION, A1.GROUP_ID, A1.ANALYSIS_TYPE, A1.DESCRIPTION, A1.INSTTYPE_ID, A1.PREPARATION_ID, A1.EXPECTED_TIME, A1.CHARGECODE, A1.RESULT_SCREEN, A1.MODIFIED_ON, A1.MODIFIED_BY, A1.MODIFIABLE, A1.REMOVEFLAG, A1.CALCULATION, A1.REPLICATES, A1.ACCESS_FLAGS, A1.COMP_REPLICATES, A1.GENERIC_ANALYSIS, A1.APPROVAL_REQD, A1.ALLOW_CATEGORY, A1.EXINSTTYPE, A1.CONVERTED_DATE, A1.CONVERTED_BY, A1.QAP_NUMBER, A1.QAP_DATE, A1.QAP_COMMENT
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A1
        where ANALYSIS_VERSION =
        (select max(ANALYSIS_VERSION)
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A2
        where A2.[IDENTITY] = A1.[IDENTITY]);

    view SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD
        on_table WORKSHEET;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD.PRODUCT}
    field PRODUCT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.IDENTITY;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD.STD_NUMBER}
    field STD_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD.LOGIN_DATE}
    field LOGIN_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (40);

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD.TEST_RESULT}
    field TEST_RESULT
        datatype TEXT(234);

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD.STD_RESULT}
    field STD_RESULT
        datatype TEXT(234);

    select_clause
        select S.JOB_NAME, T.ANALYSIS, S.PRODUCT, S.SAMPLING_POINT, T.TEST_NUMBER, T1.TEST_NUMBER, S.LOGIN_DATE, R.NAME, R.TEXT, R1.TEXT
        from SAMPLE S, SAMPLE S1, RESULT R, RESULT R1, TEST T, TEST T1
        where S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE and ltrim(S.PRODUCT)is not null and ltrim(S.SAMPLING_POINT)is not null and T.WORKSHEET != ' 0' and S.STANDARD = 'F' and T.WORKSHEET = T1.WORKSHEET and T1.SAMPLE = S1.ID_NUMERIC and S1.STANDARD = 'T' and R.TEST_NUMBER = T.TEST_NUMBER and R1.TEST_NUMBER = T1.TEST_NUMBER and R.NAME = R1.NAME and T.ANALYSIS = T1.ANALYSIS;

    view SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD_COM
        on_table WORKSHEET;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD_COM.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD_COM.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD_COM.PRODUCT}
    field PRODUCT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD_COM.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.IDENTITY;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD_COM.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD_COM.STD_NUMBER}
    field STD_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD_COM.LOGIN_DATE}
    field LOGIN_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD_COM.NAME}
    field NAME
        datatype TEXT (40);

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD_COM.TEST_RESULT}
    field TEST_RESULT
        datatype TEXT(234);

    {SAMP_WORKSHEET_STD_COM.STD_RESULT}
    field STD_RESULT
        datatype TEXT(234);

    select_clause
        select S.JOB_NAME, T.ANALYSIS, S.PRODUCT, S.SAMPLING_POINT, T.TEST_NUMBER, T1.TEST_NUMBER, S.LOGIN_DATE, R.NAME, R.TEXT, R1.TEXT
        from C_SAMPLE S, C_SAMPLE S1, C_RESULT R, C_RESULT R1, C_TEST T, C_TEST T1
        where S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE and ltrim(S.PRODUCT)is not null and ltrim(S.SAMPLING_POINT)is not null and T.WORKSHEET != ' 0' and S.STANDARD = 'F' and T.WORKSHEET = T1.WORKSHEET and T1.SAMPLE = S1.ID_NUMERIC and S1.STANDARD = 'T' and R.TEST_NUMBER = T.TEST_NUMBER and R1.TEST_NUMBER = T1.TEST_NUMBER and R.NAME = R1.NAME and T.ANALYSIS = T1.ANALYSIS;

    view STANDARD_TESTS_VIEW
        on_table WORKSHEET, SAMPLE, TEST;

    {STANDARD_TESTS_VIEW.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {STANDARD_TESTS_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {STANDARD_TESTS_VIEW.STARTER}
    field STARTER
        links_to TEST.STARTER;

    {STANDARD_TESTS_VIEW.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {STANDARD_TESTS_VIEW.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {STANDARD_TESTS_VIEW.WS_ID}
    field WS_ID
        links_to WORKSHEET.IDENTITY;

    {STANDARD_TESTS_VIEW.ASSIGNED_OPER}
    field ASSIGNED_OPER
        links_to WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR;

    {STANDARD_TESTS_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    select_clause
        SELECT
            T.TEST_NUMBER
            ,T.STATUS
            ,T.STARTER
            ,S.ID_NUMERIC
            ,S.ID_TEXT
            ,ISNULL(W.[IDENTITY], ' ')
            ,ISNULL(W.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, ' ')
            ,T.ANALYSIS
        FROM    SAMPLE S
                ,TEST T
                LEFT OUTER JOIN WORKSHEET W
                    ON (T.WORKSHEET = W.LINK_NUMBER)
        WHERE S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE
        AND S.STANDARD = 'T';
        
    view BATCH_TRACE_VIEW
        on_table BATCH_TRACE;

    {BATCH_TRACE_VIEW.PRODUCT_NAME_MASTER}
    field PRODUCT_NAME_MASTER
        links_to BATCH_TRACE.PRODUCT_NAME_MASTER;

    {BATCH_TRACE_VIEW.BATCH_NAME_MASTER}
    field BATCH_NAME_MASTER
        links_to BATCH_TRACE.BATCH_NAME_MASTER;

    {BATCH_TRACE_VIEW.PRODUCT_NAME_CHILD}
    field PRODUCT_NAME_CHILD
        links_to BATCH_TRACE.PRODUCT_NAME_CHILD 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {BATCH_TRACE_VIEW.BATCH_NAME_CHILD}
    field BATCH_NAME_CHILD
        links_to BATCH_TRACE.BATCH_NAME_CHILD 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {BATCH_TRACE_VIEW.MATERIAL_TYPE}
    field MATERIAL_TYPE
        links_to BATCH_TRACE.MATERIAL_TYPE;

    {BATCH_TRACE_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to BATCH_TRACE.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {BATCH_TRACE_VIEW.AMOUNT}
    field AMOUNT
        links_to BATCH_TRACE.AMOUNT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (4);

    {BATCH_TRACE_VIEW.UNIT}
    field UNIT
        links_to BATCH_TRACE.UNIT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (5);

    {BATCH_TRACE_VIEW.IDOC_ID}
    field IDOC_ID
        links_to BATCH_TRACE.IDOC_ID;

    select_clause
        select *
        from
        (select B.PRODUCT_NAME_MASTER, B.BATCH_NAME_MASTER, B.PRODUCT_NAME_CHILD, B.BATCH_NAME_CHILD, B.MATERIAL_TYPE, B.DESCRIPTION, SUM (B.AMOUNT)AS AMOUNT, B.UNIT, B.IDOC_ID
        from BATCH_TRACE B
        where B.VALID = 'T' and B.IDOC_ID IN
        (select max(B2.IDOC_ID)
        from BATCH_TRACE B2
        where B2.VALID = 'T' and B2.BATCH_NAME_MASTER = B.BATCH_NAME_MASTER and B2.PRODUCT_NAME_MASTER = B.PRODUCT_NAME_MASTER)GROUP BY B.PRODUCT_NAME_MASTER, B.BATCH_NAME_MASTER, B.PRODUCT_NAME_CHILD, B.BATCH_NAME_CHILD, B.MATERIAL_TYPE, B.DESCRIPTION, B.UNIT, B.IDOC_ID HAVING SUM (B.AMOUNT)<> 0)A
        union all
        select B.PRODUCT_NAME_MASTER, B.BATCH_NAME_MASTER, B.PRODUCT_NAME_CHILD, B.BATCH_NAME_CHILD, B.MATERIAL_TYPE, B.DESCRIPTION, B.AMOUNT, B.UNIT, B.IDOC_ID
        from BATCH_TRACE B
        where B.IDOC_ID = ' ';

    view MLP_LIMITS_VIEW
        on_table MLP_HEADER_VIEW, MLP_COMPONENTS;

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.PRODUCT_ID}
    field PRODUCT_ID
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.SUB_MLP}
    field SUB_MLP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.SUB_VER}
    field SUB_VER
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.ANALYSIS_ID}
    field ANALYSIS_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.Q_METHOD}
    field Q_METHOD
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.Q_METHOD;

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.INOC_PCT}
    field INOC_PCT
        datatype TEXT (80);

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        datatype TEXT (40);

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS;

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        datatype TEXT (10);

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        datatype TEXT (10);

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.TEXT_SPEC}
    field TEXT_SPEC
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.TEXT_PHRASE}
    field TEXT_PHRASE
        datatype TEXT (10);

    {MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.LIMITS}
    field LIMITS
        datatype TEXT (20);

    select_clause
        SELECT
            M.[IDENTITY]
            ,M.PRODUCT_VERSION
            ,M.SUB_IDENTITY
            ,M.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION
            ,C.ANALYSIS_ID
            ,a.ANALYSIS_VERSION
            ,a.Q_METHOD
            ,CASE
                WHEN p.VAL8 IS NULL THEN ''
                ELSE p.VAL8
            END INOC_PCT
            ,C.COMPONENT_NAME
            ,C.UNITS
            ,V.LEVEL_ID
            ,V.MIN_LIMIT
            ,V.MAX_LIMIT
            ,V.TEXT_SPEC
            ,V.TEXT_PHRASE
            ,CASE
                WHEN (V.MAX_LIMIT = '') AND
                    (V.MIN_LIMIT <> '') THEN LTRIM(V.MIN_LIMIT)
                WHEN (V.MAX_LIMIT <> '') AND
                    (V.MIN_LIMIT <> '') THEN LTRIM(V.MIN_LIMIT) + +' - ' + +V.MAX_LIMIT
                WHEN lpe.RESULT_VALUE_COUNT = 1 THEN lpe.RESULT_VALUE
                ELSE v.TEXT_PHRASE
            END AS LIMITS
        FROM MLP_HEADER_VIEW m
        INNER JOIN MLP_COMPONENTS c
            ON M.SUB_IDENTITY = c.PRODUCT_ID
            AND M.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION = c.PRODUCT_VERSION
        LEFT OUTER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS a
            ON c.ANALYSIS_ID = a.[IDENTITY]
            AND a.ANALYSIS_VERSION = (SELECT MAX(a.ANALYSIS_VERSION) 
                FROM VERSIONED_ANALYSIS a 
                WHERE a.[IDENTITY] = c.ANALYSIS_ID 
                AND a.MODIFIED_ON <= m.MODIFIED_ON) 
        LEFT OUTER JOIN PARM_SETUP p
            ON p.[IDENTITY] = m.[IDENTITY]
            AND p.IDENTITY_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION
            AND p.PARM_ID = 'INOC_PCT'
            AND p.VAL1 = c.ANALYSIS_ID
        INNER JOIN MLP_VALUES v
            ON c.ENTRY_CODE = v.ENTRY_CODE
        LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                lpe.LIMIT_PHRASE
                ,lpe.COMPARISON
                ,lpe.RESULT_VALUE
                ,COUNT(lpe.RESULT_VALUE) RESULT_VALUE_COUNT
            FROM LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY lpe
            GROUP BY    lpe.LIMIT_PHRASE
                        ,lpe.COMPARISON
                        ,lpe.RESULT_VALUE) lpe
            ON lpe.LIMIT_PHRASE = v.TEXT_PHRASE
            AND lpe.COMPARISON <> v.BOOLEAN_PASS;
    
    view JOB_HEADERS_VIEW
        on_table JOB_HEADER, C_JOB_HEADER, MLP_HEADER, PHRASE;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        datatype TEXT (20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.MPS_STATUS}
    field MPS_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.MPS_STATUS;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION}
    field BROWSE_DESCRIPTION
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.AUTHORISER}
    field AUTHORISER
        links_to JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISER;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.AUTHORISATION_NOTES}
    field AUTHORISATION_NOTES
        links_to JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISATION_NOTES;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION}
    field PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.SAMPLE_TYPE}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.SAMPLE_DESCRIPTION}
    field SAMPLE_DESCRIPTION
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.DESCRIPTION;

    {JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.PRODUCT_CODE}
    field PRODUCT_CODE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_CODE;

    select_clause
        select J.JOB_NAME, J.JOB_STATUS, J.MPS_STATUS, J.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION, J.DATE_AUTHORISED, J.AUTHORISER, J.AUTHORISATION_NOTES, J.BATCH_NAME, J.PRODUCT_NAME, J.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, M.SAMPLE_TYPE, P.PHRASE_TEXT, M.DESCRIPTION, M.PRODUCT_CODE
        from JOB_HEADER J, MLP_HEADER M, PHRASE P
        where J.PRODUCT_NAME = M.[IDENTITY] and P.PHRASE_TYPE = 'SAMP_TYPE' and P.PHRASE_ID = M.SAMPLE_TYPE union
        select C.JOB_NAME, C.JOB_STATUS, C.MPS_STATUS, C.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION, C.DATE_AUTHORISED, C.AUTHORISER, C.AUTHORISATION_NOTES, C.BATCH_NAME, C.PRODUCT_NAME, C.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, L.SAMPLE_TYPE, P.PHRASE_TEXT, L.DESCRIPTION, L.PRODUCT_CODE
        from C_JOB_HEADER C, MLP_HEADER L, PHRASE P
        where C.PRODUCT_NAME=L.[IDENTITY] and P.PHRASE_TYPE = 'SAMP_TYPE' and P.PHRASE_ID = L.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    view TRANSFERABLE_JOBS_VIEW
        on_table JOB_HEADER, PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS, PARM_SETUP_VALUES, PARM_SETUP_HEADERS;

    {TRANSFERABLE_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        datatype TEXT (20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {TRANSFERABLE_JOBS_VIEW.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION}
    field BROWSE_DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {TRANSFERABLE_JOBS_VIEW.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME;

    {TRANSFERABLE_JOBS_VIEW.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME;

    {TRANSFERABLE_JOBS_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to JOB_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {TRANSFERABLE_JOBS_VIEW.PARM_TYPE}
    field PARM_TYPE
        links_to PARM_SETUP_HEADERS.PARM_TYPE;

    {TRANSFERABLE_JOBS_VIEW.PARM_ID}
    field PARM_ID
        datatype TEXT (10);

    {TRANSFERABLE_JOBS_VIEW.VAL1}
    field VAL1
        datatype TEXT (80);

    {TRANSFERABLE_JOBS_VIEW.VAL2}
    field VAL2
        datatype TEXT (80);

    {TRANSFERABLE_JOBS_VIEW.VAL3}
    field VAL3
        datatype TEXT (80);

    select_clause
        select J.JOB_NAME, J.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION, J.PRODUCT_NAME, J.BATCH_NAME, J.GROUP_ID, P.PARM_TYPE, P.PARM_ID, P.VAL1, P.VAL2, P.VAL3
        from JOB_HEADER J, PARM_SETUP P
        where J.PRODUCT_NAME = P.[IDENTITY] and P.PARM_ID = 'IMPORTPREV' and P.VAL1 = 'TRUE' and ltrim(P.PARM_TYPE)= 'M' and J.JOB_STATUS = 'V' union
        select J.JOB_NAME, J.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION, J.PRODUCT_NAME, J.BATCH_NAME, J.GROUP_ID, P.PARM_TYPE, P.PARM_ID, P.VAL1, P.VAL2, P.VAL3
        from C_JOB_HEADER J, PARM_SETUP P
        where J.PRODUCT_NAME = P.[IDENTITY] and P.PARM_ID = 'IMPORTPREV' and P.VAL1 = 'TRUE' and ltrim(P.PARM_TYPE)= 'M' and J.JOB_STATUS = 'V';

    view ALL_SAMPLES_VIEW
        on_table SAMPLE, C_SAMPLE;

    {ALL_SAMPLES_VIEW.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        alias IDNUMERIC 
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {ALL_SAMPLES_VIEW.PRODUCT}
    field PRODUCT
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT;

    {ALL_SAMPLES_VIEW.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME;

    {ALL_SAMPLES_VIEW.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT;

    {ALL_SAMPLES_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        alias JOBNAME 
        links_to SAMPLE.JOB_NAME;

    {ALL_SAMPLES_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS;

    {ALL_SAMPLES_VIEW.AUTHORISATION_NOTES}
    field AUTHORISATION_NOTES
        links_to SAMPLE.AUTHORISATION_NOTES;

    {ALL_SAMPLES_VIEW.SAMPLE_COMMENT}
    field SAMPLE_COMMENT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLE_COMMENT;

    select_clause
        select ID_NUMERIC, PRODUCT, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, JOB_NAME, STATUS, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, SAMPLE_COMMENT
        from SAMPLE
        union all
        select ID_NUMERIC, PRODUCT, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, JOB_NAME, STATUS, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, SAMPLE_COMMENT
        from C_SAMPLE;

    view MLP_STANDARDS_VIEW
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {MLP_STANDARDS_VIEW.PRODUCT_CODE}
    field PRODUCT_CODE
        datatype TEXT (25) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    select_clause
        select distinct PRODUCT_CODE
        from MLP_HEADER
        where REMOVEFLAG != 'T' and (UPPER (LTRIM (DESCRIPTION))= UPPER ('Created via Standards')or UPPER (LTRIM (DESCRIPTION))LIKE UPPER ('Created as Standard%'));

    view WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW
        on_table WORKSHEET, SAMPLE, TEST;

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.WORKSHEET_TYPE}
    field WORKSHEET_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype TEXT (20);

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR}
    field ASSIGNED_OPERATOR
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.GENERATOR_OPERATOR}
    field GENERATOR_OPERATOR
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.WORKSHEET_STATUS}
    field WORKSHEET_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.LINK_NUMBER}
    field LINK_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.DATE_WS_GENERATED}
    field DATE_WS_GENERATED
        datatype DATE;

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.TEST_SAMPLE}
    field TEST_SAMPLE
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.WORKSHEET_POSITION}
    field WORKSHEET_POSITION
        datatype INTEGER;

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (20);

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        datatype IDENTITY (30);

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.DATERESREQ}
    field DATERESREQ
        datatype DATE;

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.PRODUCT_CODE}
    field PRODUCT_CODE
        datatype TEXT (40);

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION}
    field PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.ANALYSIS_DESCRIPTION}
    field ANALYSIS_DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT (255);

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.INOC_TEMP}
    field INOC_TEMP
        datatype TEXT(10);

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.MEDIA_01}
    field MEDIA_01
        datatype IDENTITY (17);

    {WORKSHEET_SAMPLE_VIEW.MEDIA_DESCR}
    field MEDIA_DESCR
        datatype TEXT (234);

    select_clause
        select WORKSHEET.WORKSHEET_TYPE, WORKSHEET.[IDENTITY], WORKSHEET.ASSIGNED_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.GENERATOR_OPERATOR, WORKSHEET.STATUS, WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER, WORKSHEET.DATE_GENERATED, TEST.SAMPLE, TEST.STATUS, TEST.ANALYSIS, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, TEST.WORKSHEET_POSITION, SAMPLE.STATUS, SAMPLE.JOB_NAME, SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, SAMPLE.DATERESREQ, MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_CODE, MLP_HEADER.DESCRIPTION, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INOC_TEMP, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MEDIA_01, PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT
        from WORKSHEET, SAMPLE, TEST, MLP_HEADER, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, PHRASE
        where WORKSHEET.LINK_NUMBER = TEST.WORKSHEET and TEST.SAMPLE = SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC and SAMPLE.PRODUCT = MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY] and SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION = MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION and TEST.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.[IDENTITY] and TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION and PHRASE.PHRASE_TYPE = 'MEDIA_01' and VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MEDIA_01 = PHRASE.PHRASE_ID;

    view ALL_JOB_HEADERS_VIEW
        on_table JOB_HEADER, C_JOB_HEADER;

    {ALL_JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        datatype TEXT (20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {ALL_JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {ALL_JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.MPS_STATUS}
    field MPS_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.MPS_STATUS;

    {ALL_JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME;

    {ALL_JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.AUTHORISATION_NOTES}
    field AUTHORISATION_NOTES
        links_to JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISATION_NOTES;

    {ALL_JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {ALL_JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME;

    {ALL_JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to JOB_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {ALL_JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.DATE_CREATED}
    field DATE_CREATED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_CREATED;

    {ALL_JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION}
    field PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION;

    {ALL_JOB_HEADERS_VIEW.LOGIN_PLANT}
    field LOGIN_PLANT
        links_to JOB_HEADER.LOGIN_PLANT;

    select_clause
        select JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME, JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS, JOB_HEADER.MPS_STATUS, JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME, JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISATION_NOTES, JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED, JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME, JOB_HEADER.GROUP_ID, JOB_HEADER.DATE_CREATED, JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, JOB_HEADER.LOGIN_PLANT
        from JOB_HEADER
        union all
        select C_JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME, C_JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS, C_JOB_HEADER.MPS_STATUS, C_JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME, C_JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISATION_NOTES, C_JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED, C_JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME, C_JOB_HEADER.GROUP_ID, C_JOB_HEADER.DATE_CREATED, C_JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, C_JOB_HEADER.LOGIN_PLANT
        from C_JOB_HEADER;

    view ALL_TESTS_VIEW
        on_table TEST, C_TEST;

    {ALL_TESTS_VIEW.SAMPLE}
    field SAMPLE
        links_to TEST.SAMPLE;

    {ALL_TESTS_VIEW.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {ALL_TESTS_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS;

    {ALL_TESTS_VIEW.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    select_clause
        select TEST.SAMPLE, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, TEST.ANALYSIS, TEST.TEST_COUNT
        from TEST
        union all
        select C_TEST.SAMPLE, C_TEST.TEST_NUMBER, C_TEST.ANALYSIS, C_TEST.TEST_COUNT
        from C_TEST;

    view EXPORT_COMPONENTS
        on_table PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS, PARM_SETUP_VALUES;

    {EXPORT_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS.FIELD_NAME;

    {EXPORT_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT}
    field COMPONENT
        links_to PARM_SETUP_VALUES.VAL1;

    select_clause
        select L.FIELD_NAME, V.VAL1
        from PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS L, PARM_SETUP_VALUES V
        where V.PARM_ID = 'EXPORT' and V.[IDENTITY] = L.[IDENTITY] and V.VAL1 is not null and L.PARM_TYPE = 'A';

    {Custom}
view EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1
        on_table JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE, TEST, RESULT, MLP_VALUES, MLP_COMPONENTS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.RESULT_TEXT}
    field RESULT_TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.UNIT}
    field UNIT
        links_to RESULT.UNITS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.OUT_OF_RANGE}
    field OUT_OF_RANGE
        links_to RESULT.OUT_OF_RANGE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.SAMPLE_COMMENT}
    field SAMPLE_COMMENT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLE_COMMENT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.RESULT_VALUE}
    field RESULT_VALUE
        links_to RESULT.VALUE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.MLP_GROUP_ID}
    field MLP_GROUP_ID
        links_to MLP_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.JOB_AUTHORISED}
    field JOB_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.JOB_FIRST_AUTHORISED}
    field JOB_FIRST_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.TANK_NUMBER}
    field TANK_NUMBER
        links_to SAMPLE.TANK_NUMBER;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.ANALYSIS_TYPE}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_1.COA_GROUP}
    field COA_GROUP
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COA_GROUP;

    {Custom}
    select_clause
     select J.BATCH_NAME,
            S.PRODUCT,
            S.PRODUCT_VERSION,
            S.ID_NUMERIC,
            S.SAMPLING_POINT,
            T.TEST_NUMBER,
            T.ANALYSIS,
            T.TEST_COUNT,
            R.NAME,
            R.TEXT,
            R.UNITS,
            R.OUT_OF_RANGE,
            J.JOB_STATUS,
            MV.MIN_LIMIT,
            MV.MAX_LIMIT,
            S.SAMPLE_COMMENT,
            S.STATUS S_STATUS,
            T.STATUS T_STATUS,
            R.VALUE,
            MH.GROUP_ID,
            J.DATE_AUTHORISED,
            J.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED,
            T.ANALYSIS_VERSION,
            S.ID_TEXT,
            S.TANK_NUMBER,
            va.ANALYSIS_TYPE,
            va.COA_GROUP
        from JOB_HEADER J
        INNER JOIN SAMPLE S
            ON J.JOB_NAME = S.JOB_NAME
        INNER JOIN TEST T
            ON S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE
        INNER JOIN RESULT R
            ON T.TEST_NUMBER = R.TEST_NUMBER
        INNER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS va
            on t.ANALYSIS = va.[IDENTITY]
           and t.ANALYSIS_VERSION = va.ANALYSIS_VERSION
        INNER JOIN VERSIONED_COMPONENT VC
            ON T.ANALYSIS = VC.ANALYSIS
           and T.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VC.ANALYSIS_VERSION 
           AND R.NAME = VC.NAME COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS
           and VC.EXPORT = 'T'
        INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER MH
            ON S.PRODUCT = MH.[IDENTITY]
           and S.PRODUCT_VERSION = MH.PRODUCT_VERSION
        INNER JOIN MLP_VALUES MV
            ON S.PRODUCT = MV.PRODUCT_ID
          and S.PRODUCT_VERSION = MV.PRODUCT_VERSION
          and R.NAME = MV.COMPONENT_NAME COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS
        INNER JOIN MLP_COMPONENTS MC
            ON S.PRODUCT = MC.PRODUCT_ID
           and S.PRODUCT_VERSION = MC.PRODUCT_VERSION
           and T.ANALYSIS = MC.ANALYSIS_ID
           and R.NAME = MC.COMPONENT_NAME
           and MV.ENTRY_CODE = MC.ENTRY_CODE
           and MC.ANALYSIS_ID is not null 
         where MV.LEVEL_ID = 'INTERNAL'
          and S.STATUS IN ('A', 'C', 'X', 'R', 'V')and T.STATUS IN ('A', 'C', 'X', 'R')and J.INSPECTION_TYPE = '04';
{          and j.date_authorised > GETDATE ()- 4; }

    {Custom}
view EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2
        on_table JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE, TEST, RESULT, PARM_SETUP, MLP_VALUES, MLP_COMPONENTS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.RESULT_TEXT}
    field RESULT_TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.UNIT}
    field UNIT
        links_to RESULT.UNITS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.OUT_OF_RANGE}
    field OUT_OF_RANGE
        links_to RESULT.OUT_OF_RANGE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.SAMPLE_COMMENT}
    field SAMPLE_COMMENT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLE_COMMENT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.RESULT_VALUE}
    field RESULT_VALUE
        links_to RESULT.VALUE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.MLP_GROUP_ID}
    field MLP_GROUP_ID
        links_to MLP_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.JOB_AUTHORISED}
    field JOB_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.JOB_FIRST_AUTHORISED}
    field JOB_FIRST_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.TANK_NUMBER}
    field TANK_NUMBER
        links_to SAMPLE.TANK_NUMBER;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.ANALYSIS_TYPE}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_ACT_2.COA_GROUP}
    field COA_GROUP
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COA_GROUP;

    {Custom}
    select_clause
        select J.BATCH_NAME,
            S.PRODUCT,
            S.PRODUCT_VERSION,
            S.ID_NUMERIC,
            S.SAMPLING_POINT,
            T.TEST_NUMBER,
            T.ANALYSIS,
            T.TEST_COUNT,
            R.NAME,
            R.TEXT,
            R.UNITS,
            R.OUT_OF_RANGE,
            J.JOB_STATUS,
            null MIN_LIMIT,
            null MAX_LIMIT,
            S.SAMPLE_COMMENT,
            S.STATUS S_STATUS,
            T.STATUS T_STATUS,
            R.VALUE,
            MH.GROUP_ID,
            J.DATE_AUTHORISED,
            J.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED,
            T.ANALYSIS_VERSION,
            S.ID_TEXT,
            S.TANK_NUMBER,
            va.ANALYSIS_TYPE,
            va.COA_GROUP
        from JOB_HEADER J
        INNER JOIN SAMPLE S
            ON J.JOB_NAME = S.JOB_NAME
        INNER JOIN TEST T
            ON S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE 
        INNER JOIN RESULT R
            ON T.TEST_NUMBER = R.TEST_NUMBER
        INNER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS va
            on t.ANALYSIS = va.[IDENTITY]
            and t.ANALYSIS_VERSION = va.ANALYSIS_VERSION
        INNER JOIN VERSIONED_COMPONENT VC
            ON T.ANALYSIS = VC.ANALYSIS
          and T.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VC.ANALYSIS_VERSION
          and R.NAME = VC.NAME COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS
          and VC.EXPORT = 'T'
        INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER MH
            ON S.PRODUCT = MH.[IDENTITY]
          and S.PRODUCT_VERSION = MH.PRODUCT_VERSION
        where S.STATUS IN ('A', 'C', 'X', 'R', 'V')and T.STATUS IN ('A', 'C', 'X', 'R')and J.INSPECTION_TYPE = '04'
          and not exists
        (select 1
        from MLP_VALUES MV, MLP_COMPONENTS MC
        where MC.PRODUCT_ID = S.PRODUCT
          and MC.PRODUCT_VERSION = S.PRODUCT_VERSION
          and MC.ANALYSIS_ID = T.ANALYSIS
          and MC.COMPONENT_NAME COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS = R.NAME
          and MC.ANALYSIS_ID is not null
          and MC.ENTRY_CODE = MV.ENTRY_CODE
          and MV.LEVEL_ID = 'INTERNAL');
{          and J.DATE_AUTHORISED > GETDATE ()- 4; }

    {Custom}
view EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3
        on_table JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE, TEST, RESULT, MLP_VALUES, MLP_COMPONENTS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.RESULT_TEXT}
    field RESULT_TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.UNIT}
    field UNIT
        links_to RESULT.UNITS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.OUT_OF_RANGE}
    field OUT_OF_RANGE
        links_to RESULT.OUT_OF_RANGE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.SAMPLE_COMMENT}
    field SAMPLE_COMMENT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLE_COMMENT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.RESULT_VALUE}
    field RESULT_VALUE
        links_to RESULT.VALUE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.MLP_GROUP_ID}
    field MLP_GROUP_ID
        links_to MLP_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.JOB_AUTHORISED}
    field JOB_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.JOB_FIRST_AUTHORISED}
    field JOB_FIRST_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.TANK_NUMBER}
    field TANK_NUMBER
        links_to SAMPLE.TANK_NUMBER;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.ANALYSIS_TYPE}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_3.COA_GROUP}
    field COA_GROUP
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COA_GROUP;

    {Custom}
    select_clause
        select J.BATCH_NAME,
            S.PRODUCT,
            S.PRODUCT_VERSION,
            S.ID_NUMERIC,
            S.SAMPLING_POINT,
            T.TEST_NUMBER,
            T.ANALYSIS,
            T.TEST_COUNT,
            R.NAME,
            R.TEXT,
            R.UNITS,
            R.OUT_OF_RANGE,
            J.JOB_STATUS,
            MV.MIN_LIMIT,
            MV.MAX_LIMIT,
            S.SAMPLE_COMMENT,
            S.STATUS S_STATUS,
            T.STATUS T_STATUS,
            R.VALUE,
            MH.GROUP_ID,
            J.DATE_AUTHORISED,
            J.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED,
            T.ANALYSIS_VERSION,
            S.ID_TEXT,
            S.TANK_NUMBER,
            va.ANALYSIS_TYPE, 
            va.COA_GROUP
        from C_JOB_HEADER J
            INNER JOIN C_SAMPLE S
                ON J.JOB_NAME = S.JOB_NAME
            INNER JOIN C_TEST T
                ON S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE
            INNER JOIN C_RESULT R
                ON T.TEST_NUMBER = R.TEST_NUMBER
            INNER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS va
                ON t.ANALYSIS = va.[IDENTITY]
                and t.ANALYSIS_VERSION  = va.ANALYSIS_VERSION
            INNER JOIN VERSIONED_COMPONENT VC
                ON T.ANALYSIS = VC.ANALYSIS
                and T.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VC.ANALYSIS_VERSION
                and R.NAME = VC.NAME COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS
                and VC.EXPORT = 'T'
            INNER JOIN MLP_VALUES MV
                ON S.PRODUCT = MV.PRODUCT_ID
                and S.PRODUCT_VERSION = MV.PRODUCT_VERSION
                and R.NAME = MV.COMPONENT_NAME COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS
            INNER JOIN MLP_COMPONENTS MC
                ON S.PRODUCT = MC.PRODUCT_ID
                and S.PRODUCT_VERSION = MC.PRODUCT_VERSION
                and T.ANALYSIS = MC.ANALYSIS_ID
                and R.NAME = MC.COMPONENT_NAME
                and MV.ENTRY_CODE = MC.ENTRY_CODE
                and MC.ANALYSIS_ID is not null
            INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER MH
                ON S.PRODUCT = MH.[IDENTITY]
                and S.PRODUCT_VERSION = MH.PRODUCT_VERSION
        where S.STATUS IN ('A', 'C', 'X', 'R', 'V')
          and T.STATUS IN ('A', 'C', 'X', 'R')
          and J.INSPECTION_TYPE = '04'
          and MV.LEVEL_ID = 'INTERNAL';

    {Custom}
view EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4
        on_table JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE, TEST, RESULT, MLP_VALUES, MLP_COMPONENTS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.RESULT_TEXT}
    field RESULT_TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.UNIT}
    field UNIT
        links_to RESULT.UNITS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.OUT_OF_RANGE}
    field OUT_OF_RANGE
        links_to RESULT.OUT_OF_RANGE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.SAMPLE_COMMENT}
    field SAMPLE_COMMENT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLE_COMMENT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.RESULT_VALUE}
    field RESULT_VALUE
        links_to RESULT.VALUE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.MLP_GROUP_ID}
    field MLP_GROUP_ID
        links_to MLP_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.JOB_AUTHORISED}
    field JOB_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.JOB_FIRST_AUTHORISED}
    field JOB_FIRST_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.TANK_NUMBER}
    field TANK_NUMBER
        links_to SAMPLE.TANK_NUMBER;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.ANALYSIS_TYPE}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE;

    {Custom}
    {EXPORT_RESULTS_COM_4.COA_GROUP}
    field COA_GROUP
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COA_GROUP;

    {Custom}
    select_clause
        SELECT J.BATCH_NAME,
            S.PRODUCT,
            S.PRODUCT_VERSION,
            S.ID_NUMERIC,
            S.SAMPLING_POINT,
            T.TEST_NUMBER,
            T.ANALYSIS,
            T.TEST_COUNT,
            R.NAME,
            R.TEXT,
            R.UNITS,
            R.OUT_OF_RANGE,
            J.JOB_STATUS,
            null MIN_LIMIT,
            null MAX_LIMIT,
            S.SAMPLE_COMMENT,
            S.STATUS S_STATUS,
            T.STATUS T_STATUS,
            R.VALUE,
            MH.GROUP_ID,
            J.DATE_AUTHORISED,
            J.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED,
            T.ANALYSIS_VERSION,
            S.ID_TEXT,
            S.TANK_NUMBER,
            va.ANALYSIS_TYPE,
            va.COA_GROUP
        FROM C_JOB_HEADER J
        INNER JOIN C_SAMPLE S
            ON J.JOB_NAME = S.JOB_NAME
        INNER JOIN C_TEST T
            ON S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE
        INNER JOIN C_RESULT R
            ON T.TEST_NUMBER = R.TEST_NUMBER
        INNER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS va
            ON t.ANALYSIS = va.[IDENTITY]
            and t.ANALYSIS_VERSION = va.ANALYSIS_VERSION
        INNER JOIN VERSIONED_COMPONENT VC
            ON T.ANALYSIS = VC.ANALYSIS
          and T.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VC.ANALYSIS_VERSION
          and R.NAME = VC.NAME COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS
          and VC.EXPORT = 'T'
        INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER MH
            ON S.PRODUCT = MH.[IDENTITY]
          and S.PRODUCT_VERSION = MH.PRODUCT_VERSION
        where S.STATUS IN ('A', 'C', 'X', 'R', 'V')
          and T.STATUS IN ('A', 'C', 'X', 'R')
          and J.INSPECTION_TYPE = '04'
          and left(J.BATCH_NAME,2) in ('31','32')
          and not exists
        (select 1
        from MLP_VALUES MV, MLP_COMPONENTS MC
        where MC.PRODUCT_ID = S.PRODUCT
          and MC.PRODUCT_VERSION = S.PRODUCT_VERSION
          and MC.ANALYSIS_ID = T.ANALYSIS
          and MC.COMPONENT_NAME COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS = R.NAME
          and MC.ANALYSIS_ID is not null
          and MC.ENTRY_CODE = MV.ENTRY_CODE
          and MV.LEVEL_ID = 'INTERNAL');

    view ALL_RESULTS_VIEW
        on_table RESULT, C_RESULT;

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.NAME}
    field NAME
        alias COMPONENT_NAME 
        datatype TEXT (40) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        alias COMP_NUM 
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.RESULT_TYPE}
    field RESULT_TYPE
        datatype TEXT(1);

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        datatype TEXT(10);

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        alias CALCULATION_ID 
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.VALUE}
    field VALUE
        datatype REAL;

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.TEXT}
    field TEXT
        datatype TEXT(234);

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        datatype TEXT(1);

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.ENTERED_ON}
    field ENTERED_ON
        datatype DATE;

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.ENTERED_BY}
    field ENTERED_BY
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED
        datatype DATE;

    {ALL_RESULTS_VIEW.AUTHORISER}
    field AUTHORISER
        datatype IDENTITY;

    select_clause
        select RESULT.TEST_NUMBER, RESULT.NAME, RESULT.ORDER_NUMBER, RESULT.RESULT_TYPE, RESULT.UNITS, RESULT.CALCULATION, RESULT.VALUE, RESULT.TEXT, RESULT.STATUS, RESULT.ENTERED_ON, RESULT.ENTERED_BY, RESULT.DATE_AUTHORISED, RESULT.AUTHORISER
        from RESULT
        union all
        select C_RESULT.TEST_NUMBER, C_RESULT.NAME, C_RESULT.ORDER_NUMBER, C_RESULT.RESULT_TYPE, C_RESULT.UNITS, C_RESULT.CALCULATION, C_RESULT.VALUE, C_RESULT.TEXT, C_RESULT.STATUS, C_RESULT.ENTERED_ON, C_RESULT.ENTERED_BY, C_RESULT.DATE_AUTHORISED, C_RESULT.AUTHORISER
        from C_RESULT;

    view INOCULATION_VIEW
        on_table JOB_HEADER;

    {INOCULATION_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {INOCULATION_VIEW.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME;

    {INOCULATION_VIEW.INOCULATION}
    field INOCULATION
        datatype TEXT (40);

    select_clause
        select distinct MC.PRODUCT_ID, MC.COMPONENT_NAME + ':', 'Inoculated ' + ltrim(PV.VAL8)+ case when ltrim(VA.INOC_TEMP)= '' then '.' else ' at ' + ltrim(VA.INOC_TEMP)+ 'C.' end
        from MLP_COMPONENTS MC, PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS PL, PARM_SETUP_VALUES PV, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS VA
        where MC.PRODUCT_ID = PL.FIELD_NAME and PL.PARM_TYPE = 'M' and PL.[IDENTITY] = PV.[IDENTITY] and MC.ANALYSIS_ID = PV.VAL1 and PV.PARM_ID = 'INOC_PCT' and ltrim(PV.VAL4)is not null and VA.[IDENTITY] = MC.ANALYSIS_ID and VA.ANALYSIS_VERSION =
        (select max(ANALYSIS_VERSION)
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS VA2
        where VA2.[IDENTITY] = VA.[IDENTITY])and UPPER (MC.COMPONENT_NAME)not LIKE '%INOC%' and ltrim(PV.VAL8)is not null and ltrim(PV.VAL9)is not null and ltrim(PV.VAL10)is not null and PL.[IDENTITY] =
        (select PL1.[IDENTITY]
        from PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS PL1, PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS PL2
        where PL1.FIELD_NAME = MC.PRODUCT_ID and ltrim(PL1.ORDER_NUM)= ltrim(' 1')and PL2.FIELD_NAME =
        (select ltrim(MAX (PRODUCT_VERSION))
        from MLP_HEADER MV2
        where MV2.[IDENTITY] = MC.PRODUCT_ID)and ltrim(PL2.ORDER_NUM)= ltrim(' 2')and PL2.[IDENTITY] = PL1.[IDENTITY] and PL1.PARM_TYPE = 'M' and PL2.PARM_TYPE = 'M');

    view MAX_ANALYSIS_VERSION
        on_table VERSIONED_ANALYSIS;

    {MAX_ANALYSIS_VERSION.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MAX_ANALYSIS_VERSION.MAX_VERSION}
    field MAX_VERSION
        datatype INTEGER;

    {MAX_ANALYSIS_VERSION.MAX_VERSION_FOR_PARM}
    field MAX_VERSION_FOR_PARM
        datatype TEXT(10);

    select_clause
        select [IDENTITY], max(ANALYSIS_VERSION), ltrim(MAX (ANALYSIS_VERSION))
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS GROUP BY [IDENTITY];

    view MAX_ACTIVE_ANAL_VER
        on_table VERSIONED_ANALYSIS;

    {MAX_ACTIVE_ANAL_VER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MAX_ACTIVE_ANAL_VER.MAX_VERSION}
    field MAX_VERSION
        datatype INTEGER;

    {MAX_ACTIVE_ANAL_VER.MAX_VERSION_FOR_PARM}
    field MAX_VERSION_FOR_PARM
        datatype TEXT(10);

    select_clause
        select [IDENTITY], max(ANALYSIS_VERSION), ltrim(MAX (ANALYSIS_VERSION))
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS
        where APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A' and REMOVEFLAG <> 'T' GROUP BY [IDENTITY];

    view CONFIRMATION
        on_table VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, TEST_SCHED_HEADER;

    {CONFIRMATION.TEST}
    field TEST
        datatype IDENTITY(15) 
        allowed_characters ' ..`';

    select_clause
        select TOP 100 PERCENT ID
        from
        (select A.[IDENTITY] + ' (A)' ID
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A, MAX_ACTIVE_ANAL_VER V
        where A.[IDENTITY]= V.[IDENTITY] and A.ANALYSIS_VERSION = V.MAX_VERSION and A.[IDENTITY] <> '$NULL' union
        select T.[IDENTITY] + ' (T)' ID
        from TEST_SCHED_HEADER T
        where T.REMOVEFLAG = 'F')l order by ID desc;

    view MAX_ACTIVE_MLP_VER
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {MAX_ACTIVE_MLP_VER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MAX_ACTIVE_MLP_VER.MAX_VERSION}
    field MAX_VERSION
        datatype INTEGER;

    {MAX_ACTIVE_MLP_VER.MAX_VERSION_FOR_PARM}
    field MAX_VERSION_FOR_PARM
        datatype TEXT(10);

    {MAX_ACTIVE_MLP_VER.MAX_EXT_VERSION}
    field MAX_EXT_VERSION
        datatype INTEGER;

    {MAX_ACTIVE_MLP_VER.MAX_EXT_VERSION_FOR_PARM}
    field MAX_EXT_VERSION_FOR_PARM
        datatype TEXT(10);

    select_clause
        select M1.[IDENTITY], max(M1.PRODUCT_VERSION), ltrim(MAX (M1.PRODUCT_VERSION)),
        (select max(M2.PRODUCT_VERSION)
        from MLP_HEADER M2
        where M2.[IDENTITY] = M1.[IDENTITY] and M2.EXTERNAL_VERSION = 'T' and M2.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A'),
        (select ltrim(MAX (M2.PRODUCT_VERSION))
        from MLP_HEADER M2
        where M2.[IDENTITY] = M1.[IDENTITY] and M2.EXTERNAL_VERSION = 'T' and M2.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A')
        from MLP_HEADER M1
        where M1.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A' and M1.REMOVEFLAG <> 'T' GROUP BY M1.[IDENTITY];

    view MAX_MLP_VERSION
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {MAX_MLP_VERSION.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MAX_MLP_VERSION.MAX_VERSION}
    field MAX_VERSION
        datatype INTEGER;

    {MAX_MLP_VERSION.MAX_VERSION_FOR_PARM}
    field MAX_VERSION_FOR_PARM
        datatype TEXT(10);

    select_clause
        select [IDENTITY], max(PRODUCT_VERSION), ltrim(MAX (PRODUCT_VERSION))
        from MLP_HEADER GROUP BY [IDENTITY];

    {Custom} 
    view MAX_MATMAS
        on_table SAP_MATMAS;

    {Custom} 
    {MAX_MATMAS.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {Custom} 
    {MAX_MATMAS.UNIQUEID}
    field UNIQUEID
        links_to SAP_MATMAS.UNIQUEID;

    {Custom} 
    select_clause
        SELECT 
            GIN, 
            MAX(UNIQUEID)
        FROM SAP_MATMAS
        GROUP BY GIN;

    view PROD_LABEL_VIEW
        on_table JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE, PROD_SCHED, MAX_ACTIVE_MLP_VER, SAMPLE_POINT, MLP_HEADER, COUNTER;

    {PROD_LABEL_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME;

    {PROD_LABEL_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.DESCRIPTION;

    {PROD_LABEL_VIEW.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME;

    {PROD_LABEL_VIEW.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME;

    {PROD_LABEL_VIEW.PRODUCT_CODE}
    field PRODUCT_CODE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_CODE;

    {PROD_LABEL_VIEW.VOLUME}
    field VOLUME
        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.VOLUME;

    {PROD_LABEL_VIEW.DELIV_LOCATION}
    field DELIV_LOCATION
        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.DELIV_LOCATION;

    {PROD_LABEL_VIEW.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.IDENTITY;

    {PROD_LABEL_VIEW.POINT_LOCATION}
    field POINT_LOCATION
        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.POINT_LOCATION;

    {PROD_LABEL_VIEW.SAMPLE}
    field SAMPLE
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {PROD_LABEL_VIEW.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {PROD_LABEL_VIEW.LABEL_COUNT}
    field LABEL_COUNT
        links_to COUNTER.VALUE;

    select_clause
        SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT
            *
        FROM (
        SELECT DISTINCT
            J.JOB_NAME
            ,SP.DESCRIPTION
            ,J.PRODUCT_NAME
            ,J.BATCH_NAME
            ,CASE
                WHEN M.PRODUCT_CODE <> '' THEN m.PRODUCT_CODE
                ELSE m.DESCRIPTION
             END PRODUCT_CODE
            ,SP.VOLUME
            ,SP.DELIV_LOCATION
            ,SP.[IDENTITY] AS SAMPLING_POINT
            ,SP.POINT_LOCATION AS POINT_LOCATION
            ,S.ID_NUMERIC AS SAMPLE
            ,S.ID_TEXT
            ,CASE
                WHEN p.LABEL_COUNT IS NULL THEN c1.VALUE
                ELSE c2.VALUE
            END AS LABEL_COUNT
        FROM JOB_HEADER J
        INNER JOIN SAMPLE S
            ON j.JOB_NAME = s.JOB_NAME
        INNER JOIN SAMPLE_POINT SP
            ON s.SAMPLING_POINT = sp.[IDENTITY]
        INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER M
            ON S.PRODUCT = M.[IDENTITY]
            AND S.PRODUCT_VERSION = M.PRODUCT_VERSION
        LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD_SCHED p
            ON m.[IDENTITY] = p.PRODUCT_NAME
            AND m.PRODUCT_VERSION = p.PRODUCT_VERSION
            AND s.SAMPLING_POINT = p.SAMPLING_POINT
        INNER JOIN COUNTER C1
            ON C1.VALUE <= SP.LABEL_COUNT
        LEFT OUTER JOIN COUNTER C2
            ON C2.VALUE <= P.LABEL_COUNT        
        UNION 
            SELECT
                J.JOB_NAME
                ,SP.DESCRIPTION
                ,J.PRODUCT_NAME
                ,J.BATCH_NAME
            ,CASE
                WHEN M.PRODUCT_CODE <> '' THEN m.PRODUCT_CODE
                ELSE m.DESCRIPTION
             END
                ,SP.VOLUME
                ,SP.DELIV_LOCATION
                ,SP.[IDENTITY] AS SAMPLING_POINT
                ,SP.POINT_LOCATION AS POINT_LOCATION
                ,'' AS SAMPLE
                ,'' AS ID_TEXT
                ,c.VALUE AS LABEL_COUNT
            FROM JOB_HEADER J
            INNER JOIN MAX_ACTIVE_MLP_VER v
                ON j.PRODUCT_NAME = v.[IDENTITY]
            INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER m
                ON v.[IDENTITY] = m.[IDENTITY]
                AND v.MAX_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION
            INNER JOIN PROD_SCHED p
                ON m.[IDENTITY] = p.PRODUCT_NAME
                AND m.PRODUCT_VERSION = p.PRODUCT_VERSION
                AND j.LOGIN_PLANT = p.GROUP_ID
                AND p.SAMPLING_POINT NOT IN (SELECT S2.SAMPLING_POINT
                    FROM SAMPLE S2
                    WHERE S2.JOB_NAME = J.JOB_NAME)
            INNER JOIN SAMPLE_POINT sp
                ON p.SAMPLING_POINT = sp.[IDENTITY]
            INNER JOIN COUNTER c
                ON c.VALUE <= p.LABEL_COUNT 
        ) PLV
        ORDER BY PLV.JOB_NAME, plv.SAMPLE, plv.LABEL_COUNT;

    {Custom} 
    view MLP_RECENT_VERSIONS
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {Custom}
