        datatype DATE;


    {Custom} 
    select_clause
        SELECT
            M.[IDENTITY]
            ,M.PRODUCT_CODE
            ,M.ENTRY_CODE
            ,M.PRODUCT_GROUP
            ,M.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP
            ,M.DESCRIPTION
            ,M.TEST_SCHEDULE
            ,M.PRODUCT_STATUS
            ,M.MODIFIED_ON
            ,M.MODIFIED_BY
            ,M.MODIFIABLE
            ,M.REMOVEFLAG
            ,M.GROUP_ID
            ,M.WARN_MSG
            ,M.SAMPLE_TYPE
            ,M.CONVERTED_DATE
            ,M.CONVERTED_BY
            ,M.QC_NUMBER
            ,M.QC_DATE
            ,M.QS_NUMBER
            ,M.QS_DATE
            ,M.QCQS_COMMENT
            ,M.MPS_TEMPLATE
            ,M.CULTURE_GROUP
            ,M.DISP_RESP
            ,M.AMOUNT_01
            ,M.MASTER_PLANT
            ,M.MPS_EXPORT
            ,M.ALLOW_AGREE
            ,M.CERT_TYPE
            ,M.SAP_CERT
            ,M.PRODUCT_VERSION
            ,M.VERSION_COMMENT
            ,M.VERSION_STATUS
            ,M.CREATED_DATE
            ,M.APPROVAL_REQD
            ,M.APPROVAL_STATUS
            ,M.INSPECTION_PLAN
            ,M.EXTERNAL_VERSION
            ,M.DO_SPLAN_LOGIN
            ,M.PROJECT_ID
            ,M.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP
            ,M.MATERIAL_TYPE
            ,M.SOS_GROUP
            ,M.SAP_UNIQUEID
            ,M.SAP_MASTERSTATUS
            ,M.GMP_STATUS
            ,M.PRODUCTAREA
            ,M.PRODUCTSEGMENT
            ,M.PRODUCTCLUSTER
            ,M.PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER
            ,M.PRODHIERAKEYNAME
            ,M.MATGROUPDESC
            ,M.PRODUCT_FORM
            ,M.PRODUCT_FORMAT
            ,M.PRODUCT_IDENTIFICATION
            ,M.APPR_DATE
        FROM MLP_HEADER M
        INNER JOIN (
            SELECT
                M.[IDENTITY]
                ,M.PRODUCT_VERSION
            FROM MLP_HEADER M
            INNER JOIN MAX_ACTIVE_MLP_VER V1
                ON M.[IDENTITY] = V1.[IDENTITY]
                AND M.PRODUCT_VERSION = V1.MAX_VERSION 
            UNION
            SELECT
                M.[IDENTITY]
                ,M.PRODUCT_VERSION
            FROM MLP_HEADER M
            INNER JOIN MAX_MLP_VERSION V1
                ON M.[IDENTITY] = V1.[IDENTITY]
                AND M.PRODUCT_VERSION = V1.MAX_VERSION) V
            ON m.[IDENTITY] = v.[IDENTITY]
            AND m.PRODUCT_VERSION = v.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    view ANA_RECENT_VERSIONS {alias ANALYSIS_VIEW }       on_table VERSIONED_ANALYSIS;

    field IDENTITY         alias IDENTIFIER           links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY          used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION          used_for UNIQUE_KEY, VERSION_NUMBER, DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);
    field REMOVEFLAG         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.REMOVEFLAG;
    field GROUP_ID         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.GROUP_ID;
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE          used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(5);
    field DESCRIPTION         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION          used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);
    field INSTTYPE_ID         datatype IDENTITY(17);
    field PREPARATION_ID         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.PREPARATION_ID;
    field EXPECTED_TIME         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.EXPECTED_TIME;
    field CHARGECODE         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CHARGECODE;
    field RESULT_SCREEN         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.RESULT_SCREEN;
    field MODIFIED_ON         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIED_ON;
    field MODIFIED_BY         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIED_BY;
    field MODIFIABLE         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIABLE;
    field CALCULATION         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION;
    field REPLICATES         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.REPLICATES;
    field ACCESS_FLAGS         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ACCESS_FLAGS;
    field COMP_REPLICATES         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COMP_REPLICATES;
    field GENERIC_ANALYSIS         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.GENERIC_ANALYSIS;
    field APPROVAL_REQD         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.APPROVAL_REQD;
    field ALLOW_CATEGORY         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ALLOW_CATEGORY;
    field EXINSTTYPE         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.EXINSTTYPE;
    field CONVERTED_DATE         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CONVERTED_DATE;
    field CONVERTED_BY         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CONVERTED_BY;
    field QAP_NUMBER         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAP_NUMBER;
    field QAP_DATE         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAP_DATE;
    field QAP_COMMENT         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAP_COMMENT          used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(4);
    field INOC_TEMP         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INOC_TEMP;
    field COA_GROUP         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COA_GROUP;
    field CONDITIONS         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CONDITIONS;
    field MEDIA_01         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MEDIA_01;
    field QAM_NUMBER         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAM_NUMBER;
    field Q_INSTRUCTION         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.Q_INSTRUCTION;
    field Q_METHOD         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.Q_METHOD;
    field APPROVAL_STATUS         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.APPROVAL_STATUS          used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);
    field INSPECTION_PLAN         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INSPECTION_PLAN;
    field SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE;
    field AUTO_VALIDATE         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.AUTO_VALIDATE;
    field ALLOW_RES_IMPORT         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ALLOW_RES_IMPORT;
    field RDA_AVAILABLE         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.RDA_AVAILABLE;
    field CALC         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALC;
    field CDOC_METHOD         links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CDOC_METHOD;

    select_clause               
        SELECT

        A.[IDENTITY]
        ,A.ANALYSIS_VERSION
        ,A.REMOVEFLAG
        ,A.GROUP_ID
        ,A.ANALYSIS_TYPE
        ,A.DESCRIPTION
        ,A.INSTTYPE_ID
        ,A.PREPARATION_ID
        ,A.EXPECTED_TIME
        ,A.CHARGECODE
        ,A.RESULT_SCREEN
        ,A.MODIFIED_ON
        ,A.MODIFIED_BY
        ,A.MODIFIABLE
        ,A.CALCULATION
        ,A.REPLICATES
        ,A.ACCESS_FLAGS
        ,A.COMP_REPLICATES
        ,A.GENERIC_ANALYSIS
        ,A.APPROVAL_REQD
        ,A.ALLOW_CATEGORY
        ,A.EXINSTTYPE
        ,A.CONVERTED_DATE
        ,A.CONVERTED_BY
        ,A.QAP_NUMBER
        ,A.QAP_DATE
        ,A.QAP_COMMENT
        ,A.INOC_TEMP
        ,A.COA_GROUP
        ,A.CONDITIONS
        ,A.MEDIA_01
        ,A.QAM_NUMBER
        ,A.Q_INSTRUCTION
        ,A.Q_METHOD
        ,A.APPROVAL_STATUS
        ,A.INSPECTION_PLAN
        ,A.SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE
        ,A.AUTO_VALIDATE
        ,A.ALLOW_RES_IMPORT
        ,A.RDA_AVAILABLE
        ,A.CALC
        ,A.CDOC_METHOD

        FROM VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A
        WHERE ANALYSIS_VERSION = (SELECT MAX(ANALYSIS_VERSION)
                                    FROM VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A2
                                    WHERE A2.[IDENTITY] = A.[IDENTITY]
                                    AND A2.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A'
                                    AND A2.ACTIVE = 'T'
                                    AND A2.REMOVEFLAG = 'F')
           OR ANALYSIS_VERSION = (SELECT MAX(ANALYSIS_VERSION)
                                    FROM VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A2
                                    WHERE A2.[IDENTITY] = A.[IDENTITY]
                                    AND A2.ACTIVE = 'T'
                                    AND A2.REMOVEFLAG = 'F');

    view MAX_STD_VERSION
        on_table STANDARD_VERSIONS;

    {MAX_STD_VERSION.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MAX_STD_VERSION.MAX_VERSION}
    field MAX_VERSION
        datatype INTEGER;

    {MAX_STD_VERSION.MAX_VERSION_FOR_PARM}
    field MAX_VERSION_FOR_PARM
        datatype TEXT(10);

    select_clause
        select [IDENTITY], max(VERSION), ltrim(MAX (VERSION))
        from STANDARD_VERSIONS GROUP BY [IDENTITY];

    view MAX_ACTIVE_STD_VER
        on_table STANDARD_VERSIONS;

    {MAX_ACTIVE_STD_VER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MAX_ACTIVE_STD_VER.MAX_VERSION}
    field MAX_VERSION
        datatype INTEGER;

    {MAX_ACTIVE_STD_VER.MAX_VERSION_FOR_PARM}
    field MAX_VERSION_FOR_PARM
        datatype TEXT(10);

    select_clause
        select [IDENTITY], max(VERSION), ltrim(MAX (VERSION))
        from STANDARD_VERSIONS
        where STATUS = 'A' GROUP BY [IDENTITY];

    view DATE_RES_REQ
        on_table JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE, MLP_HEADER;

    {DATE_RES_REQ.LOGIN_PLANT}
    field LOGIN_PLANT
        links_to JOB_HEADER.LOGIN_PLANT;

    {DATE_RES_REQ.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME;

    {DATE_RES_REQ.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME;

    {DATE_RES_REQ.DATERESREQ}
    field DATERESREQ
        links_to SAMPLE.DATERESREQ;

    select_clause
        select distinct JH.LOGIN_PLANT, JH.PRODUCT_NAME, JH.BATCH_NAME, case when (JH.DATE_EXP > CAST (S.DATERESREQ AS DATETIME))then JH.DATE_EXP else S.DATERESREQ end AS DATERESREQ
        from JOB_HEADER JH, SAMPLE S, MLP_HEADER MH
        where MH.[IDENTITY] = JH.PRODUCT_NAME and JH.JOB_NAME = S.JOB_NAME and JH.JOB_STATUS IN ('U', 'V', 'C')and S.STATUS IN ('V', 'C')and S.DATERESREQ =
        (select max (S2.DATERESREQ)
        from SAMPLE S2
        where S2.JOB_NAME = S.JOB_NAME)and S.DATERESREQ > GETDATE ();

    view RES_W_STD
        on_table SAMPLE, TEST, RESULT;

    {RES_W_STD.SAMPLE_JOB_NAME}
    field SAMPLE_JOB_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.JOB_NAME;

    {RES_W_STD.SAMPLE_PRODUCT}
    field SAMPLE_PRODUCT
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT;

    {RES_W_STD.SAMPLE_PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field SAMPLE_PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {RES_W_STD.SAMPLE_GROUP_ID}
    field SAMPLE_GROUP_ID
        links_to SAMPLE.GROUP_ID;

    {RES_W_STD.SAMPLE_DATE_STARTED}
    field SAMPLE_DATE_STARTED
        links_to SAMPLE.DATE_STARTED;

    {RES_W_STD.WORKSHEET}
    field WORKSHEET
        links_to TEST.WORKSHEET;

    {RES_W_STD.SAMPLE_ID_TEXT}
    field SAMPLE_ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {RES_W_STD.SAMPLE_ID_NUMERIC}
    field SAMPLE_ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {RES_W_STD.ANALYSIS_NAME}
    field ANALYSIS_NAME
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS;

    {RES_W_STD.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {RES_W_STD.SAMPLE_RESULT_VALUE}
    field SAMPLE_RESULT_VALUE
        links_to RESULT.VALUE;

    {RES_W_STD.STANDARD_RESULT_VALUE}
    field STANDARD_RESULT_VALUE
        links_to RESULT.VALUE;

    {RES_W_STD.SAMPLE_RESULT_TEXT}
    field SAMPLE_RESULT_TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {RES_W_STD.STANDARD_RESULT_TEXT}
    field STANDARD_RESULT_TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {RES_W_STD.STANDARD_PRODUCT}
    field STANDARD_PRODUCT
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT;

    {RES_W_STD.STANDARD_PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field STANDARD_PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {RES_W_STD.SAMPLE_TEST_NUMBER}
    field SAMPLE_TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {RES_W_STD.STANDARD_TEST_NUMBER}
    field STANDARD_TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {RES_W_STD.SAMPLE_TEST_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_TEST_STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS;

    {RES_W_STD.STANDARD_TEST_STATUS}
    field STANDARD_TEST_STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS;

    {RES_W_STD.COUNT_OF_SAMPLE}
    field COUNT_OF_SAMPLE
        datatype INTEGER;

    {RES_W_STD.COUNT_OF_STANDARD}
    field COUNT_OF_STANDARD
        datatype INTEGER;

    select_clause
        select S1.JOB_NAME, S1.PRODUCT, S1.PRODUCT_VERSION, S1.GROUP_ID, S1.DATE_STARTED, T1.WORKSHEET, S1.ID_TEXT, S1.ID_NUMERIC, T1.ANALYSIS, R1.NAME, R1.VALUE, R2.VALUE, R1.TEXT, R2.TEXT, S2.PRODUCT, S2.PRODUCT_VERSION, T1.TEST_NUMBER, T2.TEST_NUMBER, T1.STATUS, T2.STATUS, 1, 1
        from ALL_RESULT R1, ALL_RESULT R2, ALL_TEST T1, ALL_TEST T2, ALL_SAMPLE S1, ALL_SAMPLE S2
        where S1.STANDARD = 'F' and S1.ID_NUMERIC = T1.SAMPLE and ltrim(T1.WORKSHEET)<> '0' and T1.TEST_NUMBER = R1.TEST_NUMBER and T1.STATUS IN ('A', 'C')and S2.STANDARD = 'T' and S2.ID_NUMERIC = T2.SAMPLE and ltrim(T1.WORKSHEET)<> '0' and T2.TEST_NUMBER = R2.TEST_NUMBER and T2.STATUS IN ('A', 'C')and T1.WORKSHEET = T2.WORKSHEET and T1.ANALYSIS = T2.ANALYSIS and R1.NAME = R2.NAME;

    view MPS_STATUS_VIEW
        on_table JOB_HEADER;

    {MPS_STATUS_VIEW.LOGIN_PLANT}
    field LOGIN_PLANT
        links_to JOB_HEADER.LOGIN_PLANT;

    {MPS_STATUS_VIEW.WORK_CENTER}
    field WORK_CENTER
        links_to JOB_HEADER.WORK_CENTER;

    {MPS_STATUS_VIEW.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME;

    {MPS_STATUS_VIEW.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME;

    {MPS_STATUS_VIEW.MPS_STATUS}
    field MPS_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.MPS_STATUS;

    {MPS_STATUS_VIEW.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {MPS_STATUS_VIEW.INSPECTION_LOT}
    field INSPECTION_LOT
        links_to JOB_HEADER.INSPECTION_LOT;

    {MPS_STATUS_VIEW.INSPECTION_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_TYPE
        links_to JOB_HEADER.INSPECTION_TYPE;

    select_clause
        select LOGIN_PLANT, WORK_CENTER, PRODUCT_NAME, BATCH_NAME, MPS_STATUS, JOB_STATUS, INSPECTION_LOT, INSPECTION_TYPE
        from JOB_HEADER JH, MLP_HEADER MH
        where ltrim(MPS_STATUS)is not null and JOB_STATUS = 'A' and DATE_AUTHORISED > GETDATE ()- 4 and MH.[IDENTITY] = JH.PRODUCT_NAME and MH.PRODUCT_VERSION =
        (select min(PRODUCT_VERSION)
        from SAMPLE S
        where S.JOB_NAME = JH.JOB_NAME and S.PRODUCT_VERSION > ' 0')and INSPECTION_TYPE not LIKE '09%' and JH.JOB_NAME LIKE JH.PRODUCT_NAME + '%' union
        select LOGIN_PLANT, WORK_CENTER, PRODUCT_NAME, BATCH_NAME, MPS_STATUS, JOB_STATUS, INSPECTION_LOT, INSPECTION_TYPE
        from JOB_HEADER JH, MLP_HEADER MH
        where ltrim(MPS_STATUS)is not null and JOB_STATUS <> 'A' and MH.[IDENTITY] = JH.PRODUCT_NAME and MH.PRODUCT_VERSION =
        (select min(PRODUCT_VERSION)
        from SAMPLE S
        where S.JOB_NAME = JH.JOB_NAME and S.PRODUCT_VERSION > ' 0')and INSPECTION_TYPE not LIKE '09%' and JH.JOB_NAME LIKE JH.PRODUCT_NAME + '%' union
        select S.LOGIN_PLANT, JH.WORK_CENTER, S.PRODUCT, S.BATCH_NAME, JH.MPS_STATUS, JH.JOB_STATUS, S.INSPECTION_LOT, S.INSPECTION_TYPE
        from JOB_HEADER JH, MLP_HEADER MH, SAMPLE S
        where ltrim(JH.MPS_STATUS)is not null and S.DATE_AUTHORISED > GETDATE ()- 4 and MH.[IDENTITY] = JH.PRODUCT_NAME and JH.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT and MH.PRODUCT_VERSION = S.PRODUCT_VERSION and JH.BATCH_NAME = S.BATCH_NAME and S.INSPECTION_TYPE LIKE '09%' and JH.JOB_NAME LIKE JH.PRODUCT_NAME + '%' union
        select S.LOGIN_PLANT, JH.WORK_CENTER, S.PRODUCT, S.BATCH_NAME, JH.MPS_STATUS, JH.JOB_STATUS, S.INSPECTION_LOT, S.INSPECTION_TYPE
        from C_JOB_HEADER JH, MLP_HEADER MH, SAMPLE S
        where ltrim(JH.MPS_STATUS)is not null and S.DATE_AUTHORISED > GETDATE ()- 4 and MH.[IDENTITY] = JH.PRODUCT_NAME and JH.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT and MH.PRODUCT_VERSION = S.PRODUCT_VERSION and JH.BATCH_NAME = S.BATCH_NAME and S.INSPECTION_TYPE LIKE '09%' and JH.JOB_NAME LIKE JH.PRODUCT_NAME + '%';

    view MPS_RESULT_EXPORT
        on_table JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE, TEST, RESULT, PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS, PARM_SETUP_VALUES;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.LOGIN_PLANT}
    field LOGIN_PLANT
        links_to SAMPLE.LOGIN_PLANT;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.SAP_CHARACTERISTIC}
    field SAP_CHARACTERISTIC
        links_to PARM_SETUP_VALUES.VAL2;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.RESULT_TEXT}
    field RESULT_TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.RESULT_NUMERIC}
    field RESULT_NUMERIC
        links_to RESULT.VALUE;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.UNIT}
    field UNIT
        links_to RESULT.UNITS;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.ANALYSIS_NAME}
    field ANALYSIS_NAME
        links_to PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS.FIELD_NAME;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to PARM_SETUP_VALUES.VAL1;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.OUT_OF_RANGE}
    field OUT_OF_RANGE
        links_to RESULT.OUT_OF_RANGE;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.SAMPLE_COMMENT}
    field SAMPLE_COMMENT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLE_COMMENT;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.DATE_JOB_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_JOB_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.DATE_SAMPLE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_SAMPLE_AUTHORISED
        links_to SAMPLE.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.INSPECTION_LOT}
    field INSPECTION_LOT
        links_to SAMPLE.INSPECTION_LOT;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.INSPECTION_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_TYPE
        links_to SAMPLE.INSPECTION_TYPE;

    {MPS_RESULT_EXPORT.TESTMIX_ID}
    field TESTMIX_ID
        links_to SAMPLE.TESTMIX_ID;

    select_clause
        select S.LOGIN_PLANT, S.PRODUCT, S.BATCH_NAME, UPPER (PV.VAL2), UPPER (R.TEXT), R.VALUE, R.UNITS, S.PRODUCT_VERSION, S.ID_NUMERIC, S.SAMPLING_POINT, T.TEST_NUMBER, PF.FIELD_NAME, T.TEST_COUNT, PV.VAL1, R.OUT_OF_RANGE, J.JOB_STATUS, S.SAMPLE_COMMENT, S.STATUS, T.STATUS, J.DATE_AUTHORISED, S.DATE_AUTHORISED, S.INSPECTION_LOT, S.INSPECTION_TYPE, S.TESTMIX_ID
        from PARM_SETUP_VALUES PV, PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS PF, PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS PF2, RESULT R, TEST T, SAMPLE S, JOB_HEADER J, MLP_HEADER MH, SAMPLE_POINT SP
        where MH.[IDENTITY] = S.PRODUCT and MH.PRODUCT_VERSION = S.PRODUCT_VERSION and S.DATE_AUTHORISED > DATEADD (D, - 4, GETDATE ())and PV.PARM_ID = 'SAP_CHARAC' and PV.[IDENTITY] = PF.[IDENTITY] and PF.PARM_TYPE = 'A' and PF2.PARM_TYPE = 'A' and PF.[IDENTITY] = PF2.[IDENTITY] and PF2.FIELD_NAME = ltrim(T.ANALYSIS_VERSION)and PF2.ORDER_NUM = ' 2' and PF.ORDER_NUM = ' 1' and R.NAME = PV.VAL1 COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS and R.TEST_NUMBER = T.TEST_NUMBER and T.ANALYSIS = PF.FIELD_NAME and T.SAMPLE = S.ID_NUMERIC and S.STATUS = 'A' and S.JOB_NAME = J.JOB_NAME and S.SAMPLING_POINT = SP.[IDENTITY] and SP.MPS_EXPORT = 'T' and T.TEST_NUMBER =
        (select max(T2.TEST_NUMBER)
        from TEST T2
        where T2.SAMPLE = T.SAMPLE and T2.ANALYSIS = T.ANALYSIS and T2.STATUS != 'X' and T2.STATUS != 'R')and not exists
        (select 1
        from NEW_TEST_REASONS N, TEST T3
        where N.TRIGGERING_TEST_NO = T.TEST_NUMBER and N.NEW_TEST_NO = T3.TEST_NUMBER and T3.STATUS != 'X' and T3.STATUS != 'R')and S.INSPECTION_TYPE not LIKE '09%'
        union all
        select S.LOGIN_PLANT, S.PRODUCT, S.BATCH_NAME, UPPER (PV.VAL2), UPPER (R.TEXT), R.VALUE, R.UNITS, S.PRODUCT_VERSION, S.ID_NUMERIC, S.SAMPLING_POINT, T.TEST_NUMBER, PF.FIELD_NAME, T.TEST_COUNT, PV.VAL1, R.OUT_OF_RANGE, NULL, S.SAMPLE_COMMENT, S.STATUS, T.STATUS, CAST (NULL AS DATETIME), S.DATE_AUTHORISED, S.INSPECTION_LOT, S.INSPECTION_TYPE, S.TESTMIX_ID
        from PARM_SETUP_VALUES PV, PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS PF, PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS PF2, RESULT R, TEST T, SAMPLE S, MLP_HEADER MH, SAMPLE_POINT SP
        where MH.[IDENTITY] = S.PRODUCT and MH.PRODUCT_VERSION = S.PRODUCT_VERSION and S.DATE_AUTHORISED > DATEADD (D, - 4, GETDATE ())and PV.PARM_ID = 'SAP_CHARAC' and PV.[IDENTITY] = PF.[IDENTITY] and PF.PARM_TYPE = 'A' and PF2.PARM_TYPE = 'A' and PF.[IDENTITY] = PF2.[IDENTITY] and PF2.FIELD_NAME = ltrim(T.ANALYSIS_VERSION)and PF2.ORDER_NUM = ' 2' and PF.ORDER_NUM = ' 1' and R.NAME = PV.VAL1 COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS and R.TEST_NUMBER = T.TEST_NUMBER and T.ANALYSIS = PF.FIELD_NAME and T.SAMPLE = S.ID_NUMERIC and S.STATUS = 'A' and S.SAMPLING_POINT = SP.[IDENTITY] and SP.MPS_EXPORT = 'T' and T.TEST_NUMBER =
        (select max(T2.TEST_NUMBER)
        from TEST T2
        where T2.SAMPLE = T.SAMPLE and T2.ANALYSIS = T.ANALYSIS and T2.STATUS != 'X' and T2.STATUS != 'R')and not exists
        (select 1
        from NEW_TEST_REASONS N, TEST T3
        where N.TRIGGERING_TEST_NO = T.TEST_NUMBER and N.NEW_TEST_NO = T3.TEST_NUMBER and T3.STATUS != 'X' and T3.STATUS != 'R')and S.INSPECTION_TYPE LIKE '09%';

    view PARAMETERS_VIEW
        on_table PARM_SETUP;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.PARM_TYPE}
    field PARM_TYPE
        links_to PARM_SETUP.PARM_TYPE;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.PRIMARY_KEY}
    field PRIMARY_KEY
        links_to PARM_SETUP.IDENTITY;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.SECONDARY_KEY}
    field SECONDARY_KEY
        links_to PARM_SETUP.IDENTITY_VERSION;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.PARM_ID}
    field PARM_ID
        links_to PARM_SETUP.PARM_ID;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.VAL1}
    field VAL1
        links_to PARM_SETUP.VAL1;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.VAL2}
    field VAL2
        links_to PARM_SETUP.VAL2;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.VAL3}
    field VAL3
        links_to PARM_SETUP.VAL3;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.VAL4}
    field VAL4
        links_to PARM_SETUP.VAL4;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.VAL5}
    field VAL5
        links_to PARM_SETUP.VAL5;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.VAL6}
    field VAL6
        links_to PARM_SETUP.VAL6;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.VAL7}
    field VAL7
        links_to PARM_SETUP.VAL7;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.VAL8}
    field VAL8
        links_to PARM_SETUP.VAL8;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.VAL9}
    field VAL9
        links_to PARM_SETUP.VAL9;

    {PARAMETERS_VIEW.VAL10}
    field VAL10
        links_to PARM_SETUP.VAL10;

    select_clause
        select P.PARM_TYPE, P.[IDENTITY] AS PRIMARY_KEY, rtrim(P.IDENTITY_VERSION)AS SECONDARY_KEY, P.PARM_ID, P.VAL1, P.VAL2, P.VAL3, P.VAL4, P.VAL5, P.VAL6, P.VAL7, P.VAL8, P.VAL9, P.VAL10
        from PARM_SETUP P;

    view LABLABELS_VIEW
        on_table SAMPLE, TEST, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, VERSIONED_COMPONENT;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype TEXT(60) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.SAMPLE_ID}
    field SAMPLE_ID
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.RECD_DATE}
    field RECD_DATE
        links_to SAMPLE.RECD_DATE;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.PRODUCT_ID}
    field PRODUCT_ID
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.JOB_NAME;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.DATE_EXP}
    field DATE_EXP
        links_to TEST.DATE_EXP;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.ANALYSIS_TYPE}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.ANALYSIS_DESCR}
    field ANALYSIS_DESCR
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.COA_GROUP}
    field COA_GROUP
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COA_GROUP;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.COA_AREA}
    field COA_AREA
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.LABEL_TEXT}
    field LABEL_TEXT
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.LABEL_TEXT;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.COMPONENT_TYPE}
    field COMPONENT_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.RESULT_TYPE;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.INCUBATION}
    field INCUBATION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.EXPECTED_TIME;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.CONDITION}
    field CONDITION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CONDITIONS;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.TEMPERATURE}
    field TEMPERATURE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INOC_TEMP;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.MEDIA}
    field MEDIA
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MEDIA_01;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.PRODUCT_CODE}
    field PRODUCT_CODE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_CODE;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.TESTMIX_ID}
    field TESTMIX_ID
        links_to SAMPLE.TESTMIX_ID;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.TEST_ON_SPEC}
    field TEST_ON_SPEC
        links_to TEST.ON_SPEC;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.LABEL_PRINTED}
    field LABEL_PRINTED
        links_to TEST.LABEL_PRINTED;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.PREPARATION_ID}
    field PREPARATION_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.PREPARATION_ID;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.TN_SELECT}
    field TN_SELECT
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {LABLABELS_VIEW.ENTITY}
    field ENTITY
        datatype TEXT(10);

    select_clause
        SELECT DISTINCT 
            L.[IDENTITY]
            ,L.ID_NUMERIC
            ,L.ID_TEXT
            ,L.RECD_DATE
            ,L.PRODUCT
            ,L.BATCH_NAME
            ,L.SAMPLING_POINT
            ,L.JOB_NAME
            ,L.DATE_EXP
            ,L.ANALYSIS
            ,L.ANALYSIS_VERSION
            ,L.ANALYSIS_TYPE
            ,L.DESCRIPTION
            ,L.COA_GROUP
            ,L.PHRASE_TEXT
            ,L.NAME
            ,L.ORDER_NUMBER
            ,L.LABEL_TEXT
            ,L.RESULT_TYPE 
            ,L.INCUBATION
            ,L.CONDITIONS
            ,L.INOC_TEMP
            ,L.MEDIA_01
            ,L.PRODUCT_CODE
            ,L.STATUS
            ,L.TESTMIX_ID
            ,L.ON_SPEC
            ,L.TEST_COUNT
            ,L.TEST_NUMBER
            ,L.LABEL_PRINTED
            ,L.PREPARATION_ID
            ,L.TN_SELECT
            ,l.ENTITY
        FROM (
            SELECT
                   LTRIM(S.ID_NUMERIC) ++ '-' ++ LTRIM(TEST_NUMBER) ++' -' + +RIGHT(ORDER_NUMBER, 3) + +': ' + +LABEL_TEXT 'IDENTITY'
                   ,S.ID_NUMERIC
                   ,S.ID_TEXT
                   ,S.RECD_DATE
                   ,S.PRODUCT
                   ,S.BATCH_NAME
                   ,S.SAMPLING_POINT
                   ,S.JOB_NAME
                   ,T.DATE_EXP
                   ,T.ANALYSIS
                   ,T.ANALYSIS_VERSION
                   ,A.ANALYSIS_TYPE
                   ,A.DESCRIPTION
                   ,A.COA_GROUP
                   ,P.PHRASE_TEXT
                   ,C.NAME
                   ,C.ORDER_NUMBER
                   ,C.LABEL_TEXT
                   ,C.RESULT_TYPE 
                   ,A.EXPECTED_TIME INCUBATION
                   ,A.CONDITIONS
                   ,A.INOC_TEMP
                   ,A.MEDIA_01
                   ,CASE
                        WHEN m.PRODUCT_CODE <> '' THEN m.PRODUCT_CODE
                        ELSE m.DESCRIPTION
                    END PRODUCT_CODE
                   ,T.STATUS
                   ,S.TESTMIX_ID
                   ,T.ON_SPEC
                   ,T.TEST_COUNT
                   ,T.TEST_NUMBER
                   ,T.LABEL_PRINTED
                   ,A.PREPARATION_ID
                   ,t.TEST_NUMBER TN_SELECT
                   ,'COMPONENT' ENTITY
                FROM SAMPLE S
                INNER JOIN TEST T
                    ON S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE
                INNER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A
                    ON T.ANALYSIS = A.[IDENTITY]
                    AND T.ANALYSIS_VERSION = A.ANALYSIS_VERSION
                INNER JOIN VERSIONED_COMPONENT C
                    ON A.[IDENTITY] = C.ANALYSIS
                    AND A.ANALYSIS_VERSION = C.ANALYSIS_VERSION
                    AND C.PRINT_LABEL = 'T'
                INNER JOIN PHRASE P
                    ON P.PHRASE_TYPE = 'COA_GROUP'
                    AND a.COA_GROUP = p.PHRASE_ID
                INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER m
                    ON s.PRODUCT = m.[IDENTITY]
                    AND s.PRODUCT_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION 
            UNION ALL 
                SELECT
                    LTRIM(S.ID_NUMERIC) ++ '-' ++ LTRIM(TEST_NUMBER)
                   ,S.ID_NUMERIC
                   ,S.ID_TEXT
                   ,S.RECD_DATE
                   ,S.PRODUCT
                   ,S.BATCH_NAME
                   ,S.SAMPLING_POINT
                   ,S.JOB_NAME
                   ,T.DATE_EXP
                   ,T.ANALYSIS
                   ,T.ANALYSIS_VERSION
                   ,A.ANALYSIS_TYPE
                   ,A.DESCRIPTION
                   ,A.COA_GROUP
                   ,P.PHRASE_TEXT
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,A.EXPECTED_TIME INCUBATION
                   ,A.CONDITIONS
                   ,A.INOC_TEMP
                   ,A.MEDIA_01
                   ,CASE
                        WHEN m.PRODUCT_CODE <> '' THEN m.PRODUCT_CODE
                        ELSE m.DESCRIPTION
                    END PRODUCT_CODE
                   ,T.STATUS
                   ,S.TESTMIX_ID
                   ,T.ON_SPEC
                   ,T.TEST_COUNT
                   ,T.TEST_NUMBER
                   ,T.LABEL_PRINTED
                   ,A.PREPARATION_ID
                   ,t.TEST_NUMBER
                   ,'TEST' ENTITY
                FROM SAMPLE S
                INNER JOIN TEST T
                    ON S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE
                INNER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A
                    ON T.ANALYSIS = A.[IDENTITY]
                    AND T.ANALYSIS_VERSION = A.ANALYSIS_VERSION
                INNER JOIN VERSIONED_COMPONENT C
                    ON A.[IDENTITY] = C.ANALYSIS
                    AND A.ANALYSIS_VERSION = C.ANALYSIS_VERSION
                    AND C.PRINT_LABEL = 'T'
                INNER JOIN PHRASE P
                    ON P.PHRASE_TYPE = 'COA_GROUP'
                    AND a.COA_GROUP = p.PHRASE_ID
                INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER m
                    ON s.PRODUCT = m.[IDENTITY]
                    AND s.PRODUCT_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION
            UNION ALL 
                SELECT DISTINCT
                    LTRIM(S.ID_NUMERIC)
                   ,S.ID_NUMERIC
                   ,S.ID_TEXT
                   ,S.RECD_DATE
                   ,S.PRODUCT
                   ,S.BATCH_NAME
                   ,S.SAMPLING_POINT
                   ,S.JOB_NAME
                   ,S.DATE_EXP
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,'        -1'
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,CASE
                        WHEN m.PRODUCT_CODE <> '' THEN m.PRODUCT_CODE
                        ELSE m.DESCRIPTION
                    END PRODUCT_CODE
                   ,''
                   ,S.TESTMIX_ID
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,''
                   ,t.TEST_NUMBER
                   ,'SAMPLE' ENTITY
                FROM SAMPLE S
                INNER JOIN TEST T
                    ON S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE
                INNER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A
                    ON T.ANALYSIS = A.[IDENTITY]
                    AND T.ANALYSIS_VERSION = A.ANALYSIS_VERSION
                INNER JOIN VERSIONED_COMPONENT C
                    ON A.[IDENTITY] = C.ANALYSIS
                    AND A.ANALYSIS_VERSION = C.ANALYSIS_VERSION
                    AND C.PRINT_LABEL = 'T'
                INNER JOIN PHRASE P
                    ON P.PHRASE_TYPE = 'COA_GROUP'
                    AND a.COA_GROUP = p.PHRASE_ID
                INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER m
                    ON s.PRODUCT = m.[IDENTITY]
                    AND s.PRODUCT_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION
                    ) L;

    view ERP_CERT
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {ERP_CERT.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {ERP_CERT.DOCUMENT_TYPE}
    field DOCUMENT_TYPE
        datatype TEXT(10);

    select_clause
        SELECT DISTINCT M.[IDENTITY], M.SAP_CERT
        FROM MLP_HEADER M
        INNER JOIN (SELECT
                m.[IDENTITY]
                ,MAX(m.PRODUCT_VERSION) PRODUCT_VERSION
            FROM MLP_HEADER m
            WHERE m.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A'
            AND (m.REMOVEFLAG = 'F'
            OR m.MODIFIED_ON > GETDATE() - 730)
            GROUP BY m.[IDENTITY]) v
            ON m.[IDENTITY] = v.[IDENTITY]
            AND m.PRODUCT_VERSION = v.PRODUCT_VERSION
        INNER JOIN MLP_LIMITS_VIEW l
            ON l.PRODUCT_ID = m.[IDENTITY]
            AND l.PRODUCT_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION
            AND l.LEVEL_ID = 'EXTERNAL'
        WHERE ISNUMERIC(M.[IDENTITY]) = 1
        AND M.[IDENTITY] < 999000;

        
    view EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS.MLP_VERSION}
    field MLP_VERSION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS.EXTERNAL_VERSION}
    field EXTERNAL_VERSION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.EXTERNAL_VERSION;

    {EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS.EXTERNAL_NUMBER}
    field EXTERNAL_NUMBER
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS.EXTERNAL_DATE}
    field EXTERNAL_DATE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.CREATED_DATE;

    select_clause
        select MV1.[IDENTITY], MV1.PRODUCT_VERSION, MV1.EXTERNAL_VERSION, MV2.PRODUCT_VERSION, MV2.CREATED_DATE
        from MLP_HEADER MV1, MLP_HEADER MV2
        where MV1.[IDENTITY] = MV2.[IDENTITY] and MV2.PRODUCT_VERSION =
        (select max(MV3.PRODUCT_VERSION)
        from MLP_HEADER MV3
        where MV3.[IDENTITY] = MV2.[IDENTITY] and MV3.EXTERNAL_VERSION = MV2.EXTERNAL_VERSION and MV3.PRODUCT_VERSION <= MV1.PRODUCT_VERSION)and MV2.EXTERNAL_VERSION = 'T';

    view MPS_BATCH_TEXT
        on_table JOB_HEADER;

    {MPS_BATCH_TEXT.LOGIN_PLANT}
    field LOGIN_PLANT
        links_to JOB_HEADER.LOGIN_PLANT;

    {MPS_BATCH_TEXT.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME;

    {MPS_BATCH_TEXT.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME;

    {MPS_BATCH_TEXT.AUTHORISATION_NOTES}
    field AUTHORISATION_NOTES
        links_to JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISATION_NOTES;

    {MPS_BATCH_TEXT.INSPECTION_LOT}
    field INSPECTION_LOT
        links_to JOB_HEADER.INSPECTION_LOT;

    {MPS_BATCH_TEXT.INSPECTION_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_TYPE
        links_to JOB_HEADER.INSPECTION_TYPE;

    select_clause
        select J.LOGIN_PLANT, J.PRODUCT_NAME, J.BATCH_NAME, J.AUTHORISATION_NOTES, J.INSPECTION_LOT, J.INSPECTION_TYPE
        from JOB_HEADER J, MLP_HEADER MH
        where MH.[IDENTITY] = J.PRODUCT_NAME and MH.PRODUCT_VERSION =
        (select min(PRODUCT_VERSION)
        from SAMPLE S
        where S.JOB_NAME = J.JOB_NAME and S.PRODUCT_VERSION > ' 0')and J.DATE_AUTHORISED > GETDATE ()- 4 and ltrim (RTRIM (J.AUTHORISATION_NOTES))is not null;

    view C_SAMP_TEST_RESULT PARENT_VIEW SAMP_TEST_RESULT tableset COMMITTED;

        from C_SAMP_TEST_RESULT;

        datatype BOOLEAN;

        datatype TEXT (1) 
        prompt_type 
        choose choose_type TEST_STAT;

    field RESULT_VALUE
        datatype REAL;

    field UNITS
        datatype TEXT(10);

    {SQCWIN_ALL_SAMP_TEST_RESULT.MINIMUM}
    field MINIMUM
        datatype REAL;

    {SQCWIN_ALL_SAMP_TEST_RESULT.MAXIMUM}
    field MAXIMUM
        datatype REAL;

    {SQCWIN_ALL_SAMP_TEST_RESULT.OUT_OF_RANGE}
    field OUT_OF_RANGE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {SQCWIN_ALL_SAMP_TEST_RESULT.DATE_RESULT_ENTERED}
    field DATE_RESULT_ENTERED
        datatype DATE;

    {SQCWIN_ALL_SAMP_TEST_RESULT.RESULT_ENTERED_BY}
    field RESULT_ENTERED_BY
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {SQCWIN_ALL_SAMP_TEST_RESULT.DATE_RESULT_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_RESULT_AUTHORISED
        datatype DATE;

    {SQCWIN_ALL_SAMP_TEST_RESULT.RESULT_AUTHORISER}
    field RESULT_AUTHORISER
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {SQCWIN_ALL_SAMP_TEST_RESULT.REPLICATE_TEST}
    field REPLICATE_TEST
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {SQCWIN_ALL_SAMP_TEST_RESULT.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        datatype INTEGER;

    select_clause
        select ID_NUMERIC, TEST_NUMBER, COMPONENT_NAME, JOB_NAME, ID_TEXT, STATUS, SAMPLE_OLD_STATUS, COMPARED, ON_SPEC, RE_SAMPLED, ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, LINK_NUMBER, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_BY, SAMPLED_DATE, RECD_DATE, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATERESREQ, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATERESAVAIL, SAMPLE_DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, GRADE_CODE, TESTS_TO_DO, ON_WKS, PROJECT_ID, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PREPARATION, HAZARD, PRIORITY, LOCATION_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, TEST_SCHEDULE, TEMPLATE_ID, COMP_PROD_NAME, COMP_PROD_VER, COMP_PROD_GRADE, STANDARD, ANALYSIS, TEST_STATUS, INSTRUMENT, RESULT_TYPE, RESULT_STATUS, RESULT_TEXT, RESULT_VALUE, UNITS, MINIMUM, MAXIMUM, OUT_OF_RANGE, DATE_RESULT_ENTERED, RESULT_ENTERED_BY, DATE_RESULT_AUTHORISED, RESULT_AUTHORISER, REPLICATE_TEST, TEST_COUNT
        from SAMP_TEST_RESULT union
        select ID_NUMERIC, TEST_NUMBER, COMPONENT_NAME, JOB_NAME, ID_TEXT, STATUS, SAMPLE_OLD_STATUS, COMPARED, ON_SPEC, RE_SAMPLED, ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, LINK_NUMBER, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_BY, SAMPLED_DATE, RECD_DATE, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATERESREQ, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATERESAVAIL, SAMPLE_DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, GRADE_CODE, TESTS_TO_DO, ON_WKS, PROJECT_ID, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PREPARATION, HAZARD, PRIORITY, LOCATION_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, TEST_SCHEDULE, TEMPLATE_ID, COMP_PROD_NAME, COMP_PROD_VER, COMP_PROD_GRADE, STANDARD, ANALYSIS, TEST_STATUS, INSTRUMENT, RESULT_TYPE, RESULT_STATUS, RESULT_TEXT, RESULT_VALUE, UNITS, MINIMUM, MAXIMUM, OUT_OF_RANGE, DATE_RESULT_ENTERED, RESULT_ENTERED_BY, DATE_RESULT_AUTHORISED, RESULT_AUTHORISER, REPLICATE_TEST, TEST_COUNT
        from SQCWIN_C_SAMP_TEST_RESULT;

    view INVENTORY_ALLOCATION_VIEW
        on_table INVENTORY_ALLOCATION, INVENTORY_ALLOC_ITEM;

    {INVENTORY_ALLOCATION_VIEW.INVENTORY_ID}
    field INVENTORY_ID
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOCATION.INVENTORY_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {INVENTORY_ALLOCATION_VIEW.ENTRY_NUMBER}
    field ENTRY_NUMBER
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOCATION.ENTRY_NUMBER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {INVENTORY_ALLOCATION_VIEW.ITEM_ID}
    field ITEM_ID
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOC_ITEM.ITEM_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {INVENTORY_ALLOCATION_VIEW.ALLOCATED_ON}
    field ALLOCATED_ON
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOCATION.ALLOCATED_ON 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {INVENTORY_ALLOCATION_VIEW.ALLOCATED_BY}
    field ALLOCATED_BY
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOCATION.ALLOCATED_BY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(4);

    {INVENTORY_ALLOCATION_VIEW.PURPOSE}
    field PURPOSE
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOCATION.PURPOSE;

    {INVENTORY_ALLOCATION_VIEW.QUANTITY}
    field QUANTITY
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOC_ITEM.QUANTITY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(5);

    {INVENTORY_ALLOCATION_VIEW.BASE_UNIT}
    field BASE_UNIT
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOC_ITEM.BASE_UNIT;

    select_clause
        select A.INVENTORY_ID, A.ENTRY_NUMBER, AI.ITEM_ID, A.ALLOCATED_ON, A.ALLOCATED_BY, A.PURPOSE, AI.QUANTITY, AI.BASE_UNIT
        from INVENTORY_ALLOCATION A, INVENTORY_ALLOC_ITEM AI
        where A.INVENTORY_ID = AI.INVENTORY_ID and A.ENTRY_NUMBER = AI.ENTRY_NUMBER;

    view INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW
        on_table INVENTORY_ALLOC_ITEM, INVENTORY_ITEM;

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.INVENTORY_ID}
    field INVENTORY_ID
        links_to INVENTORY_ITEM.INVENTORY_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.ITEM_ID}
    field ITEM_ID
        links_to INVENTORY_ITEM.ITEM_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.ITEM_CODE}
    field ITEM_CODE
        links_to INVENTORY_ITEM.ITEM_CODE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.ENTERED_ON}
    field ENTERED_ON
        links_to INVENTORY_ITEM.ENTERED_ON;

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.ENTERED_BY}
    field ENTERED_BY
        links_to INVENTORY_ITEM.ENTERED_BY;

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.LAST_TESTED_ON}
    field LAST_TESTED_ON
        links_to INVENTORY_ITEM.LAST_TESTED_ON;

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.LAST_TESTED_BY}
    field LAST_TESTED_BY
        links_to INVENTORY_ITEM.LAST_TESTED_BY;

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.TOTAL}
    field TOTAL
        links_to INVENTORY_ITEM.QUANTITY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.BASE_UNIT}
    field BASE_UNIT
        links_to INVENTORY_ITEM.BASE_UNIT;

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.EXPIRY_DATE}
    field EXPIRY_DATE
        links_to INVENTORY_ITEM.EXPIRY_DATE;

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.LOCATION}
    field LOCATION
        links_to INVENTORY_ITEM.LOCATION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(4);

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to INVENTORY_ITEM.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(7);

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.ALLOCATED}
    field ALLOCATED
        datatype REAL 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(5);

    {INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW.UNALLOCATED}
    field UNALLOCATED
        datatype REAL 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(6);

    select_clause
        select I.INVENTORY_ID, I.ITEM_ID, I.ITEM_CODE, I.ENTERED_ON, I.ENTERED_BY, I.LAST_TESTED_ON, I.LAST_TESTED_BY, I.QUANTITY AS TOTAL, I.BASE_UNIT, I.EXPIRY_DATE, I.LOCATION, I.DESCRIPTION, ISNULL (SUM (A.QUANTITY), 0)AS ALLOCATED, I.QUANTITY - ISNULL (SUM (A.QUANTITY), 0)AS UNALLOCATED
        from INVENTORY_ALLOC_ITEM A
        left outer join INVENTORY_ITEM I on I.INVENTORY_ID = A.INVENTORY_ID and I.ITEM_ID = A.ITEM_ID GROUP BY I.INVENTORY_ID, I.ITEM_ID, I.ITEM_CODE, I.ENTERED_ON, I.ENTERED_BY, I.LAST_TESTED_ON, I.LAST_TESTED_BY, I.QUANTITY, I.BASE_UNIT, I.EXPIRY_DATE, I.LOCATION, I.DESCRIPTION;

    view INVENTORY_ALLOC_SUMMARY_VIEW
        on_table INVENTORY_ALLOCATION, INVENTORY_ALLOC_ITEM;

    {INVENTORY_ALLOC_SUMMARY_VIEW.INVENTORY_ID}
    field INVENTORY_ID
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOCATION.INVENTORY_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {INVENTORY_ALLOC_SUMMARY_VIEW.ENTRY_NUMBER}
    field ENTRY_NUMBER
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOCATION.ENTRY_NUMBER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {INVENTORY_ALLOC_SUMMARY_VIEW.ALLOCATED_ON}
    field ALLOCATED_ON
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOCATION.ALLOCATED_ON 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {INVENTORY_ALLOC_SUMMARY_VIEW.ALLOCATED_BY}
    field ALLOCATED_BY
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOCATION.ALLOCATED_BY;

    {INVENTORY_ALLOC_SUMMARY_VIEW.PURPOSE}
    field PURPOSE
        links_to INVENTORY_ALLOCATION.PURPOSE;

    {INVENTORY_ALLOC_SUMMARY_VIEW.TOTAL_ALLOCATED}
    field TOTAL_ALLOCATED
        datatype REAL 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    select_clause
        select A.INVENTORY_ID, A.ENTRY_NUMBER, A.ALLOCATED_ON, A.ALLOCATED_BY, A.PURPOSE, ISNULL (SUM (AI.QUANTITY), 0)AS TOTAL_ALLOCATED
        from INVENTORY_ALLOC_ITEM AI
        left outer join INVENTORY_ALLOCATION A on A.INVENTORY_ID = AI.INVENTORY_ID and A.ENTRY_NUMBER = AI.ENTRY_NUMBER GROUP BY A.INVENTORY_ID, A.ENTRY_NUMBER, A.ALLOCATED_ON, A.ALLOCATED_BY, A.PURPOSE;

    view INVENTORY_VIEW
        on_table INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW, INVENTORY_HEADER;

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to INVENTORY_HEADER.INVENTORY_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to INVENTORY_HEADER.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.LOW_UNALLOCATED_LEVEL}
    field LOW_UNALLOCATED_LEVEL
        links_to INVENTORY_HEADER.LOW_UNALLOCATED_LEVEL;

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.CALLBACK_LIBRARY}
    field CALLBACK_LIBRARY
        links_to INVENTORY_HEADER.CALLBACK_LIBRARY;

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.LOW_UNALLOCATED_ROUTINE}
    field LOW_UNALLOCATED_ROUTINE
        links_to INVENTORY_HEADER.LOW_UNALLOCATED_ROUTINE;

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.BASE_UNIT}
    field BASE_UNIT
        links_to INVENTORY_HEADER.BASE_UNIT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(5);

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.PRODUCT_ID}
    field PRODUCT_ID
        links_to INVENTORY_HEADER.PRODUCT_ID;

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to INVENTORY_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON;

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to INVENTORY_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY;

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        links_to INVENTORY_HEADER.MODIFIABLE;

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to INVENTORY_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.TOTAL}
    field TOTAL
        datatype REAL 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.ALLOCATED}
    field ALLOCATED
        datatype REAL 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {INVENTORY_VIEW.UNALLOCATED}
    field UNALLOCATED
        datatype REAL 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(4);

    select_clause
        select H.[IDENTITY], H.DESCRIPTION, H.LOW_UNALLOCATED_LEVEL, H.CALLBACK_LIBRARY, H.LOW_UNALLOCATED_ROUTINE, H.BASE_UNIT, H.PRODUCT_ID, H.MODIFIED_ON, H.MODIFIED_BY, H.MODIFIABLE, H.GROUP_ID, ISNULL (SUM (I.TOTAL), 0), ISNULL (SUM (I.ALLOCATED), 0), ISNULL (SUM (I.UNALLOCATED), 0)
        from INVENTORY_ITEM_SUMMARY_VIEW I
        left outer join INVENTORY_HEADER H on (I.INVENTORY_ID = H.[IDENTITY])GROUP BY H.[IDENTITY], H.DESCRIPTION, H.LOW_UNALLOCATED_LEVEL, H.CALLBACK_LIBRARY, H.LOW_UNALLOCATED_ROUTINE, H.BASE_UNIT, H.PRODUCT_ID, H.DESCRIPTION, H.MODIFIED_ON, H.MODIFIED_BY, H.MODIFIABLE, H.GROUP_ID;

    view JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP
        on_table JOB_HEADER;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.VIEW_SECTION}
    field VIEW_SECTION
        datatype INTEGER;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.JOB_NAME;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.SAMPLE_AUTHORISED}
    field SAMPLE_AUTHORISED
        links_to SAMPLE.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.PRODUCT_CODE}
    field PRODUCT_CODE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_CODE;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.SAMPLE_TYPE}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.RESULT_TYPE}
    field RESULT_TYPE
        links_to RESULT.RESULT_TYPE;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        links_to RESULT.CALCULATION;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.TEXT}
    field TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.VALUE}
    field VALUE
        links_to RESULT.VALUE;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID
        links_to MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.LIMITS}
    field LIMITS
        datatype TEXT(100);

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.MIN_NUM_LIMIT}
    field MIN_NUM_LIMIT
        datatype REAL;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.MAX_NUM_LIMIT}
    field MAX_NUM_LIMIT
        datatype REAL;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.TEXT_SPEC}
    field TEXT_SPEC
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_SPEC;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.TEXT_PHRASE}
    field TEXT_PHRASE
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_PHRASE;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.PROD_VER_FOR_PARMS}
    field PROD_VER_FOR_PARMS
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.MLP_ANALYSIS}
    field MLP_ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.COMPONENT_ORDER}
    field COMPONENT_ORDER
        links_to RESULT.ORDER_NUMBER;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to RESULT.UNITS;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.TEMPERATURE}
    field TEMPERATURE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INOC_TEMP;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.COA_GROUP}
    field COA_GROUP
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COA_GROUP;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.INOC_TIME}
    field INOC_TIME
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.EXPECTED_TIME;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP}
    field PRODUCT_SUBGROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP}
    field PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.SAP_CERT}
    field SAP_CERT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.SAP_CERT;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.RESULT_STATUS}
    field RESULT_STATUS
        links_to RESULT.STATUS;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.EQUIPMENT}
    field EQUIPMENT
        links_to SAMPLE.EQUIPMENT;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.SAMPLE_RECEIVED}
    field SAMPLE_RECEIVED
        links_to SAMPLE.RECD_DATE;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.RESULT_ENTERED_ON}
    field RESULT_ENTERED_ON
        links_to RESULT.ENTERED_ON;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.TEST_COMPLETED}
    field TEST_COMPLETED
        links_to TEST.DATE_COMPLETED;

    {JOB_SAMP_TEST_RES_MLP.OUT_OF_RANGE}
    field OUT_OF_RANGE
        links_to RESULT.OUT_OF_RANGE;

    sqlserver_specific_select
        select VIEW_SECTION, JOB_NAME, DATE_AUTHORISED AS SAMPLE_AUTHORISED, PRODUCT AS PRODUCT_NAME, BATCH_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, SAMPLE_TYPE, RESULT_TYPE, CALCULATION, TEXT, VALUE, case when VIEW_SECTION IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 11, 12, 13, 14)then LEVEL_ID when VIEW_SECTION IN (5, 6, 15, 16)then '' else '' end AS LEVEL_ID, case when VIEW_SECTION IN (1, 2, 11, 12)then case when ((ISNULL (LTRIM (MIN_LIMIT), '')++ ISNULL (LTRIM (TEXT_SPEC), ISNULL ((' - ' ++ MAX_LIMIT), '')))= '')then ltrim(LPE_RESULT_VALUE)else (ISNULL (LTRIM (MIN_LIMIT), '')++ ISNULL (LTRIM (TEXT_SPEC), ISNULL ((' - ' ++ MAX_LIMIT), '')))end when VIEW_SECTION IN (3, 4, 13, 14)then case when (TEXT_SPEC = '')then case when (MAX_LIMIT ='')then ltrim(MIN_LIMIT)else ltrim(MIN_LIMIT)++' - '++MAX_LIMIT end else ltrim(TEXT_SPEC)end when VIEW_SECTION IN (5, 6, 15, 16)then '' else '' end AS LIMITS, case when VIEW_SECTION IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 11, 12, 13, 14)then MIN_LIMIT when VIEW_SECTION IN (5, 6, 15, 16)then '' else '' end AS MIN_LIMIT, case when VIEW_SECTION IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 11, 12, 13, 14)then MAX_LIMIT when VIEW_SECTION IN (5, 6, 15, 16)then '' else '' end AS MAX_LIMIT, case when SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 1, 1)= '>' then case when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 1, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 1, LEN (MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 2, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 2, LEN (MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 3, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 3, LEN (MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 4, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 4, LEN (MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)else '' end when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 1, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 1, LEN (MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)else '' end AS MIN_NUM_LIMIT, case when ISNUMERIC (MAX_LIMIT)= 1 and LEN (MAX_LIMIT)> 0 then CAST (MAX_LIMIT AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MAX_LIMIT, 1, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MAX_LIMIT, 1, LEN (MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MAX_LIMIT, 2, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MAX_LIMIT, 2, LEN (MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MAX_LIMIT, 3, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MAX_LIMIT, 3, LEN (MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MAX_LIMIT, 4, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MAX_LIMIT, 4, LEN (MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when MAX_LIMIT is null or LEN (LTRIM (MAX_LIMIT))= 0 then case when SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 1, 1)= '<' then case when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 1, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 1, LEN (MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 2, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 2, LEN (MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 3, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 3, LEN (MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 4, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MIN_LIMIT, 4, LEN (MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)else '' end else '' end else '' end AS MAX_NUM_LIMIT, case when VIEW_SECTION IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 11, 12, 13, 14)then TEXT_SPEC when VIEW_SECTION IN (5, 6, 15, 16)then '' end AS TEXT_SPEC, case when VIEW_SECTION IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 11, 12, 13, 14)then TEXT_PHRASE when VIEW_SECTION IN (5, 6, 15, 16)then '' end AS TEXT_PHRASE, ID_NUMERIC, ID_TEXT, SAMPLING_POINT, ltrim(PRODUCT_VERSION)AS PROD_VER_FOR_PARMS, PRODUCT_VERSION, case when VIEW_SECTION IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 11, 12, 13, 14)then ANALYSIS_ID when VIEW_SECTION IN (5, 6, 15, 16)then '$NULL' end AS MLP_ANALYSIS, [IDENTITY] AS ANALYSIS, ANALYSIS_VERSION, NAME AS COMPONENT_NAME, ORDER_NUMBER AS COMPONENT_ORDER, UNITS, INOC_TEMP AS TEMPERATURE, COA_GROUP, EXPECTED_TIME AS INOC_TIME, PRODUCT_SUBGROUP, PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP, TEST_NUMBER, SAP_CERT, STATUS_J AS JOB_STATUS, STATUS_S AS SAMPLE_STATUS, STATUS_T AS TEST_STATUS, STATUS_R AS RESULT_STATUS, EQUIPMENT, RECD_DATE AS SAMPLE_RECEIVED, ENTERED_ON AS RESULT_ENTERED_ON, DATE_COMPLETED AS TEST_COMPLETED, OUT_OF_RANGE
        from
        (select case when MH.[IDENTITY] = MH.SUB_IDENTITY then case when MC.PRODUCT_ID is null then '5' else case when (LPE.LIMIT_PHRASE is null and (LTRIM (ISNULL (MV.MIN_LIMIT, ''))!= '')or (LTRIM (ISNULL (MV.MAX_LIMIT, ''))!= '')or (LTRIM (ISNULL (MV.TEXT_SPEC, ''))!= ''))then '3' when (LPE.LIMIT_PHRASE is not null and (LTRIM (ISNULL (MV.MIN_LIMIT, ''))= '')and (LTRIM (ISNULL (MV.MAX_LIMIT, ''))= '')and (LTRIM (ISNULL (MV.TEXT_SPEC, ''))= ''))then '1' else '5' end end when MH.[IDENTITY] != MH.SUB_IDENTITY then case when MC.PRODUCT_ID is null then '15' else case when (LPE.LIMIT_PHRASE is null and (LTRIM (ISNULL (MV.MIN_LIMIT, ''))!= '')or (LTRIM (ISNULL (MV.MAX_LIMIT, ''))!= '')or (LTRIM (ISNULL (MV.TEXT_SPEC, ''))!= ''))then '13' when (LPE.LIMIT_PHRASE is not null and (LTRIM (ISNULL (MV.MIN_LIMIT, ''))= '')and (LTRIM (ISNULL (MV.MAX_LIMIT, ''))= '')and (LTRIM (ISNULL (MV.TEXT_SPEC, ''))= ''))then '11' else '15' end end else '42' end AS VIEW_SECTION, J.JOB_NAME, S.DATE_AUTHORISED, S.PRODUCT, S.BATCH_NAME, MH2.PRODUCT_CODE, MH2.SAMPLE_TYPE, R.RESULT_TYPE, R.CALCULATION, R.TEXT, R.VALUE, MV.LEVEL_ID, MV.MIN_LIMIT, MV.MAX_LIMIT, MV.TEXT_SPEC, MV.TEXT_PHRASE, S.ID_NUMERIC, S.ID_TEXT, S.SAMPLING_POINT, S.PRODUCT_VERSION, MC.ANALYSIS_ID, A.[IDENTITY], A.ANALYSIS_VERSION, R.NAME, R.ORDER_NUMBER, R.UNITS, A.INOC_TEMP, A.COA_GROUP, A.EXPECTED_TIME, MH2.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP, MH.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP, T.TEST_NUMBER, MH2.SAP_CERT, J.JOB_STATUS STATUS_J, S.STATUS STATUS_S, T.STATUS STATUS_T, R.STATUS STATUS_R, S.EQUIPMENT, S.RECD_DATE, R.ENTERED_ON, T.DATE_COMPLETED, R.OUT_OF_RANGE, LPE.RESULT_VALUE AS LPE_RESULT_VALUE
        from ALL_RESULT R INNER JOIN ALL_TEST T on (T.TEST_NUMBER = R.TEST_NUMBER)INNER JOIN ALL_SAMPLE S on (S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE)INNER JOIN ALL_JOB_HEADER J on (S.JOB_NAME = J.JOB_NAME)INNER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A on (T.ANALYSIS = A.[IDENTITY] and A.ANALYSIS_VERSION = T.ANALYSIS_VERSION)INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER_VIEW MH on (MH.PRODUCT_VERSION = S.PRODUCT_VERSION and S.PRODUCT = MH.[IDENTITY])INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER MH2 on (MH2.PRODUCT_VERSION = MH.PRODUCT_VERSION and MH2.[IDENTITY] = MH.[IDENTITY])
        left outer join MLP_COMPONENTS MC on ((MH.SUB_IDENTITY = MC.PRODUCT_ID)and (MH.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION = MC.PRODUCT_VERSION)and (T.ANALYSIS = MC.ANALYSIS_ID or '$NULL' = MC.ANALYSIS_ID)and (R.NAME = MC.COMPONENT_NAME))
        left outer join MLP_VALUES MV on (MC.ENTRY_CODE = MV.ENTRY_CODE)
        left outer join LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY LPE on (MV.TEXT_PHRASE = LPE.LIMIT_PHRASE and LPE.COMPARISON = 'P'))AS DL;

    view SQL_JSTRM
        on_table JOB_HEADER;

    {SQL_JSTRM.JOB_NAME_J}
    field JOB_NAME_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION_J}
    field PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PROCESS_ORDER_J}
    field PROCESS_ORDER_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.PROCESS_ORDER;

    {SQL_JSTRM.REFERENCE_ORDER_J}
    field REFERENCE_ORDER_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.REFERENCE_ORDER;

    {SQL_JSTRM.COUNTRY_J}
    field COUNTRY_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.COUNTRY;

    {SQL_JSTRM.COUNTRYCODE_J}
    field COUNTRYCODE_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.COUNTRYCODE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.WORK_CENTER_J}
    field WORK_CENTER_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.WORK_CENTER;

    {SQL_JSTRM.SAMPLE_TYPE_J}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.JOB_STATUS_J}
    field JOB_STATUS_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {SQL_JSTRM.AUTHORISATION_NOTES_J}
    field AUTHORISATION_NOTES_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISATION_NOTES;

    {SQL_JSTRM.MPS_STATUS_J}
    field MPS_STATUS_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.MPS_STATUS;

    {SQL_JSTRM.AUTHORISER_J}
    field AUTHORISER_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISER;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCTION_DATE_J}
    field PRODUCTION_DATE_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.PRODUCTION_DATE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.SHELFLIFE_EXP_DATE_J}
    field SHELFLIFE_EXP_DATE_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.SHELFLIFE_EXP_DATE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED_J}
    field DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED;

    {SQL_JSTRM.DATE_AUTHORISED_J}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {SQL_JSTRM.LOGIN_PLANT_J}
    field LOGIN_PLANT_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.LOGIN_PLANT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.SAP_UPDATE_DATE_J}
    field SAP_UPDATE_DATE_J
        links_to ALL_JOB_HEADER.SAP_UPDATE_DATE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.ID_NUMERIC_S}
    field ID_NUMERIC_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {SQL_JSTRM.ID_TEXT_S}
    field ID_TEXT_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.LOCATION_ID_S}
    field LOCATION_ID_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.LOCATION_ID;

    {SQL_JSTRM.SAMPLE_COMMENT_S}
    field SAMPLE_COMMENT_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.SAMPLE_COMMENT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.INSPECTION_TYPE_S}
    field INSPECTION_TYPE_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.INSPECTION_TYPE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCT_NAME_S}
    field PRODUCT_NAME_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.PRODUCT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCT_VERSION_S}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {SQL_JSTRM.BATCH_NAME_S}
    field BATCH_NAME_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCT_BEFORE_S}
    field PRODUCT_BEFORE_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.PRODUCT_BEFORE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.BATCH_BEFORE_S}
    field BATCH_BEFORE_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.BATCH_BEFORE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.SAMPLING_POINT_S}
    field SAMPLING_POINT_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.SAMPLING_POINT_DESCRIPTION_SP}
    field SAMPLING_POINT_DESCRIPTION_SP
        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.DESCRIPTION;

    {SQL_JSTRM.SAMPLE_TYPE_S}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.EQUIPMENT_S}
    field EQUIPMENT_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.EQUIPMENT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.RECD_DATE_S}
    field RECD_DATE_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.RECD_DATE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.DATE_AUTHORISED_S}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {SQL_JSTRM.STATUS_S}
    field STATUS_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.STATUS;

    {SQL_JSTRM.MPS_STATUS_S}
    field MPS_STATUS_S
        links_to ALL_SAMPLE.MPS_STATUS;

    {SQL_JSTRM.TEST_NUMBER_T}
    field TEST_NUMBER_T
        links_to ALL_TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {SQL_JSTRM.ANALYSIS_T}
    field ANALYSIS_T
        links_to ALL_TEST.ANALYSIS;

    {SQL_JSTRM.ANALYSIS_VERSION_T}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION_T
        links_to ALL_TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    {SQL_JSTRM.TEST_COUNT_T}
    field TEST_COUNT_T
        links_to ALL_TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.DATE_COMPLETED_T}
    field DATE_COMPLETED_T
        links_to ALL_TEST.DATE_COMPLETED;

    {SQL_JSTRM.STATUS_T}
    field STATUS_T
        links_to ALL_TEST.STATUS;

    {SQL_JSTRM.STATUS_DESCR_T}
    field STATUS_DESCR_T
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.ON_SPEC_T}
    field ON_SPEC_T
        links_to ALL_TEST.ON_SPEC;

    {SQL_JSTRM.NAME_R}
    field NAME_R
        links_to ALL_RESULT.NAME;

    {SQL_JSTRM.RESULT_TYPE_R}
    field RESULT_TYPE_R
        links_to ALL_RESULT.RESULT_TYPE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.ORDER_NUMBER_R}
    field ORDER_NUMBER_R
        links_to ALL_RESULT.ORDER_NUMBER;

    {SQL_JSTRM.CALCULATION_R}
    field CALCULATION_R
        links_to ALL_RESULT.CALCULATION;

    {SQL_JSTRM.LANGAUGE_CT}
    field LANGAUGE_CT
        links_to COMPONENT_TRANSLATION.LANGAUGE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.LANGUAGE_CT}
    field LANGUAGE_CT
        links_to COMPONENT_TRANSLATION.LANGAUGE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.EXTERNAL_NAME_CT}
    field EXTERNAL_NAME_CT
        links_to COMPONENT_TRANSLATION.EXTERNAL_NAME;

    {SQL_JSTRM.VALUE_R}
    field VALUE_R
        links_to ALL_RESULT.VALUE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.TEXT_R}
    field TEXT_R
        links_to ALL_RESULT.TEXT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.UNITS_R}
    field UNITS_R
        links_to ALL_RESULT.UNITS;

    {SQL_JSTRM.ENTERED_ON_R}
    field ENTERED_ON_R
        links_to ALL_RESULT.ENTERED_ON;

    {SQL_JSTRM.OUT_OF_RANGE_R}
    field OUT_OF_RANGE_R
        links_to ALL_RESULT.OUT_OF_RANGE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.STATUS_R}
    field STATUS_R
        links_to ALL_RESULT.STATUS;

    {SQL_JSTRM.COMPARISON_LPE}
    field COMPARISON_LPE
        links_to LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY.COMPARISON;

    {SQL_JSTRM.RESULT_VALUE_LPE}
    field RESULT_VALUE_LPE
        links_to LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY.RESULT_VALUE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.IDENTITY_LPH}
    field IDENTITY_LPH
        links_to LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {SQL_JSTRM.DEFAULT_COMPARISON_LPH}
    field DEFAULT_COMPARISON_LPH
        links_to LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.DEFAULT_COMPARISON;

    {SQL_JSTRM.DESCRIPTION_LPH}
    field DESCRIPTION_LPH
        links_to LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.DESCRIPTION;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCT_ID_M}
    field PRODUCT_ID_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.IDENTITY;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCT_VERSION_M}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {SQL_JSTRM.MAIN_MLP_M}
    field MAIN_MLP_M
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {SQL_JSTRM.EXTERNAL_DATE_M}
    field EXTERNAL_DATE_M
        links_to EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS.EXTERNAL_DATE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.APPROVAL_STATUS_M}
    field APPROVAL_STATUS_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.APPROVAL_STATUS;

    {SQL_JSTRM.DESCRIPTION_M}
    field DESCRIPTION_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.DESCRIPTION;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_M}
    field PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_DESC_M}
    field PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_DESC_M
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCT_CODE_M}
    field PRODUCT_CODE_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.PRODUCT_CODE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP_M}
    field PRODUCT_SUBGROUP_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCT_GROUP_M}
    field PRODUCT_GROUP_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.PRODUCT_GROUP;

    {SQL_JSTRM.PRODUCT_GROUP_DESC_M}
    field PRODUCT_GROUP_DESC_M
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.SAMPLE_TYPE_M}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.SAMPLE_TYPE_DESC_M}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE_DESC_M
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.INOC_PCT_M}
    field INOC_PCT_M
        links_to PARM_SETUP.VAL8;

    {SQL_JSTRM.CERT_TYPE_M}
    field CERT_TYPE_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.CERT_TYPE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.SAP_CERT_M}
    field SAP_CERT_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.SAP_CERT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.REMOVEFLAG_M}
    field REMOVEFLAG_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.REMOVEFLAG;

    {SQL_JSTRM.SUB_IDENTITY_M}
    field SUB_IDENTITY_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.SUB_IDENTITY;

    {SQL_JSTRM.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION_M}
    field SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {SQL_JSTRM.ANALYSIS_ID_MC}
    field ANALYSIS_ID_MC
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID;

    {SQL_JSTRM.COMPONENT_NAME_MC}
    field COMPONENT_NAME_MC
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME;

    {SQL_JSTRM.UNITS_MC}
    field UNITS_MC
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS;

    {SQL_JSTRM.BOOLEAN_PASS_MV}
    field BOOLEAN_PASS_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS;

    {SQL_JSTRM.CALCULATION_MV}
    field CALCULATION_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.CALCULATION;

    {SQL_JSTRM.LEVEL_ID_MV}
    field LEVEL_ID_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID;

    {SQL_JSTRM.LIMITS_MV}
    field LIMITS_MV
        datatype TEXT(100);

    {SQL_JSTRM.MIN_LIMIT_MV}
    field MIN_LIMIT_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.MIN_NUM_LIMIT_MV}
    field MIN_NUM_LIMIT_MV
        datatype REAL;

    {SQL_JSTRM.MAX_LIMIT_MV}
    field MAX_LIMIT_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.MAX_NUM_LIMIT_MV}
    field MAX_NUM_LIMIT_MV
        datatype REAL;

    {SQL_JSTRM.TEXT_PHRASE_MV}
    field TEXT_PHRASE_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_PHRASE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.TEXT_SPEC_MV}
    field TEXT_SPEC_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_SPEC;

    {SQL_JSTRM.ANALYSIS_ID_A}
    field ANALYSIS_ID_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY;

    {SQL_JSTRM.ANALYSIS_TYPE_A}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE;

    {SQL_JSTRM.COA_GROUP_A}
    field COA_GROUP_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COA_GROUP;

    {SQL_JSTRM.COA_GROUP_DESC_A}
    field COA_GROUP_DESC_A
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {SQL_JSTRM.INOC_TEMP_A}
    field INOC_TEMP_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INOC_TEMP;

    {SQL_JSTRM.Q_METHOD_A}
    field Q_METHOD_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.Q_METHOD;

    {SQL_JSTRM.QAM_NUMBER_A}
    field QAM_NUMBER_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAM_NUMBER;

    {SQL_JSTRM.EXPECTED_TIME_A}
    field EXPECTED_TIME_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.EXPECTED_TIME;

    select_clause
    select 
            j.JOB_NAME as   JOB_NAME_J,
            j.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION as    PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION_J,
            j.PROCESS_ORDER as PROCESS_ORDER_J,
            j.REFERENCE_ORDER as REFERENCE_ORDER_J,
            j.COUNTRY as COUNTRY_J,
            j.COUNTRYCODE as COUNTRYCODE_J,
            j.WORK_CENTER as WORK_CENTER_J,
            j.SAMPLE_TYPE as    SAMPLE_TYPE_J,
            j.JOB_STATUS as     JOB_STATUS_J,
            j.AUTHORISATION_NOTES as AUTHORISATION_NOTES_J,
            j.MPS_STATUS as     MPS_STATUS_J,
            j.AUTHORISER as AUTHORISER_J,
            j.PRODUCTION_DATE as    PRODUCTION_DATE_J,
            j.SHELFLIFE_EXP_DATE as     SHELFLIFE_EXP_DATE_J,
            j.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED as  DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED_J,
            j.DATE_AUTHORISED as    DATE_AUTHORISED_J,
            j.LOGIN_PLANT as    LOGIN_PLANT_J,
            j.SAP_UPDATE_DATE as    SAP_UPDATE_DATE_J,
            s.ID_NUMERIC as     ID_NUMERIC_S,
            s.ID_TEXT as    ID_TEXT_S,
            s.LOCATION_ID as LOCATION_ID_S,
            s.SAMPLE_COMMENT as SAMPLE_COMMENT_S,
            s.INSPECTION_TYPE as    INSPECTION_TYPE_S,
            s.PRODUCT as    PRODUCT_NAME_S,
            s.PRODUCT_VERSION as    PRODUCT_VERSION_S,
            s.BATCH_NAME as     BATCH_NAME_S,
            s.PRODUCT_BEFORE as PRODUCT_BEFORE_S,
            s.BATCH_BEFORE as BATCH_BEFORE_S,
            s.SAMPLING_POINT as     SAMPLING_POINT_S,
            sp.DESCRIPTION as SAMPLING_POINT_DESCRIPTION_SP,
            s.SAMPLE_TYPE as    SAMPLE_TYPE_S,
            s.EQUIPMENT as  EQUIPMENT_S,
            s.RECD_DATE as  RECD_DATE_S,
            s.DATE_AUTHORISED as    DATE_AUTHORISED_S,
            s.STATUS as     STATUS_S,
            s.MPS_STATUS as MPS_STATUS_S,
            t.TEST_NUMBER as    TEST_NUMBER_T,
            t.ANALYSIS as ANALYSIS_T,
            t.ANALYSIS_VERSION as ANALYSIS_VERSION_T,
            t.TEST_COUNT as     TEST_COUNT_T,
            t.DATE_COMPLETED as     DATE_COMPLETED_T,
            t.STATUS as     STATUS_T,
            (select PHRASE_TEXT 
                from PHRASE
                where PHRASE_TYPE = 'TEST_STAT'
                  and PHRASE_ID = t.STATUS) STATUS_Descr_T,
            t.ON_SPEC as    ON_SPEC_T,
            r.NAME as   NAME_R,
            r.RESULT_TYPE as    RESULT_TYPE_R,
            r.ORDER_NUMBER as   ORDER_NUMBER_R,
            r.CALCULATION as    CALCULATION_R,
            cl.[IDENTITY] as    LANGAUGE_CT,
            cl.[IDENTITY] as    LANGUAGE_CT,
            case
                when (ltrim(ct.EXTERNAL_NAME) <> '' 
                  AND ct.EXTERNAL_NAME is not null 
                  AND ltrim(ct.EXTERNAL_NAME) <> r.NAME COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS_WS) 
                  then ct.EXTERNAL_NAME COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS_WS
                else r.NAME COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS_WS
            end EXTERNAL_NAME_CT,
            r.VALUE as  VALUE_R,
            r.TEXT as   TEXT_R,
            r.UNITS as  UNITS_R,
            r.ENTERED_ON as     ENTERED_ON_R,
            r.OUT_OF_RANGE as   OUT_OF_RANGE_R,
            r.STATUS as     STATUS_R,
            lpe.COMPARISON as   COMPARISON_LPE,
            lpe.RESULT_VALUE as RESULT_VALUE_LPE,
            lph.[IDENTITY] as IDENTITY_LPH,
            lph.DEFAULT_COMPARISON as DEFAULT_COMPARISON_LPH,
            lph.DESCRIPTION as DESCRIPTION_LPH,
            m.[IDENTITY] as     PRODUCT_ID_M,
            m.PRODUCT_VERSION as    PRODUCT_VERSION_M,
            CASE
                WHEN m.[IDENTITY] = m.SUB_IDENTITY then 'T'
                ELSE 'F'
            END MAIN_MLP_M,
            (select EXTERNAL_DATE from EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS where [IDENTITY] = s.PRODUCT and MLP_VERSION = s.PRODUCT_VERSION) EXTERNAL_DATE_M,
            mh.APPROVAL_STATUS as   APPROVAL_STATUS_M,
            mh.DESCRIPTION as   DESCRIPTION_M,
            mh.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP as    PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_M,
            (select PHRASE_TEXT 
                from PHRASE
                where PHRASE_TYPE = 'MLP_APPLIC'
                  and PHRASE_ID = mh.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP) PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_Desc_M,
            mh.PRODUCT_CODE as  PRODUCT_CODE_M,
            mh.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP as  PRODUCT_SUBGROUP_M,
            mh.PRODUCT_GROUP as PRODUCT_GROUP_M,
            (select PHRASE_TEXT 
                from PHRASE
                where PHRASE_TYPE = 'MLP_GROUP'
                  and PHRASE_ID = mh.PRODUCT_GROUP) PRODUCT_GROUP_Desc_M,
            mh.SAMPLE_TYPE as   SAMPLE_TYPE_M,
            (select PHRASE_TEXT 
                from PHRASE
                where PHRASE_TYPE = 'SAMP_TYPE'
                  and PHRASE_ID = mh.SAMPLE_TYPE) SAMPLE_TYPE_Desc_M,
            case when inoc.INOC_PCT_M_COUNT > 1
                then 'ERROR'
                else inoc.INOC_PCT_M
            end INOC_PCT_M,
            mh.CERT_TYPE as     CERT_TYPE_M,
            mh.SAP_CERT as  SAP_CERT_M,
            mh.REMOVEFLAG as    REMOVEFLAG_M,
            m.SUB_IDENTITY as   SUB_IDENTITY_M,
            m.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION as    SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION_M,
            mc.ANALYSIS_ID as   ANALYSIS_ID_MC,
            mc.COMPONENT_NAME as    COMPONENT_NAME_MC,
            mc.UNITS as     UNITS_MC,
            mv.BOOLEAN_PASS as  BOOLEAN_PASS_MV,
            mv.CALCULATION as   CALCULATION_MV,
            mv.LEVEL_ID as  LEVEL_ID_MV,
            case 
                when (mv.MAX_LIMIT =  '') AND (mv.MIN_LIMIT <> '') then ltrim(mv.MIN_LIMIT)
                when (mv.MAX_LIMIT <> '') AND (mv.MIN_LIMIT <> '') then ltrim(mv.MIN_LIMIT)++' - '++mv.MAX_LIMIT 
                else 
                    CASE
                        WHEN ctp.EXTERNAL_NAME is null then lpe.RESULT_VALUE COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS_WS
                        ELSE ctp.EXTERNAL_NAME
                    END
            end AS LIMITS_MV,
            mv.MIN_LIMIT as MIN_LIMIT_MV, 
            case 
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 1, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 1, LEN (mv.MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 2, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 2, LEN (mv.MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 3, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 3, LEN (mv.MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 4, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 4, LEN (mv.MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ltrim(mv.MIN_LIMIT) = ''
                then null
                else '' 
            end MIN_NUM_LIMIT_MV,
            mv.MAX_LIMIT as MAX_LIMIT_MV, 
            case 
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 1, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 1, LEN (mv.MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 2, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 2, LEN (mv.MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 3, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 3, LEN (mv.MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 4, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 4, LEN (mv.MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ltrim(mv.MAX_LIMIT) = ''
                then null
                else '' 
            end MAX_NUM_LIMIT_MV,
            mv.TEXT_PHRASE as   TEXT_PHRASE_MV,
            mv.TEXT_SPEC as     TEXT_SPEC_MV,
            a.[IDENTITY] as ANALYSIS_ID_A,
            a.ANALYSIS_TYPE as  ANALYSIS_TYPE_A,
            a.COA_GROUP as  COA_GROUP_A,
            (select PHRASE_TEXT 
             from PHRASE
             where PHRASE_TYPE = 'COA_GROUP'
               and PHRASE_ID = a.COA_GROUP) COA_GROUP_Desc_A,
            a.INOC_TEMP as  INOC_TEMP_A,
            a.Q_METHOD as   Q_METHOD_A,
            a.QAM_NUMBER as     QAM_NUMBER_A,
            a.EXPECTED_TIME as  EXPECTED_TIME_A
        from ALL_JOB_HEADER j
        inner join ALL_SAMPLE s 
            on (j.TEMPLATE_ID IN (SELECT [IDENTITY] FROM JOB_TEMPLATE WHERE [IDENTITY] NOT IN ('RDA-GENERA','RDA-INTERN','RDA-PP-GEN'))
            AND j.PRODUCT_NAME = s.PRODUCT 
            AND j.BATCH_NAME = s.BATCH_NAME)
        inner join ALL_TEST t 
            on (s.ID_NUMERIC = t.SAMPLE)
        inner join ALL_RESULT r 
            on (t.TEST_NUMBER = r.TEST_NUMBER)
        inner JOIN SAMPLE_POINT sp
            on s.SAMPLING_POINT = sp.[IDENTITY]
        inner join MLP_HEADER_VIEW m 
            on (s.PRODUCT = m.[IDENTITY] and s.PRODUCT_VERSION = m.IDENTITY_VERSION)
        inner JOIN MLP_HEADER mh
            on m.[IDENTITY] = mh.[IDENTITY] and m.PRODUCT_VERSION = mh.PRODUCT_VERSION
        left outer join MLP_COMPONENTS mc 
            on (m.SUB_IDENTITY = mc.PRODUCT_ID 
            and m.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION = mc.PRODUCT_VERSION 
            and r.NAME = mc.COMPONENT_NAME)
        left outer join mlp_values mv 
            on (mc.ENTRY_CODE = mv.ENTRY_CODE 
            and (mv.ANALYSIS_ID = t.ANALYSIS 
              or mv.ANALYSIS_ID = '$NULL'))
        left outer join versioned_analysis a 
            on (t.ANALYSIS = a.[IDENTITY] 
            and t.ANALYSIS_VERSION = a.ANALYSIS_VERSION)
        left outer join COMPONENT_LANGAUGE cl on cl.REMOVEFLAG = 'F'
        left outer join COMPONENT_TRANSLATION ct 
            on (ct.COMPONENT_NAME = mc.COMPONENT_NAME
            and ct.ANALYSIS_TYPE = a.ANALYSIS_TYPE
            and cl.[IDENTITY] = ct.LANGAUGE)
        left outer join COMPONENT_TRANSLATION ct2
            on (ct2.COMPONENT_NAME = mc.COMPONENT_NAME
            and cl.[IDENTITY] = ct2.LANGAUGE)
        left outer join LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY LPE 
            on (MV.TEXT_PHRASE = LPE.LIMIT_PHRASE and LPE.COMPARISON = 'P')
        left outer join LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER lph
            on (lpe.LIMIT_PHRASE = lph.[IDENTITY]
            and lpe.COMPARISON = lph.DEFAULT_COMPARISON)
        LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPONENT_TRANSLATION ctp
            on (ctp.COMPONENT_NAME = LPE.RESULT_VALUE COLLATE Latin1_General_CS_AS_WS
            AND ctp.ANALYSIS_TYPE = 'PHRASE'
            AND ctp.LANGAUGE = cl.[IDENTITY])
        outer apply (select min(p.VAL8) INOC_PCT_M, count(1) INOC_PCT_M_COUNT from PARM_SETUP p
                     where p.[IDENTITY] = m.[IDENTITY] 
                       and p.IDENTITY_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION 
                       and p.PARM_TYPE = 'M' 
                       and p.PARM_ID = 'INOC_PCT'
                       and p.VAL1 = t.ANALYSIS) inoc
    UNION ALL
    select 
            j.JOB_NAME as   JOB_NAME_J,
            j.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION as    PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION_J,
            j.PROCESS_ORDER as PROCESS_ORDER_J,
            j.REFERENCE_ORDER as REFERENCE_ORDER_J,
            j.COUNTRY as COUNTRY_J,
            j.COUNTRYCODE as COUNTRYCODE_J,
            j.WORK_CENTER as WORK_CENTER_J,
            j.SAMPLE_TYPE as    SAMPLE_TYPE_J,
            j.JOB_STATUS as     JOB_STATUS_J,
            j.AUTHORISATION_NOTES as AUTHORISATION_NOTES_J,
            j.MPS_STATUS as     MPS_STATUS_J,
            j.AUTHORISER as AUTHORISER_J,
            j.PRODUCTION_DATE as    PRODUCTION_DATE_J,
            j.SHELFLIFE_EXP_DATE as     SHELFLIFE_EXP_DATE_J,
            j.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED as  DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED_J,
            j.DATE_AUTHORISED as    DATE_AUTHORISED_J,
            j.LOGIN_PLANT as    LOGIN_PLANT_J,
            j.SAP_UPDATE_DATE as    SAP_UPDATE_DATE_J,
            s.ID_NUMERIC as     ID_NUMERIC_S,
