            s.ID_TEXT as    ID_TEXT_S,
            s.LOCATION_ID as LOCATION_ID_S,
            s.SAMPLE_COMMENT as SAMPLE_COMMENT_S,
            s.INSPECTION_TYPE as    INSPECTION_TYPE_S,
            s.PRODUCT as    PRODUCT_NAME_S,
            s.PRODUCT_VERSION as    PRODUCT_VERSION_S,
            s.BATCH_NAME as     BATCH_NAME_S,
            s.PRODUCT_BEFORE as PRODUCT_BEFORE_S,
            s.BATCH_BEFORE as BATCH_BEFORE_S,
            s.SAMPLING_POINT as     SAMPLING_POINT_S,
            sp.DESCRIPTION as SAMPLING_POINT_DESCRIPTION_SP,
            s.SAMPLE_TYPE as    SAMPLE_TYPE_S,
            s.EQUIPMENT as  EQUIPMENT_S,
            s.RECD_DATE as  RECD_DATE_S,
            s.DATE_AUTHORISED as    DATE_AUTHORISED_S,
            s.STATUS as     STATUS_S,
            s.MPS_STATUS as MPS_STATUS_S,
            t.TEST_NUMBER as    TEST_NUMBER_T,
            t.ANALYSIS as ANALYSIS_T,
            t.ANALYSIS_VERSION as ANALYSIS_VERSION_T,
            t.TEST_COUNT as     TEST_COUNT_T,
            t.DATE_COMPLETED as     DATE_COMPLETED_T,
            t.STATUS as     STATUS_T,
            (select PHRASE_TEXT 
                from PHRASE
                where PHRASE_TYPE = 'TEST_STAT'
                  and PHRASE_ID = t.STATUS) STATUS_Descr_T,
            t.ON_SPEC as    ON_SPEC_T,
            r.NAME as   NAME_R,
            r.RESULT_TYPE as    RESULT_TYPE_R,
            r.ORDER_NUMBER as   ORDER_NUMBER_R,
            r.CALCULATION as    CALCULATION_R,
            cl.[IDENTITY] as    LANGAUGE_CT,
            cl.[IDENTITY] as    LANGUAGE_CT,
            case
                when (ltrim(ct.EXTERNAL_NAME) <> '' 
                  AND ct.EXTERNAL_NAME is not null 
                  AND ltrim(ct.EXTERNAL_NAME) <> r.NAME COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS_WS) 
                  then ct.EXTERNAL_NAME COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS_WS
                else r.NAME COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS_WS
            end EXTERNAL_NAME_CT,
            r.VALUE as  VALUE_R,
            r.TEXT as   TEXT_R,
            r.UNITS as  UNITS_R,
            r.ENTERED_ON as     ENTERED_ON_R,
            r.OUT_OF_RANGE as   OUT_OF_RANGE_R,
            r.STATUS as     STATUS_R,
            lpe.COMPARISON as   COMPARISON_LPE,
            lpe.RESULT_VALUE as RESULT_VALUE_LPE,
            lph.[IDENTITY] as IDENTITY_LPH,
            lph.DEFAULT_COMPARISON as DEFAULT_COMPARISON_LPH,
            lph.DESCRIPTION as DESCRIPTION_LPH,
            m.[IDENTITY] as     PRODUCT_ID_M,
            m.PRODUCT_VERSION as    PRODUCT_VERSION_M,
            CASE
                WHEN m.[IDENTITY] = m.SUB_IDENTITY then 'T'
                ELSE 'F'
            END MAIN_MLP_M,
            (select EXTERNAL_DATE from EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS where [IDENTITY] = s.PRODUCT and MLP_VERSION = s.PRODUCT_VERSION) EXTERNAL_DATE_M,
            mh.APPROVAL_STATUS as   APPROVAL_STATUS_M,
            mh.DESCRIPTION as   DESCRIPTION_M,
            mh.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP as    PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_M,
            (select PHRASE_TEXT 
                from PHRASE
                where PHRASE_TYPE = 'MLP_APPLIC'
                  and PHRASE_ID = mh.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP) PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_Desc_M,
            mh.PRODUCT_CODE as  PRODUCT_CODE_M,
            mh.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP as  PRODUCT_SUBGROUP_M,
            mh.PRODUCT_GROUP as PRODUCT_GROUP_M,
            (select PHRASE_TEXT 
                from PHRASE
                where PHRASE_TYPE = 'MLP_GROUP'
                  and PHRASE_ID = mh.PRODUCT_GROUP) PRODUCT_GROUP_Desc_M,
            mh.SAMPLE_TYPE as   SAMPLE_TYPE_M,
            (select PHRASE_TEXT 
                from PHRASE
                where PHRASE_TYPE = 'SAMP_TYPE'
                  and PHRASE_ID = mh.SAMPLE_TYPE) SAMPLE_TYPE_Desc_M,
            case when inoc.INOC_PCT_M_COUNT > 1
                then 'ERROR'
                else inoc.INOC_PCT_M
            end INOC_PCT_M,
            mh.CERT_TYPE as     CERT_TYPE_M,
            mh.SAP_CERT as  SAP_CERT_M,
            mh.REMOVEFLAG as    REMOVEFLAG_M,
            m.SUB_IDENTITY as   SUB_IDENTITY_M,
            m.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION as    SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION_M,
            mc.ANALYSIS_ID as   ANALYSIS_ID_MC,
            mc.COMPONENT_NAME as    COMPONENT_NAME_MC,
            mc.UNITS as     UNITS_MC,
            mv.BOOLEAN_PASS as  BOOLEAN_PASS_MV,
            mv.CALCULATION as   CALCULATION_MV,
            mv.LEVEL_ID as  LEVEL_ID_MV,
            case 
                when (mv.MAX_LIMIT =  '') AND (mv.MIN_LIMIT <> '') then ltrim(mv.MIN_LIMIT)
                when (mv.MAX_LIMIT <> '') AND (mv.MIN_LIMIT <> '') then ltrim(mv.MIN_LIMIT)++' - '++mv.MAX_LIMIT 
                else 
                    CASE
                        WHEN ctp.EXTERNAL_NAME is null then lpe.RESULT_VALUE COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS_WS
                        ELSE ctp.EXTERNAL_NAME
                    END
            end AS LIMITS_MV,
            mv.MIN_LIMIT as MIN_LIMIT_MV, 
            case 
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 1, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 1, LEN (mv.MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 2, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 2, LEN (mv.MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 3, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 3, LEN (mv.MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 4, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MIN_LIMIT, 4, LEN (mv.MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ltrim(mv.MIN_LIMIT) = ''
                then null
                else '' 
            end MIN_NUM_LIMIT_MV,
            mv.MAX_LIMIT as MAX_LIMIT_MV, 
            case 
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 1, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 1, LEN (mv.MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 2, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 2, LEN (mv.MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 3, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 3, LEN (mv.MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 4, 1))= 1 
                then CAST (SUBSTRING (mv.MAX_LIMIT, 4, LEN (mv.MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)
                when ltrim(mv.MAX_LIMIT) = ''
                then null
                else '' 
            end MAX_NUM_LIMIT_MV,
            mv.TEXT_PHRASE as   TEXT_PHRASE_MV,
            mv.TEXT_SPEC as     TEXT_SPEC_MV,
            a.[IDENTITY] as ANALYSIS_ID_A,
            a.ANALYSIS_TYPE as  ANALYSIS_TYPE_A,
            a.COA_GROUP as  COA_GROUP_A,
            (select PHRASE_TEXT 
             from PHRASE
             where PHRASE_TYPE = 'COA_GROUP'
               and PHRASE_ID = a.COA_GROUP) COA_GROUP_Desc_A,
            a.INOC_TEMP as  INOC_TEMP_A,
            a.Q_METHOD as   Q_METHOD_A,
            a.QAM_NUMBER as     QAM_NUMBER_A,
            a.EXPECTED_TIME as  EXPECTED_TIME_A
        from ALL_JOB_HEADER j
        inner join ALL_SAMPLE s 
            on (j.TEMPLATE_ID IN ('RDA-GENERA','RDA-INTERN','RDA-PP-GEN')
            AND j.JOB_NAME = s.JOB_NAME)
        inner join ALL_TEST t 
            on (s.ID_NUMERIC = t.SAMPLE)
        inner join ALL_RESULT r 
            on (t.TEST_NUMBER = r.TEST_NUMBER)
        inner JOIN SAMPLE_POINT sp
            on s.SAMPLING_POINT = sp.[IDENTITY]
        inner join MLP_HEADER_VIEW m 
            on (s.PRODUCT = m.[IDENTITY] and s.PRODUCT_VERSION = m.IDENTITY_VERSION)
        inner JOIN MLP_HEADER mh
            on m.[IDENTITY] = mh.[IDENTITY] and m.PRODUCT_VERSION = mh.PRODUCT_VERSION
        left outer join MLP_COMPONENTS mc 
            on (m.SUB_IDENTITY = mc.PRODUCT_ID 
            and m.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION = mc.PRODUCT_VERSION 
            and r.NAME = mc.COMPONENT_NAME)
        left outer join MLP_VALUES mv 
            on (mc.ENTRY_CODE = mv.ENTRY_CODE 
            and (mv.ANALYSIS_ID = t.ANALYSIS 
              or mv.ANALYSIS_ID = '$NULL'))
        left outer join versioned_analysis a 
            on (t.ANALYSIS = a.[IDENTITY] 
            and t.ANALYSIS_VERSION = a.ANALYSIS_VERSION)
        left outer join COMPONENT_LANGAUGE cl on cl.REMOVEFLAG = 'F'
        left outer join COMPONENT_TRANSLATION ct 
            on (ct.COMPONENT_NAME = mc.COMPONENT_NAME
            and ct.ANALYSIS_TYPE = a.ANALYSIS_TYPE
            and cl.[IDENTITY] = ct.LANGAUGE)
        left outer join COMPONENT_TRANSLATION ct2
            on (ct2.COMPONENT_NAME = mc.COMPONENT_NAME
            and cl.[IDENTITY] = ct2.LANGAUGE)
        left outer join LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY LPE 
            on (MV.TEXT_PHRASE = LPE.LIMIT_PHRASE and LPE.COMPARISON = 'P')
        left outer join LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER lph
            on (lpe.LIMIT_PHRASE = lph.[IDENTITY]
            and lpe.COMPARISON = lph.DEFAULT_COMPARISON)
        LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPONENT_TRANSLATION ctp
            on (ctp.COMPONENT_NAME = LPE.RESULT_VALUE COLLATE Latin1_General_CS_AS_WS
            AND ctp.ANALYSIS_TYPE = 'PHRASE'
            AND ctp.LANGAUGE = cl.[IDENTITY])
        outer apply (select min(p.VAL8) INOC_PCT_M, count(1) INOC_PCT_M_COUNT from PARM_SETUP p
                     where p.[IDENTITY] = m.[IDENTITY] 
                       and p.IDENTITY_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION 
                       and p.PARM_TYPE = 'M' 
                       and p.PARM_ID = 'INOC_PCT'
                       and p.VAL1 = t.ANALYSIS) inoc;

    view SQL_PROD_SPEC
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.LANGUAGE_CT}
    field LANGUAGE_CT
        links_to COMPONENT_TRANSLATION.LANGAUGE;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.PRODUCT_ID_M}
    field PRODUCT_ID_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.IDENTITY;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.PRODUCT_VERSION_M}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.SUB_IDENTITY_M}
    field SUB_IDENTITY_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.SUB_IDENTITY;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION_M}
    field SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.MAIN_MLP_M}
    field MAIN_MLP_M
        datatype TEXT(1);

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.EXTERNAL_DATE_M}
    field EXTERNAL_DATE_M
        links_to EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS.EXTERNAL_DATE;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.APPROVAL_STATUS_M}
    field APPROVAL_STATUS_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.APPROVAL_STATUS;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.DESCRIPTION_M}
    field DESCRIPTION_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.DESCRIPTION;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_M}
    field PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_DESC_M}
    field PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_DESC_M
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.PRODUCT_CODE_M}
    field PRODUCT_CODE_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.PRODUCT_CODE;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP_M}
    field PRODUCT_SUBGROUP_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.PRODUCT_GROUP_M}
    field PRODUCT_GROUP_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.PRODUCT_GROUP;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.PRODUCT_GROUP_DESC_M}
    field PRODUCT_GROUP_DESC_M
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.SAMPLE_TYPE_M}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.SAMPLE_TYPE_DESC_M}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE_DESC_M
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.INOC_PCT_M}
    field INOC_PCT_M
        links_to PARM_SETUP.VAL8;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.CERT_TYPE_M}
    field CERT_TYPE_M
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.SAP_CERT_M}
    field SAP_CERT_M
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.REMOVEFLAG_M}
    field REMOVEFLAG_M
        links_to MLP_HEADER_VIEW.REMOVEFLAG;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.SAMPLE_TYPE_SP}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE_SP
        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.ANALYSIS_ID_MC}
    field ANALYSIS_ID_MC
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.COMPONENT_NAME_MC}
    field COMPONENT_NAME_MC
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.ORDER_NUMBER_MC}
    field ORDER_NUMBER_MC
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.ORDER_NUM;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.EXTERNAL_NAME_CT}
    field EXTERNAL_NAME_CT
        links_to COMPONENT_TRANSLATION.EXTERNAL_NAME;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.EXTERNAL_NAME_CT2}
    field EXTERNAL_NAME_CT2
        links_to COMPONENT_TRANSLATION.EXTERNAL_NAME;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.UNITS_MC}
    field UNITS_MC
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.BOOLEAN_PASS_MV}
    field BOOLEAN_PASS_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.CALCULATION_MV}
    field CALCULATION_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.CALCULATION;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.LEVEL_ID_MV}
    field LEVEL_ID_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.LIMITS_MV}
    field LIMITS_MV
        datatype TEXT(100);

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.MIN_LIMIT_MV}
    field MIN_LIMIT_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.MIN_NUM_LIMIT_MV}
    field MIN_NUM_LIMIT_MV
        datatype REAL;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.MAX_LIMIT_MV}
    field MAX_LIMIT_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.MAX_NUM_LIMIT_MV}
    field MAX_NUM_LIMIT_MV
        datatype REAL;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.TEXT_PHRASE_MV}
    field TEXT_PHRASE_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_PHRASE;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.TEXT_SPEC_MV}
    field TEXT_SPEC_MV
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_SPEC;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.COMPARISON_LPE}
    field COMPARISON_LPE
        links_to LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY.COMPARISON;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.RESULT_VALUE_LPE}
    field RESULT_VALUE_LPE
        links_to LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY.RESULT_VALUE;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.IDENTITY_LPH}
    field IDENTITY_LPH
        links_to LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.DEFAULT_COMPARISON_LPH}
    field DEFAULT_COMPARISON_LPH
        links_to LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.DEFAULT_COMPARISON;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.DESCRIPTION_LPH}
    field DESCRIPTION_LPH
        links_to LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER.DESCRIPTION;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.ANALYSIS_TYPE_A}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.COA_GROUP_A}
    field COA_GROUP_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COA_GROUP;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.COA_GROUP_DESC_A}
    field COA_GROUP_DESC_A
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.INOC_TEMP_A}
    field INOC_TEMP_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INOC_TEMP;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.Q_METHOD_A}
    field Q_METHOD_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.Q_METHOD;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.QAM_NUMBER_A}
    field QAM_NUMBER_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAM_NUMBER;

    {SQL_PROD_SPEC.EXPECTED_TIME_A}
    field EXPECTED_TIME_A
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.EXPECTED_TIME;

    select_clause
        select CL.[IDENTITY] AS LANGUAGE_CT, M.[IDENTITY] AS PRODUCT_ID_M, M.PRODUCT_VERSION AS PRODUCT_VERSION_M, M.SUB_IDENTITY AS SUB_IDENTITY_M, M.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION AS SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION_M, case when M.[IDENTITY] = M.SUB_IDENTITY then 'T' else 'F' end MAIN_MLP_M,
        (select EXTERNAL_DATE
        from EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS
        where [IDENTITY] = MH.[IDENTITY] and MLP_VERSION = MH.PRODUCT_VERSION)EXTERNAL_DATE_M, MH.APPROVAL_STATUS AS APPROVAL_STATUS_M, MH.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION_M, MH.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP AS PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_M,
        (select PHRASE_TEXT
        from PHRASE
        where PHRASE_TYPE = 'MLP_APPLIC' and PHRASE_ID = MH.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP)PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP_DESC_M, MH.PRODUCT_CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE_M, MH.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP AS PRODUCT_SUBGROUP_M, MH.PRODUCT_GROUP AS PRODUCT_GROUP_M,
        (select PHRASE_TEXT
        from PHRASE
        where PHRASE_TYPE = 'MLP_GROUP' and PHRASE_ID = MH.PRODUCT_GROUP)PRODUCT_GROUP_DESC_M, MH.SAMPLE_TYPE AS SAMPLE_TYPE_M,
        (select PHRASE_TEXT
        from PHRASE
        where PHRASE_TYPE = 'SAMP_TYPE' and PHRASE_ID = MH.SAMPLE_TYPE)SAMPLE_TYPE_DESC_M, case when INOC.INOC_PCT_M_COUNT > 1 then 'ERROR' else INOC.INOC_PCT_M end INOC_PCT_M, MH.CERT_TYPE AS CERT_TYPE_M, MH.SAP_CERT AS SAP_CERT_M, MH.REMOVEFLAG AS REMOVEFLAG_M, SP.SAMPLE_TYPE AS SAMPLE_TYPE_SP, MC.ANALYSIS_ID AS ANALYSIS_ID_MC, MC.COMPONENT_NAME AS COMPONENT_NAME_MC, MC.ORDER_NUM AS ORDER_NUMBER_MC, case when MC.ANALYSIS_ID = '$NULL' and ltrim(CT2.EXTERNAL_NAME)<> '' then CT2.EXTERNAL_NAME COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CI_AS_WS when ltrim(CT.EXTERNAL_NAME)<> '' then CT.EXTERNAL_NAME COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CI_AS_WS else MC.COMPONENT_NAME COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CI_AS_WS end EXTERNAL_NAME_CT, CT2.EXTERNAL_NAME EXTERNAL_NAME_CT2, MC.UNITS AS UNITS_MC, MV.BOOLEAN_PASS AS BOOLEAN_PASS_MV, MV.CALCULATION AS CALCULATION_MV, MV.LEVEL_ID AS LEVEL_ID_MV, case when (MV.MAX_LIMIT = '')and (MV.MIN_LIMIT <> '')then ltrim(MV.MIN_LIMIT)when (MV.MAX_LIMIT <> '')and (MV.MIN_LIMIT <> '')then ltrim(MV.MIN_LIMIT)++' - '++MV.MAX_LIMIT when (MV.TEXT_SPEC <> ' ')and (MV.TEXT_SPEC is not NULL)then MV.TEXT_SPEC else case when CTP.EXTERNAL_NAME is null then LPE.RESULT_VALUE COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CI_AS_WS else CTP.EXTERNAL_NAME end end AS LIMITS_MV, MV.MIN_LIMIT AS MIN_LIMIT_MV, case when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MV.MIN_LIMIT, 1, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MV.MIN_LIMIT, 1, LEN (MV.MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MV.MIN_LIMIT, 2, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MV.MIN_LIMIT, 2, LEN (MV.MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MV.MIN_LIMIT, 3, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MV.MIN_LIMIT, 3, LEN (MV.MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MV.MIN_LIMIT, 4, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MV.MIN_LIMIT, 4, LEN (MV.MIN_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ltrim(MV.MIN_LIMIT)= '' then null else '' end MIN_NUM_LIMIT_MV, MV.MAX_LIMIT AS MAX_LIMIT_MV, case when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MV.MAX_LIMIT, 1, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MV.MAX_LIMIT, 1, LEN (MV.MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MV.MAX_LIMIT, 2, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MV.MAX_LIMIT, 2, LEN (MV.MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MV.MAX_LIMIT, 3, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MV.MAX_LIMIT, 3, LEN (MV.MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ISNUMERIC (SUBSTRING (MV.MAX_LIMIT, 4, 1))= 1 then CAST (SUBSTRING (MV.MAX_LIMIT, 4, LEN (MV.MAX_LIMIT))AS FLOAT)when ltrim(MV.MAX_LIMIT)= '' then null else '' end MAX_NUM_LIMIT_MV, MV.TEXT_PHRASE AS TEXT_PHRASE_MV, MV.TEXT_SPEC AS TEXT_SPEC_MV, LPE.COMPARISON AS COMPARISON_LPE, LPE.RESULT_VALUE AS RESULT_VALUE_LPE, LPH.[IDENTITY] AS IDENTITY_LPH, LPH.DEFAULT_COMPARISON AS DEFAULT_COMPARISON_LPH, LPH.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION_LPH, A.ANALYSIS_TYPE AS ANALYSIS_TYPE_A, A.COA_GROUP AS COA_GROUP_A,
        (select PHRASE_TEXT
        from PHRASE
        where PHRASE_TYPE = 'COA_GROUP' and PHRASE_ID = A.COA_GROUP)COA_GROUP_DESC_A, A.INOC_TEMP AS INOC_TEMP_A, A.Q_METHOD AS Q_METHOD_A, A.QAM_NUMBER AS QAM_NUMBER_A, A.EXPECTED_TIME AS EXPECTED_TIME_A
        from MLP_HEADER_VIEW M INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER MH on M.[IDENTITY] = MH.[IDENTITY] and M.PRODUCT_VERSION = MH.PRODUCT_VERSION
        left outer join PROD_SCHED PS on M.SUB_IDENTITY = PS.PRODUCT_NAME and M.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION = PS.PRODUCT_VERSION
        left outer join SAMPLE_POINT SP on PS.SAMPLING_POINT = SP.[IDENTITY]
        left outer join MLP_COMPONENTS MC on (M.SUB_IDENTITY = MC.PRODUCT_ID and M.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION = MC.PRODUCT_VERSION)INNER JOIN MLP_VALUES MV on (MC.ENTRY_CODE = MV.ENTRY_CODE and (MV.ANALYSIS_ID = MC.ANALYSIS_ID or MV.ANALYSIS_ID = '$NULL'))
        left outer join VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A on (MC.ANALYSIS_ID = A.[IDENTITY] and
        (select MAX_VERSION
        from MAX_ACTIVE_ANAL_VER
        where [IDENTITY] = MC.ANALYSIS_ID)= A.ANALYSIS_VERSION)
        left outer join COMPONENT_LANGAUGE CL on CL.REMOVEFLAG = 'F'
        left outer join COMPONENT_TRANSLATION CT on (CT.COMPONENT_NAME = MC.COMPONENT_NAME and CT.ANALYSIS_TYPE = A.ANALYSIS_TYPE and CL.[IDENTITY] = CT.LANGAUGE)
        left outer join COMPONENT_TRANSLATION CT2 on (CT2.COMPONENT_NAME = MC.COMPONENT_NAME and CL.[IDENTITY] = CT2.LANGAUGE and CT2.ANALYSIS_TYPE = '')
        left outer join LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY LPE on (MV.TEXT_PHRASE = LPE.LIMIT_PHRASE and LPE.COMPARISON = 'P')
        left outer join COMPONENT_TRANSLATION CTP on (CTP.COMPONENT_NAME = LPE.RESULT_VALUE COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS and CTP.ANALYSIS_TYPE = 'PHRASE' and CTP.LANGAUGE = CL.[IDENTITY])
        left outer join LIMIT_PHRASE_HEADER LPH on (LPE.LIMIT_PHRASE = LPH.[IDENTITY] and LPE.COMPARISON = LPH.DEFAULT_COMPARISON)OUTER APPLY
        (select min(P.VAL8)INOC_PCT_M, COUNT (1)INOC_PCT_M_COUNT
        from PARM_SETUP P
        where P.[IDENTITY] = MH.[IDENTITY] and P.IDENTITY_VERSION = M.PRODUCT_VERSION and P.PARM_TYPE = 'M' and P.PARM_ID = 'INOC_PCT' and p.VAL1 = mc.ANALYSIS_ID)inoc;

    view REPEATED_TESTS
        on_table ALL_SAMPLE, ALL_TEST;

    {REPEATED_TESTS.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {REPEATED_TESTS.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT;

    {REPEATED_TESTS.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS;

    {REPEATED_TESTS.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to SAMPLE.GROUP_ID;

    {REPEATED_TESTS.LOGIN_DATE}
    field LOGIN_DATE
        links_to SAMPLE.LOGIN_DATE;

    {REPEATED_TESTS.SAMPLE_RECIEVED}
    field SAMPLE_RECIEVED
        links_to SAMPLE.RECD_DATE;

    {REPEATED_TESTS.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS;

    {REPEATED_TESTS.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to TEST.TEST_COUNT;

    {REPEATED_TESTS.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {REPEATED_TESTS.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS;

    select_clause
        select AS1.ID_NUMERIC, AS1.ID_TEXT, AS1.STATUS, AS1.GROUP_ID, AS1.LOGIN_DATE, AS1.RECD_DATE, AT1.ANALYSIS, AT1.TEST_COUNT, AT1.TEST_NUMBER, AT1.STATUS
        from ALL_SAMPLE AS1, ALL_TEST AT1
        where AS1.ID_NUMERIC = AT1.SAMPLE and exists
        (select 1
        from ALL_SAMPLE AS2, ALL_TEST AT2
        where AT2.TEST_COUNT > 1 and AS2.ID_NUMERIC = AT2.SAMPLE and AS1.ID_NUMERIC = AS2.ID_NUMERIC and AT1.ANALYSIS = AT2.ANALYSIS);

    view ORACLE_JOBS;

    {ORACLE_JOBS.MLP_ID}
    field MLP_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {ORACLE_JOBS.BATCH_NO}
    field BATCH_NO
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {ORACLE_JOBS.PRODUCTION_DATE}
    field PRODUCTION_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {ORACLE_JOBS.LOGIN_GROUP}
    field LOGIN_GROUP
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {ORACLE_JOBS.LAYERED}
    field LAYERED
        datatype TEXT (1) 
        allowed_characters 'YNU';

    {ORACLE_JOBS.BATCH_STATUS}
    field BATCH_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(10) 
        allowed_characters 'A..Z- _';

    {ORACLE_JOBS.TEMPLATE_CODE}
    field TEMPLATE_CODE
        datatype TEXT(1) 
        allowed_characters 'MP';

    {ORACLE_JOBS.WORK_CENTER}
    field WORK_CENTER
        datatype TEXT(20);

    {ORACLE_JOBS.IS_PRODUCT}
    field IS_PRODUCT
        datatype BOOLEAN 
        true_word 'Yes' 
        false_word 'No';

    select_clause
        select EF.MLP_ID COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS, case when EF.LOGIN_FREQUENCY = 'D' then EF.LOGIN_FREQUENCY + CONVERT (VARCHAR, RIGHT (DATEPART (YY, GETDATE ()), 2))+ RIGHT ('0' + CONVERT (VARCHAR, DATEPART (MM, GETDATE ())), 2)+ RIGHT ('0' + CONVERT (VARCHAR, DATEPART (DD, GETDATE ())), 2)when EF.LOGIN_FREQUENCY = 'W' then EF.LOGIN_FREQUENCY + CONVERT (VARCHAR, RIGHT (DATEPART (YY, GETDATE ()), 2))+ RIGHT ('0' + CONVERT (VARCHAR, DATEPART (ISO_WEEK, GETDATE ())), 2)when EF.LOGIN_FREQUENCY = 'M' then EF.LOGIN_FREQUENCY + CONVERT (VARCHAR, RIGHT (DATEPART (YY, GETDATE ()), 2))+ RIGHT ('0' + CONVERT (VARCHAR, DATEPART (MM, GETDATE ())), 2)when EF.LOGIN_FREQUENCY = 'Q' then EF.LOGIN_FREQUENCY + CONVERT (VARCHAR, RIGHT (DATEPART (YY, GETDATE ()), 2))+ CONVERT (VARCHAR, DATEPART (Q, GETDATE ()))when EF.LOGIN_FREQUENCY = 'Y' then EF.LOGIN_FREQUENCY + CONVERT (VARCHAR, RIGHT (DATEPART (YY, GETDATE ()), 2))else 'ERROR' end COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS, CAST ('' AS DATETIME), EF.LOGIN_GROUP, EF.LAYERED, 'C', 'P', EF.WORK_CENTER, 'F'
        from ENVIRON_FREQ EF
        where REMOVEFLAG <> 'T'
        union all
        select CONVERT (VARCHAR, B.SAP_MATNR)COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS, CONVERT (VARCHAR, B.BATCH_NO)COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS, B.PRODUCTION_DATE, 'HOR-PIM', 'N', 'C', 'P', 'HOR-PIM', 'T'
        from [CHEOPS]..[CH_OWNER].[PIM_BATCHES] B
        where B.BATCH_STATUS = 'AW' and ltrim (B.SAP_MATNR)is not null and ltrim (B.BATCH_NO)is not null and ltrim (B.PRODUCTION_DATE)is not null;

    view INCIDENT_JOBS
        on_table JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE;

    {INCIDENT_JOBS.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME;

    {INCIDENT_JOBS.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    select_clause
        select JOB_NAME, JOB_STATUS
        from JOB_HEADER
        where JOB_NAME IN
        (select distinct JOB_NAME
        from SAMPLE
        where HAS_INCIDENTS = 'T');

    view MAX_TEST_COUNT
        on_table SAMPLE, TEST;

    {MAX_TEST_COUNT.SAMPLE}
    field SAMPLE
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {MAX_TEST_COUNT.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {MAX_TEST_COUNT.MAX_COUNT}
    field MAX_COUNT
        datatype INTEGER;

    select_clause
        select SAMPLE, ANALYSIS, max(TEST_COUNT)
        from TEST GROUP BY ANALYSIS, SAMPLE;

    view RES_HAVING_SPEC
        on_table RESULT, TEST, SAMPLE, MLP_VALUES;

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (20);

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        datatype IDENTITY (30);

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.NAME}
    field NAME
        alias COMPONENT_NAME 
        datatype TEXT (40) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        alias COMP_NUM 
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.RESULT_TYPE}
    field RESULT_TYPE
        datatype TEXT(1);

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        datatype TEXT(10) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.VALUE}
    field VALUE
        datatype REAL;

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.TEXT}
    field TEXT
        datatype TEXT(234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.OUT_OF_RANGE}
    field OUT_OF_RANGE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        datatype TEXT(1);

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.OLD_STATUS}
    field OLD_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(1);

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.ENTERED_ON}
    field ENTERED_ON
        datatype DATE;

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.ENTERED_BY}
    field ENTERED_BY
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.QAM_NUMBER}
    field QAM_NUMBER
        datatype IDENTITY (17);

    {RES_HAVING_SPEC.Q_INSTRUCTION}
    field Q_INSTRUCTION
        datatype IDENTITY (17);

    select_clause
        select SAMPLE.JOB_NAME, SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, SAMPLE.STATUS, RESULT.TEST_NUMBER, TEST.ANALYSIS, TEST.STATUS, RESULT.NAME, RESULT.ORDER_NUMBER, RESULT.RESULT_TYPE, RESULT.UNITS, RESULT.VALUE, RESULT.TEXT, RESULT.OUT_OF_RANGE, RESULT.STATUS, RESULT.OLD_STATUS, RESULT.ENTERED_ON, RESULT.ENTERED_BY, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.QAM_NUMBER, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.Q_INSTRUCTION
        from RESULT, TEST, SAMPLE, MLP_COMPONENTS, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS
        where RESULT.TEST_NUMBER = TEST.TEST_NUMBER and TEST.SAMPLE = SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC and SAMPLE.PRODUCT = MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID and SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION = MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_VERSION and RESULT.NAME = MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME and ((TEST.ANALYSIS = MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID)or (MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID ='$NULL'))and TEST.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.[IDENTITY] and TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION;

    view LAST_TEST
        on_table SAMPLE, TEST;

    {LAST_TEST.JOB_MPS_STATUS}
    field JOB_MPS_STATUS
        datatype IDENTITY (17);

    {LAST_TEST.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {LAST_TEST.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (20);

    {LAST_TEST.PRODUCT}
    field PRODUCT
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {LAST_TEST.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {LAST_TEST.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (15);

    {LAST_TEST.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {LAST_TEST.LOGIN_PLANT}
    field LOGIN_PLANT
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {LAST_TEST.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {LAST_TEST.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        datatype IDENTITY (30);

    {LAST_TEST.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {LAST_TEST.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {LAST_TEST.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {LAST_TEST.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {LAST_TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {LAST_TEST.ON_SPEC}
    field ON_SPEC
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {LAST_TEST.COMPLETER}
    field COMPLETER
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {LAST_TEST.DATE_COMPLETED}
    field DATE_COMPLETED
        datatype DATE;

    {LAST_TEST.SAMPLE_INCIDENTS}
    field SAMPLE_INCIDENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {LAST_TEST.ONE}
    field ONE
        datatype INTEGER;

    select_clause
        select JOB_HEADER.MPS_STATUS, JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS, SAMPLE.JOB_NAME, SAMPLE.PRODUCT, SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION, SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME, SAMPLE.GROUP_ID, SAMPLE.LOGIN_PLANT, SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, SAMPLE.STATUS, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, TEST.STATUS, TEST.ANALYSIS, TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION, TEST.ON_SPEC, TEST.COMPLETER, TEST.DATE_COMPLETED, SAMPLE.HAS_INCIDENTS, '1'
        from JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE, TEST
        where JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME = SAMPLE.JOB_NAME and TEST.SAMPLE = SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC and not exists
        (select 1
        from TEST T2, SAMPLE S2
        where T2.SAMPLE = S2.ID_NUMERIC and SAMPLE.JOB_NAME = S2.JOB_NAME and T2.DATE_COMPLETED > TEST.DATE_COMPLETED and T2.DATE_COMPLETED is not NULL)and TEST.DATE_COMPLETED is not null
        union all
        select C_JOB_HEADER.MPS_STATUS, C_JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS, C_SAMPLE.JOB_NAME, C_SAMPLE.PRODUCT, C_SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION, C_SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME, C_SAMPLE.GROUP_ID, C_SAMPLE.LOGIN_PLANT, C_SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC, C_SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, C_SAMPLE.STATUS, C_TEST.TEST_NUMBER, C_TEST.STATUS, C_TEST.ANALYSIS, C_TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION, C_TEST.ON_SPEC, C_TEST.COMPLETER, C_TEST.DATE_COMPLETED, C_SAMPLE.HAS_INCIDENTS, '1'
        from C_JOB_HEADER, C_SAMPLE, C_TEST
        where C_JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME = C_SAMPLE.JOB_NAME and C_TEST.SAMPLE = C_SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC and not exists
        (select 1
        from C_TEST T2, C_SAMPLE S2
        where T2.SAMPLE = S2.ID_NUMERIC and C_SAMPLE.JOB_NAME = S2.JOB_NAME and T2.DATE_COMPLETED > C_TEST.DATE_COMPLETED and T2.DATE_COMPLETED is not null)and C_TEST.DATE_COMPLETED is not null;

    view ANALTYPE_SAMPLE
        on_table MLP_HEADER, JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE, TEST, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS;

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY (20);

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        datatype IDENTITY(10);

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        datatype IDENTITY (30);

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (1);

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.ANALYSIS_TYPE}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY (17);

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.MATERIAL}
    field MATERIAL
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.MATERIAL_VERSION}
    field MATERIAL_VERSION
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.PRODUCT_CODE}
    field PRODUCT_CODE
        datatype TEXT (40);

    {ANALTYPE_SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY;

    select_clause
        select JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME, SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, SAMPLE.STATUS, TEST.TEST_NUMBER, TEST.ANALYSIS, TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION, TEST.STATUS, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE, SAMPLE.PRODUCT, SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION, MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_CODE, SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME
        from MLP_HEADER, JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE, TEST, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS
        where JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME = SAMPLE.JOB_NAME and SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC = TEST.SAMPLE and TEST.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.[IDENTITY] and TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION and SAMPLE.PRODUCT = MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY] and SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION = MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    view INSTRUMENT_CALIB
        on_table INSTRUMENT_LOG;

    {INSTRUMENT_CALIB.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {INSTRUMENT_CALIB.LAST_CALIB_DATE}
    field LAST_CALIB_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {INSTRUMENT_CALIB.NEXT_CALIB_DATE}
    field NEXT_CALIB_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {INSTRUMENT_CALIB.CALIB_NUMBERS}
    field CALIB_NUMBERS
        datatype INTEGER;

    select_clause
        select IL.INSTRUMENT_ID, max(IL.LOG_DATE), max(IL.LOG_DATE + CAST (SUBSTRING (I.CALIB_INTV, 1, 4)AS NUMERIC)), COUNT (*)
        from INSTRUMENT_LOG IL, INSTRUMENT I
        where IL.INSTRUMENT_ID = I.[IDENTITY] and IL.LOG_TYPE = 'CALIBRATION' GROUP BY INSTRUMENT_ID union
        select [IDENTITY], NULL, NULL, 0
        from INSTRUMENT
        where not exists
        (select 1
        from INSTRUMENT_LOG IL2
        where IL2.INSTRUMENT_ID = INSTRUMENT.[IDENTITY] and LOG_TYPE = 'CALIBRATION');

    view INSTRUMENT_SERVICE
        on_table INSTRUMENT_LOG;

    {INSTRUMENT_SERVICE.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {INSTRUMENT_SERVICE.LAST_SERVICE_DATE}
    field LAST_SERVICE_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {INSTRUMENT_SERVICE.NEXT_SERVICE_DATE}
    field NEXT_SERVICE_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {INSTRUMENT_SERVICE.SERVICE_NUMBERS}
    field SERVICE_NUMBERS
        datatype INTEGER;

    select_clause
        select IL.INSTRUMENT_ID, max(IL.LOG_DATE), max(IL.LOG_DATE + CAST (SUBSTRING (I.SERVICE_INTV, 1, 4)AS NUMERIC)), COUNT (*)
        from INSTRUMENT_LOG IL, INSTRUMENT I
        where IL.INSTRUMENT_ID = I.[IDENTITY] and IL.LOG_TYPE = 'SERVICE' GROUP BY INSTRUMENT_ID union
        select [IDENTITY], NULL, NULL, 0
        from INSTRUMENT
        where not exists
        (select 1
        from INSTRUMENT_LOG IL2
        where IL2.INSTRUMENT_ID = INSTRUMENT.[IDENTITY] and LOG_TYPE = 'SERVICE');

    view MEDIA_VIEW
        on_table PHRASE, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS;

    {MEDIA_VIEW.MEDIA_ID}
    field MEDIA_ID
        datatype IDENTITY (17) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {MEDIA_VIEW.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for ORDERING;

    {MEDIA_VIEW.MEDIA_TEXT}
    field MEDIA_TEXT
        datatype TEXT (234) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {MEDIA_VIEW.ICON}
    field ICON
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {MEDIA_VIEW.ANALYSIS_TYPE}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY (17) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    select_clause
        select distinct PHRASE.PHRASE_ID, PHRASE.ORDER_NUM, PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT, PHRASE.ICON, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE
        from PHRASE, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS
        where PHRASE.PHRASE_TYPE = 'MEDIA_01' and VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MEDIA_01 = PHRASE.PHRASE_ID;

    view MEDIA_BATCH_FOR_TEST
        on_table MEDIA_BATCH, TEST, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS;

    {MEDIA_BATCH_FOR_TEST.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {MEDIA_BATCH_FOR_TEST.DATE_TEST_COMPLETED}
    field DATE_TEST_COMPLETED
        datatype DATE;

    {MEDIA_BATCH_FOR_TEST.MEDIA_01}
    field MEDIA_01
        datatype IDENTITY (17);

    {MEDIA_BATCH_FOR_TEST.BATCH_NUMBER}
    field BATCH_NUMBER
        datatype IDENTITY(20);

    {MEDIA_BATCH_FOR_TEST.BATCH_COMMENT}
    field BATCH_COMMENT
        datatype TEXT (256);

    {MEDIA_BATCH_FOR_TEST.BACH_ACTIVATION_DATE}
    field BACH_ACTIVATION_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    select_clause
        select distinct TEST.TEST_NUMBER, TEST.DATE_COMPLETED, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MEDIA_01, MEDIA_BATCH.BATCH_NUMBER, CONVERT (VARCHAR, MEDIA_BATCH.BATCH_COMMENT), MEDIA_BATCH.ACTIVATION_DATE
        from MEDIA_BATCH, TEST, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS
        where TEST.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.[IDENTITY] and TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MEDIA_01 = MEDIA_BATCH.MEDIA and MEDIA_BATCH.ACTIVATION_DATE =
        (select max(ACTIVATION_DATE)
        from MEDIA_BATCH MB2
        where MB2.ACTIVATION_DATE < TEST.DATE_COMPLETED)
        union all
        select distinct C_TEST.TEST_NUMBER, C_TEST.DATE_COMPLETED, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MEDIA_01, MEDIA_BATCH.BATCH_NUMBER, CONVERT (VARCHAR, MEDIA_BATCH.BATCH_COMMENT), MEDIA_BATCH.ACTIVATION_DATE
        from MEDIA_BATCH, C_TEST, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS
        where C_TEST.ANALYSIS = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.[IDENTITY] and C_TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION = VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION and VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MEDIA_01 = MEDIA_BATCH.MEDIA and MEDIA_BATCH.ACTIVATION_DATE =
        (select max(ACTIVATION_DATE)
        from MEDIA_BATCH MB2
        where MB2.ACTIVATION_DATE < C_TEST.DATE_COMPLETED);

    table CHEOPS_PO;

    {CHEOPS_PO.PRODUCTION_ORDER}
    field PRODUCTION_ORDER
        datatype TEXT(12) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {CHEOPS_PO.PLANT_ID}
    field PLANT_ID
        datatype TEXT(10) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CHEOPS_PO.SITE_ID}
    field SITE_ID
        datatype TEXT(10);

    {CHEOPS_PO.PRODUCT_ID}
    field PRODUCT_ID
        datatype IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CHEOPS_PO.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {CHEOPS_PO.QUANTITY}
    field QUANTITY
        datatype REAL;

    {CHEOPS_PO.PRODUCT_STATUS}
    field PRODUCT_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(10);

    {CHEOPS_PO.PRODUCTION_ORDER_STATUS}
    field PRODUCTION_ORDER_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(3);

    {CHEOPS_PO.MPS_STATUS}
    field MPS_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(4);

    {CHEOPS_PO.PRODUCTION_DATE}
    field PRODUCTION_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {CHEOPS_PO.ACTUAL_PRODUCTION_DATE}
    field ACTUAL_PRODUCTION_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {CHEOPS_PO.EXP_BATCH_NO}
    field EXP_BATCH_NO
        datatype TEXT(12);

    view CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD;

    {CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.PRODUCTION_ORDER}
    field PRODUCTION_ORDER
        datatype TEXT(12) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.PLANT_ID}
    field PLANT_ID
        datatype TEXT(10) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.SITE_ID}
    field SITE_ID
        datatype TEXT(10);

    {CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.PRODUCT_ID}
    field PRODUCT_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.QUANTITY}
    field QUANTITY
        datatype REAL;

    {CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.PRODUCT_STATUS}
    field PRODUCT_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(10);

    {CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.PRODUCTION_ORDER_STATUS}
    field PRODUCTION_ORDER_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(3);

    {CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.MPS_STATUS}
    field MPS_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(4);

    {CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.PRODUCTION_DATE}
    field PRODUCTION_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.ACTUAL_PRODUCTION_DATE}
    field ACTUAL_PRODUCTION_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.EXP_BATCH_NO}
    field EXP_BATCH_NO
        datatype TEXT(12);

    select_clause
        select distinct PRODUCTION_ORDER, PO.PLANT_ID, PO.SITE_ID, PO.PRODUCT_ID, PO.PRODUCT_VERSION, PO.QUANTITY, PO.PRODUCT_STATUS, PO.PRODUCTION_ORDER_STATUS, PO.MPS_STATUS, CAST (PO.PRODUCTION_DATE AS DATE)PRODUCTION_DATE, CAST (PO.ACTUAL_PRODUCTION_DATE AS DATE)ACTUAL_PRODUCTION_DATE, PO.EXP_BATCH_NO
        from [CHEOPS]..[CH_OWNER].[PRODUCTION_ORDERS] PO, MLP_HEADER MH
        where MH.[IDENTITY] = CONVERT (VARCHAR, PO.PRODUCT_ID)and MH.REMOVEFLAG <> 'T';

    view EXP_JOB_SAP_VIEW
        on_table JOB_HEADER, CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD;

    {EXP_JOB_SAP_VIEW.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME;

    {EXP_JOB_SAP_VIEW.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME;

    {EXP_JOB_SAP_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME;

    {EXP_JOB_SAP_VIEW.INSPECTION_LOT}
    field INSPECTION_LOT
        links_to JOB_HEADER.INSPECTION_LOT;

    {EXP_JOB_SAP_VIEW.INSPECTION_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_TYPE
        links_to JOB_HEADER.INSPECTION_TYPE;

    {EXP_JOB_SAP_VIEW.MPS_STATUS}
    field MPS_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.MPS_STATUS;

    {EXP_JOB_SAP_VIEW.AUTHORISATION_NOTES}
    field AUTHORISATION_NOTES
        links_to JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISATION_NOTES;

    {EXP_JOB_SAP_VIEW.CHEOPS_STATUS}
    field CHEOPS_STATUS
        links_to CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD.PRODUCTION_ORDER_STATUS;

    select_clause
        select J.PRODUCT_NAME, J.BATCH_NAME, J.JOB_NAME, J.INSPECTION_LOT, J.INSPECTION_TYPE, J.MPS_STATUS, J.AUTHORISATION_NOTES, C.PRODUCTION_ORDER_STATUS AS CHEOPS_STATUS
        from JOB_HEADER J
        left outer join CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD C on C.PRODUCTION_ORDER COLLATE LATIN1_GENERAL_CS_AS_WS = RIGHT ('0000000000' + J.PROCESS_ORDER, 10)
        where J.JOB_STATUS = 'A';

    view EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW
        on_table JOB_HEADER, CHEOPS_PRODUCTION_ORD;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.PRODUCT}
    field PRODUCT
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.INSPECTION_LOT}
    field INSPECTION_LOT
        links_to SAMPLE.INSPECTION_LOT;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.INSPECTION_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_TYPE
        links_to SAMPLE.INSPECTION_TYPE;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.SAP_CHARAC}
    field SAP_CHARAC
        links_to PARAMETERS_VIEW.VAL2;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.ID}
    field ID
        datatype TEXT(30);

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.RESULT_TYPE}
    field RESULT_TYPE
        links_to RESULT.RESULT_TYPE;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.CALCULATION;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to RESULT.NAME;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.TEXT}
    field TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to RESULT.UNITS;

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.LIMITS}
    field LIMITS
        datatype TEXT(60);

    {EXP_RES_SAP_VIEW.PASS_FAIL}
    field PASS_FAIL
        datatype TEXT(4);

    select_clause
        SELECT
            S.PRODUCT
            ,S.BATCH_NAME
            ,J.INSPECTION_LOT
            ,J.INSPECTION_TYPE
            ,S.ID_NUMERIC
            ,T.TEST_NUMBER
            ,C.SAP_CHARAC
            ,T.TEST_NUMBER + ':' + LTRIM(C.SAP_CHARAC)
            ,R.RESULT_TYPE
            ,C.CALCULATION
            ,R.NAME
            ,R.TEXT
            ,R.UNITS
           ,CASE
                WHEN l.LIMITS IS NULL THEN ''
                ELSE l.LIMITS 
            END LIMITS
           ,CASE
                WHEN l.LIMITS IS NULL THEN ''
                WHEN r.TEXT = l.LIMITS THEN 'PASS'
            ELSE 
                CASE
                    WHEN LEFT(L.MIN_LIMIT,2) = '<=' THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','')AS FLOAT) <= CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','')AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    WHEN LEFT(L.MIN_LIMIT,1) = '<' AND LEFT(R.TEXT,1) = '<'  THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) < CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','')AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    WHEN LEFT(L.MIN_LIMIT,1) = '<'  THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) < CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    WHEN LEFT(L.MIN_LIMIT,2) = '>=' THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) >= CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    WHEN LEFT(L.MIN_LIMIT,1) = '>' AND LEFT(R.TEXT,1) = '>'  THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) >= CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    WHEN LEFT(L.MIN_LIMIT,1) = '>'  THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) > CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    WHEN ISNUMERIC(l.MIN_LIMIT) = 1 AND ISNUMERIC(l.MAX_LIMIT) = 1
                      AND l.MIN_LIMIT <> '' AND l.MAX_LIMIT <> ''THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) > CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) 
                             AND CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) < CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MAX_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    ELSE '?'
                END
            END PASS_FAIL
        FROM ALL_SAMPLE S
        INNER JOIN ALL_JOB_HEADER j
            ON s.JOB_NAME = j.JOB_NAME
        INNER JOIN ALL_TEST T
            ON S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE
        INNER JOIN ALL_RESULT R
            ON T.TEST_NUMBER = R.TEST_NUMBER
            AND R.STATUS = 'A'
        LEFT OUTER JOIN MLP_LIMITS_VIEW l
            ON s.PRODUCT = l.PRODUCT_ID
            AND s.PRODUCT_VERSION = l.PRODUCT_VERSION
            AND l.LEVEL_ID IN ('INTERNAL', 'EXTERNAL')
            AND (t.ANALYSIS = l.ANALYSIS_ID
            AND r.NAME = l.COMPONENT_NAME
            OR '$NULL' = l.ANALYSIS_ID
            AND r.NAME = l.COMPONENT_NAME)
        INNER JOIN VERSIONED_COMPONENT C
            ON T.ANALYSIS = C.ANALYSIS
            AND T.ANALYSIS_VERSION = C.ANALYSIS_VERSION
            AND R.NAME = C.NAME
            AND LTRIM(C.SAP_CHARAC) <> ''
        INNER JOIN SAMPLE_POINT SP
            ON S.SAMPLING_POINT = SP.[IDENTITY]
            AND SP.MPS_EXPORT = 'T'
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
            S.PRODUCT
           ,S.BATCH_NAME
           ,J.INSPECTION_LOT
           ,J.INSPECTION_TYPE
           ,S.ID_NUMERIC
           ,T.TEST_NUMBER
           ,sc.CHAR
           ,T.TEST_NUMBER + ':' + LTRIM(sc.CHAR) ID
           ,R.RESULT_TYPE
           ,r.CALCULATION
           ,R.NAME
           ,R.TEXT
           ,R.UNITS
           ,l.LIMITS
           ,CASE
                WHEN r.TEXT = l.LIMITS THEN 'PASS'
            ELSE 
                CASE
                    WHEN LEFT(L.MIN_LIMIT,2) = '<=' THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','')AS FLOAT) <= CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','')AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    WHEN LEFT(L.MIN_LIMIT,1) = '<' AND LEFT(R.TEXT,1) = '<'  THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) < CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','')AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    WHEN LEFT(L.MIN_LIMIT,1) = '<'  THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) < CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    WHEN LEFT(L.MIN_LIMIT,2) = '>=' THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) >= CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    WHEN LEFT(L.MIN_LIMIT,1) = '>' AND LEFT(R.TEXT,1) = '>'  THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) >= CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    WHEN LEFT(L.MIN_LIMIT,1) = '>'  THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) > CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    WHEN ISNUMERIC(l.MIN_LIMIT) = 1 AND ISNUMERIC(l.MAX_LIMIT) = 1
                      AND l.MIN_LIMIT <> '' AND l.MAX_LIMIT <> ''THEN 
                        CASE
                            WHEN CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) > CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MIN_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) 
                             AND CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(R.TEXT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) < CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(L.MAX_LIMIT,'<',''),'>',''),'=','') AS FLOAT) THEN 'PASS'
                            ELSE 'FAIL'
                        END
                    ELSE '?'
                END
            END PASS_FAIL
        FROM ALL_SAMPLE S
        INNER JOIN ALL_JOB_HEADER j
            ON s.JOB_NAME = j.JOB_NAME
        INNER JOIN ALL_TEST T
            ON S.ID_NUMERIC = T.SAMPLE
        INNER JOIN ALL_RESULT R
            ON T.TEST_NUMBER = R.TEST_NUMBER
            AND R.STATUS = 'A'
        INNER JOIN MLP_LIMITS_VIEW l
            ON s.PRODUCT = l.PRODUCT_ID
            AND s.PRODUCT_VERSION = l.PRODUCT_VERSION
            AND l.LEVEL_ID IN ('INTERNAL', 'EXTERNAL')
            AND (t.ANALYSIS = l.ANALYSIS_ID
            AND r.NAME = l.COMPONENT_NAME
            OR '$NULL' = l.ANALYSIS_ID
            AND r.NAME = l.COMPONENT_NAME)
        INNER JOIN SAP_CHAR sc
            ON l.COMPONENT_NAME = sc.NAME COLLATE Latin1_General_CS_AS_WS
        INNER JOIN SAMPLE_POINT SP
            ON S.SAMPLING_POINT = SP.[IDENTITY]
            AND SP.MPS_EXPORT = 'T';


    view SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW
        on_table MLP_HEADER, SAMPLE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.ID_TEXT}
    field ID_TEXT
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_TEXT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.JOB_NAME;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.OLD_STATUS}
    field OLD_STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.OLD_STATUS;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.COMPARED}
    field COMPARED
        links_to SAMPLE.COMPARED;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.ON_SPEC}
    field ON_SPEC
        links_to SAMPLE.ON_SPEC;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.RE_SAMPLED}
    field RE_SAMPLED
        links_to SAMPLE.RE_SAMPLED;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.ORIGINAL_SAMPLE}
    field ORIGINAL_SAMPLE
        links_to SAMPLE.ORIGINAL_SAMPLE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.LINK_NUMBER}
    field LINK_NUMBER
        links_to SAMPLE.LINK_NUMBER;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.LOGIN_DATE}
    field LOGIN_DATE
        links_to SAMPLE.LOGIN_DATE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (4);

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.LOGIN_BY}
    field LOGIN_BY
        links_to SAMPLE.LOGIN_BY;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.SAMPLED_DATE}
    field SAMPLED_DATE
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLED_DATE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.RECD_DATE}
    field RECD_DATE
        links_to SAMPLE.RECD_DATE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.DATE_STARTED}
    field DATE_STARTED
        links_to SAMPLE.DATE_STARTED;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.STARTER}
    field STARTER
        links_to SAMPLE.STARTER;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.DATERESREQ}
    field DATERESREQ
        links_to SAMPLE.DATERESREQ;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.DATE_COMPLETED}
    field DATE_COMPLETED
        links_to SAMPLE.DATE_COMPLETED;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.COMPLETER}
    field COMPLETER
        links_to SAMPLE.COMPLETER;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.DATERESAVAIL}
    field DATERESAVAIL
        links_to SAMPLE.DATERESAVAIL;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED
        links_to SAMPLE.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.AUTHORISER}
    field AUTHORISER
        links_to SAMPLE.AUTHORISER;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.AUTHORISATION_NOTES}
    field AUTHORISATION_NOTES
        links_to SAMPLE.AUTHORISATION_NOTES;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.PRODUCT}
    field PRODUCT
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.GRADE_CODE}
    field GRADE_CODE
        links_to SAMPLE.GRADE_CODE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.TESTS_TO_DO}
    field TESTS_TO_DO
        links_to SAMPLE.TESTS_TO_DO;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.ON_WKS}
    field ON_WKS
        links_to SAMPLE.ON_WKS;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.PROJECT_ID}
    field PROJECT_ID
        links_to SAMPLE.PROJECT_ID;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.SAMPLE_TYPE}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.SAMPLE_NAME}
    field SAMPLE_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLE_NAME;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.PREPARATION}

        links_to SAMPLE.PREPARATION;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.HAZARD}

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.STABILITY_SAMPLE}

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.LAYER_FACTOR}

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.C_FACTOR}

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.DATE_IDEAL_COMPLETE}

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED
        links_to SAMPLE.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_IDENTITY}
    field MH_IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_PRODUCT_CODE}
    field MH_PRODUCT_CODE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_CODE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_ENTRY_CODE}
    field MH_ENTRY_CODE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.ENTRY_CODE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_PRODUCT_GROUP}
    field MH_PRODUCT_GROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_GROUP;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_PRODUCT_SUBGROUP}
    field MH_PRODUCT_SUBGROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_DESCRIPTION}
    field MH_DESCRIPTION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.DESCRIPTION;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_TEST_SCHEDULE}
    field MH_TEST_SCHEDULE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.TEST_SCHEDULE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_PRODUCT_STATUS}
    field MH_PRODUCT_STATUS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_STATUS;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_MODIFIED_ON}
    field MH_MODIFIED_ON
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_MODIFIED_BY}
    field MH_MODIFIED_BY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_MODIFIABLE}
    field MH_MODIFIABLE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MODIFIABLE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_REMOVEFLAG}
    field MH_REMOVEFLAG
        links_to MLP_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_GROUP_ID}
    field MH_GROUP_ID
        links_to MLP_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_SAMPLE_TYPE}
    field MH_SAMPLE_TYPE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_CONVERTED_DATE}
    field MH_CONVERTED_DATE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.CONVERTED_DATE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_CONVERTED_BY}
    field MH_CONVERTED_BY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.CONVERTED_BY;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_QC_NUMBER}
    field MH_QC_NUMBER
        links_to MLP_HEADER.QC_NUMBER;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_QC_DATE}
    field MH_QC_DATE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.QC_DATE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_QS_NUMBER}
    field MH_QS_NUMBER
        links_to MLP_HEADER.QS_NUMBER;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_QS_DATE}
    field MH_QS_DATE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.QS_DATE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_QCQS_COMMENT}
    field MH_QCQS_COMMENT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.QCQS_COMMENT;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_MPS_TEMPLATE}
    field MH_MPS_TEMPLATE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MPS_TEMPLATE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_CULTURE_GROUP}
    field MH_CULTURE_GROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.CULTURE_GROUP;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_DISP_RESP}
    field MH_DISP_RESP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.DISP_RESP;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_AMOUNT_01}
    field MH_AMOUNT_01
        links_to MLP_HEADER.AMOUNT_01;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_MASTER_PLANT}
    field MH_MASTER_PLANT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MASTER_PLANT;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_MPS_EXPORT}
    field MH_MPS_EXPORT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MPS_EXPORT;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_ALLOW_AGREE}
    field MH_ALLOW_AGREE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.ALLOW_AGREE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_CERT_TYPE}
    field MH_CERT_TYPE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.CERT_TYPE;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_SAP_CERT}
    field MH_SAP_CERT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.SAP_CERT;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field MH_PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_VERSION_COMMENT}
    field MH_VERSION_COMMENT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.VERSION_COMMENT;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_VERSION_STATUS}
    field MH_VERSION_STATUS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.VERSION_STATUS;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_CREATED_DATE}
    field MH_CREATED_DATE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.CREATED_DATE 
        default '0';

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_APPROVAL_REQD}
    field MH_APPROVAL_REQD
        links_to MLP_HEADER.APPROVAL_REQD;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_APPROVAL_STATUS}
    field MH_APPROVAL_STATUS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.APPROVAL_STATUS;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_INSPECTION_PLAN}
    field MH_INSPECTION_PLAN
        links_to MLP_HEADER.INSPECTION_PLAN;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_EXTERNAL_VERSION}
    field MH_EXTERNAL_VERSION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.EXTERNAL_VERSION;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_DO_SPLAN_LOGIN}
    field MH_DO_SPLAN_LOGIN
        links_to MLP_HEADER.DO_SPLAN_LOGIN;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_PROJECT_ID}
    field MH_PROJECT_ID
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PROJECT_ID;

    {SAMPLE_MLP_VIEW.MH_PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP}
    field MH_PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP;

    select_clause
        select SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC, SAMPLE.ID_TEXT, SAMPLE.JOB_NAME, SAMPLE.STATUS, SAMPLE.OLD_STATUS, SAMPLE.COMPARED, SAMPLE.ON_SPEC, SAMPLE.RE_SAMPLED, SAMPLE.ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, SAMPLE.LINK_NUMBER, SAMPLE.LOGIN_DATE, SAMPLE.LOGIN_BY, SAMPLE.SAMPLED_DATE, SAMPLE.RECD_DATE, SAMPLE.DATE_STARTED, SAMPLE.STARTER, SAMPLE.DATERESREQ, SAMPLE.DATE_COMPLETED, SAMPLE.COMPLETER, SAMPLE.DATERESAVAIL, SAMPLE.DATE_AUTHORISED, SAMPLE.AUTHORISER, SAMPLE.AUTHORISATION_NOTES, SAMPLE.PRODUCT, SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION, SAMPLE.GRADE_CODE, SAMPLE.TESTS_TO_DO, SAMPLE.ON_WKS, SAMPLE.PROJECT_ID, SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME, SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE.SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE.SAMPLE_NAME, SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION, SAMPLE.PREPARATION, SAMPLE.HAZARD, SAMPLE.PRIORITY, SAMPLE.LOCATION_ID, SAMPLE.CUSTOMER_ID, SAMPLE.INVOICE_NUMBER, SAMPLE.TEST_SCHEDULE, SAMPLE.TEMPLATE_ID, SAMPLE.COMP_PROD_NAME, SAMPLE.COMP_PROD_VER, SAMPLE.COMP_PROD_GRADE, SAMPLE.STANDARD, SAMPLE.GROUP_ID, SAMPLE.DATERESEXP, SAMPLE.TANK_NUMBER, SAMPLE.DATESTART_PREP, SAMPLE.SAMPLE_COMMENT, SAMPLE.CONCERN_FUNCTION, SAMPLE.STANDARD_ID, SAMPLE.STANDARD_VERSION, SAMPLE.INSPECTION_HEADER, SAMPLE.STANDARD_TYPE, SAMPLE.BATCH_ID, SAMPLE.MPS_STATUS, SAMPLE.TESTMIX_ID, SAMPLE.BATCH_MASS_INFO, SAMPLE.LOGIN_PLANT, SAMPLE.PRODUCER_ID, SAMPLE.INSPECTION_LOT, SAMPLE.INSPECTION_TYPE, SAMPLE.DYNAMIC_PRODUCT, SAMPLE.TOTAL_ELEMENTS, SAMPLE.SAMPLING_PROCEDURE, SAMPLE.REPLICATE_LINK_NO, SAMPLE.AUTO_VALIDATE, SAMPLE.HAS_INCIDENTS, SAMPLE.STAB_STUDY_ID, SAMPLE.STABILITY_SAMPLE, SAMPLE.LAYER_FACTOR, SAMPLE.C_FACTOR, SAMPLE.TIME_FACTOR, SAMPLE.PRODUCT_BEFORE, SAMPLE.BATCH_BEFORE, SAMPLE.DATE_IDEAL_COMPLETE, SAMPLE.DATE_FIRST_AUTHORISED, MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY], MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_CODE, MLP_HEADER.ENTRY_CODE, MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_GROUP, MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP, MLP_HEADER.DESCRIPTION, MLP_HEADER.TEST_SCHEDULE, MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_STATUS, MLP_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON, MLP_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY, MLP_HEADER.MODIFIABLE, MLP_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG, MLP_HEADER.GROUP_ID, MLP_HEADER.SAMPLE_TYPE, MLP_HEADER.CONVERTED_DATE, MLP_HEADER.CONVERTED_BY, MLP_HEADER.QC_NUMBER, MLP_HEADER.QC_DATE, MLP_HEADER.QS_NUMBER, MLP_HEADER.QS_DATE, MLP_HEADER.QCQS_COMMENT, MLP_HEADER.MPS_TEMPLATE, MLP_HEADER.CULTURE_GROUP, MLP_HEADER.DISP_RESP, MLP_HEADER.AMOUNT_01, MLP_HEADER.MASTER_PLANT, MLP_HEADER.MPS_EXPORT, MLP_HEADER.ALLOW_AGREE, MLP_HEADER.CERT_TYPE, MLP_HEADER.SAP_CERT, MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION, MLP_HEADER.VERSION_COMMENT, MLP_HEADER.VERSION_STATUS, MLP_HEADER.CREATED_DATE, MLP_HEADER.APPROVAL_REQD, MLP_HEADER.APPROVAL_STATUS, MLP_HEADER.INSPECTION_PLAN, MLP_HEADER.EXTERNAL_VERSION, MLP_HEADER.DO_SPLAN_LOGIN, MLP_HEADER.PROJECT_ID, MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP
        from SAMPLE, MLP_HEADER
        where SAMPLE.PRODUCT = MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY] and SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION = MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    view JOB_MLP_VIEW
        on_table JOB_HEADER, MLP_HEADER;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.APPL_GROUP}
    field APPL_GROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_DESCRIPTION}
    field JOB_DESCRIPTION
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_DATE_CREATED}
    field JOB_DATE_CREATED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_CREATED;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_DATE_COMPLETED}
    field JOB_DATE_COMPLETED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_COMPLETED;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_DATE_RECEIVED}
    field JOB_DATE_RECEIVED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_RECEIVED;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_DATE_TO_START}
    field JOB_DATE_TO_START
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_TO_START;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_SUBMITTER_OPER}
    field JOB_SUBMITTER_OPER
        links_to JOB_HEADER.SUBMITTER_OPER;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_SAMPLES_TO_DO}
    field JOB_SAMPLES_TO_DO
        links_to JOB_HEADER.SAMPLES_TO_DO;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_GROUP_ID}
    field JOB_GROUP_ID
        links_to JOB_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_TEMPLATE_ID}
    field JOB_TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to JOB_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_SAMPLE_TEMPLATE}
    field JOB_SAMPLE_TEMPLATE
        links_to JOB_HEADER.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field JOB_DATE_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_AUTHORISER}
    field JOB_AUTHORISER
        links_to JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISER;

    {JOB_MLP_VIEW.JOB_AUTHORISATION_NOTES}
    field JOB_AUTHORISATION_NOTES
        links_to JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISATION_NOTES;

    select_clause
        select JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME, JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS, MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP, JOB_HEADER.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION, JOB_HEADER.DATE_CREATED, JOB_HEADER.DATE_COMPLETED, JOB_HEADER.DATE_RECEIVED, JOB_HEADER.DATE_TO_START, JOB_HEADER.SUBMITTER_OPER, JOB_HEADER.SAMPLES_TO_DO, JOB_HEADER.GROUP_ID, JOB_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID, JOB_HEADER.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED, JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISER, JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISATION_NOTES
        from JOB_HEADER, MLP_HEADER
        where JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME=MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY];

    view QC_SAMPLE_VIEW
        on_table ALL_SAMPLE, ALL_JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE_POINT;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.JOB}
    field JOB
        links_to SAMPLE.JOB_NAME 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.JOB_DATE_EXP}
    field JOB_DATE_EXP
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_EXP;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.JOB_DESCRIPTION}
    field JOB_DESCRIPTION
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.SAMPLE}
    field SAMPLE
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3), UNIQUE_KEY;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.SAMPLE_TYPE}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE
        links_to JOB_HEADER.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (4);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        alias STATUS 
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (6);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.PRODUCTION_DATE}
    field PRODUCTION_DATE
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCTION_DATE;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.SAMPLE_COMMENT}
    field SAMPLE_COMMENT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLE_COMMENT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (5);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.PRODUCT_BEFORE}
    field PRODUCT_BEFORE
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_BEFORE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (8);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.EQUIPMENT}
    field EQUIPMENT
        links_to SAMPLE.EQUIPMENT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (9);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.SAMPLED_DATE}

        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLED_DATE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (10);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.SAMPLED_BY}
    field SAMPLED_BY
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLED_BY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (11);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.BATCH_BEFORE}
    field BATCH_BEFORE
        links_to SAMPLE.BATCH_BEFORE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (12);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.RECEIVED}
    field RECEIVED
        links_to SAMPLE.RECD_DATE;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.TESTS_TO_DO}
    field TESTS_TO_DO
        links_to SAMPLE.TESTS_TO_DO 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (7);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.SAMPLE_COMPLETED}
    field SAMPLE_COMPLETED

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.COMPLETER}
    field COMPLETER
        links_to SAMPLE.COMPLETER;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.WORK_CENTER}
    field WORK_CENTER
        links_to JOB_HEADER.WORK_CENTER;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.SAMPLE_LOCATION}
    field SAMPLE_LOCATION
        links_to SAMPLE.LOCATION_ID;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.STORAGE_LOCATION}
    field STORAGE_LOCATION
        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.DELIV_LOCATION;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.JOB_CREATED}
    field JOB_CREATED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_CREATED;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.JOB_DATE_COMPLETED}
    field JOB_DATE_COMPLETED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_COMPLETED;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.APPL_GROUP}
    field APPL_GROUP
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.BATCH_NAME;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW.SAMPLE_MPS_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_MPS_STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.MPS_STATUS;

    view QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN
        on_table ALL_SAMPLE, ALL_JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE_POINT;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.JOB}
    field JOB
        links_to SAMPLE.JOB_NAME 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.JOB_DESCRIPTION}

        links_to JOB_HEADER.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.SAMPLE_COMMENT}
    field SAMPLE_COMMENT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLE_COMMENT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.SAMPLE}

        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (4), UNIQUE_KEY;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.SAMPLE_MPS_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_MPS_STATUS
        links_to SAMPLE.MPS_STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (5);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.SAMPLE_AUTHORISED}
    field SAMPLE_AUTHORISED
        links_to SAMPLE.DATE_AUTHORISED 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (6);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.JOB_DATE_EXP}
    field JOB_DATE_EXP
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_EXP 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (7);

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.SAMPLE_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_STATUS
        alias STATUS 
        links_to SAMPLE.STATUS;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.WORK_CENTER}
    field WORK_CENTER
        links_to JOB_HEADER.WORK_CENTER;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.SAMPLE_LOCATION}
    field SAMPLE_LOCATION
        links_to SAMPLE.LOCATION_ID;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.STORAGE_LOCATION}
