        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.DELIV_LOCATION;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.JOB_DATE_COMPLETED}
    field JOB_DATE_COMPLETED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_COMPLETED;

    {QC_SAMPLE_VIEW_HHN.APPL_GROUP}
    field APPL_GROUP
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP;

    view QC_INCIDENT_VIEW
        on_table INCIDENTS, SAMPLE;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.INCIDENT_ID}
    field INCIDENT_ID
        links_to INCIDENTS.INCIDENT_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to INCIDENTS.STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (10);

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.CHECKLIST_ID}
    field CHECKLIST_ID
        links_to INCIDENTS.CHECKLIST_ID;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.TEMPLATE_ID}
    field TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to INCIDENTS.TEMPLATE_ID;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.REVIEW_INSPECTORS}
    field REVIEW_INSPECTORS
        links_to INCIDENTS.REVIEW_INSPECTORS;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.AUTHORISE_INSPECTORS}
    field AUTHORISE_INSPECTORS
        links_to INCIDENTS.AUTHORISE_INSPECTORS;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.REVIEW_VERSION}
    field REVIEW_VERSION
        links_to INCIDENTS.REVIEW_VERSION;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.AUTHORISE_VERSION}
    field AUTHORISE_VERSION
        links_to INCIDENTS.AUTHORISE_VERSION;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.INCIDENT_DESCRIPTION}
    field INCIDENT_DESCRIPTION
        links_to INCIDENTS.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (7);

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.INCIDENT_DATE}
    field INCIDENT_DATE
        links_to INCIDENTS.INCIDENT_DATE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (8);

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.REPORTED_BY}
    field REPORTED_BY
        links_to INCIDENTS.REPORTED_BY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (9);

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.SUBJECT_TABLE}
    field SUBJECT_TABLE
        links_to INCIDENTS.SUBJECT_TABLE;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.SUBJECT_field}
    field SUBJECT_field
        links_to INCIDENTS.SUBJECT_FIELD;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.REMARK}
    field REMARK
        links_to INCIDENTS.REMARK;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to INCIDENTS.JOB_NAME 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.JOB_DESCRIPTION}
    field JOB_DESCRIPTION
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to INCIDENTS.BATCH_NAME;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.PRODUCT}
    field PRODUCT
        links_to INCIDENTS.PRODUCT;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.SAMPLE_TYPE}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE
        links_to JOB_HEADER.SAMPLE_TYPE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.SAMPLE}
    field SAMPLE
        links_to INCIDENTS.SAMPLE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (5);

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.EQUIPMENT}
    field EQUIPMENT
        links_to SAMPLE.EQUIPMENT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (6);

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.LOCATION_ID}
    field LOCATION_ID
        links_to SAMPLE.LOCATION_ID;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to INCIDENTS.TEST_NUMBER;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to INCIDENTS.ANALYSIS;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.TEST_COUNT}
    field TEST_COUNT
        links_to INCIDENTS.TEST_COUNT;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.RESULTID}
    field RESULTID
        links_to INCIDENTS.RESULTID;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.RESULT_NAME}
    field RESULT_NAME
        links_to INCIDENTS.RESULT_NAME;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.RESULT_TEXT}
    field RESULT_TEXT
        links_to INCIDENTS.RESULT_TEXT;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to INCIDENTS.UNITS;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.SENT}
    field SENT
        links_to INCIDENTS.SENT;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.NC_STATUS}
    field NC_STATUS
        links_to INCIDENTS.NC_STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (12);

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.NC_IDENTITY}
    field NC_IDENTITY
        links_to INCIDENTS.NC_IDENTITY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (11);

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.NC_LINK_EDIT}
    field NC_LINK_EDIT
        links_to INCIDENTS.NC_LINK_EDIT;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.NC_LINK_READ}
    field NC_LINK_READ
        links_to INCIDENTS.NC_LINK_READ;

    {QC_INCIDENT_VIEW.APPLICATION_GROUP}
    field APPLICATION_GROUP
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (13);

    select_clause
        select I.INCIDENT_ID, I.STATUS, I.CHECKLIST_ID, I.TEMPLATE_ID, I.REVIEW_INSPECTORS, I.AUTHORISE_INSPECTORS, I.REVIEW_VERSION, I.AUTHORISE_VERSION, I.DESCRIPTION, I.INCIDENT_DATE, I.REPORTED_BY, I.SUBJECT_TABLE, I.SUBJECT_FIELD, I.REMARK, I.JOB_NAME, J.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION, I.BATCH_NAME, I.PRODUCT, J.SAMPLE_TYPE, I.SAMPLE, S.EQUIPMENT, S.LOCATION_ID, I.TEST_NUMBER, I.ANALYSIS, I.TEST_COUNT, I.RESULTID, I.RESULT_NAME, I.RESULT_TEXT, I.UNITS, I.SENT, I.NC_STATUS, I.NC_IDENTITY, I.NC_LINK_EDIT, I.NC_LINK_READ, P.PHRASE_TEXT
        from ALL_INCIDENTS I, ALL_SAMPLE S, ALL_JOB_HEADER J, MLP_HEADER M, PHRASE P
        where I.SAMPLE = S.ID_NUMERIC and S.JOB_NAME = J.JOB_NAME and S.PRODUCT = M.[IDENTITY] and S.PRODUCT_VERSION = M.PRODUCT_VERSION and M.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP = P.PHRASE_ID and P.PHRASE_TYPE = 'MLP_APPLIC';

    view QC_TEST_VIEW
        on_table TEST, SAMPLE, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS, PHRASE;

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to SAMPLE.JOB_NAME 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(4);

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.JOB_DATE_EXP}
    field JOB_DATE_EXP
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_EXP;

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.SAMPLE}
    field SAMPLE
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.SAMPLE_POINT}
    field SAMPLE_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE.SAMPLING_POINT 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(5);

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.TEST_STATUS}
    field TEST_STATUS
        links_to TEST.STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.TEST_DATE_EXP}
    field TEST_DATE_EXP
        links_to TEST.DATE_EXP;

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.ANALYSIS_COA_GROUP}
    field ANALYSIS_COA_GROUP
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COA_GROUP;

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.ANALYSIS_TYPE}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE;

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.ANALYSIS_MEDIA}
    field ANALYSIS_MEDIA
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MEDIA_01;

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.ANALYSIS_ID}
    field ANALYSIS_ID
        links_to TEST.ANALYSIS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.MLP_APPLICATION_GROUP}
    field MLP_APPLICATION_GROUP
        links_to PHRASE.PHRASE_TEXT;

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.SAMPLE_LOCATION}
    field SAMPLE_LOCATION
        links_to SAMPLE.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION;

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.SAMPLE_TYPE}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.SAMPLE_TYPE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(6);

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.POTENCY}
    field POTENCY
        links_to JOB_HEADER.POTENCY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(7);

    {QC_TEST_VIEW.SAMPLE_PRIORITY}
    field SAMPLE_PRIORITY
        links_to SAMPLE.PRIORITY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(8);

    select_clause
        SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT
            S.JOB_NAME
            ,J.DATE_EXP
            ,S.ID_NUMERIC
            ,S.SAMPLING_POINT
            ,T.TEST_NUMBER
            ,T.STATUS
            ,T.DATE_EXP
            ,A.COA_GROUP
            ,A.ANALYSIS_TYPE
            ,A.MEDIA_01
            ,T.ANALYSIS
            ,P.PHRASE_TEXT AS APPL_GROUP
            ,S.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION
            ,S.SAMPLE_TYPE
            ,J.POTENCY
            ,S.PRIORITY
        FROM    TEST T
                ,SAMPLE S
                ,JOB_HEADER J
                ,VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A
                ,MLP_HEADER M
                ,PHRASE P
        WHERE T.SAMPLE = S.ID_NUMERIC
        AND S.JOB_NAME = J.JOB_NAME
        AND T.ANALYSIS = A.[IDENTITY]
        AND T.ANALYSIS_VERSION = A.ANALYSIS_VERSION
        AND S.PRODUCT = M.[IDENTITY]
        AND S.PRODUCT_VERSION = M.PRODUCT_VERSION
        AND P.PHRASE_TYPE = 'MLP_APPLIC'
        AND P.PHRASE_ID = M.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP
        ORDER BY T.TEST_NUMBER DESC;

    view MLP_SCH_VIEW
        on_table MLP_HEADER, MLP_VALUES, MLP_LEVEL, MLP_COMPONENTS;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.PRODUCT_ID}
    field PRODUCT_ID
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.PRODUCT_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP}
    field PRODUCT_SUBGROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP}
    field PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.SAP_CERT}
    field SAP_CERT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.SAP_CERT;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.PRODUCT_CODE}
    field PRODUCT_CODE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_CODE;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.SAMPLE_TYPE}
    field SAMPLE_TYPE
        links_to MLP_HEADER.SAMPLE_TYPE;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.ANALYSIS_ID}
    field ANALYSIS_ID
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.COMPONENT_TYPE}
    field COMPONENT_TYPE
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_TYPE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.LEVEL_ID;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.LEVEL_ORDER}
    field LEVEL_ORDER
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.CONTINUE_CHECKING}
    field CONTINUE_CHECKING
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_SPEC;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.MESSAGE_ACTION}
    field MESSAGE_ACTION
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.MESSAGE_ACTION;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.REPORT_ACTION}
    field REPORT_ACTION
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.REPORT_ACTION;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.RESULT_ACTION}
    field RESULT_ACTION
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.RESULT_ACTION;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.DISPLAY_MESSAGE}
    field DISPLAY_MESSAGE
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.DISPLAY_MESSAGE;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.REPORT_NAME}
    field REPORT_NAME
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.REPORT_NAME;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.ROUTINE_NAME}
    field ROUTINE_NAME
        links_to MLP_LEVEL.ROUTINE_NAME;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.MIN_LIMIT}
    field MIN_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MIN_LIMIT;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.MAX_LIMIT}
    field MAX_LIMIT
        links_to MLP_VALUES.MAX_LIMIT;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.TEXT_SPEC}
    field TEXT_SPEC
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_SPEC;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.TEXT_PHRASE}
    field TEXT_PHRASE
        links_to MLP_VALUES.TEXT_PHRASE;

    {MLP_SCH_VIEW.BOOLEAN_PASS}
    field BOOLEAN_PASS
        links_to MLP_VALUES.BOOLEAN_PASS;

    select_clause
        select MS.[IDENTITY], MS.IDENTITY_VERSION, MHH.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP, MHH.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP, MHH.SAP_CERT, MHH.PRODUCT_CODE, MHH.SAMPLE_TYPE, MC.ANALYSIS_ID, MC.COMPONENT_NAME, MC.COMPONENT_TYPE, ML.LEVEL_ID, MHV.MIN_LIMIT, MHV.TEXT_SPEC, ML.MESSAGE_ACTION, ML.REPORT_ACTION, ML.RESULT_ACTION, ML.DISPLAY_MESSAGE, ML.REPORT_NAME, ML.ROUTINE_NAME, MCV.MIN_LIMIT, MCV.MAX_LIMIT, MCV.TEXT_SPEC, MCV.TEXT_PHRASE, MCV.BOOLEAN_PASS
        from MLP_HEADER MH, MLP_VALUES MHV, MLP_LEVEL ML, MLP_COMPONENTS MC, MLP_VALUES MCV, MLP_SCHEDULE MS, MLP_HEADER MHH
        where MH.ENTRY_CODE = MHV.ENTRY_CODE and ML.LEVEL_ID = MHV.LEVEL_ID and ML.LEVEL_ID = MCV.LEVEL_ID and MC.PRODUCT_ID = MH.[IDENTITY] and MC.PRODUCT_VERSION = MH.PRODUCT_VERSION and MC.ENTRY_CODE = MCV.ENTRY_CODE and MS.MLP_ID = MH.[IDENTITY] and MS.MLP_VERSION = MH.PRODUCT_VERSION and MS.[IDENTITY] = MHH.[IDENTITY] and MS.IDENTITY_VERSION = MHH.PRODUCT_VERSION union
        select MC.PRODUCT_ID, MC.PRODUCT_VERSION, MH.PRODUCT_SUBGROUP, MH.PRODUCT_APPL_GROUP, MH.SAP_CERT, MH.PRODUCT_CODE, MH.SAMPLE_TYPE, MC.ANALYSIS_ID, MC.COMPONENT_NAME, MC.COMPONENT_TYPE, ML.LEVEL_ID, MHV.MIN_LIMIT, MHV.TEXT_SPEC, ML.MESSAGE_ACTION, ML.REPORT_ACTION, ML.RESULT_ACTION, ML.DISPLAY_MESSAGE, ML.REPORT_NAME, ML.ROUTINE_NAME, MCV.MIN_LIMIT, MCV.MAX_LIMIT, MCV.TEXT_SPEC, MCV.TEXT_PHRASE, MCV.BOOLEAN_PASS
        from MLP_HEADER MH, MLP_VALUES MHV, MLP_LEVEL ML, MLP_COMPONENTS MC, MLP_VALUES MCV
        where MH.ENTRY_CODE = MHV.ENTRY_CODE and ML.LEVEL_ID = MHV.LEVEL_ID and ML.LEVEL_ID = MCV.LEVEL_ID and MC.PRODUCT_ID = MH.[IDENTITY] and MC.PRODUCT_VERSION = MH.PRODUCT_VERSION and MC.ENTRY_CODE = MCV.ENTRY_CODE;

    view AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW
        on_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION, AUDIT_EVENT, AUDIT_DATA;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.FIELD_NAME}
    field FIELD_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.field 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.VALUE_BEFORE}
    field VALUE_BEFORE
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_BEFORE;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.VALUE_AFTER}
    field VALUE_AFTER
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_AFTER;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.DATA;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TABLE_NAME;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.EVENT}
    field EVENT
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.TRANSACTION}
    field TRANSACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TRANSACTION;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.RECORD_KEY0;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.EVENT_ACTION}
    field EVENT_ACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_ACTION;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.EVENT_REASON}
    field EVENT_REASON
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_REASON;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.TRANSACTION_DATE}
    field TRANSACTION_DATE
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.USER_ID}
    field USER_ID
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.USER_ID;

    {AUDIT_VALUE_TRAN_VIEW.TRANSACTION_NAME}
    field TRANSACTION_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_NAME;

    select_clause
        select A.FIELD, A.VALUE_BEFORE, A.VALUE_AFTER, A.DATA, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from AUDIT_DATA A, AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where A.EVENT = E.EVENT and E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION];

    view AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT
        on_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION, AUDIT_EVENT, AUDIT_DATA;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.FIELD_NAME}
    field FIELD_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.field 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.VALUE_BEFORE}
    field VALUE_BEFORE
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_BEFORE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.VALUE_AFTER}
    field VALUE_AFTER
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_AFTER;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.DATA;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TABLE_NAME;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.EVENT}
    field EVENT
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.TRANSACTION}
    field TRANSACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TRANSACTION;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.RECORD_KEY0;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.EVENT_ACTION}
    field EVENT_ACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_ACTION;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.REASON}
    field REASON
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_REASON;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.TRANSACTION_DATE}
    field TRANSACTION_DATE
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.USER_ID}
    field USER_ID
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.USER_ID;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_RESULT.TRANSACTION_NAME}
    field TRANSACTION_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_NAME;

    select_clause
        select A.FIELD, A.VALUE_BEFORE, A.VALUE_AFTER, A.DATA, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.EVENT_ACTION, case when A.DATA_REASON = ' ' then E.EVENT_REASON else A.DATA_REASON end AS REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from AUDIT_DATA A, AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where A.EVENT = E.EVENT and E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION] and E.TABLE_NAME = 'RESULT';

    view AUDIT_VIEW_TEST
        on_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION, AUDIT_EVENT, AUDIT_DATA;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.FIELD_NAME}
    field FIELD_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.field 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.VALUE_BEFORE}
    field VALUE_BEFORE
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_BEFORE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.VALUE_AFTER}
    field VALUE_AFTER
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_AFTER;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.DATA;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TABLE_NAME;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.EVENT}
    field EVENT
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.TRANSACTION}
    field TRANSACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TRANSACTION;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.RECORD_KEY0;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.EVENT_ACTION}
    field EVENT_ACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_ACTION;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.REASON}
    field REASON
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_REASON;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.TRANSACTION_DATE}
    field TRANSACTION_DATE
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.USER_ID}
    field USER_ID
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.USER_ID;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_TEST.TRANSACTION_NAME}
    field TRANSACTION_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_NAME;

    select_clause
        select A.FIELD, A.VALUE_BEFORE, A.VALUE_AFTER, A.DATA, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.EVENT_ACTION, case when A.DATA_REASON = ' ' then E.EVENT_REASON else A.DATA_REASON end AS REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from AUDIT_DATA A, AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where A.EVENT = E.EVENT and E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION] and E.TABLE_NAME = 'TEST';

    view AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE
        on_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION, AUDIT_EVENT, AUDIT_DATA;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.FIELD_NAME}
    field FIELD_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.field 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.VALUE_BEFORE}
    field VALUE_BEFORE
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_BEFORE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.VALUE_AFTER}
    field VALUE_AFTER
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_AFTER;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.DATA;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TABLE_NAME;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.EVENT}
    field EVENT
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.TRANSACTION}
    field TRANSACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TRANSACTION;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.RECORD_KEY0;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.EVENT_ACTION}
    field EVENT_ACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_ACTION;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.REASON}
    field REASON
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_REASON;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.TRANSACTION_DATE}
    field TRANSACTION_DATE
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.USER_ID}
    field USER_ID
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.USER_ID;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_SAMPLE.TRANSACTION_NAME}
    field TRANSACTION_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_NAME;

    select_clause
        select A.FIELD, A.VALUE_BEFORE, A.VALUE_AFTER, A.DATA, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.EVENT_ACTION, case when A.DATA_REASON = ' ' then E.EVENT_REASON else A.DATA_REASON end AS REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from AUDIT_DATA A, AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where A.EVENT = E.EVENT and E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION] and E.TABLE_NAME = 'SAMPLE';

    view AUDIT_VIEW_JOB
        on_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION, AUDIT_EVENT, AUDIT_DATA;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.FIELD_NAME}
    field FIELD_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.field 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.VALUE_BEFORE}
    field VALUE_BEFORE
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_BEFORE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.VALUE_AFTER}
    field VALUE_AFTER
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_AFTER;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.DATA;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TABLE_NAME;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.EVENT}
    field EVENT
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.TRANSACTION}
    field TRANSACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TRANSACTION;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.RECORD_KEY0;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.EVENT_ACTION}
    field EVENT_ACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_ACTION;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.REASON}
    field REASON
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_REASON;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.TRANSACTION_DATE}
    field TRANSACTION_DATE
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.USER_ID}
    field USER_ID
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.USER_ID;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_JOB.TRANSACTION_NAME}
    field TRANSACTION_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_NAME;

    select_clause
        select A.FIELD, A.VALUE_BEFORE, A.VALUE_AFTER, A.DATA, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.EVENT_ACTION, case when A.DATA_REASON = ' ' then E.EVENT_REASON else A.DATA_REASON end AS REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from AUDIT_DATA A, AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where A.EVENT = E.EVENT and E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION] and E.TABLE_NAME = 'JOB_HEADER';

    view ARCHIVE_SAMP_TEST_RESULT
        parent_table SAMP_TEST_RESULT tableset ARCHIVE;

    view R_AUDIT_VALUES
        parent_table AUDIT_VALUES tableset RETENTION;

    view R_AUDIT_VIEW
        parent_table AUDIT_VIEW tableset RETENTION;

    select_clause
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from R_AUDIT_EVENT E, R_AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION];

    view R_ESIG_DATA_VIEW
        parent_table ESIG_DATA_VIEW tableset RETENTION;

    view R_SAMP_JOB_VIEW
        parent_table SAMP_JOB_VIEW tableset RETENTION;

    view R_SAMP_TEST_RESULT
        parent_table SAMP_TEST_RESULT tableset RETENTION;

    view R_SAMP_TEST_VIEW
        parent_table SAMP_TEST_VIEW tableset RETENTION;

    view AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW
        on_table AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER;

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.BASE_TABLE}
    field BASE_TABLE
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.BASE_TABLE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.COMMIT_VIEW}
    field COMMIT_VIEW
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.COMMIT_VIEW 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.COMMIT_SOURCE}
    field COMMIT_SOURCE
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.COMMIT_SOURCE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.COMMIT_DESTINATION}
    field COMMIT_DESTINATION
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.COMMIT_DESTINATION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(4);

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.ENABLED}
    field ENABLED
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.ENABLED;

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.DESCRIPTION;

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON;

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY;

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.MODIFIABLE;

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.ENABLE_RMB}
    field ENABLE_RMB
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.ENABLE_RMB;

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.MANUAL_BACKGROUND}
    field MANUAL_BACKGROUND
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.MANUAL_BACKGROUND;

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.NEW_VERSION}
    field NEW_VERSION
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.NEW_VERSION;

    {AUTO_COMMIT_VIEW.NEW_ENTRY_CODE}
    field NEW_ENTRY_CODE
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.NEW_ENTRY_CODE;

    select_clause
        select AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.[IDENTITY], AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.BASE_TABLE, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.COMMIT_VIEW, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.COMMIT_SOURCE, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.COMMIT_DESTINATION, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.ENABLED, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.DESCRIPTION, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.GROUP_ID, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.MODIFIABLE, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.ENABLE_RMB, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.MANUAL_BACKGROUND, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.NEW_VERSION, AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.NEW_ENTRY_CODE
        from AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER
        where AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG = 'F' and AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.MANUAL_BACKGROUND = 'T' and AUTO_COMMIT_HEADER.ENABLED = 'T';

    view JOB_ARCOM_VIEW
        on_table JOB_HEADER;

    {JOB_ARCOM_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {JOB_ARCOM_VIEW.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        alias STATUS 
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {JOB_ARCOM_VIEW.DATE_CREATED}
    field DATE_CREATED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_CREATED;

    {JOB_ARCOM_VIEW.DATE_COMPLETED}
    field DATE_COMPLETED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_COMPLETED;

    {JOB_ARCOM_VIEW.DATE_RECEIVED}
    field DATE_RECEIVED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_RECEIVED;

    {JOB_ARCOM_VIEW.DATE_TO_START}
    field DATE_TO_START
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_TO_START;

    {JOB_ARCOM_VIEW.DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {JOB_ARCOM_VIEW.SUBMITTER_OPER}
    field SUBMITTER_OPER
        links_to JOB_HEADER.SUBMITTER_OPER;

    {JOB_ARCOM_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to JOB_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {JOB_ARCOM_VIEW.TEMPLATE_ID}
    field TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to JOB_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID;

    {JOB_ARCOM_VIEW.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE}
    field SAMPLE_TEMPLATE
        links_to JOB_HEADER.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE;

    {JOB_ARCOM_VIEW.AUTHORISER}
    field AUTHORISER
        links_to JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISER 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    select_clause
        select distinct J.JOB_NAME, J.JOB_STATUS, J.DATE_CREATED, J.DATE_COMPLETED, J.DATE_RECEIVED, J.DATE_TO_START, J.DATE_AUTHORISED, J.SUBMITTER_OPER, J.GROUP_ID, J.TEMPLATE_ID, J.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, J.AUTHORISER
        from JOB_HEADER J
        where (J.JOB_STATUS = 'A' or J.JOB_STATUS = 'X');

    view C_JOB_ARCOM_VIEW
        parent_table JOB_ARCOM_VIEW tableset COMMITTED;

    select_clause
        select J.JOB_NAME, J.JOB_STATUS, J.DATE_CREATED, J.DATE_COMPLETED, J.DATE_RECEIVED, J.DATE_TO_START, J.DATE_AUTHORISED, J.SUBMITTER_OPER, J.GROUP_ID, J.TEMPLATE_ID, J.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, J.AUTHORISER
        from C_JOB_HEADER J
        where (J.JOB_STATUS = 'A' or J.JOB_STATUS = 'X');

    view ARC_JOB_ARCOM_VIEW
        parent_table JOB_ARCOM_VIEW tableset ARCHIVE;

    select_clause
        select J.JOB_NAME, J.JOB_STATUS, J.DATE_CREATED, J.DATE_COMPLETED, J.DATE_RECEIVED, J.DATE_TO_START, J.DATE_AUTHORISED, J.SUBMITTER_OPER, J.GROUP_ID, J.TEMPLATE_ID, J.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, J.AUTHORISER
        from ARCHIVE_JOB_HEADER J
        where (J.JOB_STATUS = 'A' or J.JOB_STATUS = 'X');

    view R_JOB_ARCOM_VIEW
        parent_table JOB_ARCOM_VIEW tableset RETENTION;

    select_clause
        select J.JOB_NAME, J.JOB_STATUS, J.DATE_CREATED, J.DATE_COMPLETED, J.DATE_RECEIVED, J.DATE_TO_START, J.DATE_AUTHORISED, J.SUBMITTER_OPER, J.GROUP_ID, J.TEMPLATE_ID, J.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, J.AUTHORISER
        from R_JOB_HEADER J
        where (J.JOB_STATUS = 'A' or J.JOB_STATUS = 'X');

    view AUDIT_TRANSACTION_ALL_VIEW
        on_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION, C_AUDIT_TRANSACTION, R_AUDIT_TRANSACTION;

    {AUDIT_TRANSACTION_ALL_VIEW.TRANSACTION}
    field TRANSACTION
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {AUDIT_TRANSACTION_ALL_VIEW.SYSTEM_PID}
    field SYSTEM_PID
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.SYSTEM_PID 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {AUDIT_TRANSACTION_ALL_VIEW.USER_ID}
    field USER_ID
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.USER_ID 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {AUDIT_TRANSACTION_ALL_VIEW.TRANSACTION_NAME}
    field TRANSACTION_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_NAME 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {AUDIT_TRANSACTION_ALL_VIEW.TRANSACTION_DATE}
    field TRANSACTION_DATE
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(4);

    {AUDIT_TRANSACTION_ALL_VIEW.SESSION_ID}
    field SESSION_ID
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.SESSION_ID 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(5);

    select_clause
        select [TRANSACTION], SYSTEM_PID, USER_ID, TRANSACTION_NAME, TRANSACTION_DATE, SESSION_ID
        from AUDIT_TRANSACTION
        union all
        select [TRANSACTION], SYSTEM_PID, USER_ID, TRANSACTION_NAME, TRANSACTION_DATE, SESSION_ID
        from C_AUDIT_TRANSACTION
        union all
        select [TRANSACTION], SYSTEM_PID, USER_ID, TRANSACTION_NAME, TRANSACTION_DATE, SESSION_ID
        from R_AUDIT_TRANSACTION;

    view AUDIT_VIEW_ALL
        on_table AUDIT_TRANSACTION, AUDIT_EVENT;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_ALL.EVENT}
    field EVENT
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_ALL.TRANSACTION}
    field TRANSACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TRANSACTION;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_ALL.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.RECORD_KEY0;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_ALL.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TABLE_NAME;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_ALL.EVENT_ACTION}
    field EVENT_ACTION
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_ACTION;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_ALL.EVENT_REASON}
    field EVENT_REASON
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.EVENT_REASON;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_ALL.TRANSACTION_DATE}
    field TRANSACTION_DATE
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_ALL.USER_ID}
    field USER_ID
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.USER_ID;

    {AUDIT_VIEW_ALL.TRANSACTION_NAME}
    field TRANSACTION_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_NAME;

    select_clause
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION]
        union all
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from AUDIT_EVENT E, C_AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION]
        union all
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from AUDIT_EVENT E, ARCHIVE_AUDIT_TRANS T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION]
        union all
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from ARCHIVE_AUDIT_EVENT E, ARCHIVE_AUDIT_TRANS T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION]
        union all
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from ARCHIVE_AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION]
        union all
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from ARCHIVE_AUDIT_EVENT E, C_AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION]
        union all
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from C_AUDIT_EVENT E, C_AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION]
        union all
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from C_AUDIT_EVENT E, AUDIT_TRANSACTION T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION]
        union all
        select E.EVENT, E.[TRANSACTION], E.RECORD_KEY0, E.TABLE_NAME, E.EVENT_ACTION, E.EVENT_REASON, T.TRANSACTION_DATE, T.USER_ID, T.TRANSACTION_NAME
        from C_AUDIT_EVENT E, ARCHIVE_AUDIT_TRANS T
        where E.[TRANSACTION] = T.[TRANSACTION];

    view AUDIT_VALUES_ALL
        on_table AUDIT_VALUES, C_AUDIT_VALUES, ARCHIVE_AUDIT_VALUES;

    {AUDIT_VALUES_ALL.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.TABLE_NAME;

    {AUDIT_VALUES_ALL.FIELD_NAME}
    field FIELD_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.FIELD;

    {AUDIT_VALUES_ALL.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        links_to AUDIT_EVENT.RECORD_KEY0;

    {AUDIT_VALUES_ALL.AUDIT_DATE}
    field AUDIT_DATE
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE;

    {AUDIT_VALUES_ALL.USER_NAME}
    field USER_NAME
        links_to AUDIT_TRANSACTION.USER_ID;

    {AUDIT_VALUES_ALL.VALUE_BEFORE}
    field VALUE_BEFORE
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_BEFORE;

    {AUDIT_VALUES_ALL.VALUE_AFTER}
    field VALUE_AFTER
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.VALUE_AFTER;

    {AUDIT_VALUES_ALL.ORDER_NUM}
    field ORDER_NUM
        links_to AUDIT_DATA.DATA;

    select_clause
        select TABLE_NAME, FIELD_NAME, RECORD_KEY0, AUDIT_DATE, USER_NAME, VALUE_BEFORE, VALUE_AFTER, ORDER_NUM
        from AUDIT_VALUES
        union all
        select TABLE_NAME, FIELD_NAME, RECORD_KEY0, AUDIT_DATE, USER_NAME, VALUE_BEFORE, VALUE_AFTER, ORDER_NUM
        from C_AUDIT_VALUES
        union all
        select TABLE_NAME, FIELD_NAME, RECORD_KEY0, AUDIT_DATE, USER_NAME, VALUE_BEFORE, VALUE_AFTER, ORDER_NUM
        from ARCHIVE_AUDIT_VALUES;

    view ESIG_DATA_ALL_VIEW
        on_table ESIG_DATA, C_ESIG_DATA, R_ESIG_DATA;

    {ESIG_DATA_ALL_VIEW.ESIG_DATA_ID}
    field ESIG_DATA_ID
        links_to ESIG_DATA.ESIG_DATA_ID 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {ESIG_DATA_ALL_VIEW.ESIG_EVENT_ID}
    field ESIG_EVENT_ID
        links_to ESIG_DATA.ESIG_EVENT_ID 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {ESIG_DATA_ALL_VIEW.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to ESIG_DATA.TABLE_NAME 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {ESIG_DATA_ALL_VIEW.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        links_to ESIG_DATA.RECORD_KEY0 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {ESIG_DATA_ALL_VIEW.CHECKSUM_FIELDS}
    field CHECKSUM_FIELDS
        links_to ESIG_DATA.CHECKSUM_FIELDS;

    {ESIG_DATA_ALL_VIEW.CHECKSUM}
    field CHECKSUM
        links_to ESIG_DATA.CHECKSUM;

    select_clause
        select ESIG_DATA_ID, ESIG_EVENT_ID, TABLE_NAME, RECORD_KEY0, CHECKSUM_FIELDS, CHECKSUM
        from ESIG_DATA
        union all
        select ESIG_DATA_ID, ESIG_EVENT_ID, TABLE_NAME, RECORD_KEY0, CHECKSUM_FIELDS, CHECKSUM
        from C_ESIG_DATA
        union all
        select ESIG_DATA_ID, ESIG_EVENT_ID, TABLE_NAME, RECORD_KEY0, CHECKSUM_FIELDS, CHECKSUM
        from R_ESIG_DATA;

    view ESIG_DATA_VIEW_ALL
        on_table ESIG_DATA, ESIG_EVENT;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW_ALL.ESIG_EVENT_ID}
    field ESIG_EVENT_ID
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW_ALL.ESIG_DATA_ID}
    field ESIG_DATA_ID
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW_ALL.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        datatype TEXT (30);

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW_ALL.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        datatype TEXT (255);

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW_ALL.OPERATOR}
    field OPERATOR
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW_ALL.FULLNAME}
    field FULLNAME
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW_ALL.SERVER_DATE}
    field SERVER_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW_ALL.ESIG_REASON}
    field ESIG_REASON
        datatype TEXT (80);

    {ESIG_DATA_VIEW_ALL.SIGNATURE_COMMENT}
    field SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        datatype TEXT (234);

    select_clause
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from ESIG_DATA D, ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from ESIG_DATA D, C_ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from ESIG_DATA D, R_ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from ESIG_DATA D, ARCHIVE_ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from R_ESIG_DATA D, R_ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from R_ESIG_DATA D, ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from R_ESIG_DATA D, C_ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from R_ESIG_DATA D, ARCHIVE_ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from ARCHIVE_ESIG_DATA D, ARCHIVE_ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from ARCHIVE_ESIG_DATA D, ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from ARCHIVE_ESIG_DATA D, C_ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from ARCHIVE_ESIG_DATA D, R_ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from C_ESIG_DATA D, C_ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from C_ESIG_DATA D, ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from C_ESIG_DATA D, R_ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID
        union all
        select E.ESIG_EVENT_ID, D.ESIG_DATA_ID, D.TABLE_NAME, D.RECORD_KEY0, E.OPERATOR, E.FULLNAME, E.SERVER_DATE, E.ESIG_REASON, E.SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        from C_ESIG_DATA D, ARCHIVE_ESIG_EVENT E
        where E.ESIG_EVENT_ID = D.ESIG_EVENT_ID;

    view ESIG_EVENT_ALL
        on_table ESIG_EVENT, C_ESIG_EVENT, R_ESIG_EVENT, ARCHIVE_ESIG_EVENT;

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.ESIG_EVENT_ID}
    field ESIG_EVENT_ID
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY DESCENDING;

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.OPERATOR}
    field OPERATOR
        links_to PERSONNEL.IDENTITY;

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.FULLNAME}
    field FULLNAME
        links_to PERSONNEL.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.SERVER_DATE}
    field SERVER_DATE
        datatype DATE 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.SERVER_DATE_OFFSET}
    field SERVER_DATE_OFFSET
        datatype INTEGER;

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.IP_ADDRESS}
    field IP_ADDRESS
        datatype TEXT (15);

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.CLIENT_NAME}
    field CLIENT_NAME
        datatype TEXT (80);

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.CLIENT_DATE}
    field CLIENT_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.MENU_NUMBER}
    field MENU_NUMBER
        links_to ESIG_MENU_LEVEL.MENU_NUMBER;

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.ESIG_REASON}
    field ESIG_REASON
        links_to ESIG_MENU_LEVEL.ESIG_REASON;

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.SIGNATURE_COMMENT}
    field SIGNATURE_COMMENT
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.SUCCESS}
    field SUCCESS
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {ESIG_EVENT_ALL.SESSION_ID}
    field SESSION_ID
        links_to ACCESS_LOG.SESSION_ID;

    select_clause
        select ESIG_EVENT_ID, OPERATOR, FULLNAME, SERVER_DATE, SERVER_DATE_OFFSET, IP_ADDRESS, CLIENT_NAME, CLIENT_DATE, MENU_NUMBER, ESIG_REASON, SIGNATURE_COMMENT, SUCCESS, SESSION_ID
        from ESIG_EVENT
        union all
        select ESIG_EVENT_ID, OPERATOR, FULLNAME, SERVER_DATE, SERVER_DATE_OFFSET, IP_ADDRESS, CLIENT_NAME, CLIENT_DATE, MENU_NUMBER, ESIG_REASON, SIGNATURE_COMMENT, SUCCESS, SESSION_ID
        from C_ESIG_EVENT
        union all
        select ESIG_EVENT_ID, OPERATOR, FULLNAME, SERVER_DATE, SERVER_DATE_OFFSET, IP_ADDRESS, CLIENT_NAME, CLIENT_DATE, MENU_NUMBER, ESIG_REASON, SIGNATURE_COMMENT, SUCCESS, SESSION_ID
        from R_ESIG_EVENT
        union all
        select ESIG_EVENT_ID, OPERATOR, FULLNAME, SERVER_DATE, SERVER_DATE_OFFSET, IP_ADDRESS, CLIENT_NAME, CLIENT_DATE, MENU_NUMBER, ESIG_REASON, SIGNATURE_COMMENT, SUCCESS, SESSION_ID
        from ARCHIVE_ESIG_EVENT;

    view ESIG_DATA_ALL
        on_table ESIG_DATA, C_ESIG_DATA, R_ESIG_DATA, ARCHIVE_ESIG_DATA;

    {ESIG_DATA_ALL.ESIG_DATA_ID}
    field ESIG_DATA_ID
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {ESIG_DATA_ALL.ESIG_EVENT_ID}
    field ESIG_EVENT_ID
        links_to ESIG_EVENT.ESIG_EVENT_ID;

    {ESIG_DATA_ALL.TABLE_NAME}
    field TABLE_NAME
        links_to ESIG_CHECKSUM_FIELDS.TABLE_NAME 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {ESIG_DATA_ALL.RECORD_KEY0}
    field RECORD_KEY0
        datatype TEXT (255) 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {ESIG_DATA_ALL.CHECKSUM_FIELDS}
    field CHECKSUM_FIELDS
        links_to ESIG_CHECKSUM_FIELDS.CHECKSUM_FIELDS;

    {ESIG_DATA_ALL.CHECKSUM}
    field CHECKSUM
        datatype TEXT (80);

    select_clause
        select ESIG_DATA_ID, ESIG_EVENT_ID, TABLE_NAME, RECORD_KEY0, CHECKSUM_FIELDS, CHECKSUM
        from ESIG_DATA
        union all
        select ESIG_DATA_ID, ESIG_EVENT_ID, TABLE_NAME, RECORD_KEY0, CHECKSUM_FIELDS, CHECKSUM
        from C_ESIG_DATA
        union all
        select ESIG_DATA_ID, ESIG_EVENT_ID, TABLE_NAME, RECORD_KEY0, CHECKSUM_FIELDS, CHECKSUM
        from R_ESIG_DATA
        union all
        select ESIG_DATA_ID, ESIG_EVENT_ID, TABLE_NAME, RECORD_KEY0, CHECKSUM_FIELDS, CHECKSUM
        from ARCHIVE_ESIG_DATA;

    view AC_JOB_HEADER
        on_table JOB_HEADER, C_JOB_HEADER;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        datatype TEXT(30) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(1);

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION}
    field BROWSE_DESCRIPTION
        datatype TEXT(234);

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.SAMPLE_SYNTAX_ID}
    field SAMPLE_SYNTAX_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.DATE_CREATED}
    field DATE_CREATED
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.DATE_COMPLETED}
    field DATE_COMPLETED
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.DATE_RECEIVED}
    field DATE_RECEIVED
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.DATE_TO_START}
    field DATE_TO_START
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.SUBMITTER_OPER}
    field SUBMITTER_OPER
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.SAMPLES_TO_DO}
    field SAMPLES_TO_DO
        datatype INTEGER;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID}
    field TEMPLATE_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE}
    field SAMPLE_TEMPLATE
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISER}
    field AUTHORISER
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISATION_NOTES}
    field AUTHORISATION_NOTES
        datatype TEXT(234);

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.OLD_STATUS}
    field OLD_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(1);

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.INSPECTION_HEADER}
    field INSPECTION_HEADER
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.NODE_TRIGGER_PATH}
    field NODE_TRIGGER_PATH
        datatype TEXT(500);

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.ORIGINAL_JOB}
    field ORIGINAL_JOB
        datatype TEXT(30);

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.BEEN_COPIED}
    field BEEN_COPIED
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.AUTO_VALIDATE}
    field AUTO_VALIDATE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.TOTAL_ELEMENTS}
    field TOTAL_ELEMENTS
        datatype INTEGER;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.LOT_ID}
    field LOT_ID
        datatype IDENTITY(20);

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.CONSIGN_ID}
    field CONSIGN_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.CONSIGN_DATE}
    field CONSIGN_DATE
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_JOB_HEADER.CONSIGN_SEQUENCE}
    field CONSIGN_SEQUENCE
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    select_clause
        select JOB_NAME, JOB_STATUS, BROWSE_DESCRIPTION, SAMPLE_SYNTAX_ID, DATE_CREATED, DATE_COMPLETED, DATE_RECEIVED, DATE_TO_START, SUBMITTER_OPER, SAMPLES_TO_DO, GROUP_ID, TEMPLATE_ID, SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, OLD_STATUS, INSPECTION_HEADER, CONVERT (VARCHAR, NODE_TRIGGER_PATH), ORIGINAL_JOB, BEEN_COPIED, AUTO_VALIDATE, TOTAL_ELEMENTS, LOT_ID, CONSIGN_ID, CONSIGN_DATE, CONSIGN_SEQUENCE
        from JOB_HEADER union
        select JOB_NAME, JOB_STATUS, BROWSE_DESCRIPTION, SAMPLE_SYNTAX_ID, DATE_CREATED, DATE_COMPLETED, DATE_RECEIVED, DATE_TO_START, SUBMITTER_OPER, SAMPLES_TO_DO, GROUP_ID, TEMPLATE_ID, SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, OLD_STATUS, INSPECTION_HEADER, CONVERT (VARCHAR, NODE_TRIGGER_PATH), ORIGINAL_JOB, BEEN_COPIED, AUTO_VALIDATE, TOTAL_ELEMENTS, LOT_ID, CONSIGN_ID, CONSIGN_DATE, CONSIGN_SEQUENCE
        from C_JOB_HEADER;

    view AC_SAMPLE
        on_table SAMPLE, C_SAMPLE;

        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMPLE.TEMPLATE_ID}

        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

        datatype IDENTITY;

        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_SAMPLE.STANDARD_ID}
    field STANDARD_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMPLE.STANDARD_VERSION}
    field STANDARD_VERSION
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {AC_SAMPLE.INSPECTION_HEADER}
    field INSPECTION_HEADER
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMPLE.STANDARD_TYPE}
    field STANDARD_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMPLE.BATCH_ID}
    field BATCH_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMPLE.DYNAMIC_PRODUCT}
    field DYNAMIC_PRODUCT
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMPLE.TOTAL_ELEMENTS}

        datatype INTEGER;

        datatype IDENTITY;

    field REPLICATE_LINK_NO
        datatype INTEGER;

    {AC_SAMPLE.AUTO_VALIDATE}
    field AUTO_VALIDATE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_SAMPLE.HAS_INCIDENTS}
    field HAS_INCIDENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    select_clause
        select ID_NUMERIC, ID_TEXT, JOB_NAME, STATUS, OLD_STATUS, COMPARED, ON_SPEC, RE_SAMPLED, ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, LINK_NUMBER, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_BY, SAMPLED_DATE, RECD_DATE, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATERESREQ, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATERESAVAIL, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, GRADE_CODE, TESTS_TO_DO, ON_WKS, PROJECT_ID, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PREPARATION, HAZARD, PRIORITY, LOCATION_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, TEST_SCHEDULE, TEMPLATE_ID, COMP_PROD_NAME, COMP_PROD_VER, COMP_PROD_GRADE, STANDARD, STANDARD_ID, STANDARD_VERSION, INSPECTION_HEADER, STANDARD_TYPE, BATCH_ID, DYNAMIC_PRODUCT, TOTAL_ELEMENTS, SAMPLING_PROCEDURE, REPLICATE_LINK_NO, AUTO_VALIDATE, HAS_INCIDENTS
        from SAMPLE union
        select ID_NUMERIC, ID_TEXT, JOB_NAME, STATUS, OLD_STATUS, COMPARED, ON_SPEC, RE_SAMPLED, ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, LINK_NUMBER, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_BY, SAMPLED_DATE, RECD_DATE, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATERESREQ, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATERESAVAIL, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, GRADE_CODE, TESTS_TO_DO, ON_WKS, PROJECT_ID, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PREPARATION, HAZARD, PRIORITY, LOCATION_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, TEST_SCHEDULE, TEMPLATE_ID, COMP_PROD_NAME, COMP_PROD_VER, COMP_PROD_GRADE, STANDARD, STANDARD_ID, STANDARD_VERSION, INSPECTION_HEADER, STANDARD_TYPE, BATCH_ID, DYNAMIC_PRODUCT, TOTAL_ELEMENTS, SAMPLING_PROCEDURE, REPLICATE_LINK_NO, AUTO_VALIDATE, HAS_INCIDENTS
        from C_SAMPLE;

    view AC_TEST
        on_table TEST, C_TEST;

    {AC_TEST.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL

    field INSTRUMENT
        datatype IDENTITY;

    field TEST_PRIORITY
        datatype INTEGER;

    field ON_SPEC
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    field TEST_SCHEDULE
        datatype IDENTITY;

    field ORDER_NUM
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    field HAS_RESULT_LIST
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_TEST.COMPONENT_LIST}
    field COMPONENT_LIST
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_TEST.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {AC_TEST.PREPARATION_BATCH}
    field PREPARATION_BATCH
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_TEST.INSTRUMENT_BATCH}

        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_TEST.PARENT_TEST}

        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {AC_TEST.INSPECTION_HEADER}
    field INSPECTION_HEADER
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_TEST.TRIGGER_RULE}
    field TRIGGER_RULE
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_TEST.TRIGGER_ANALYSIS}

        datatype TEXT(40);

    {AC_TEST.STAT_DOUBLE_ATT_FAIL}
    field STAT_DOUBLE_ATT_FAIL
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_TEST.VALIDATION_STATUS}
    field VALIDATION_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(1);

    {AC_TEST.AUTHORISATION_COMMENT}
    field AUTHORISATION_COMMENT
        datatype TEXT(234);

    {AC_TEST.AUTO_VALIDATE}
    field AUTO_VALIDATE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_TEST.HAS_INCIDENTS}
    field HAS_INCIDENTS
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_TEST.INSTRUMENT_TYPE}
    field INSTRUMENT_TYPE
        datatype IDENTITY(17);

    select_clause
        select TEST_NUMBER, ANALYSIS, SAMPLE, PREPARATION, TEST_COUNT, STATUS, OLD_STATUS, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, COMPONENT_REPLICATES, WORKSHEET, WORKSHEET_POSITION, REPLICATE_TEST, INSTRUMENT, TEST_PRIORITY, ON_SPEC, TEST_SCHEDULE, ORDER_NUM, HAS_RESULT_LIST, COMPONENT_LIST, ANALYSIS_VERSION, PREPARATION_BATCH, INSTRUMENT_BATCH, PARENT_TEST, INSPECTION_HEADER, TRIGGER_RULE, TRIGGER_ANALYSIS, STAT_DOUBLE_ATT_FAIL, VALIDATION_STATUS, AUTHORISATION_COMMENT, AUTO_VALIDATE, HAS_INCIDENTS, INSTRUMENT_TYPE
        from TEST union
        select TEST_NUMBER, ANALYSIS, SAMPLE, PREPARATION, TEST_COUNT, STATUS, OLD_STATUS, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, COMPONENT_REPLICATES, WORKSHEET, WORKSHEET_POSITION, REPLICATE_TEST, INSTRUMENT, TEST_PRIORITY, ON_SPEC, TEST_SCHEDULE, ORDER_NUM, HAS_RESULT_LIST, COMPONENT_LIST, ANALYSIS_VERSION, PREPARATION_BATCH, INSTRUMENT_BATCH, PARENT_TEST, INSPECTION_HEADER, TRIGGER_RULE, TRIGGER_ANALYSIS, STAT_DOUBLE_ATT_FAIL, VALIDATION_STATUS, AUTHORISATION_COMMENT, AUTO_VALIDATE, HAS_INCIDENTS, INSTRUMENT_TYPE
        from C_TEST;

    view AC_RESULT
        on_table RESULT, C_RESULT;

    {AC_RESULT.TEST_NUMBER}

    {AC_RESULT.GROUP_ID}

        datatype IDENTITY;

        datatype BOOLEAN;

    field GREATER_THAN_PQL
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_RESULT.PQL_CALCULATION}
    field PQL_CALCULATION
        datatype REAL;

    {AC_RESULT.FORMULA}
    field FORMULA
        datatype TEXT(1000);

    {AC_RESULT.DILUTION_FACTOR}
    field DILUTION_FACTOR
        datatype TEXT (10) 
        default 1.0;

    {AC_RESULT.SPIKE_VALUE}
    field SPIKE_VALUE
        datatype REAL;

    {AC_RESULT.SURROGATE_MLP}
    field SURROGATE_MLP
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_RESULT.SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION}
    field SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {AC_RESULT.MATRIX_NO}
    field MATRIX_NO
        datatype INTEGER;

    {AC_RESULT.MATRIX_NAME}
    field MATRIX_NAME
        datatype TEXT(10);

    {AC_RESULT.COLUMN_NO}
    field COLUMN_NO
        datatype INTEGER;

    {AC_RESULT.COLUMN_NAME}
    field COLUMN_NAME
        datatype TEXT(20);

    {AC_RESULT.ROW_NO}
    field ROW_NO
        datatype INTEGER;

    {AC_RESULT.ROW_NAME}
    field ROW_NAME
        datatype TEXT(20);

    select_clause
        select TEST_NUMBER, NAME, ORDER_NUMBER, RESULT_TYPE, UNITS, MINIMUM, MAXIMUM, TYPICAL, TRUE_WORD, FALSE_WORD, ALLOWED_CHARACTERS, CALCULATION, VALUE, TEXT, PLACES, OUT_OF_RANGE, STATUS, OLD_STATUS, ENTERED_ON, ENTERED_BY, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, GROUP_ID, SECURITY_FLAGS, SIG_FIGS_NUMBER, SIG_FIGS_ROUNDING, SIG_FIGS_FILTER, REP_CONTROL, MINIMUM_PQL, MAXIMUM_PQL, LESS_THAN_PQL, GREATER_THAN_PQL, PQL_CALCULATION, CONVERT (VARCHAR, FORMULA), DILUTION_FACTOR, SPIKE_VALUE, SURROGATE_MLP, SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION, MATRIX_NO, MATRIX_NAME, COLUMN_NO, COLUMN_NAME, ROW_NO, ROW_NAME
        from RESULT union
        select TEST_NUMBER, NAME, ORDER_NUMBER, RESULT_TYPE, UNITS, MINIMUM, MAXIMUM, TYPICAL, TRUE_WORD, FALSE_WORD, ALLOWED_CHARACTERS, CALCULATION, VALUE, TEXT, PLACES, OUT_OF_RANGE, STATUS, OLD_STATUS, ENTERED_ON, ENTERED_BY, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, GROUP_ID, SECURITY_FLAGS, SIG_FIGS_NUMBER, SIG_FIGS_ROUNDING, SIG_FIGS_FILTER, REP_CONTROL, MINIMUM_PQL, MAXIMUM_PQL, LESS_THAN_PQL, GREATER_THAN_PQL, PQL_CALCULATION, CONVERT (VARCHAR, FORMULA), DILUTION_FACTOR, SPIKE_VALUE, SURROGATE_MLP, SURROGATE_MLP_VERSION, MATRIX_NO, MATRIX_NAME, COLUMN_NO, COLUMN_NAME, ROW_NO, ROW_NAME
        from C_RESULT;

    view C_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT
        parent_table SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT tableset COMMITTED;

    view AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT
        on_table SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT, C_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        datatype TEXT(40);

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        datatype TEXT(20);

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_STATUS}
    field JOB_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(1);

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_DESCRIPTION}

        datatype TEXT(234);

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_DATE_CREATED}
    field JOB_DATE_CREATED
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_DATE_COMPLETED}
    field JOB_DATE_COMPLETED
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_DATE_RECEIVED}
    field JOB_DATE_RECEIVED
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_DATE_TO_START}
    field JOB_DATE_TO_START
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_SUBMITTER_OPER}
    field JOB_SUBMITTER_OPER
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_SAMPLES_TO_DO}
    field JOB_SAMPLES_TO_DO
        datatype INTEGER;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_GROUP_ID}
    field JOB_GROUP_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_TEMPLATE_ID}
    field JOB_TEMPLATE_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_SAMPLE_TEMPLATE}

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.JOB_DATE_AUTHORISED}

        datatype TEXT(30);

        datatype TEXT(1);

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.SAMPLE_OLD_STATUS}
    field SAMPLE_OLD_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(1);

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.COMPARED}
    field COMPARED

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.ON_SPEC}
    field ON_SPEC
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.RE_SAMPLED}
    field RE_SAMPLED
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.ORIGINAL_SAMPLE}
    field ORIGINAL_SAMPLE
        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.LINK_NUMBER}
    field LINK_NUMBER
        datatype INTEGER;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.LOGIN_DATE}
    field LOGIN_DATE
        datatype DATE;

        datatype IDENTITY;

        datatype IDENTITY;

    field STANDARD
        datatype BOOLEAN;

        datatype IDENTITY;

        datatype TEXT(1);

    field INSTRUMENT
        datatype IDENTITY;

        datatype TEXT(1);

    field RESULT_STATUS
        datatype TEXT(1);

        datatype TEXT(234);

    field RESULT_VALUE
        datatype REAL;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        datatype TEXT(10);

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.MINIMUM}
    field MINIMUM
        datatype REAL;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.MAXIMUM}
    field MAXIMUM
        datatype REAL;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.OUT_OF_RANGE}
    field OUT_OF_RANGE
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.DATE_RESULT_ENTERED}
    field DATE_RESULT_ENTERED
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.RESULT_ENTERED_BY}
    field RESULT_ENTERED_BY
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.DATE_RESULT_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_RESULT_AUTHORISED
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.RESULT_AUTHORISER}
    field RESULT_AUTHORISER
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT.BATCH_ID}
    field BATCH_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    select_clause
        select ID_NUMERIC, COMPONENT_NAME, JOB_NAME, JOB_STATUS, JOB_DESCRIPTION, JOB_DATE_CREATED, JOB_DATE_COMPLETED, JOB_DATE_RECEIVED, JOB_DATE_TO_START, JOB_SUBMITTER_OPER, JOB_SAMPLES_TO_DO, JOB_GROUP_ID, JOB_TEMPLATE_ID, JOB_SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, JOB_DATE_AUTHORISED, JOB_AUTHORISER, JOB_AUTHORISATION_NOTES, ID_TEXT, STATUS, SAMPLE_OLD_STATUS, COMPARED, ON_SPEC, RE_SAMPLED, ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, LINK_NUMBER, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_BY, SAMPLED_DATE, RECD_DATE, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATERESREQ, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATERESAVAIL, SAMPLE_DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, GRADE_CODE, TESTS_TO_DO, ON_WKS, PROJECT_ID, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PREPARATION, HAZARD, PRIORITY, LOCATION_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, TEST_SCHEDULE, TEMPLATE_ID, COMP_PROD_NAME, COMP_PROD_VER, COMP_PROD_GRADE, STANDARD, ANALYSIS, TEST_STATUS, INSTRUMENT, RESULT_TYPE, RESULT_STATUS, RESULT_TEXT, RESULT_VALUE, UNITS, MINIMUM, MAXIMUM, OUT_OF_RANGE, DATE_RESULT_ENTERED, RESULT_ENTERED_BY, DATE_RESULT_AUTHORISED, RESULT_AUTHORISER, BATCH_ID
        from SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT union
        select ID_NUMERIC, COMPONENT_NAME, JOB_NAME, JOB_STATUS, JOB_DESCRIPTION, JOB_DATE_CREATED, JOB_DATE_COMPLETED, JOB_DATE_RECEIVED, JOB_DATE_TO_START, JOB_SUBMITTER_OPER, JOB_SAMPLES_TO_DO, JOB_GROUP_ID, JOB_TEMPLATE_ID, JOB_SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, JOB_DATE_AUTHORISED, JOB_AUTHORISER, JOB_AUTHORISATION_NOTES, ID_TEXT, STATUS, SAMPLE_OLD_STATUS, COMPARED, ON_SPEC, RE_SAMPLED, ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, LINK_NUMBER, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_BY, SAMPLED_DATE, RECD_DATE, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATERESREQ, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATERESAVAIL, SAMPLE_DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, GRADE_CODE, TESTS_TO_DO, ON_WKS, PROJECT_ID, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PREPARATION, HAZARD, PRIORITY, LOCATION_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, TEST_SCHEDULE, TEMPLATE_ID, COMP_PROD_NAME, COMP_PROD_VER, COMP_PROD_GRADE, STANDARD, ANALYSIS, TEST_STATUS, INSTRUMENT, RESULT_TYPE, RESULT_STATUS, RESULT_TEXT, RESULT_VALUE, UNITS, MINIMUM, MAXIMUM, OUT_OF_RANGE, DATE_RESULT_ENTERED, RESULT_ENTERED_BY, DATE_RESULT_AUTHORISED, RESULT_AUTHORISER, BATCH_ID
        from C_SAMP_JOB_TEST_RESULT;

        on_table SAMP_TEST_RESULT, C_SAMP_TEST_RESULT;

        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

        datatype PACKED_DECIMAL 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

        datatype TEXT(40) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

        datatype TEXT(20);

        datatype TEXT(234);

        datatype REAL;

        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMP_TEST_RESULT.DATE_RESULT_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_RESULT_AUTHORISED
        datatype DATE;

    {AC_SAMP_TEST_RESULT.RESULT_AUTHORISER}
    field RESULT_AUTHORISER
        datatype IDENTITY;

    select_clause
        select ID_NUMERIC, TEST_NUMBER, COMPONENT_NAME, JOB_NAME, ID_TEXT, STATUS, SAMPLE_OLD_STATUS, COMPARED, ON_SPEC, RE_SAMPLED, ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, LINK_NUMBER, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_BY, SAMPLED_DATE, RECD_DATE, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATERESREQ, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATERESAVAIL, SAMPLE_DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, GRADE_CODE, TESTS_TO_DO, ON_WKS, PROJECT_ID, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PREPARATION, HAZARD, PRIORITY, LOCATION_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, TEST_SCHEDULE, TEMPLATE_ID, COMP_PROD_NAME, COMP_PROD_VER, COMP_PROD_GRADE, STANDARD, ANALYSIS, TEST_STATUS, INSTRUMENT, RESULT_TYPE, RESULT_STATUS, RESULT_TEXT, RESULT_VALUE, UNITS, MINIMUM, MAXIMUM, OUT_OF_RANGE, DATE_RESULT_ENTERED, RESULT_ENTERED_BY, DATE_RESULT_AUTHORISED, RESULT_AUTHORISER
        from SAMP_TEST_RESULT union
        select ID_NUMERIC, TEST_NUMBER, COMPONENT_NAME, JOB_NAME, ID_TEXT, STATUS, SAMPLE_OLD_STATUS, COMPARED, ON_SPEC, RE_SAMPLED, ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, LINK_NUMBER, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_BY, SAMPLED_DATE, RECD_DATE, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATERESREQ, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATERESAVAIL, SAMPLE_DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, GRADE_CODE, TESTS_TO_DO, ON_WKS, PROJECT_ID, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PREPARATION, HAZARD, PRIORITY, LOCATION_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, TEST_SCHEDULE, TEMPLATE_ID, COMP_PROD_NAME, COMP_PROD_VER, COMP_PROD_GRADE, STANDARD, ANALYSIS, TEST_STATUS, INSTRUMENT, RESULT_TYPE, RESULT_STATUS, RESULT_TEXT, RESULT_VALUE, UNITS, MINIMUM, MAXIMUM, OUT_OF_RANGE, DATE_RESULT_ENTERED, RESULT_ENTERED_BY, DATE_RESULT_AUTHORISED, RESULT_AUTHORISER
        from C_SAMP_TEST_RESULT;

    field TEST_SCHEDULE
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_VIEW.TEMPLATE_ID}
    field TEMPLATE_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_VIEW.COMP_PROD_NAME}
    field COMP_PROD_NAME
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_VIEW.COMP_PROD_VER}
    field COMP_PROD_VER
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_VIEW.COMP_PROD_GRADE}
    field COMP_PROD_GRADE
        datatype IDENTITY;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_VIEW.STANDARD}
    field STANDARD
        datatype BOOLEAN;

    {AC_SAMP_JOB_VIEW.BATCH_ID}
    field BATCH_ID
        datatype IDENTITY;

    select_clause
        select ID_NUMERIC, JOB_NAME, JOB_STATUS, JOB_DESCRIPTION, JOB_DATE_CREATED, JOB_DATE_COMPLETED, JOB_DATE_RECEIVED, JOB_DATE_TO_START, JOB_SUBMITTER_OPER, JOB_SAMPLES_TO_DO, JOB_GROUP_ID, JOB_TEMPLATE_ID, JOB_SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, JOB_DATE_AUTHORISED, JOB_AUTHORISER, JOB_AUTHORISATION_NOTES, ID_TEXT, SAMPLE_STATUS, SAMPLE_OLD_STATUS, COMPARED, ON_SPEC, RE_SAMPLED, ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, LINK_NUMBER, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_BY, SAMPLED_DATE, RECD_DATE, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATERESREQ, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATERESAVAIL, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, GRADE_CODE, TESTS_TO_DO, ON_WKS, PROJECT_ID, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PREPARATION, HAZARD, PRIORITY, LOCATION_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, TEST_SCHEDULE, TEMPLATE_ID, COMP_PROD_NAME, COMP_PROD_VER, COMP_PROD_GRADE, STANDARD, BATCH_ID
        from SAMP_JOB_VIEW union
        select ID_NUMERIC, JOB_NAME, JOB_STATUS, JOB_DESCRIPTION, JOB_DATE_CREATED, JOB_DATE_COMPLETED, JOB_DATE_RECEIVED, JOB_DATE_TO_START, JOB_SUBMITTER_OPER, JOB_SAMPLES_TO_DO, JOB_GROUP_ID, JOB_TEMPLATE_ID, JOB_SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, JOB_DATE_AUTHORISED, JOB_AUTHORISER, JOB_AUTHORISATION_NOTES, ID_TEXT, SAMPLE_STATUS, SAMPLE_OLD_STATUS, COMPARED, ON_SPEC, RE_SAMPLED, ORIGINAL_SAMPLE, LINK_NUMBER, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_BY, SAMPLED_DATE, RECD_DATE, DATE_STARTED, STARTER, DATERESREQ, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATERESAVAIL, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, AUTHORISATION_NOTES, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_VERSION, GRADE_CODE, TESTS_TO_DO, ON_WKS, PROJECT_ID, BATCH_NAME, SAMPLING_POINT, SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PREPARATION, HAZARD, PRIORITY, LOCATION_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, INVOICE_NUMBER, TEST_SCHEDULE, TEMPLATE_ID, COMP_PROD_NAME, COMP_PROD_VER, COMP_PROD_GRADE, STANDARD, BATCH_ID
        from C_SAMP_JOB_VIEW;

    view SMP_BATCH_VIEW
        on_table BATCH_HEADER,BATCH_ENTRY;

    {SMP_BATCH_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {SMP_BATCH_VIEW.TEST}
    field TEST
        links_to BATCH_ENTRY.TEST 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {SMP_BATCH_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {SMP_BATCH_VIEW.DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {SMP_BATCH_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(4);

    select_clause
        select BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, BATCH_HEADER.STATUS, BATCH_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED, BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS
        from BATCH_HEADER, BATCH_ENTRY;

    view C_SMP_BATCH_VIEW
        on_table C_BATCH_HEADER,C_BATCH_ENTRY;

    {C_SMP_BATCH_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {C_SMP_BATCH_VIEW.TEST}
    field TEST
        links_to BATCH_ENTRY.TEST 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {C_SMP_BATCH_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {C_SMP_BATCH_VIEW.DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {C_SMP_BATCH_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(4);

    select_clause
        select C_BATCH_HEADER.[IDENTITY], C_BATCH_ENTRY.TEST, C_BATCH_HEADER.STATUS, C_BATCH_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED, C_BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS
        from C_BATCH_HEADER, C_BATCH_ENTRY;

    view ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW
        on_table VERSIONED_ANALYSIS;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,VERSION_NUMBER;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.GROUP_ID 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.ANALYSIS_TYPE}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.INSTTYPE_ID}
    field INSTTYPE_ID
        datatype IDENTITY(17);

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.PREPARATION_ID}
    field PREPARATION_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.PREPARATION_ID;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.EXPECTED_TIME}
    field EXPECTED_TIME
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.EXPECTED_TIME;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.CHARGECODE}
    field CHARGECODE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CHARGECODE;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.RESULT_SCREEN}
    field RESULT_SCREEN
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.RESULT_SCREEN;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIED_ON 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIED_BY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIABLE 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.REMOVEFLAG 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.REPLICATES}
    field REPLICATES
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.REPLICATES;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.ACCESS_FLAGS}
    field ACCESS_FLAGS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ACCESS_FLAGS;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.COMP_REPLICATES}
    field COMP_REPLICATES
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COMP_REPLICATES;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.GENERIC_ANALYSIS}
    field GENERIC_ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.GENERIC_ANALYSIS;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.APPROVAL_REQD}
    field APPROVAL_REQD
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.APPROVAL_REQD;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.ALLOW_CATEGORY}
    field ALLOW_CATEGORY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ALLOW_CATEGORY;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.APPROVAL_STATUS}
    field APPROVAL_STATUS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.APPROVAL_STATUS;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.INSPECTION_PLAN}
    field INSPECTION_PLAN
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INSPECTION_PLAN;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE}
    field SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE;

    {ANALYSIS_ALL_VIEW.AUTO_VALIDATE}
    field AUTO_VALIDATE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.AUTO_VALIDATE;

    select_clause
        select A1.[IDENTITY], A1.ANALYSIS_VERSION, A1.GROUP_ID, A1.ANALYSIS_TYPE, A1.DESCRIPTION, A1.INSTTYPE_ID, A1.PREPARATION_ID, A1.EXPECTED_TIME, A1.CHARGECODE, A1.RESULT_SCREEN, A1.MODIFIED_ON, A1.MODIFIED_BY, A1.MODIFIABLE, A1.REMOVEFLAG, A1.CALCULATION, A1.REPLICATES, A1.ACCESS_FLAGS, A1.COMP_REPLICATES, A1.GENERIC_ANALYSIS, A1.APPROVAL_REQD, A1.ALLOW_CATEGORY, A1.APPROVAL_STATUS, A1.INSPECTION_PLAN, A1.SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE, A1.AUTO_VALIDATE
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A1;

        links_to PDS_PROTO.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE;

    field TYPE
        links_to PDS_PROTO.TYPE;

    {ARC_PDS_PROTO_VIEW.USE_PREDICTED}

        links_to PDS_PROTO.USE_PREDICTED;

        links_to PDS_PROTO.USE_STUDY_NAME;

        links_to PDS_PROTO.PRODUCT_ID;

    {ARC_PDS_PROTO_VIEW.MODIFIED_ON}

        links_to PDS_PROTO.MODIFIED_ON;

    {ARC_PDS_PROTO_VIEW.MODIFIABLE}

        links_to PDS_PROTO.MODIFIABLE;

    {ARC_PDS_PROTO_VIEW.REMOVE_FLAG}

        links_to PDS_PROTO.REMOVE_FLAG;

    select_clause
        select [IDENTITY], PROTOCOL_VERSION, DESCRIPTION, GROUP_ID, DEFAULT_CONFIG, STATUS, JOB_TEMPLATE_ID, SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, REPORT_NAME, LABEL_NAME, LOG_TYPE, AUTHORISED_ON, AUTHORISED_BY, AUTHORISATION_TEXT, TYPE, USE_PREDICTED, USE_STUDY_NAME, PRODUCT_ID, MODIFIED_ON, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIABLE, REMOVE_FLAG
        from PDS_PROTO;

        links_to PDS_STUDY.AUTHORISATION_TEXT;

    field LOG_TYPE
        links_to PDS_STUDY.LOG_TYPE;

    {ARC_PDS_STUDY_VIEW.JOB_NAME}

    field TYPE
        links_to PDS_STUDY.TYPE;

    {ARC_PDS_STUDY_VIEW.STABILITY_VERSION}

    field PRODUCT_ID
        links_to PDS_STUDY.PRODUCT_ID;

    {ARC_PDS_STUDY_VIEW.ACTIVATED_BEFORE}
    field ACTIVATED_BEFORE
        links_to PDS_STUDY.ACTIVATED_BEFORE;

    {ARC_PDS_STUDY_VIEW.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to PDS_STUDY.MODIFIED_ON;

    {ARC_PDS_STUDY_VIEW.MODIFIED_BY}

    {ARC_PDS_STUDY_VIEW.MODIFIABLE}

        links_to PDS_STUDY.USE_STUDY_NAME;

        from PDS_STUDY;

    view ARC_TEST_SCHED_VIEW
        on_table TEST_SCHED_HEADER;

    {ARC_TEST_SCHED_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,PRIMARY_BROWSE;

        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.MODIFIABLE;

        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON;

    {ARC_TEST_SCHED_VIEW.MODIFIED_BY}

        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY;

    {ARC_TEST_SCHED_VIEW.REMOVEFLAG}

        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG;

    {ARC_TEST_SCHED_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {ARC_TEST_SCHED_VIEW.CONSIGN_ID}
    field CONSIGN_ID
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.CONSIGN_ID;

    {ARC_TEST_SCHED_VIEW.CONSIGN_SEQUENCE}
    field CONSIGN_SEQUENCE
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.CONSIGN_SEQUENCE;

    {ARC_TEST_SCHED_VIEW.CONSIGN_DATE}
    field CONSIGN_DATE
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.CONSIGN_DATE;

    select_clause

        from TEST_SCHED_HEADER;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_STATUS}

        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_STATUS;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_DESCRIPTION}
    field JOB_DESCRIPTION
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BROWSE_DESCRIPTION;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_DATE_CREATED}
    field JOB_DATE_CREATED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_CREATED;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_DATE_COMPLETED}
    field JOB_DATE_COMPLETED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_COMPLETED;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_DATE_RECEIVED}
    field JOB_DATE_RECEIVED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_RECEIVED;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_DATE_TO_START}
    field JOB_DATE_TO_START
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_TO_START;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_SUBMITTER_OPER}
    field JOB_SUBMITTER_OPER
        links_to JOB_HEADER.SUBMITTER_OPER;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_SAMPLES_TO_DO}
    field JOB_SAMPLES_TO_DO
        links_to JOB_HEADER.SAMPLES_TO_DO;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_GROUP_ID}
    field JOB_GROUP_ID
        links_to JOB_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_TEMPLATE_ID}
    field JOB_TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to JOB_HEADER.TEMPLATE_ID;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_SAMPLE_TEMPLATE}
    field JOB_SAMPLE_TEMPLATE
        links_to JOB_HEADER.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field JOB_DATE_AUTHORISED
        links_to JOB_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_AUTHORISER}
    field JOB_AUTHORISER
        links_to JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISER;

    {ARC_JOB_LOT_VIEW.JOB_AUTHORISATION_NOTES}

        links_to JOB_HEADER.AUTHORISATION_NOTES;

    view STANDARDS_VIEW
        on_table STANDARD_VERSIONS;

    {STANDARDS_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {STANDARDS_VIEW.VERSION}
    field VERSION
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.VERSION 
        used_for VERSION_NUMBER,UNIQUE_KEY,ORDERING;

    {STANDARDS_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.STATUS;

    {STANDARDS_VIEW.CREATION_DATE}
    field CREATION_DATE
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.CREATION_DATE;

    {STANDARDS_VIEW.EXPIRY_DATE}
    field EXPIRY_DATE
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.EXPIRY_DATE;

    {STANDARDS_VIEW.USAGE_COUNT}
    field USAGE_COUNT
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.USAGE_COUNT;

    {STANDARDS_VIEW.VERSION_COMMENT}
    field VERSION_COMMENT
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.VERSION_COMMENT;

    select_clause
        select [IDENTITY], VERSION, STATUS, CREATION_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE, USAGE_COUNT, VERSION_COMMENT
        from STANDARD_VERSIONS;

    view ARC_STANDARDS_VIEW
        on_table ARCHIVE_STANDARD_VERSIONS;

    {ARC_STANDARDS_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY, PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {ARC_STANDARDS_VIEW.VERSION}
    field VERSION
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.VERSION 
        used_for VERSION_NUMBER,UNIQUE_KEY,ORDERING;

    {ARC_STANDARDS_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.STATUS;

    {ARC_STANDARDS_VIEW.CREATION_DATE}
    field CREATION_DATE
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.CREATION_DATE;

    {ARC_STANDARDS_VIEW.EXPIRY_DATE}
    field EXPIRY_DATE
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.EXPIRY_DATE;

    {ARC_STANDARDS_VIEW.USAGE_COUNT}
    field USAGE_COUNT
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.USAGE_COUNT;

    {ARC_STANDARDS_VIEW.VERSION_COMMENT}
    field VERSION_COMMENT
        links_to STANDARD_VERSIONS.VERSION_COMMENT;

    select_clause
        select [IDENTITY], VERSION, STATUS, CREATION_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE, USAGE_COUNT, VERSION_COMMENT
        from STANDARD_VERSIONS;

    view AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW
        on_table BATCH_HEADER;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.STATUS;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.DATE_CREATED}
    field DATE_CREATED
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.DATE_CREATED;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.CREATOR}
    field CREATOR
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.CREATOR;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.DATE_COMPLETED}
    field DATE_COMPLETED
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.DATE_COMPLETED;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.COMPLETER}
    field COMPLETER
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.COMPLETER;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.DATE_REVIEWED}
    field DATE_REVIEWED
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.DATE_REVIEWED;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.REVIEWER}
    field REVIEWER
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.REVIEWER;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.DATE_AUTHORISED}
    field DATE_AUTHORISED
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.DATE_AUTHORISED;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.AUTHORISER}
    field AUTHORISER
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.AUTHORISER;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.DATE_CANCELLED}
    field DATE_CANCELLED
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.DATE_CANCELLED;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.CANCELLER}
    field CANCELLER
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.CANCELLER;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.LIMITS}
    field LIMITS
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.LIMITS;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.BATCH_CLASS}
    field BATCH_CLASS
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.BATCH_CLASS;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.ANALYST}

        links_to BATCH_HEADER.ANALYST;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.INSTRUMENT}

        links_to BATCH_HEADER.INSTRUMENT;

        links_to BATCH_HEADER.START_DATE;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.END_DATE}
