        links_to BATCH_HEADER.END_DATE;

    {AC_BATCH_HEADER_VIEW.BATCH_COMMENT}
    field BATCH_COMMENT
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.BATCH_COMMENT;

    select_clause
        select [IDENTITY], STATUS, DATE_CREATED, CREATOR, DATE_COMPLETED, COMPLETER, DATE_REVIEWED, REVIEWER, DATE_AUTHORISED, AUTHORISER, DATE_CANCELLED, CANCELLER, LIMITS, ANALYSIS, BATCH_CLASS, ANALYST, INSTRUMENT, START_DATE, END_DATE, BATCH_COMMENT
        from BATCH_HEADER;

    view AC_ARC_BATCH_VIEW
        on_table ARCHIVE_BATCH_HEADER;

    {AC_ARC_BATCH_VIEW.IDENTITY}

        links_to BATCH_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {AC_ARC_BATCH_VIEW.STATUS}

        links_to BATCH_HEADER.AUTHORISER;

        links_to BATCH_HEADER.DATE_CANCELLED;

        links_to BATCH_HEADER.CANCELLER;

    {AC_ARC_BATCH_VIEW.LIMITS}
    field LIMITS
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.LIMITS;

    {AC_ARC_BATCH_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to BATCH_HEADER.ANALYSIS;

    {AC_ARC_BATCH_VIEW.BATCH_CLASS}

        from ARCHIVE_BATCH_HEADER;

    view EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW
        on_table AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION, DESTINATION_CPU;

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.ORDER_NUMBER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.DESTINATION_SYSTEM}
    field DESTINATION_SYSTEM
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.DESTINATION_SYSTEM 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.DATE_SUBMITTED}
    field DATE_SUBMITTED
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.DATE_SUBMITTED 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.SUBMITTED_BY}
    field SUBMITTED_BY
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.SUBMITTED_BY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.ZIP_FILE_ID}
    field ZIP_FILE_ID
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.ZIP_FILE_ID 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(9);

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.DELIVERY_ATTEMPTS}
    field DELIVERY_ATTEMPTS
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.DELIVERY_ATTEMPTS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(4);

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.DATE_DELIVERED}
    field DATE_DELIVERED
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.DATE_DELIVERED 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(5);

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.DESTINATION_ADDRESS}
    field DESTINATION_ADDRESS
        links_to DESTINATION_CPU.SYSTEM_PATH 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(8);

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.DELIVERY_SUCCESSFUL}
    field DELIVERY_SUCCESSFUL
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.DELIVERY_SUCCESSFUL 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(6);

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.DELIVERY_STATUS}
    field DELIVERY_STATUS
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.DELIVERY_STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(7);

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.MAIL_LIST_SUCCESS}
    field MAIL_LIST_SUCCESS
        links_to DESTINATION_CPU.MAIL_LIST_SUCCESS;

    {EXPORT_DELIVER_VIEW.MAIL_LIST_FAILURE}
    field MAIL_LIST_FAILURE
        links_to DESTINATION_CPU.MAIL_LIST_FAILURE;

    select_clause
        select ACD.[IDENTITY], ACD.ORDER_NUMBER, ACD.DESTINATION_SYSTEM, ACD.DATE_SUBMITTED, ACD.SUBMITTED_BY, ACD.ZIP_FILE_ID, ACD.DELIVERY_ATTEMPTS, ACD.DATE_DELIVERED, DC.SYSTEM_PATH, ACD.DELIVERY_SUCCESSFUL, ACD.DELIVERY_STATUS, DC.MAIL_LIST_SUCCESS, DC.MAIL_LIST_FAILURE
        from AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION ACD, DESTINATION_CPU DC
        where ACD.DELIVERY_ATTEMPTS <= 999 and ACD.DESTINATION_SYSTEM = DC.[IDENTITY] and ACD.DELIVERY_SUCCESSFUL = 'F';

    view EXPORT_DELIVERED_VIEW
        on_table AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION, DESTINATION_CPU;

    {EXPORT_DELIVERED_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {EXPORT_DELIVERED_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.ORDER_NUMBER 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {EXPORT_DELIVERED_VIEW.DESTINATION_SYSTEM}
    field DESTINATION_SYSTEM
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.DESTINATION_SYSTEM 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,DISPLAY_BROWSE(1);

    {EXPORT_DELIVERED_VIEW.DELIVERY_ATTEMPTS}
    field DELIVERY_ATTEMPTS
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.DELIVERY_ATTEMPTS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(2);

    {EXPORT_DELIVERED_VIEW.DATE_DELIVERED}
    field DATE_DELIVERED
        links_to AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION.DATE_DELIVERED 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(3);

    {EXPORT_DELIVERED_VIEW.DESTINATION_ADDRESS}
    field DESTINATION_ADDRESS
        links_to DESTINATION_CPU.SYSTEM_PATH 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE(5);

    select_clause
        select ACD.[IDENTITY], ACD.ORDER_NUMBER, ACD.DESTINATION_SYSTEM, ACD.DELIVERY_ATTEMPTS, ACD.DATE_DELIVERED, DC.SYSTEM_PATH
        from AUTO_COMMIT_DESTINATION ACD, DESTINATION_CPU DC
        where ACD.DESTINATION_SYSTEM = DC.[IDENTITY] and ACD.DELIVERY_SUCCESSFUL = 'T';

    view ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW
        on_table VERSIONED_ANALYSIS;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.ANALYSIS_VERSION}
    field ANALYSIS_VERSION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,VERSION_NUMBER;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.GROUP_ID 
        used_for SECURITY_ID;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.ANALYSIS_TYPE}
    field ANALYSIS_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_TYPE;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.INSTTYPE_ID}
    field INSTTYPE_ID
        datatype IDENTITY(17);

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.PREPARATION_ID}
    field PREPARATION_ID
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.PREPARATION_ID;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.EXPECTED_TIME}
    field EXPECTED_TIME
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.EXPECTED_TIME;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.CHARGECODE}
    field CHARGECODE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CHARGECODE;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.RESULT_SCREEN}
    field RESULT_SCREEN
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.RESULT_SCREEN;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIED_ON 
        used_for MODIFIED_ON;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIED_BY 
        used_for MODIFIED_BY;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.MODIFIABLE 
        used_for MODIFIABLE;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.REMOVEFLAG 
        used_for REMOVE_FLAG;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.CALCULATION;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.REPLICATES}
    field REPLICATES
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.REPLICATES;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.ACCESS_FLAGS}
    field ACCESS_FLAGS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ACCESS_FLAGS;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.COMP_REPLICATES}
    field COMP_REPLICATES
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COMP_REPLICATES;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.GENERIC_ANALYSIS}
    field GENERIC_ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.GENERIC_ANALYSIS;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.APPROVAL_REQD}
    field APPROVAL_REQD
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.APPROVAL_REQD;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.ALLOW_CATEGORY}
    field ALLOW_CATEGORY
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.ALLOW_CATEGORY;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.APPROVAL_STATUS}
    field APPROVAL_STATUS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.APPROVAL_STATUS;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.INSPECTION_PLAN}
    field INSPECTION_PLAN
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.INSPECTION_PLAN;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE}
    field SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE;

    {ANALYSIS_EXP_VIEW.AUTO_VALIDATE}
    field AUTO_VALIDATE
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.AUTO_VALIDATE;

    select_clause
        select TOP 100 PERCENT A1.[IDENTITY], A1.ANALYSIS_VERSION, A1.GROUP_ID, A1.ANALYSIS_TYPE, A1.DESCRIPTION, A1.INSTTYPE_ID, A1.PREPARATION_ID, A1.EXPECTED_TIME, A1.CHARGECODE, A1.RESULT_SCREEN, A1.MODIFIED_ON, A1.MODIFIED_BY, A1.MODIFIABLE, A1.REMOVEFLAG, A1.CALCULATION, A1.REPLICATES, A1.ACCESS_FLAGS, A1.COMP_REPLICATES, A1.GENERIC_ANALYSIS, A1.APPROVAL_REQD, A1.ALLOW_CATEGORY, A1.APPROVAL_STATUS, A1.INSPECTION_PLAN, A1.SAMPLING_PLAN_TYPE, A1.AUTO_VALIDATE
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A1
        where ANALYSIS_VERSION =
        (select max(ANALYSIS_VERSION)
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A2
        where A2.[IDENTITY] = A1.[IDENTITY] and A2.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A' and A2.REMOVEFLAG = 'F' and A2.MODIFIED_ON is not null)ORDER BY A1.MODIFIED_ON DESC;

    view PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW
        on_table PDS_PROTO;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to PDS_PROTO.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.PROTOCOL_VERSION}
    field PROTOCOL_VERSION
        links_to PDS_PROTO.PROTOCOL_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to PDS_PROTO.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to PDS_PROTO.GROUP_ID;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.DEFAULT_CONFIG}
    field DEFAULT_CONFIG
        links_to PDS_PROTO.DEFAULT_CONFIG;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to PDS_PROTO.STATUS;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.JOB_TEMPLATE_ID}
    field JOB_TEMPLATE_ID
        links_to PDS_PROTO.JOB_TEMPLATE_ID;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE}
    field SAMPLE_TEMPLATE
        links_to PDS_PROTO.SAMPLE_TEMPLATE;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.REPORT_NAME}
    field REPORT_NAME
        links_to PDS_PROTO.REPORT_NAME;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.LABEL_NAME}
    field LABEL_NAME
        links_to PDS_PROTO.LABEL_NAME;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.LOG_TYPE}
    field LOG_TYPE
        links_to PDS_PROTO.LOG_TYPE;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.AUTHORISED_ON}
    field AUTHORISED_ON
        links_to PDS_PROTO.AUTHORISED_ON;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.AUTHORISED_BY}
    field AUTHORISED_BY
        links_to PDS_PROTO.AUTHORISED_BY;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.AUTHORISATION_TEXT}
    field AUTHORISATION_TEXT
        links_to PDS_PROTO.AUTHORISATION_TEXT;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.TYPE}
    field TYPE
        links_to PDS_PROTO.TYPE;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.USE_PREDICTED}
    field USE_PREDICTED
        links_to PDS_PROTO.USE_PREDICTED;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.USE_STUDY_NAME}
    field USE_STUDY_NAME
        links_to PDS_PROTO.USE_STUDY_NAME;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.PRODUCT_ID}
    field PRODUCT_ID
        links_to PDS_PROTO.PRODUCT_ID;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to PDS_PROTO.MODIFIED_ON;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to PDS_PROTO.MODIFIED_BY;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        links_to PDS_PROTO.MODIFIABLE;

    {PDS_PROTO_EXP_VIEW.REMOVE_FLAG}
    field REMOVE_FLAG
        links_to PDS_PROTO.REMOVE_FLAG;

    select_clause
        select [IDENTITY], PROTOCOL_VERSION, DESCRIPTION, GROUP_ID, DEFAULT_CONFIG, STATUS, JOB_TEMPLATE_ID, SAMPLE_TEMPLATE, REPORT_NAME, LABEL_NAME, LOG_TYPE, AUTHORISED_ON, AUTHORISED_BY, AUTHORISATION_TEXT, TYPE, USE_PREDICTED, USE_STUDY_NAME, PRODUCT_ID, MODIFIED_ON, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIABLE, REMOVE_FLAG
        from PDS_PROTO
        where PROTOCOL_VERSION =
        (select max(PROTOCOL_VERSION)
        from PDS_PROTO A2
        where A2.[IDENTITY] = PDS_PROTO.[IDENTITY] and A2.STATUS = 'A' and A2.REMOVE_FLAG = 'F');

    view TEST_SCHED_EXP_VIEW
        on_table TEST_SCHED_HEADER;

    {TEST_SCHED_EXP_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY,PRIMARY_BROWSE;

    {TEST_SCHED_EXP_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (1);

    {TEST_SCHED_EXP_VIEW.MODIFIABLE}
    field MODIFIABLE
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.MODIFIABLE;

    {TEST_SCHED_EXP_VIEW.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON;

    {TEST_SCHED_EXP_VIEW.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY;

    {TEST_SCHED_EXP_VIEW.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG;

    {TEST_SCHED_EXP_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.GROUP_ID;

    select_clause
        select TOP 100 PERCENT [IDENTITY], DESCRIPTION, MODIFIABLE, MODIFIED_ON, MODIFIED_BY, REMOVEFLAG, GROUP_ID
        from TEST_SCHED_HEADER
        where REMOVEFLAG = 'F' ORDER BY MODIFIED_ON DESC;

    view MLP_HEADER_EXP_VIEW
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {MLP_HEADER_EXP_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {MLP_HEADER_EXP_VIEW.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY DESCENDING;

    {MLP_HEADER_EXP_VIEW.APPROVAL_STATUS}
    field APPROVAL_STATUS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.APPROVAL_STATUS 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (2);

    {MLP_HEADER_EXP_VIEW.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (3);

    {MLP_HEADER_EXP_VIEW.MODIFIED_BY}
    field MODIFIED_BY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (4);

    {MLP_HEADER_EXP_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.DESCRIPTION 
        used_for DISPLAY_BROWSE (5);

    {MLP_HEADER_EXP_VIEW.VERSION_COMMENT}
    field VERSION_COMMENT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.VERSION_COMMENT;

    {MLP_HEADER_EXP_VIEW.VERSION_STATUS}
    field VERSION_STATUS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_STATUS;

    {MLP_HEADER_EXP_VIEW.REMOVEFLAG}
    field REMOVEFLAG
        links_to MLP_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG;

    select_clause
        select TOP 100 PERCENT MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY], MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION, MLP_HEADER.APPROVAL_STATUS, MLP_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON, MLP_HEADER.MODIFIED_BY, MLP_HEADER.DESCRIPTION, MLP_HEADER.VERSION_COMMENT, MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_STATUS, MLP_HEADER.REMOVEFLAG
        from MLP_HEADER
        where PRODUCT_VERSION =
        (select max(PRODUCT_VERSION)
        from MLP_HEADER A2
        where A2.[IDENTITY] = MLP_HEADER.[IDENTITY] and A2.REMOVEFLAG = 'F')order by MLP_HEADER.MODIFIED_ON DESC;

    view PARM_KEY_EXP_VIEW
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {PARM_KEY_EXP_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {PARM_KEY_EXP_VIEW.VERSION}
    field VERSION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION;

    {PARM_KEY_EXP_VIEW.PARM_TYPE}
    field PARM_TYPE
        links_to PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS.PARM_TYPE;

    {PARM_KEY_EXP_VIEW.PARM_KEY}
    field PARM_KEY
        links_to PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS.IDENTITY;

    select_clause
        select M.[IDENTITY], M.PRODUCT_VERSION, L1.PARM_TYPE, L1.[IDENTITY]
        from MLP_HEADER M, PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS L1, PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS L2
        where M.REMOVEFLAG = 'F' and M.[IDENTITY] = L1.FIELD_NAME and L1.PARM_TYPE = 'M' and L1.[IDENTITY] = L2.[IDENTITY] and rtrim(M.PRODUCT_VERSION)= L2.FIELD_NAME union
        select A.[IDENTITY], A.ANALYSIS_VERSION, L1.PARM_TYPE, L1.[IDENTITY]
        from VERSIONED_ANALYSIS A, PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS L1, PARM_SETUP_LINK_FIELDS L2
        where A.REMOVEFLAG = 'F' and A.[IDENTITY] = L1.FIELD_NAME and L1.PARM_TYPE = 'A' and l1.[identity] = l2.[identity] and rtrim (a.analysis_version)= l2.field_name;

    {Custom} 
    view MAX_STAB_MLP_VER
        on_table MLP_HEADER;

    {Custom} 
    {MAX_STAB_MLP_VER.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {Custom} 
    {MAX_STAB_MLP_VER.MAX_VERSION}
    field MAX_VERSION
        datatype INTEGER;

    {Custom} 
    select_clause
        select MLP_ID, max(S.PRODUCT_VERSION)
        from PDS_STUDY ST INNER JOIN PDS_STUDY_PULL P on ST.[IDENTITY] = P.HEADER INNER JOIN ALL_SAMPLE S on P.CREATED_SAMPLE_ID = S.ID_NUMERIC GROUP BY MLP_ID;

    {Custom} 
    table CH_LOG;

    {Custom} 
    {CH_LOG.LOG_ID}
    field LOG_ID
        datatype TEXT(20) 
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {Custom} 
    {CH_LOG.TIME_STAMP}
    field TIME_STAMP
        datatype DATE;

    {Custom} 
    {CH_LOG.OPERATOR}
    field OPERATOR
        datatype TEXT(10);

    {Custom} 
    {CH_LOG.LIBRARY}
    field LIBRARY
        datatype TEXT(50);

    {Custom} 
    {CH_LOG.LINE}
    field LINE
        datatype INTEGER;

    {Custom} 
    {CH_LOG.ROUTINE}
    field ROUTINE
        datatype TEXT(50);

    {Custom} 
    {CH_LOG.MSG}
    field MSG
        datatype TEXT(100);

    {Custom} 
    index CH_LOG_UNIQUE UNIQUE
        on LOG_ID;

    {Custom} 
    index CH_LOG_DATE
        on TIME_STAMP;

    {Custom} 
    view MLP_CHANGE_VIEW;

    {Custom} 
    {MLP_CHANGE_VIEW.ACTION}
    field ACTION 
        datatype TEXT (10);
        
    {Custom} 
    {MLP_CHANGE_VIEW.PRODUCT_ID}
    field PRODUCT_ID 
        links_to MLP_VALUES.PRODUCT_ID;
        
    {Custom} 
    {MLP_CHANGE_VIEW.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION 
        links_to MLP_VALUES.PRODUCT_VERSION;
        
    {Custom} 
    {MLP_CHANGE_VIEW.ANALYSIS_ID}
    field ANALYSIS_ID 
        links_to MLP_VALUES.ANALYSIS_ID;

    {Custom} 
    {MLP_CHANGE_VIEW.Q_METHOD}
    field Q_METHOD 
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.Q_METHOD;

    {Custom} 
    {MLP_CHANGE_VIEW.INOC_PCT}
    field INOC_PCT 
        datatype TEXT(80);
        
    {Custom} 
    {MLP_CHANGE_VIEW.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME 
        links_to MLP_VALUES.COMPONENT_NAME;
        
    {Custom} 
    {MLP_CHANGE_VIEW.UNITS}
    field UNITS 
        datatype TEXT (10);
        
    {Custom} 
    {MLP_CHANGE_VIEW.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID 
        links_to MLP_VALUES.LEVEL_ID;
    
    {Custom} 
    {MLP_CHANGE_VIEW.LIMITS}
    field LIMITS 
        datatype TEXT (20);
        
    {Custom} 
    {MLP_CHANGE_VIEW.TEXT_SPEC}
    field TEXT_SPEC 
        datatype TEXT (20);
        
    {Custom} 
    {MLP_CHANGE_VIEW.TEXT_PHRASE}
    field TEXT_PHRASE 
        datatype TEXT (20);
        
    {Custom} 
    select_clause 
        SELECT 'Added' ACTION, l.PRODUCT_ID, m.PRODUCT_VERSION, l.ANALYSIS_ID, l.Q_METHOD, l.INOC_PCT, l.COMPONENT_NAME, l.UNITS, l.LEVEL_ID, l.LIMITS, l.TEXT_SPEC, l.TEXT_PHRASE 
        FROM MLP_HEADER m
        INNER JOIN MLP_LIMITS_VIEW l
            ON m.[IDENTITY] = l.PRODUCT_ID
            AND m.PRODUCT_VERSION = l.PRODUCT_VERSION
        WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM  MLP_LIMITS_VIEW l0
                          WHERE l0.PRODUCT_ID = m.[IDENTITY] 
                            AND l0.PRODUCT_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION - 1
                            AND l0.ANALYSIS_ID = l.ANALYSIS_ID 
                            AND l0.COMPONENT_NAME = l.COMPONENT_NAME
                            AND l0.LEVEL_ID = l.LEVEL_ID)
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Modified' ACTION, l.PRODUCT_ID, m.PRODUCT_VERSION, l.ANALYSIS_ID, l.Q_METHOD, l.INOC_PCT, l.COMPONENT_NAME, l.UNITS, l.LEVEL_ID, l.LIMITS, l.TEXT_SPEC , l.TEXT_PHRASE
        FROM MLP_HEADER m
        INNER JOIN MLP_LIMITS_VIEW l
            ON m.[IDENTITY] = l.PRODUCT_ID
            AND m.PRODUCT_VERSION = l.PRODUCT_VERSION
        WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
                          FROM  MLP_LIMITS_VIEW l0
                          WHERE m.[IDENTITY] = l0.PRODUCT_ID
                            AND m.PRODUCT_VERSION - 1 = l0.PRODUCT_VERSION
                            AND l.ANALYSIS_ID = l0.ANALYSIS_ID
                            AND l0.Q_METHOD = l.Q_METHOD
                            AND l0.INOC_PCT = l.INOC_PCT
                            AND l.COMPONENT_NAME = l0.COMPONENT_NAME
                            AND l0.LEVEL_ID = l.LEVEL_ID
                            AND l0.LIMITS = l.LIMITS
                            AND l0.TEXT_SPEC = l.TEXT_SPEC
                            AND l0.TEXT_PHRASE = l.TEXT_PHRASE)
              AND EXISTS (SELECT 1
                          FROM  MLP_LIMITS_VIEW l0
                          WHERE m.[IDENTITY] = l0.PRODUCT_ID
                            AND m.PRODUCT_VERSION - 1 = l0.PRODUCT_VERSION
                            AND l.ANALYSIS_ID = l0.ANALYSIS_ID
                            AND l.COMPONENT_NAME = l0.COMPONENT_NAME
                            AND l0.LEVEL_ID = l.LEVEL_ID)
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Removed' ACTION, l.PRODUCT_ID, m.PRODUCT_VERSION, l.ANALYSIS_ID, l.Q_METHOD, l.INOC_PCT, l.COMPONENT_NAME, l.UNITS, l.LEVEL_ID, l.LIMITS, l.TEXT_SPEC, l.TEXT_PHRASE 
        FROM MLP_HEADER m
        INNER JOIN MLP_LIMITS_VIEW l
            ON m.[IDENTITY] = l.PRODUCT_ID
            AND m.PRODUCT_VERSION - 1 = l.PRODUCT_VERSION
        INNER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS a
            ON a.[IDENTITY] = l.ANALYSIS_ID
            AND a.ANALYSIS_VERSION = l.ANALYSIS_VERSION
        LEFT OUTER JOIN PARM_SETUP p
            ON p.[IDENTITY] = m.[IDENTITY]
            AND p.IDENTITY_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION
            AND p.PARM_ID = 'INOC_PCT'
            AND p.VAL1 = l.ANALYSIS_ID
        WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM  MLP_LIMITS_VIEW l0
                          WHERE l0.PRODUCT_ID = m.[IDENTITY] 
                            AND l0.PRODUCT_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION 
                            AND l0.ANALYSIS_ID = l.ANALYSIS_ID 
                            AND l0.COMPONENT_NAME = l.COMPONENT_NAME
                            AND l0.LEVEL_ID = l.LEVEL_ID);


    {Custom} 
    view MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW
        on_table MLP_HEADER, SAP_MATMAS;

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to MLP_HEADER.GROUP_ID; 

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY; 

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION; 

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.APPROVAL_STATUS}
    field APPROVAL_STATUS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.APPROVAL_STATUS; 

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.MODIFIED_ON}
    field MODIFIED_ON
        datatype DATE; 

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.MASTERSTATUS}
    field MASTERSTATUS 
        datatype text(60); 

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION 
        datatype text(40); 

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.NAMECULTURE}
    field NAMECULTURE 
        datatype text(30); 

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.CLASSID}
    field CLASSID
        datatype text(4); 

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.GMP_STATUS}
    field GMP_STATUS
        datatype TEXT (20); 

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.PRODUCTSEGMENT}
    field PRODUCTSEGMENT
        datatype TEXT (30); 

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.PRODUCTCLUSTER}
    field PRODUCTCLUSTER
        datatype TEXT (30); 

    {Custom} 
    {MATMAS_UPDATE_VIEW.PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER}
    field PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER
        datatype TEXT (30);


    {Custom} 
    select_clause 
        SELECT
            m.GROUP_ID
            ,m.[IDENTITY] 'IDENTITY'
            ,m.PRODUCT_VERSION
            ,m.APPROVAL_STATUS
            ,CAST(m.MODIFIED_ON AS SMALLDATETIME) MODIFIED_ON
            ,CASE
                WHEN m.SAP_MASTERSTATUS = s.MASTERSTATUS THEN ''
                ELSE s.MASTERSTATUS + +': ' + +ms.PHRASE_TEXT
            END MASTERSTATUS
            ,CASE
                WHEN s.DESCRIPTION <> m.DESCRIPTION THEN s.DESCRIPTION
                ELSE ''
            END DESCRIPTION
            ,CASE
                WHEN s.NAMECULTURE <> m.PRODUCT_CODE THEN s.NAMECULTURE
                ELSE ''
            END NAMECULTURE
            ,CASE
                WHEN s.CLASSID <> m.MATERIAL_TYPE THEN s.CLASSID
                ELSE ''
            END CLASSID
            ,CASE
                WHEN s.GMP_STATUS = m.GMP_STATUS OR 
                     s.GMP_STATUS = 'Not applicable' OR
                     s.GMP_STATUS IS NULL THEN ''
                ELSE s.GMP_STATUS
            END GMP_STATUS
            ,CASE
                WHEN s.PRODUCTSEGMENT <> m.PRODUCTSEGMENT THEN s.PRODUCTSEGMENT
                ELSE ''
            END PRODUCTSEGMENT
            ,CASE
                WHEN s.PRODUCTCLUSTER <> m.PRODUCTCLUSTER THEN s.PRODUCTCLUSTER
                ELSE ''
            END PRODUCTCLUSTER
            ,CASE
                WHEN s.PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER <> m.PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER THEN s.PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER
                ELSE ''
            END PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER
        FROM (SELECT
                s.GIN
                ,s.MASTERSTATUS
                ,s.DESCRIPTION
                ,CASE
                    WHEN c.TEXTVALUE IS NULL OR
                         c.TEXTVALUE = '' OR
                         c.TEXTVALUE = 'No information' OR
                         c.TEXTVALUE = 'Not applicable' 
                    THEN s.NAMECULTURE
                    ELSE c.TEXTVALUE + +' ' + +s.NAMECULTURE
                END NAMECULTURE
                ,s.CLASSID
                ,s.PRODUCTCLUSTER
                ,s.PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER
                ,s.PRODUCTSEGMENT
                ,gmp.TEXTVALUE GMP_STATUS
            FROM SAP_MATMAS s
            INNER JOIN MAX_MATMAS sv
                ON s.GIN = sv.[IDENTITY]
                AND s.UNIQUEID = sv.UNIQUEID
            LEFT OUTER JOIN SAP_CLASS c
                ON s.UNIQUEID = c.UNIQUEID
                AND c.TYPE = 'Material class'
                AND c.ID = 'PRODUCT_FAMILY_CULTURE'
            LEFT OUTER JOIN SAP_CLASS gmp
                ON s.UNIQUEID = gmp.UNIQUEID
                AND gmp.TYPE = 'Material class'
                AND gmp.ID = 'GROUPING' EXCEPT SELECT
                m.[IDENTITY]
                ,m.SAP_MASTERSTATUS
                ,m.DESCRIPTION
                ,m.PRODUCT_CODE
                ,m.MATERIAL_TYPE
                ,m.PRODUCTCLUSTER
                ,m.PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER
                ,m.PRODUCTSEGMENT
                , m.GMP_STATUS
            FROM MLP_HEADER m
            INNER JOIN MAX_ACTIVE_MLP_VER v
                ON m.[IDENTITY] = v.[IDENTITY]
                AND m.PRODUCT_VERSION = v.MAX_VERSION) s
        INNER JOIN MAX_MLP_VERSION v
            ON s.GIN = v.[IDENTITY]
        INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER m
            ON v.[IDENTITY] = m.[IDENTITY]
            AND v.MAX_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION
        LEFT OUTER JOIN PHRASE ms
            ON ms.PHRASE_TYPE = 'MASTERSTAT'
            AND ms.PHRASE_ID = s.MASTERSTATUS
        WHERE m.REMOVEFLAG = 'F'
          AND (s.MASTERSTATUS <> m.SAP_MASTERSTATUS
            OR s.DESCRIPTION <> m.DESCRIPTION
            OR s.NAMECULTURE <> m.PRODUCT_CODE
            OR s.CLASSID <> m.MATERIAL_TYPE
            OR s.GMP_STATUS <> m.GMP_STATUS
            OR s.PRODUCTSEGMENT <> m.PRODUCTSEGMENT
            OR s.PRODUCTCLUSTER <> m.PRODUCTCLUSTER
            OR s.PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER <> m.PRODUCTSUBCLUSTER);

    {Custom} 
    view SAP_STRAINS_VIEW;

    {Custom} 
    {SAP_STRAINS_VIEW.SAP_UNIQUEID}
    field SAP_UNIQUEID
        datatype TEXT (234); 

    {Custom} 
    {SAP_STRAINS_VIEW.STRAINS}
    field STRAINS
        datatype TEXT (234);

    {Custom} 
    select_clause
        SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT v.UNIQUEID, v.STRAIN 
        FROM (
            SELECT
                c.UNIQUEID
                ,c.TEXTVALUE STRAIN
                ,c.ORDERNUMBER
            FROM SAP_CLASS c
            LEFT OUTER JOIN SAP_CLASS i
                ON c.UNIQUEID = i.UNIQUEID
                AND i.ID = 'STRAINS_INGREDIENTS'
            WHERE c.TYPE = 'Material class'
            AND c.ID IN ('STRAINS', 'STRAINS_INGREDIENTS')
            AND i.ID IS NULL
            UNION
            SELECT
                c.UNIQUEID
                ,c.TEXTVALUE
                ,c.ORDERNUMBER
            FROM SAP_CLASS c
            WHERE c.TYPE = 'Material class'
            AND c.ID IN ('STRAINS_INGREDIENTS')) v
        ORDER BY v.UNIQUEID, v.ORDERNUMBER;

    {Custom}
    view JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW
        on_table JOB_HEADER, SAMPLE, TEST, RESULT, SAMPLE_POINT, VERSIONED_ANALYSIS,
        VERSIONED_COMPONENT;

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.JOB_NAME}
    field JOB_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.JOB_NAME; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.PRODUCT}
    field PRODUCT
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.PRODUCT_VERSION}
    field PRODUCT_VERSION
        links_to SAMPLE.PRODUCT_VERSION; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.INSPECTION_TYPE}
    field INSPECTION_TYPE
        links_to JOB_HEADER.INSPECTION_TYPE; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.ID_NUMERIC}
    field ID_NUMERIC
        links_to SAMPLE.ID_NUMERIC; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.IDENTITY; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.TEST_NUMBER}
    field TEST_NUMBER
        links_to TEST.TEST_NUMBER; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.IDENTITY; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.COA_GROUP}
    field COA_GROUP
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.COA_GROUP; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.ORDER_NUMBER}
    field ORDER_NUMBER
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.ORDER_NUMBER; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.NAME; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.TEXT}
    field TEXT
        links_to RESULT.TEXT; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.UNITS}
    field UNITS
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.UNITS; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.ENTERED_ON}
    field ENTERED_ON
        links_to RESULT.ENTERED_ON; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.SAP_CHARAC}
    field SAP_CHARAC
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.SAP_CHARAC; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.CALCULATION}
    field CALCULATION
        links_to VERSIONED_COMPONENT.CALCULATION; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.LEVEL_ID}
    field LEVEL_ID
        links_to MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.LEVEL_ID; 

    {Custom} 
    {JOB_VALIDATION_VIEW.LIMITS}
    field LIMITS
        links_to MLP_LIMITS_VIEW.LIMITS; 

    select_clause
        SELECT DISTINCT
            a1.JOB_NAME
            ,a1.PRODUCT
            ,a1.PRODUCT_VERSION
            ,a1.INSPECTION_TYPE
            ,a1.ID_NUMERIC
            ,a1.SAMPLING_POINT
            ,t.TEST_NUMBER
            ,c.ANALYSIS
            ,a.COA_GROUP
            ,c.ORDER_NUMBER
            ,c.NAME
            ,CASE
                WHEN t.STATUS IN ('A', 'C') THEN r.TEXT
                WHEN t.STATUS IS NULL THEN '>>No test<<'
                ELSE '>>' + +tstat.PHRASE_TEXT + +'<<'
            END TEXT
            ,c.UNITS
            ,r.ENTERED_ON
            ,CASE
                WHEN sp.MPS_EXPORT = 'T' THEN c.SAP_CHARAC
                ELSE ''
            END SAP_CHARAC
            ,c.CALCULATION
            ,l.LEVEL_ID
            ,l.LIMITS
        FROM (SELECT
                j.JOB_NAME
                ,s.ID_NUMERIC
                ,s.STATUS
                ,s.PRODUCT
                ,s.PRODUCT_VERSION
                ,s.INSPECTION_TYPE
                ,s.SAMPLING_POINT
                ,t.ANALYSIS
                ,t.ANALYSIS_VERSION
            FROM ALL_JOB_HEADER j
            INNER JOIN ALL_SAMPLE s
                ON j.JOB_NAME = s.JOB_NAME
            INNER JOIN ALL_TEST t
                ON s.ID_NUMERIC = t.SAMPLE UNION ALL SELECT
                j.JOB_NAME
                ,s.ID_NUMERIC
                ,s.STATUS
                ,s.PRODUCT
                ,s.PRODUCT_VERSION
                ,s.INSPECTION_TYPE
                ,sp.[IDENTITY]
                ,ts.ANALYSIS
                ,a.ANALYSIS_VERSION
            FROM ALL_JOB_HEADER j
            INNER JOIN ALL_SAMPLE s
                ON j.PRODUCT_NAME = s.PRODUCT
                AND j.BATCH_NAME = s.BATCH_NAME
            RIGHT OUTER JOIN PROD_SCHED ps
                ON s.PRODUCT = ps.PRODUCT_NAME
                AND s.PRODUCT_VERSION = ps.PRODUCT_VERSION
                AND s.SAMPLING_POINT = ps.SAMPLING_POINT
                AND j.LOGIN_PLANT = ps.GROUP_ID
                AND (LEFT(j.INSPECTION_TYPE, 2) = ps.INSPECTION_TYPE
                OR ps.INSPECTION_TYPE = '')
            INNER JOIN SAMPLE_POINT sp
                ON s.SAMPLING_POINT = sp.[IDENTITY]
                OR ps.SAMPLING_POINT = sp.[IDENTITY]
            LEFT OUTER JOIN TEST_SCHED_VIEW ts
                ON ps.TEST_SCHEDULE = ts.[IDENTITY]
            INNER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS a
                ON a.[IDENTITY] = ts.ANALYSIS
                AND a.ANALYSIS_VERSION = (SELECT
                        MAX(va.ANALYSIS_VERSION)
                    FROM VERSIONED_ANALYSIS va
                    WHERE va.[IDENTITY] = ts.ANALYSIS
                    AND va.MODIFIED_ON < j.DATE_CREATED)) a1
        INNER JOIN SAMPLE_POINT sp
            ON a1.SAMPLING_POINT = sp.[IDENTITY]
        INNER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS a
            ON a.[IDENTITY] = a1.ANALYSIS
            AND a.ANALYSIS_VERSION = a1.ANALYSIS_VERSION
        INNER JOIN VERSIONED_COMPONENT c
            ON c.ANALYSIS = a1.ANALYSIS
            AND c.ANALYSIS_VERSION = a1.ANALYSIS_VERSION
        INNER JOIN MLP_LIMITS_VIEW l
            ON l.PRODUCT_ID = a1.PRODUCT
            AND l.PRODUCT_VERSION = a1.PRODUCT_VERSION
            AND l.ANALYSIS_ID = a1.ANALYSIS
            AND l.COMPONENT_NAME = c.NAME
            AND l.LEVEL_ID <> 'NEWANALYSE'
        LEFT OUTER JOIN ALL_TEST t
            ON a1.ID_NUMERIC = t.SAMPLE
            AND a1.ANALYSIS = t.ANALYSIS
        LEFT OUTER JOIN PHRASE tstat
            ON tstat.PHRASE_TYPE = 'TEST_STAT'
            AND tstat.PHRASE_ID = t.STATUS
        LEFT OUTER JOIN ALL_RESULT r
            ON t.TEST_NUMBER = r.TEST_NUMBER
            AND c.NAME = r.NAME
        WHERE a1.STATUS IN ('C', 'A');
    
    view LOGIN_SCHEDULE_VIEW
        on_table prod_sched, mlp_header;

    {Custom} 
    {LOGIN_SCHEDULE_VIEW.PRODUCT}
    field PRODUCT
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY; 

    {Custom} 
    {LOGIN_SCHEDULE_VIEW.VERSION}
    field VERSION
        links_to MLP_HEADER.PRODUCT_VERSION
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY; 

    {Custom} 
    {LOGIN_SCHEDULE_VIEW.STATUS}
    field STATUS
        links_to MLP_HEADER.APPROVAL_STATUS; 

    {Custom} 
    {LOGIN_SCHEDULE_VIEW.INSPECTION}
    field INSPECTION
        links_to PROD_SCHED.INSPECTION_TYPE
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY; 

    {Custom} 
    {LOGIN_SCHEDULE_VIEW.SAMPLING_POINT}
    field SAMPLING_POINT
        links_to SAMPLE_POINT.IDENTITY
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY; 

    {Custom} 
    {LOGIN_SCHEDULE_VIEW.LOGIN_PLANT}
    field LOGIN_PLANT
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY; 

    {Custom} 
    {LOGIN_SCHEDULE_VIEW.LABELS}
    field LABELS
        links_to PROD_SCHED.LABEL_COUNT; 

    {Custom} 
    {LOGIN_SCHEDULE_VIEW.GROUP_ID}
    field GROUP_ID
        links_to GROUP_HEADER.IDENTITY; 

    {Custom} 
    {LOGIN_SCHEDULE_VIEW.TEST_SCHEDULE}
    field TEST_SCHEDULE
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.IDENTITY; 

    {Custom} 
    {LOGIN_SCHEDULE_VIEW.DESCRIPTION}
    field DESCRIPTION
        links_to TEST_SCHED_HEADER.DESCRIPTION; 

    select_clause
        SELECT
             ps.PRODUCT_NAME PRODUCT
            ,ps.PRODUCT_VERSION VERSION
            ,m.APPROVAL_STATUS STATUS
            ,ps.INSPECTION_TYPE INSPECTION
            ,ps.SAMPLING_POINT
            ,ps.GROUP_ID LOGIN_PLANT
            ,ps.LABEL_COUNT LABELS
            ,ps.ASSIGNED_GROUP GROUP_ID
            ,ps.TEST_SCHEDULE
            ,ts.DESCRIPTION
        FROM PROD_SCHED ps
        INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER m
            ON ps.PRODUCT_NAME = m.[IDENTITY]
            AND ps.PRODUCT_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION
        INNER JOIN TEST_SCHED_HEADER ts
            ON ps.TEST_SCHEDULE = ts.[IDENTITY]
        WHERE ps.PRODUCT_VERSION >= (SELECT MAX(PRODUCT_VERSION)
                                  FROM MLP_HEADER
                                  WHERE [IDENTITY] = PRODUCT_NAME
                                    AND APPROVAL_STATUS = 'A'
                                    AND REMOVEFLAG = 'F');
                                    
    table BATCH_CLASS; 
    
    {BATCH_CLASS.PRODUCT_NAME}
    field PRODUCT_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.PRODUCT_NAME
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {BATCH_CLASS.BATCH_NAME}
    field BATCH_NAME
        links_to JOB_HEADER.BATCH_NAME
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {BATCH_CLASS.INSPECTION_LOT}
    field INSPECTION_LOT
        links_to JOB_HEADER.INSPECTION_LOT
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {BATCH_CLASS.UNITWEIGHT}
    field UNITWEIGHT
        datatype TEXT (234);
        

    table SAP_CHAR; 
    
    {SAP_CHAR.CHAR}
    field CHAR
        datatype IDENTITY(8)
        used_for UNIQUE_KEY;

    {SAP_CHAR.NAME}
    field NAME
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME;

    
    view SAP_LIMITS
    on_table MLP_HEADER, MLP_COMPONENTS;

    {SAP_LIMITS.PLANT}
    field PLANT
        links_to PROD_SCHED.GROUP_ID;

    {SAP_LIMITS.IDENTITY}
    field IDENTITY
        links_to MLP_HEADER.IDENTITY;

    {SAP_LIMITS.EXT_VERSION}
    field EXT_VERSION
        links_to EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS.EXTERNAL_NUMBER;

    {SAP_LIMITS.EXT_DATE}
    field EXT_DATE
        links_to EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS.EXTERNAL_DATE;

    {SAP_LIMITS.SAP_CHAR}
    field SAP_CHAR
        links_to SAP_CHAR.CHAR;

    {SAP_LIMITS.ANALYSIS}
    field ANALYSIS
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.ANALYSIS_ID;

    {SAP_LIMITS.COMPONENT_NAME}
    field COMPONENT_NAME
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.COMPONENT_NAME;

    {SAP_LIMITS.INTERNAL_SPEC}
    field INTERNAL_SPEC
        datatype TEXT(60);

    {SAP_LIMITS.EXTERNAL_SPEC}
    field EXTERNAL_SPEC
        datatype TEXT(60);

    {SAP_LIMITS.UNIT}
    field UNIT
        links_to MLP_COMPONENTS.UNITS;
    
    {SAP_LIMITS.REFERENCE_METHOD}
    field REFERENCE_METHOD
        links_to VERSIONED_ANALYSIS.Q_METHOD;

    {SAP_LIMITS.CONDITION}
    field CONDITION
        datatype TEXT(60);

    {SAP_LIMITS.select_clause}
    select_clause
        SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT
            ps.GROUP_ID PLANT
           ,m.[IDENTITY]
           ,x.EXTERNAL_NUMBER EXT_VERSION
           ,CAST(x.EXTERNAL_DATE AS DATE) EXT_DATE
           ,sap.CHAR SAP_CHAR
           ,c.ANALYSIS_ID ANALYSIS
           ,c.COMPONENT_NAME
           ,CASE
                WHEN int.ENTRY_CODE IS NULL THEN ''
                WHEN (int.MAX_LIMIT = '') AND
                    (int.MIN_LIMIT <> '') THEN LTRIM(int.MIN_LIMIT)
                WHEN (int.MAX_LIMIT <> '') AND
                    (int.MIN_LIMIT <> '') THEN LTRIM(int.MIN_LIMIT) + +' - ' + +int.MAX_LIMIT
                WHEN lpe.RESULT_VALUE_COUNT = 1 THEN lpe.RESULT_VALUE
                WHEN int.TEXT_PHRASE <> '' THEN int.TEXT_PHRASE
                ELSE int.TEXT_SPEC
            END AS 'INTERNAL_SPEC'
           ,CASE
                WHEN ext.ENTRY_CODE IS NULL THEN ''
                WHEN (ext.MAX_LIMIT = '') AND
                    (ext.MIN_LIMIT <> '') THEN LTRIM(ext.MIN_LIMIT)
                WHEN (ext.MAX_LIMIT <> '') AND
                    (ext.MIN_LIMIT <> '') THEN LTRIM(ext.MIN_LIMIT) + +' - ' + +ext.MAX_LIMIT
                WHEN lpe.RESULT_VALUE_COUNT = 1 THEN lpe.RESULT_VALUE
                WHEN ext.TEXT_PHRASE <> '' THEN ext.TEXT_PHRASE
                ELSE ext.TEXT_SPEC
            END AS 'EXTERNAL_SPEC'
           ,CASE
                WHEN c.UNITS = 'ph' THEN ''
                ELSE c.UNITS
            END UNIT
           ,a.Q_METHOD REFERENCE_METHOD
           ,CASE
                WHEN p.VAL8 IS NOT NULL 
                AND coa.PHRASE_TEXT = 'Performance' 
                AND (a.[IDENTITY] LIKE '%CPH%' OR a.[IDENTITY] LIKE '%MPH%' OR a.[IDENTITY] LIKE '%DPH%') 
                THEN a.INOC_TEMP + +'C, ' + +p.VAL8 + +' inoculation'
                WHEN p.VAL8 IS NOT NULL 
                AND coa.PHRASE_TEXT = 'Performance' 
                AND a.[IDENTITY] LIKE '%MTB%' 
                AND a.ANALYSIS_TYPE = 'CHEMICAL'
                THEN CAST(CAST(SUBSTRING(a.EXPECTED_TIME, 6, 2) AS INT) AS VARCHAR) ++ 'h, ' + +p.VAL8 + +' inoculation'
                ELSE ''
            END CONDITION 
        FROM MLP_HEADER_VIEW m
        INNER JOIN MAX_ACTIVE_MLP_VER v
            ON m.[IDENTITY] = v.[IDENTITY]
            AND m.PRODUCT_VERSION = v.MAX_VERSION
        INNER JOIN MLP_HEADER mh
            ON m.[IDENTITY] = mh.[IDENTITY]
            AND m.PRODUCT_VERSION = mh.PRODUCT_VERSION
        LEFT OUTER JOIN EXTERNAL_MLP_VERSIONS x
            ON mh.[IDENTITY] = x.[IDENTITY]
            AND mh.PRODUCT_VERSION = x.MLP_VERSION
            AND x.EXTERNAL_VERSION = 'T'
        INNER JOIN PROD_SCHED ps
            ON mh.[IDENTITY] = ps.PRODUCT_NAME
            AND mh.PRODUCT_VERSION = ps.PRODUCT_VERSION
            AND ps.INSPECTION_TYPE = '04'
        INNER JOIN MLP_COMPONENTS c
            ON M.SUB_IDENTITY = c.PRODUCT_ID
            AND M.SUB_PRODUCT_VERSION = c.PRODUCT_VERSION
        LEFT OUTER JOIN SAP_CHAR sap
            ON c.COMPONENT_NAME = sap.NAME COLLATE Latin1_General_CS_AS_WS
        LEFT OUTER JOIN VERSIONED_ANALYSIS a
            ON c.ANALYSIS_ID = a.[IDENTITY]
            AND a.ANALYSIS_VERSION = (SELECT
                    MAX(a.ANALYSIS_VERSION)
                FROM VERSIONED_ANALYSIS a
                WHERE a.[IDENTITY] = c.ANALYSIS_ID
                AND a.MODIFIED_ON <= m.MODIFIED_ON)
        INNER JOIN PHRASE coa
            ON a.COA_GROUP = coa.PHRASE_ID
            AND coa.PHRASE_TYPE = 'COA_GROUP'
        LEFT OUTER JOIN PARM_SETUP p
            ON p.[IDENTITY] = m.[IDENTITY]
            AND p.IDENTITY_VERSION = m.PRODUCT_VERSION
            AND p.PARM_ID = 'INOC_PCT'
            AND p.VAL1 = c.ANALYSIS_ID
        LEFT OUTER JOIN MLP_VALUES int
            ON c.ENTRY_CODE = int.ENTRY_CODE
            AND int.LEVEL_ID = 'INTERNAL'
        LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                lpi.LIMIT_PHRASE
               ,lpi.COMPARISON
               ,lpi.RESULT_VALUE
               ,COUNT(lpi.RESULT_VALUE) RESULT_VALUE_COUNT
            FROM LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY lpi
            GROUP BY lpi.LIMIT_PHRASE
                    ,lpi.COMPARISON
                    ,lpi.RESULT_VALUE) lpi
            ON lpi.LIMIT_PHRASE = int.TEXT_PHRASE
            AND lpi.COMPARISON <> int.BOOLEAN_PASS
        LEFT OUTER JOIN MLP_VALUES ext
            ON c.ENTRY_CODE = ext.ENTRY_CODE
            AND ext.LEVEL_ID = 'EXTERNAL'
        LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                lpe.LIMIT_PHRASE
               ,lpe.COMPARISON
               ,lpe.RESULT_VALUE
               ,COUNT(lpe.RESULT_VALUE) RESULT_VALUE_COUNT
            FROM LIMIT_PHRASE_ENTRY lpe
            GROUP BY lpe.LIMIT_PHRASE
                    ,lpe.COMPARISON
                    ,lpe.RESULT_VALUE) lpe
            ON lpe.LIMIT_PHRASE = ext.TEXT_PHRASE
            AND lpe.COMPARISON <> ext.BOOLEAN_PASS
        WHERE (ext.LEVEL_ID = 'EXTERNAL'
        OR int.LEVEL_ID = 'INTERNAL')
        ORDER BY m.[IDENTITY], ps.GROUP_ID, c.ANALYSIS_ID, c.COMPONENT_NAME;
